T09TD4156E:1b-1: buddha tsa ri ta ma h'a k'a bya n'a ma /
T09TD4156E:1b-3: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po /
T09TD4156E:1b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' [dd] thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T09TD4156E:1b-5: dpal ldan yon tan tshogs kyis gang //
T09TD4156E:1b-6: bdag nyid chen po sems can gyi //
T09TD4156E:1b-7: don mdzad yang dag sangs rgyas dang //
T09TD4156E:1b-9: / bu ram shing par mthu mnyam bu ram shing ba'i rgyud //
T09TD4156E:1b-10: thub dka' sh'akya rnams la spyod pa rnam dag pa //
T09TD4156E:1b-11: 'phrog byed zla ba lta bur skye dgu rnams la sdug / rgyal po zas gtsang zhes bya'i ming can byung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:1b-12: dbang po dang mtshungs de yi bdag po ldan ma yin //
T09TD4156E:1b-13: nus mthu rjes mtshungs gzi brjid lha mo bde sogs dang //
T09TD4156E:1b-14: padmo can 'dra phun sum tshogs pas bzhin brtan //
T09TD4156E:1b-15: sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya dpe med sgyu 'dra byung //
T09TD4156E:1b-16: mi skyong rgyal po 'di ni de dang thabs cig tu //
T09TD4156E:1b-17: dga' ba nyer ldan rnam thos sras kyi dpal bzhin rol //
T09TD4156E:2a-2: sdig bral ma de mngal ni rnam par gzung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:2a-3: mngal dang nye bar ldan pa nyid kyi sngon rol du //
T09TD4156E:2a-4: de ni gnyid song glang po'i dbang po dkar po zhig / rang nyid la ni rab tu zhugs sogs mthong gyur la //
T09TD4156E:2a-5: de yi mtshan ma nyam thag pa nas thob ma yin //
T09TD4156E:2a-6: lha dang rab tu mtshungs pa de yi lha mo de //
T09TD4156E:2a-7: mngal gyis rigs kyi dpal ni rab tu 'dren byed cing //
T09TD4156E:2a-8: sgyu ma ngal ba dang ni mya ngan sgyu med par //
T09TD4156E:2a-9: gtsang la nyon mongs med pa'i dgon par blo gros mdzad //
T09TD4156E:2a-10: de ni lum bi zhes bya'i nags mthar gyur pa'i sa //
T09TD4156E:2a-11: sna tshogs ljon shing sna tshogs shing rta mngon dga' bar //
T09TD4156E:2a-12: bsam gtan la bzod dben pa'i nags kyi mtha' bzhed ma //
T09TD4156E:2a-13: 'gro ba'i chad dang gnas phyir mi skyong la zhus so //
T09TD4156E:2a-14: de yi chos dang ldan la 'phags pa'i zhes 'dod dag / rnam par shes nas ya mtshan dga' ba yis gang ste //
T09TD4156E:2a-15: zhi ba'i grong nas sa yi bdag po gshegs gyur te //
T09TD4156E:2a-16: de yi dga' ba'i rgyu yin rnam par rgyu phyir min //
T09TD4156E:2a-17: dpal dang ldan pa'i nags der rgyal po'i bdag ldan ma //
T09TD4156E:2a-18: rab tu bltam pa'i dus ni yang dag mngon gzigs shing //
T09TD4156E:2b-0: bla re nye bar @2b phul ba'i gzims mal rab thob ste //
T09TD4156E:2b-1: mi mo stong phrag dag gis mngon par dga' bar byed //
T09TD4156E:2b-2: de nas skar ma rgyal rab ldan par gyur pa'i tshe //
T09TD4156E:2b-3: brtul zhugs legs par 'dus byas lha mo de yi ni //
T09TD4156E:2b-4: rtsib logs dag nas 'jig rten phan phyir sras bltams te //
T09TD4156E:2b-5: tshor ba dang ni bral zhing nad dang bral ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:2b-6: ji ltar brla skyes brla nas rgya chen lag pa nas //
T09TD4156E:2b-7: dbang po dang mtshungs nga la nu ni spyi bo nas //
T09TD4156E:2b-8: mtshan ldan nyid kyang lag pa'i cha shas gsang ba nas //
T09TD4156E:2b-9: rnam pa de ltar de yi skye ba byung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:2b-10: mngal nas mngon par nges par byung ba gzugs mdzes te //
T09TD4156E:2b-11: nam mkha' dag las 'phros 'dre skye gnas las ma skyes //
T09TD4156E:2b-12: bskal ba gcig min rnams su bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid ni //
T09TD4156E:2b-13: gang zhig yang dag rab tu shes na skyes gyur blun po min //
T09TD4156E:2b-14: nyi ma gzhon nu sa lam mngon par babs pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:2b-15: gsal ba dang ni brtan pas gang zhig mdzes pa ste //
T09TD4156E:2b-16: de ltar shin tu gsal yang nges par rtog pa na //
T09TD4156E:2b-17: ri bong gis mtshan ji ltar mig dag 'phrogs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:2b-18: de ni rang gi lus kyi 'od rab 'bar ba yis //
T09TD4156E:2b-19: sgron ma'i 'od kyang gsal bar byed pa ltar bcom ste //
T09TD4156E:2b-20: rin thang chen po 'dzam bu chu gser mdzes pa'i mdog / phyogs rnams thams cad rnam par snang zhing gsal bar mdzad //
T09TD4156E:2b-21: 'khrugs pa ma yin yon po'i skyon dag rab bsal zhing //
T09TD4156E:2b-22: shin tu brtan pa dang ldan rnam par yangs pa'i 'gros //
T09TD4156E:2b-23: de ltar mi g-yo rab tu brtan pa'i gom pa bdun //
T09TD4156E:2b-24: drang srong skar ma bdun dang rab mnyam gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:2b-25: byang chub phyir dang 'gro la phan pa'i phyir skyes shing //
T09TD4156E:2b-26: 'di ni bdag gi srid pa'i skye ba tha ma zhes //
T09TD4156E:2b-27: seng ge'i 'gros 'dra phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:2b-28: snod ldan rnams kyi don byed dag kyang smras par gyur //
T09TD4156E:2b-29: nam mkha' dag las rab babs zla ba'i 'od zer dkar //
T09TD4156E:2b-30: grang dang dro ba'i chu rgyun rnam pa gnyis kyi shugs ;
T09TD4156E:2b-31: / lus la yang dag reg pas bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:2b-32: mdzes shing yid 'ong de yi spyi bor babs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:2b-33: dpal ldan bla re bres par gser gyis 'bar zhing mtshan //
T09TD4156E:2b-34: bee d'urya yi rkang pa'i gzims mal la gzims pa //
T09TD4156E:2b-35: de la gus phyir gser gyi padma'i phyag mnga' ba'i //
T09TD4156E:3a-0: @3a * // gnod sbyin bdag rnams kun nas yongs su bskor nas gnas //
T09TD4156E:3a-1: mi mngon gyur pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' la //
T09TD4156E:3a-2: gang gi mthu las mgo bo yis ni rab btud cing //
T09TD4156E:3a-3: kun nas gdung ba skyob ba'i gdugs dkar rnams bzung ste //
T09TD4156E:3a-4: byang chub ched du mchog gi bsngags pa dag kyang smras //
T09TD4156E:3a-5: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par mchod byas pa'i //
T09TD4156E:3a-6: lto 'phye che rnams khyad 'phags chos la sred pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:3a-7: gang la rlung g-yab kyis g-yab gus pa'i mig gzir cing //
T09TD4156E:3a-8: man d'a ra ba'i me tog rnams kyis yang dag 'thor //
T09TD4156E:3a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa bltams pa'i yon tan gyis tshim pa'i //
T09TD4156E:3a-10: gtsang mar lhag par gnas pa'i rnam dag sems can rnams //
T09TD4156E:3a-11: sdug bsngal nyid du bying ba'i 'gro la phan pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:3a-12: lha rnams 'dod chags bral ba na yang dga' bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:3a-13: gang gis rab tu bltams tshe ri rgyal phur pu nyid //
T09TD4156E:3a-14: rlung gis bsnun pa'i gru ltar sa gzhi g-yos gyur zhing //
T09TD4156E:3a-15: tsandan dang bcas autpal padma'i snying po yi //
T09TD4156E:3a-16: char pa dag ni nam mkha'i sprin dang bral las babs //
T09TD4156E:3a-17: yid 'ong reg na bde ba'i rlung dag byung gyur te //
T09TD4156E:3a-18: lha yi na bza' dag ni mngon par 'bebs byed cing //
T09TD4156E:3a-19: nyi ma de nyid lhag par mngon par gsal ba ste //
T09TD4156E:3a-20: zhi ba'i 'od zer 'dus ma byas pa'i me 'bar ro //
T09TD4156E:3a-21: shar dang byang gi mtshams kyi khang pa'i phyogs gcig na //
T09TD4156E:3a-22: bsil ba'i chu yi khron ba rang byung gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:3a-23: pho brang btsun mo'i 'khor rnams ya mtshan gyur rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:3a-24: gang la bya ba rnams ni stegs bzhin rab tu byas //
T09TD4156E:3a-25: chos dang ldan pa'i lha dang 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:3a-26: de ni lta ba'i don du nags tshal rab gang ste //
T09TD4156E:3a-27: rmad byung ngo mtshar gyur pa nyid kyi shing las kyang //
T09TD4156E:3a-28: me tog rnams ni dus ma yin par nges par brul //
T09TD4156E:3a-29: 'tshe bar byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang de yi tshe //
T09TD4156E:3a-30: phan tshun dag tu phyin te gnod pa mi byed la ;
T09TD4156E:3a-31: /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten dag na nad gang ji snyed pa //
T09TD4156E:3a-32: de dag rnams kyang 'bad pa med par de tshe bcom //
T09TD4156E:3a-33: mkha' 'gro'i bya ni mtho min sgra sgrogs ri dag kyang //
T09TD4156E:3a-34: chu klung dag ni chu yang zhi bar bab gyur la //
T09TD4156E:3a-35: phyogs rnams rab snang dge ba'i nam mkha' rab mdzes shing //
T09TD4156E:3b-0: lha yi rnga rnams mkha' @3b la rab tu grags par gyur //
T09TD4156E:3b-1: rgud par gyur la mgon ni nye bar thob nas bzhin //
T09TD4156E:3b-2: 'jig rten dag kyang mchog tu rab zhi thob gyur la //
T09TD4156E:3b-3: 'jig rten rnams kyi thar pa'i bla ma rab bltams tshe //
T09TD4156E:3b-4: 'dod pa'i lha nyid kho na dga' ba med par gyur //
T09TD4156E:3b-5: shin tu ngo mtshar sras kyi skye pa mthong gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:3b-6: mi bdag brtan pa yin yang rnam par 'gyur nas song //
T09TD4156E:3b-7: rab dga' skyes pa nyid dang yid mi bde skyes te //
T09TD4156E:3b-8: brtse ba las ni mchi ma rnam pa gnyis byung ngo //
T09TD4156E:3b-9: mi ma yin pa'i sras po nyid kyi nus pa dang //
T09TD4156E:3b-10: ma yi rang bzhin kyang ni stobs chung nyid kyi phyir //
T09TD4156E:3b-11: grang dang dro ba'i chu dag 'dres pa'i chu klung bzhin //
T09TD4156E:3b-12: lha mo 'jigs pa dang ni dga' bas gang bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:3b-13: lhag ma spangs te 'jigs pa nyid ni shes byas nas //
T09TD4156E:3b-14: yid 'ong 'dod pa'i ched du rtogs pa ma yin pa'i //
T09TD4156E:3b-15: bud med rgan mo rnams kyis bde legs gyur byas shing //
T09TD4156E:3b-16: gtsang mar byas te lha rnams dag la phyag 'tshal lo //
T09TD4156E:3b-17: de yi mtshan nyid dag kyang shes shing thos gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:3b-18: spyod dang thos dang tshig la grags thob bram ze rnams //
T09TD4156E:3b-19: rnam rgyas zhal ni ya mtshan dga' ba yis gang ste //
T09TD4156E:3b-20: dga' dang 'jigs par gyur pa'i mi yi lha la smras //
T09TD4156E:3b-21: mi dag sa la bu ma gtogs pa'i khyad 'phags pa //
T09TD4156E:3b-22: gzhan gang cung zad 'dod min zhi ba de yi phyir //
T09TD4156E:3b-23: khyod kyi sgron ma 'di ni rigs kyi sgron ma ste //
T09TD4156E:3b-24: khyod nyid dga' bar mdzod cig dga' ston da ltar bgyi //
T09TD4156E:3b-25: de phyir brtan par rnam dpyod med par dgar mdzod dang //
T09TD4156E:3b-26: rigs ni nges pa nyid du mchog tu 'phel bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:3b-27: 'di ni khyod kyi bu zhes skyes par gyur ba ste //
T09TD4156E:3b-28: 'jig rten sdug bsngal dag gis mngon par bcom pa'i mgon //
T09TD4156E:3b-29: mchog gyur 'di la mchog gyur gser gyi 'od mnga' zhing //
T09TD4156E:3b-30: sgron ma'i 'od zer dag gis mtshan rnams gang gyur pas //
T09TD4156E:3b-31: de nyid rtogs par gyur pa'i thub par 'gyur ba'am //
T09TD4156E:3b-32: yang na mi bdag sa stengs 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:3b-33: sa yi bdag po nyid la gal te dga' 'gyur na //
T09TD4156E:3b-34: stobs dang chos dag gis ni de'i tshe sa stengs su //
T09TD4156E:3b-35: rgyal po kun gyi thog tu 'di ni gnas 'gyur te //
T09TD4156E:3b-36: skar ma'i 'od rnams la ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin no //
T09TD4156E:3b-37: de ni gal te thar bzhed nags su gshegs gyur na //
T09TD4156E:3b-38: mkhyen dang de nyid kyis ni de tshes stengs su //
T09TD4156E:4a-1: zil gyis mnan nas 'di ni gnas 'gyur te //
T09TD4156E:4a-2: mtho ba kun la ri rab ri yi rgyal po bzhin //
T09TD4156E:4a-3: ji ltar lcags rnams la ni gser dag mchog yin la //
T09TD4156E:4a-4: ri rnams la ni ri rab chu bo rnams la mtsho //
T09TD4156E:4a-5: gza' rnams la ni zla ba gdung byed rnams la nyi //
T09TD4156E:4a-6: de ltar khyod kyi sras ni rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog / gang gi spyan dag mi 'dzums mig gzir rnam par spangs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:4a-7: brtan zhing shin tu ring la dkar min rdzi ma dang //
T09TD4156E:4a-8: gzi brjid ldan pa yin yang 'on kyang zhi ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:4a-9: 'di ni kun nas gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' ci la min //
T09TD4156E:4a-10: de nas gnyis skyes rnams la mi bdag gis smras pa //
T09TD4156E:4a-11: bdag nyid chen po mi skyong snga mas ma mthong ba //
T09TD4156E:4a-12: mthong zhes khyad 'di gang yin 'di la rgyu mtshan ci //
T09TD4156E:4a-13: de nas bram ze rnams kyis de nyid la smras pa //
T09TD4156E:4a-14: blo dang thos pa las dang grags pa rnams la ni //
T09TD4156E:4a-15: mi skyong sngon dang phyi ma nyid ni tshad ma yin //
T09TD4156E:4a-16: dngos po'i lugs la 'dir ni bya ba rgyu yin la //
T09TD4156E:4a-17: 'dir yang bdag gi dper brjod dag ni mkhyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:4a-18: gang zhig rgyal po'i bstan bcos shes ldan ngan spong dag / rig byed drang srong de gnyis kyis ni ma byas pa //
T09TD4156E:4a-19: de dag gi sras zhi ba pa wa sangs dang ni //
T09TD4156E:4a-20: phur bu yis ni dus kyis de nyid bskyed par gyur ;
T09TD4156E:4a-21: / nyams gyur snga ma rnams kyis ma mthong rig byed gang //
T09TD4156E:4a-22: dbyangs can ma yi bu yis kyang ni slar smras pa //
T09TD4156E:4a-23: nus med gnas 'jog gis ni ma byas gyur pa gang //
T09TD4156E:4a-24: rgyas pa yis ni de ltar rnam pa mang po brjod //
T09TD4156E:4a-25: 'pho byed drang srong chen pos ma bsdebs gyur pa gang //
T09TD4156E:4a-26: tshig gi rkang pa grog mkhar gyis ni dang por bskyed //
T09TD4156E:4a-27: gso ba gang yang rgyun shes kyis ni ma mthong ba //
T09TD4156E:4a-28: phyi nas de ni drang srong rgyun shes bu yis byas //
T09TD4156E:4a-29: gang yang gnyis skyes nyid ni kun shas ma rnyed pa //
T09TD4156E:4a-30: de ni gting dpogs bu yis rgyal po la thob bo //
T09TD4156E:4a-31: bu ram shing pas dang por ma bsdams gyur pa gang /
T09TD4156E:4a-32: rgya mtsho la ni dug bcas kyis kyang mtshams bzung ngo //
T09TD4156E:4a-33: slob dpon nyid du bram ze'i rnal 'byor cho ga la //
T09TD4156E:4a-34: gzhan rnams kyis ma thob pa skyed byed gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:4a-35: khyab 'jug gi ni grags pa'i las rnams gang yin pa //
T09TD4156E:4a-36: de rnams la ni dpa' bo la sogs stobs med gyur //
T09TD4156E:4b-0: de phyir lang tsho dang ni @4b rigs dag tshad ma yin //
T09TD4156E:4b-1: la la la lar mchog nyid nyer thob 'jig rten na //
T09TD4156E:4b-2: rgyal dang drang srong rnams kyis snga mas ma byas pa //
T09TD4156E:4b-3: de dang de dag rnams ni bu rnams dag gis byas //
T09TD4156E:4b-4: de ltar gnyis skyes de rnams kyis ni yid ches te //
T09TD4156E:4b-5: mi skyong dbugs 'byin dang yang mngon par dga' gyur la //
T09TD4156E:4b-6: mi 'dod the tshom dag ni yid las rnam bstsal te //
T09TD4156E:4b-7: rab tu dga' ba nyid la lhag par 'dzegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:4b-8: dga' ba yis ni gnyis skyes dam pa de rnams la //
T09TD4156E:4b-9: bkur sti sngon du 'gro ba'i nor rnams rab phul te //
T09TD4156E:4b-10: ji skad smras bzhin 'di ni sa yi bdag por gyur //
T09TD4156E:4b-11: rgas pa thos nas nags rnams su ni 'gro bar shog / de nas mtshan ma rnams dang dka' thub stobs las ni //
T09TD4156E:4b-12: skye ba mthar mdzad bltams pa de ni rtogs gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:4b-13: dam pa'i chos la gus pa'i sh'akya'i dbang phyug gi / gnas su dkar min drang srong chen por gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:4b-14: tshangs pa'i dpal nyid kyis kyang dka' thub dpal gyis ni //
T09TD4156E:4b-15: 'bar ba'i tshang rig rnams kyi tshang rig de la ni //
T09TD4156E:4b-16: rgyal po'i bla mas gus pa dang ni bkur sti'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:4b-17: mi dbang pho brang du ni rab tu spyan drangs so //
T09TD4156E:4b-18: de ni sa bdag btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nye logs su //
T09TD4156E:4b-19: gzhon nu bltams pa la ni dga' ba'i shugs kyis 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:4b-20: dka' thub mchog las dang ni rgas pa la brten nas //
T09TD4156E:4b-21: brtan pa nags kyi 'du shes kyis ltar rnam par zhugs //
T09TD4156E:4b-22: de nas thub pa gdan la gnas pa de la mi skyong gis //
T09TD4156E:4b-23: zhabs bsil mchod yon sngon 'gro yang dag rab mchod nas //
T09TD4156E:4b-24: sngon tshe gnas mchog la ni mtha' can lhas bzhin des //
T09TD4156E:4b-25: ji ltar nye bar spyod la snyan gsan phab pa'o //
T09TD4156E:4b-26: bdag gi rigs ni rjes su bzung phyir nor ldan des //
T09TD4156E:4b-27: gang zhig bdag la gzigs phyir bcom ldan nyer gshegs la //
T09TD4156E:4b-28: bka' drin gnang bar mdzod cig zhi ba ci bgyi bgyi //
T09TD4156E:4b-29: kho bo slob ma lags so thugs rjes mdzad par rigs //
T09TD4156E:4b-30: de ltar mi skyong gis ni dngos bo thams cad kyis //
T09TD4156E:4b-31: nye bar gsol btab gyur pa'i thub pa ji lta bzhin //
T09TD4156E:4b-32: rab rgyas yangs pa'i spyan ni ya mtshan dang bcas pas //
T09TD4156E:4b-33: zab ba dang ni brtan pa'i chig rnams smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:4b-34: chos 'dod gtong ba dang ldan 'gron la sdug cing phangs //
T09TD4156E:4b-35: bdag nyid chen po khyed la 'thad pa 'di yin la //
T09TD4156E:5a-1: pa rjes 'gro ye shes lang tsho rjes mthun pa //
T09TD4156E:5a-2: khyod kyi blo gros gnyen gang de ltar bdag la yin //
T09TD4156E:5a-3: de dang de ni gang gis mi skyong drang srong des //
T09TD4156E:5a-4: phra mo'i chos kyi nor rnams rab tu thob byas nas //
T09TD4156E:5a-5: rtag par cho ga bzhin du mchod sbyin byas gyur pa //
T09TD4156E:5a-6: dka' thub rnams kyis phyug cing nor rnams dag gis dbul //
T09TD4156E:5a-7: bdag gi nye bar 'ongs la dgos pa gang yin pa //
T09TD4156E:5a-8: bdag gi de ni gson mdzod dga' bar nyer song khyed //
T09TD4156E:5a-9: byang chub rtogs pa'i ched du khyod kyi sras bltams zhes //
T09TD4156E:5a-10: lha yi ngag dag bdag gi nyi ma'i lam du thos //
T09TD4156E:5a-11: ngag de thos nas dang ni yid la bsgoms nas dang //
T09TD4156E:5a-12: mtshan ma rnams kyis shes nas de nas nye bar 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:5a-13: brgya byin gyi ni rgyal mtshan yang dag bsgreng ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:5a-14: sh'akya'i rigs kyi rgyal mtshan blta bar 'dod pa yis //
T09TD4156E:5a-15: zhes pa'i tshig 'di de ltar thos par gyur nas ni //
T09TD4156E:5a-16: mi dbang rab tu dga' bas kun nas g-yos gyur te ;
T09TD4156E:5a-17: / yum gyi pang du son las gzhon nu blangs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:5a-18: dka' thub nor can la ni yang dag bstan par gyur //
T09TD4156E:5a-19: de nas drang srong che des zhabs la 'khor los mtshan //
T09TD4156E:5a-20: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel pa dang //
T09TD4156E:5a-21: glang po bzhin du mdoms nub smin ma mdzod spur bcas //
T09TD4156E:5a-22: ya mtshan dang bcas rgyal po'i sras ni mthong bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:5a-23: lha mo'i pang na zhugs pa me yi bu bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:5a-24: ma ma'i pang du bzhugs pa mngon par mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:5a-25: byung gyur rdzi ma'i mtha' ru mchi ma rnams byung ste //
T09TD4156E:5a-26: dbugs med gyur nas gyen du lta la zhal phyogs gyur //
T09TD4156E:5a-27: mig dag mchi mas yongs gang dkar min mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:5a-28: bu la brtse ba'i phyir ni mi skyong 'dar gyur te //
T09TD4156E:5a-29: mchi ma dang ni gri ba kha zhing ldab ldib bcas //
T09TD4156E:5a-30: thal mo sbyar zhing yan lag btud de dris par gyur //
T09TD4156E:5a-31: gang gi lus ni lha las bar na cung zad cig / rang gi skye ba ngo mtshar mang po'i sgron ma ste //
T09TD4156E:5a-32: gang gi don ni mchog tu 'gyur bar smra ba ste //
T09TD4156E:5a-33: rab tu mthong nas brtan pa gang phyir mchi ma 'ong //
T09TD4156E:5a-34: bcom ldan gzhon nu brtan pa'i tshe can yin snyam mam //
T09TD4156E:5a-35: bdag gi mya ngan ched du skyes pa min nam ci //
T09TD4156E:5a-36: bdag la chu yi snyim ba ci zhig ltar rnyed de //
T09TD4156E:5a-37: 'di ni dus kyis 'thung phyir nye bar 'ongs ma yin //
T09TD4156E:5b-0: @5b bdag gi snyan grags gter ni mi zad yin snyam mam //
T09TD4156E:5b-1: nges par bdag gi rigs kyi lag nor yin snyam ci //
T09TD4156E:5b-2: bde bar pha rol du ni rab tu 'gro snyam mam //
T09TD4156E:5b-3: gnyid par gyur kyang bu ni phye ba'i mig gcig yod //
T09TD4156E:5b-4: bdag gi rigs kyi myu gru skyes pa ma rgyas par //
T09TD4156E:5b-5: yongs su skams pa'i skal ba can zhig min snyam mam //
T09TD4156E:5b-6: khyab bdag myur bar gsungs shig bdag la zhi ba med //
T09TD4156E:5b-7: gnyen 'dun rnams kyis bu la brtse ba khyed kyis rig / de ltar mi 'dod blo yis 'khrul pa byung gyur pa //
T09TD4156E:5b-8: rig nas mi dbang rgyal la thub pa des smras pa //
T09TD4156E:5b-9: bdag gis smras pa gang de the tshom med pa de //
T09TD4156E:5b-10: mi skyong khyed kyi blo gros gzhan gang ma gyur cig /'di yi gzhan gyur mtshon min bdag gi rnam 'gyur te //
T09TD4156E:5b-11: 'on kyang rang la slu bar rab mtshon rnam par 'khrugs //
T09TD4156E:5b-12: skye ba zad pa'i rnyed par bla min rtogs pa po //
T09TD4156E:5b-13: 'di skyes bdag gi 'gro ba la ni dus yin no //
T09TD4156E:5b-14: rgyal srid rnam bar spangs nas yul rnams la mi gnas //
T09TD4156E:5b-15: 'bad pa drag po rnams kyis de nyid thob byas nas //
T09TD4156E:5b-16: 'di ni 'gro la gti mug mun pa rnam 'joms phyir //
T09TD4156E:5b-17: ye shes rang bzhin nyi ma rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:5b-18: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho nad rnams bkram pa'i dbu ba can //
T09TD4156E:5b-19: rga ba'i dpa' rlabs 'chi ba'i shugs ni drag po las //
T09TD4156E:5b-20: 'gro ba nyam thag bying bar gyur rnams 'di yis ni //
T09TD4156E:5b-21: ye shes gru bo chen po yis ni sgrol bar byed //
T09TD4156E:5b-22: shes rab chu yi shugs la brten pa'i tshul khrims dogs //
T09TD4156E:5b-23: ting nge 'dzin ni bsil ba'i brtul zhugs ngang pa 'phyo //
T09TD4156E:5b-24: 'di yi mchog gi chos kyi chu bos rab bskor la //
T09TD4156E:5b-25: sred pas nyam thag gson pa'i 'jig rten 'thung bar byed //
T09TD4156E:5b-26: sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag dang yul gyis bsgribs rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:5b-27: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon 'jigs par gnas pa rnams la ni //
T09TD4156E:5b-28: lam rab chud zos rnams la lam 'gro rnams bzhin du//
T09TD4156E:5b-29: 'dis ni rnam par dag pa'i lam dag 'chad par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:5b-30: yul gyi bud shing can gyi 'dod chags me yis ni //
T09TD4156E:5b-31: 'jig rten skye bo rnam par bsregs par gyur pa la //
T09TD4156E:5b-32: sos ka'i tha mar sprin chen gyis ni char bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:5b-33: 'di yi chos kyi char gyis rab tu sim byed 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:6a-1: gtan ma rig mun pa'i sgo glegs can //
T09TD4156E:6a-2: sgo la skye dgu rnams kyi 'thon pa'i rgyu las ni //
T09TD4156E:6a-3: 'di yis mchog rab kun nas rnyed par dka' ba yi //
T09TD4156E:6a-4: dam pa'i chos kyi sgras ni rnam par 'byed bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:6a-5: rang gi las kyi zhags pa rnams kyis yongs dkris shing//
T09TD4156E:6a-6: sdug bsngal dag gis mngon par zil non rten med pa'i //
T09TD4156E:6a-7: 'jig rten rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:6a-8: chos kyi rgyal po 'dis ni 'ching ba mthar mdzad 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:6a-9: rmongs sam 'dod pa'i bde ba yis sam rgyags las rung //
T09TD4156E:6a-10: 'di yi mthar thug chos gang thos par mi byed pa //
T09TD4156E:6a-11: mi yi 'jig rten 'dir de mya ngan bya ba'i gnas //
T09TD4156E:6a-12: de phyir khyed nyid 'di la mya ngan ma byed cig / yon tan rgya mtsho 'di las 'khrul gyur bdag gi ni //
T09TD4156E:6a-13: bsam gtan rnams ni thob kyang don byas med nyid de //
T09TD4156E:6a-14: de yi dam chos ma thos pa la kho bo ni //
T09TD4156E:6a-15: mtho ris dag na gnas kyang phun tshogs med pa snyam //
T09TD4156E:6a-16: de ltar don thos bshes dang bcas shing btsun mor bcas //
T09TD4156E:6a-17: yid mi bde ba dor nas mi dbang dgar gyur la //
T09TD4156E:6a-18: rnam pa de ltar bdag gi bu ni 'di'o zhes //
T09TD4156E:6a-19: des ni bdag nyid la ni snying po ldan par bsams //
T09TD4156E:6a-20: 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes //
T09TD4156E:6a-21: bsam pa'i rnam par gzung bya snying la byas gyur te //
T09TD4156E:6a-22: nges par 'di ni mi sdug chos kyi phyogs min la //
T09TD4156E:6a-23: rigs rgyud nyams pa las ni 'on kyang 'jigs pa mthong //
T09TD4156E:6a-24: de nas bu la rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rgyal po la //
T09TD4156E:6a-25: bu yi nges pa'i de nyid rig par byas nas su //
T09TD4156E:6a-26: gus bcas gyen du gzugs mthong dkar min thub pa ni //
T09TD4156E:6a-27: rlung gi lam gyis ji ltar 'ongs par gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:6a-28: blo gros byas pa'i sring mo'i bu yang mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:6a-29: thub pa'i gsung mnyan pa dang de yi lugs la ni //
T09TD4156E:6a-30: rnam mang rjes su brtse ba yis ni legs pa des /
T09TD4156E:6a-31: sdug pa'i bu bzhin du ni sbyor ba byed du bcug / sras po skyes pas tshim pa'i mi yi bdag po yang //
T09TD4156E:6a-32: yul la song ba'i 'ching ba rnams ni rnam spangs te //
T09TD4156E:6a-33: sras kyi yid 'ong sras po bltams pa'i las dag ni //
T09TD4156E:6b-0: rigs dang 'dra bar ji lta ba bzhin byed du bcug / zhag bcu yongs su 'das par @6b gyur ba nyid kyi tshe //
T09TD4156E:6b-1: mchog gi dga' ba rab ldan snyoms par gyur pa'i yid //
T09TD4156E:6b-2: sras las mchog tu 'gyur phyir lha yi mchod pa ni //
T09TD4156E:6b-3: bzlas brjod dang ni sbyin sreg bkra shis la sogs byas //
T09TD4156E:6b-4: gzhan yang brgya dang stong phrag yongs su gang ba'i grangs //
T09TD4156E:6b-5: brtan dang stobs ldan bu rnams gser gyi rvar bcas shing //
T09TD4156E:6b-6: rgas pa nye bar 'ongs min sva ma ldan pa'i ba //
T09TD4156E:6b-7: rang gi sras 'phel phyir na gnyis skyes rnams la byin //
T09TD4156E:6b-8: de nas snyoms pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni rnam mang yul //
T09TD4156E:6b-9: rang sems tshim bar byed pa'i bya ba rnams byas nas //
T09TD4156E:6b-10: yon tan ldan zhing dge ba'i yud tsam nges pa na //
T09TD4156E:6b-11: grong khyer rab tu 'jug la dga' bas blo gros mdzad //
T09TD4156E:6b-12: de nas mche gnyis mche ba las byung rin thang che //
T09TD4156E:6b-13: dkar po'i me tog gis spras nor bu'i sgron //
T09TD4156E:6b-14: khri la dge ba'i phyir ni lha mo sras ldan ma //
T09TD4156E:6b-15: lha rnams la ni rab tu btud nas bsnyen par gyur //
T09TD4156E:6b-16: de nas gnas brtan skye mo rjes 'brang sras mgon ma //
T09TD4156E:6b-17: bdag po ldan ma grong la mdun du rab zhugs nas //
T09TD4156E:6b-18: mchod ldan lha na lha rnams kyis ni brgya byin bzhin //
T09TD4156E:6b-19: mi bdag nyid kyang grong ba'i tshogs kyis gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:6b-20: de nas gdong drug skyes pas yid ches dbang phyug bzhin //
T09TD4156E:6b-21: sh'akya'i rgyal pos grong khyer rnam par khyab mdzad de //
T09TD4156E:6b-22: zhal ni dga' bas rab gang 'di dang 'di zhes pa'i //
T09TD4156E:6b-23: srid 'phel rgyas pa dang ni grags dang snyan pa mdzad //
T09TD4156E:6b-24: de nas mi yi bdag po'i sras bltams cher skyes pas //
T09TD4156E:6b-25: ser skya zhes pa'i grong khyer ljongs dang bcas pa de //
T09TD4156E:6b-26: gnod sbyin grong na phun tshogs 'dod ba skyes pa na //
T09TD4156E:6b-27: lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bkram bzhin dga' bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:6b-28: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:6b-29: gzhon nu sku bltams pa'i le'u ste dang po'o /
T09TD4156E:6b-31: // / skye dang rga ba mthong song bdag skyes bdag pham de'i //
T09TD4156E:6b-32: skyes pa nas brtsams mi nyed nyi mas rgyal po de //
T09TD4156E:6b-33: chu yi shugs rnams kyis ni chu bo sin dhu bzhin //
T09TD4156E:6b-34: nor dang glang po rta dang bshes rnams 'phel bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:6b-35: nor rnams dang ni rin po che dang bzang po'i gser //
T09TD4156E:6b-36: de dang de ni byas dang ma byas pa nyid kyang //
T09TD4156E:6b-37: yid la re ba yi rang bzhin du khur gyur pa//
T09TD4156E:7a-0: @7a * // de la gcig tu phan pa'i cha shas gter rnyed gyur //
T09TD4156E:7a-1: gang zhig padma dang mtshungs gnyis 'thung rnams kyis kyang //
T09TD4156E:7a-2: dkyil 'khor 'di la nye bar 'ong bar mi nus pa'i //
T09TD4156E:7a-3: gangs dang ldan pa'i glang chen chang gis dregs de rnams //
T09TD4156E:7a-4: 'bad pa las kyang gzhan du de la nye bar gnas //
T09TD4156E:7a-5: sna tshogs mtshan mas mtshan zhing gsar ba'i gser sga dang //
T09TD4156E:7a-6: de bzhin gzhan rnams dag gis brgyan byas rngog ma 'phyang //
T09TD4156E:7a-7: stobs dang byams pa dang ni nor gyis thob pa yi //
T09TD4156E:7a-8: 'di yi ma gyogs 'gro rnams kyis grong khyer phye mar byas //
T09TD4156E:7a-9: de bzhin 'di yi yul 'khor du ni tshim dang rgyas //
T09TD4156E:7a-10: legs la rdul ldan yon tan ldan pa 'o mar ldan //
T09TD4156E:7a-11: rab mchog be'u rnams dang bcas pa'i ba rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:7a-12: 'o ma mang po 'jo ba mang po byung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:7a-13: 'di yi dgra bo dbus gnas nyid du song gyur pa //
T09TD4156E:7a-14: dbus gnas gyur pa mdza' bshes nyid du rab tu song //
T09TD4156E:7a-15: khyad par du ni bshes gnyen brtan por song ba ste //
T09TD4156E:7a-16: 'di yi phyogs dag gnyis te dgra yang yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:7a-17: de bzhin du ni 'di yi 'jam rlung 'brug gi sgra //
T09TD4156E:7a-18: glog gi phreng ba 'khyil ba yis ni brgyan pa'i sprin //
T09TD4156E:7a-19: rdo char dang ni thog lhung nyes pa rnams kyis gzhan //
T09TD4156E:7a-20: yul du dus la lha yis char pa phab par gyur //
T09TD4156E:7a-21: zhing gi las kyis ngal dub byed pa nyung dus kyang //
T09TD4156E:7a-22: 'bru ni 'bras bu ldan pa dus sbyor bzhin skyes te //
T09TD4156E:7a-23: de rnams nyid kyang 'di yi sman du byung gyur la //
T09TD4156E:7a-24: bcud dang snying po yis kyang mngon par lhags pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:7a-25: g-yul du rab tu zhugs la kun du 'joms pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:7a-26: lus la the tshom za bar byed pa'i dus na yang //
T09TD4156E:7a-27: rang bzhin gnas shing bde ba nyid du nad med par //
T09TD4156E:7a-28: dus kyi dbang gis mi mo rnams ni rab tu btsas //
T09TD4156E:7a-29: brtul zhugs ldan rnams ma gtogs nor rdzas dman na yang //
T09TD4156E:7a-30: mi rnams pha rol rnams las don du gnyer mi byed//
T09TD4156E:7a-31: mngon par don du gnyer la 'phags pa nor 'phra yang //
T09TD4156E:7a-32: de che 'ga' zhig dag ni rgyab kyis phyogs ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:7a-33: de tshe rgyal po de yi rgyal srid la ni dga' //
T09TD4156E:7a-34: gnyen la zhe sa med min mi ster ba yang med //
T09TD4156E:7a-35: brtul zhugs med pa nyid min brdzun med 'tshe med pa //
T09TD4156E:7b-0: sgra mi bsgrags kyi sras po @7b lta bu byung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:7b-1: der yang skyed mos tshal dang lha gnas dka' thub gnas //
T09TD4156E:7b-2: khron pa rdzing dang dge bcu 'du ba'i gnas rnams kyi //
T09TD4156E:7b-3: bya ba rnams ni mtho ris bzhin du nyer thob nas //
T09TD4156E:7b-4: chos 'dod rnams kyis mngon sum du ni rab tu mdzad //
T09TD4156E:7b-5: mu ge dang ni 'jigs dang nad rnams las grol zhing //
T09TD4156E:7b-6: dgar gyur skye bo mtho ris gzhan du mngon par dga' //
T09TD4156E:7b-7: bdag mos bdag po la 'am mo yis bdag por rung //
T09TD4156E:7b-8: phan tshun log par mngon par spyod pa dag kyang med //
T09TD4156E:7b-9: dga' ba'i ched du 'dod la 'ga' zhig gis ma bsnyen //
T09TD4156E:7b-10: 'dod pa'i don du nor ni 'ga' zhig gis ma bsrungs //
T09TD4156E:7b-11: nor gyi don du chos la 'ga' zhig gis ma spyad //
T09TD4156E:7b-12: chos kyi don du 'tshe ba 'ga' zhig gis ma byas //
T09TD4156E:7b-13: rkun po sogs dang dgra yang nyams par rang gnas med //
T09TD4156E:7b-14: pha rol mya ngan med pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin //
T09TD4156E:7b-15: rang gi 'khor lo pha rol 'khor lo las grol te //
T09TD4156E:7b-16: rgyal po de la bde dang lo legs byung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:7b-17: de yi tshe na rgyal po de yi rgyal srid la //
T09TD4156E:7b-18: de skyes pa na nyi ma'i sras po'i yid shes bzhin //
T09TD4156E:7b-19: dga' bar spyad par gyur la sdig pa rab nyams shing //
T09TD4156E:7b-20: chos rnams 'bar zhing nyon mongs rnams ni zhi bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:7b-21: gang phyir rnam pa de ltar don kun grub pa dang //
T09TD4156E:7b-22: rgyal po'i rigs kyi phun sum tshogs pa byung gyur te //
T09TD4156E:7b-23: de phyir mi skyong gis ni sras po de yi mtshan //
T09TD4156E:7b-24: don kun grub ba zhes bya 'di ni rab tu mdzad //
T09TD4156E:7b-25: lha mo sgyu ma yang ni lha yi drang srong mtshungs //
T09TD4156E:7b-26: bu yi nus mthu rnam par spangs pa mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:7b-27: bltams la rab tu dga' mas bzod par ma nus te //
T09TD4156E:7b-28: de nas gnas pa'i ched du ltar ni gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:7b-29: de nas lha yi mngal dang mtshungs pa'i gzhon nu la //
T09TD4156E:7b-30: byams pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang khyad par med pa yi //
T09TD4156E:7b-31: ma yi nu mo mdangs mnyam pa yi rang bzhin la //
T09TD4156E:7b-32: yang dag skyed btsud bdag las skyes pa lta bur gyur //
T09TD4156E:7b-33: de nas nyi ma gzhon nu 'char rir gnas 'dra dang //
T09TD4156E:7b-34: rlung gis rab tu bus par gyur pa'i me bzhin dang //
T09TD4156E:7b-35: skar ma'i bdag po mun min phyogs la gnas pa ltar //
T09TD4156E:7b-36: gzhon nu de ni rim gyis yang dag 'phel bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:8a-0: de nas rin thang chen po'i tsandan @8a * //
T09TD4156E:8a-2: rin chen phreng ba sman gyi snying por bcas rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:8a-3: ri dags rab tu sbyar ba'i gser gyi shing rta rnams //
T09TD4156E:8a-4: 'di yi ched du gshegs kyi khyim rnams dag nas blangs //
T09TD4156E:8a-5: lang tsho nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:8a-6: gser gyi rang bzhin ri dags glang chen rta rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:8a-7: gser dang dngul gyis bris pa'i mi chung gzugs rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:8a-8: shing rta ba glang byung dus yang dag sbyar rnams blangs //
T09TD4156E:8a-9: de ni lang tsho rjes mthun yul la nye spyod pa //
T09TD4156E:8a-10: de rnams kyis ni yul la nyer spyad la //
T09TD4156E:8a-11: dpa' dang brtan pa yis dang blo dang dpal gyis kyang //
T09TD4156E:8a-12: byis pa yin yang byis min rab mtshungs byung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:8a-13: lang tsho gzhon nu shin tu 'das nas yang dag par //
T09TD4156E:8a-14: 'du byed las ni rab tu thob nas dus su ni //
T09TD4156E:8a-15: lo mang dag gis rtogs bya nyin zhag nyung ngu yis //
T09TD4156E:8a-16: rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i rigs pa rnams ni blangs //
T09TD4156E:8a-17: drang srong chen po dkar min las ni sngon rol du //
T09TD4156E:8a-18: de yi nyes legs don gyi skal ba thob nas ni //
T09TD4156E:8a-19: nags su gshegs par 'gyur zhes sh'akya'i rgyal po yis //
T09TD4156E:8a-20: 'dod pa rnams la chags pa skyed du bcug par gyur //
T09TD4156E:8a-21: brtan pa'i tshul khrims spyod pa can gyi rigs de la //
T09TD4156E:8a-22: ngo tsha dang ni dul ba nyer ldan legs ldan ma //
T09TD4156E:8a-23: grags 'dzin ma zhes grags pa rnam par yangs pa ma //
T09TD4156E:8a-24: btsun mor mngon par brjod pa'i dpal mo 'di la blangs //
T09TD4156E:8a-25: kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang ni rab tu mtshungs pa yis //
T09TD4156E:8a-26: mchog gi lus kyis snang zhing gsal ba de nyid ni //
T09TD4156E:8a-27: sh'akya'i rgyal po'i mna' ma de dang thabs cig tu //
T09TD4156E:8a-28: bde sogs ma dang mig stong ldan bzhin mngon par dga' //
T09TD4156E:8a-29: yid kyang dpyod par byed la cung zhig rab log pa //
T09TD4156E:8a-30: gang gis mthong mi 'gyur zhes rjes su bsams byas nas //
T09TD4156E:8a-31: sa la rab tu spyod min lding khang lto nyid du //
T09TD4156E:8a-32: gnas dag mi skyong gis ni de la rnam par bstan //
T09TD4156E:8a-33: de nas gzhal med nam mkhar sa la spyod pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:8a-34: ston kha'i dus kyi chu gter sprin ni dkar po yi //
T09TD4156E:8a-35: dus sbyor kun du bde ba'i gzhi yi lding khang la //
T09TD4156E:8b-0: bud med rnams kyi sil snyan rgya chen rnams kyis rnam @8b par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:8b-1: gser gyis gdams ba'i rnga shing can gyi rdza rnga'i skad //
T09TD4156E:8b-2: mi mo'i lag pa'i rtse mos mngon par brdungs pa yi //
T09TD4156E:8b-3: lha mchog ma yi gar dang mnyam pa'i gar rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:8b-4: ti se'i gangs ltar de yi pho brang mdzes par gyur //
T09TD4156E:8b-5: ngag dang gzo dang rol dang rnam 'gyur rnams kyis kyang //
T09TD4156E:8b-6: rgyags dang rtse dang dgod pa dngar mo rnams kyis dang //
T09TD4156E:8b-7: smin ma bskyod pa yis dang phyed mig lta rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:8b-8: de la der ni mi mo rnams ni dga' bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:8b-9: de nas de ni 'dod pa bsten par mkhas pa yi //
T09TD4156E:8b-10: dga' bas dregs pa'i bud med rnams kyis bzung gyur la //
T09TD4156E:8b-11: gzhal med khang ni rgyab nas bsod nams las can bzhin //
T09TD4156E:8b-12: gzhal med khang ni rgyab nas sa la ma gshegs so //
T09TD4156E:8b-13: mi skyong gis kyang de nyid bskyed pa'i ched las ni //
T09TD4156E:8b-14: de yi 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don gyis bskul gyur te //
T09TD4156E:8b-15: sdig pa las ni dga' bral zhi la mngon dga' zhing //
T09TD4156E:8b-16: legs la skal bar bgos shing dul la bsnyen par gyur //
T09TD4156E:8b-17: brtan min bzhin du 'dod pa'i bde la ma zhen la //
T09TD4156E:8b-18: ma rungs skyed ma la ni yang dag chags ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:8b-19: brtan pas dbang po'i rta ni stobs las rnam thul zhing //
T09TD4156E:8b-20: gnyen dang grong khyer pa rnams yon tan rnams kyis rgyal ;
T09TD4156E:8b-21: / gzhan gyi sdug bsngal phyir ni rig pa ma brjod la //
T09TD4156E:8b-22: ye shes dge ba gang yang de la lhag par brjod //
T09TD4156E:8b-23: des ni rang gi skye dgu rnams la ji lta bar //
T09TD4156E:8b-24: de ltar skye dgu rnams la dge ba'i bsngags pa mdzad //
T09TD4156E:8b-25: skar ma rgyal snang shes ldan sras po lhag pa'i lha //
T09TD4156E:8b-26: ji lta bar ni de yi tshe ring phyir mchod des //
T09TD4156E:8b-27: chud min me la bsreg bya rnams ni bsregs gyur la //
T09TD4156E:8b-28: gnyis skyes rnams la gser dang ba lang rnams kyang byin //
T09TD4156E:8b-29: 'gram stegs chab rnams kyis dang yon tan chab rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:8b-30: gtsang sgra'i ched du lus dang yid la khrus byas te //
T09TD4156E:8b-31: rig byed du ni nye bar bstan pa'i chad rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:8b-32: zhi ba bdag skyes snying la zhi ba'i bde la 'thung //
T09TD4156E:8b-33: gang zhig don dang mi ldan zhi ba ma smras la //
T09TD4156E:8b-34: gang zhig dga' ba dang bral de nyid ma brjod de //
T09TD4156E:8b-35: zhi ba de nyid med dang rtsub pa'i de nyid phyir //
T09TD4156E:8b-36: ngo tsha ba yis bdag nyid kho na brjod ma nus //
T09TD4156E:8b-37: don ldan 'dod pa rnams dang mi 'dod pa rnams la //
T09TD4156E:9a-1: pa'i skyon la brten nas rab tu 'thob min te //
T09TD4156E:9a-2: dge ba'i tha snyad gtsang ma la ni bsnyen gyur la //
T09TD4156E:9a-3: mchod sbyin la yang ma mos de ltar ji lta bzhin //
T09TD4156E:9a-4: sred pa dang ldan mngon par 'ongs pa de ma thag / sbyin bya chu 'dra rnams kyis skom pa bcad gyur la ;
T09TD4156E:9a-5: / g-yul las ma gtogs ye shes kyi ni sta ri yis //
T09TD4156E:9a-6: dgra bo rnams kyi nga rgyal chen po bcom par gyur //
T09TD4156E:9a-7: gcig ni rnam par dul la des ni mdun bsrungs shing //
T09TD4156E:9a-8: bdun po nyid ni don la lnga po dag ni bsrungs //
T09TD4156E:9a-9: sde tshan gsum po thob la sde tshan gsum rtogs shing ;
T09TD4156E:9a-10: / sde tshan gnyis po shes la sde tshan gnyis po spangs //
T09TD4156E:9a-11: nyes pa byas kyang rab tu bskyangs nas gzhom bya la //
T09TD4156E:9a-12: 'tshe bar mi byed khro bas kyang ni gzigs ma yin //
T09TD4156E:9a-13: de rnams dag la 'bras bu zhi bas bcings gyur la //
T09TD4156E:9a-14: de rnams dag ni 'dor ba tshul ma yin phyir mthong //
T09TD4156E:9a-15: drang srong rnams kyis mchog gi brtul zhugs spyad gyur la //
T09TD4156E:9a-16: yun rings yang dag bzung ba'i sha khon zhugs rnams dor //
T09TD4156E:9a-17: yon tan dri ldan snyan dngags rnams ni thob gyur la //
T09TD4156E:9a-18: dri ma can du byed pa'i rdul rnams rnam par dor //
T09TD4156E:9a-19: rab tu mi gnas gtor ma'i dpya ni ma blangs la ;
T09TD4156E:9a-20: / pha rol dngos po rnams la mngon par rlom ma byas //
T09TD4156E:9a-21: dgra rnams la ni chos ma yin pa ma smras la //
T09TD4156E:9a-22: khro ba rnams ni snying gis gzung ba ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:9a-23: zhi ba'i bdag nyid sems ni rnam par rab dang la //
T09TD4156E:9a-24: rnal 'byor rab tu ldan pa'i dbang po rnams ci ltar //
T09TD4156E:9a-25: der ni de ltar sa bdag rab tu sgyur ba can //
T09TD4156E:9a-26: 'bangs dang grong khyer ba rnams de lta nyid du byas //
T09TD4156E:9a-27: de nas mdzes pa'i 'o ma 'dzin pa dang ldan ma //
T09TD4156E:9a-28: grags 'dzin ma ni rang gi grags pa 'dzin ma la //
T09TD4156E:9a-29: zas gtsang sras po'i sras po sgra gcan sgra yi zhal //
T09TD4156E:9a-30: sgra gcan 'dzin zhes bya ba dus su skyes par gyur //
T09TD4156E:9a-31: de nas 'dod pa'i bu mnga' mchog gi yid ches te //
T09TD4156E:9a-32: rigs rgyud 'phel ba rab mtshon sa skyong rgyal po ni //
T09TD4156E:9a-33: ji lta nyid du sras po rab tu skyes la dga' //
T09TD4156E:9a-34: de lta nyid du sras po'i sras po skyes la dga' //
T09TD4156E:9a-35: bdag gi bu yi bur gyur pa la brtse ba ni //
T09TD4156E:9b-0: bdag @9b bzhin gang las yin zhes dga' ba skyes gyur te //
T09TD4156E:9b-1: dus su des ni cho ga de dang de dmigs shing //
T09TD4156E:9b-2: bu la dga' ba mtho ris bzhin du 'dzegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:9b-3: rgyal po'i khyu mchog grags dang snyan pas mtshan rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:9b-4: dang po'i skal ba rnams kyi lam la gnas nas ni //
T09TD4156E:9b-5: dkar po ma dor dka' thub rnams la dka' thub dang //
T09TD4156E:9b-6: 'tshe ba dor ba'i mchod sbyin rnams kyis mchod par gyur //
T09TD4156E:9b-7: rgyal po'i dpal gyis dang ni dka' thub dpal gyis kyang //
T09TD4156E:9b-8: bsod nams las can de ni de nas 'bar gyur la //
T09TD4156E:9b-9: rigs dang blo dang mdzad spyod kyis kyang gsal ba ste //
T09TD4156E:9b-10: gzi brjid stong gi 'od zer bzhin du rab tu 'phro //
T09TD4156E:9b-11: rang byung las byung mchod byed sngags ni mchod byas nas //
T09TD4156E:9b-12: sras gnas ched du brtan pa'i dpal gyis bzlas byas shing //
T09TD4156E:9b-13: dka' thub byed pa'i las rnams byas gyur skye dgu rnams //
T09TD4156E:9b-14: skyed 'dod skye dgu'i bdag bzhin dang po'i dus su'o//
T09TD4156E:9b-15: mtshon cha spangs shing bstan bcos rnam par shes gyur la //
T09TD4156E:9b-16: nye bar zhi la bsnyen zhing nges la rnam par bzod //
T09TD4156E:9b-17: dbang ldan bzhin du yul rnams gang la ma bsnyen la //
T09TD4156E:9b-18: yab mes bzhin du yul rnams kun la gzigs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:9b-19: des kyang bu yi ched du rgyal srid bzung gyur la //
T09TD4156E:9b-20: bu ni rigs kyi don du rigs ni grags pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:9b-21: grags ba mtho ris ched du mtho ris bdag nyid phyir //
T09TD4156E:9b-22: chos kyi don du bdag nyid gnas la 'dod par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:9b-23: de ltar des ni dam pa rnams kyis nges thob pa'i //
T09TD4156E:9b-24: thos pa las grub chos ni rnam pa sna tshogs byas //
T09TD4156E:9b-25: gang las bdag gi bus ni bu yi ngo mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:9b-26: nags tshal nyid du 'gro mi 'gyur zhes mgon bslangs so //
T09TD4156E:9b-27: bdag la yang dag blangs pa'i dpal ni srung 'dod pa'i //
T09TD4156E:9b-28: sa skyong rnams kyis sa la bu ni bsrung ba ste //
T09TD4156E:9b-29: chos ni 'dod pa'i ma yi dbang po de yis kyang //
T09TD4156E:9b-30: yul rnams 'dor ba med par bu ni chos las bsrungs //
T09TD4156E:9b-31: byang chub sems dpa' yul la bde ba'i ro shes thams cad kyang //
T09TD4156E:9b-32: sras skyed pa na dpe med sems pa nags su gshegs gyur te //
T09TD4156E:9b-33: de phyir nye bar bsags pa'i las ni rtsa nas skyed pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:9b-34: de ni zhi ba ma thob de srid dga' ba bsnyen par gyur //
T09TD4156E:10a-0: @10a * // sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:10a-1: btsun mo'i 'khor na gnas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
T09TD4156E:10a-3: // / de nas re zhig dus na 'jam po'i rtsva rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:10a-4: khu byug pho ni gyen du skang 'don rkang 'thung rnams //
T09TD4156E:10a-5: glu rnams rang ni nges ldan skyed mos tshal rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:10a-6: padma'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan des ni thos par gyur //
T09TD4156E:10a-7: de nas bud med skye bo rnams ni dga' ba yi //
T09TD4156E:10a-8: grong khyer skyed mos tshal gyi yid 'ong dngos thos te //
T09TD4156E:10a-9: khyim gyi nang du mngon par bkag pa'i glu bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:10a-10: phyi rol rab tu 'gro ba'i ched du blo mdzad do //
T09TD4156E:10a-11: de nas sras su mngon brjod yid 'ong de yi ni //
T09TD4156E:10a-12: dgongs pa mi skyong gis ni nges par thos gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:10a-13: brtse ba'i phun sum tshogs pas lang tshor 'od la pa ru //
T09TD4156E:10a-14: ltad mo dag la rnam par gshegs par bka' stsal to //
T09TD4156E:10a-15: gzhon nu shin tu gzhon nu'i sems dang ldan pa ni //
T09TD4156E:10a-16: yang dag skyo ba'i sems su ma gyur zhes sems zhing //
T09TD4156E:10a-17: nyam thag tha dad skye bo kun nas 'dus pa ni //
T09TD4156E:10a-18: rgyal po'i lam du phyir la rnam par zlog pa ste //
T09TD4156E:10a-19: nying lag dman pa rnams dang dbang po ma ching rnams //
T09TD4156E:10a-20: 'khogs pa nad pa la sogs bkren rnams phyogs rnams su ;
T09TD4156E:10a-21: / de nas mchog tu zhi bas yang dag rab ston nas //
T09TD4156E:10a-22: rgyal po'i lam rnams dag ni mchog tu mdzes par byas //
T09TD4156E:10a-23: de nas dpal ldan rgyal po'i lam ni byas pa na //
T09TD4156E:10a-24: dpal ldan rnam par dul ba rjes 'brangs gzhon nu ni //
T09TD4156E:10a-25: gzhal yas khang pa'i logs nas dus su mngon babs nas //
T09TD4156E:10a-26: mngon par rjes gnang byas pa mi skyong la mngon gshegs //
T09TD4156E:10a-27: de nas mi dbang bu la mchi ma byung gyur te //
T09TD4156E:10a-28: mgo la nye bar bsnams te yun rings rnam gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:10a-29: song cig ces ni tshig gi bka' dag stsal gyur la //
T09TD4156E:10a-30: brtse ba dag las de ni yid kyis ma btang ngo //
T09TD4156E:10a-31: de nas de ni 'dzam bu chu gser sga 'dzin pa'i //
T09TD4156E:10a-32: legs par bslabs pa'i mgyogs 'gro bzhi yis sbyar ba yi //
T09TD4156E:10a-33: dbang po ma nyams mkhas shing gtsang la 'od zer 'chang //
T09TD4156E:10a-34: gser gyi rang bzhin shing rta la ni yang dag 'dzegs //
T09TD4156E:10a-35: de nas 'bras spos me tog 'bar ba rab bkram zhing //
T09TD4156E:10b-0: phreng ba @10b rnam dbyangs rab tu g-yo ba'i ba dan can //
T09TD4156E:10b-1: zla ba skar ma dang bcas bar snang la bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:10b-2: 'dra ba rjes 'brang lam ni rab tu thob par gyur //
T09TD4156E:10b-3: ya mtshan gyur las rab tu rgyas pa'i mig rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:10b-4: autpal sngon po'i phyed 'dra rnams kyis bkram pa ni //
T09TD4156E:10b-5: rgyal po'i lam la dal bu dal bus gshegs gyur te //
T09TD4156E:10b-6: grong khyer skye bo rnams kyis kun nas mngon par dga' //
T09TD4156E:10b-7: kha cig de la zhi ba'i yon tan gyis bstod la //
T09TD4156E:10b-8: de bzhin zhan rnams gsal ba nyid kyis phyag 'tshal zhing //
T09TD4156E:10b-9: kha cig dag ni 'di la mngon du phyogs nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:10b-10: dpal dang tshe yi rnam par rgyas la shis pa brjod //
T09TD4156E:10b-11: zhar ba sgur po nad pa mi'u thung rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:10b-12: tshogs pa rnams ni rigs chen rnams la nges dral nas //
T09TD4156E:10b-13: mi mo rnams ni nges par zhugs gnas phra rnams las //
T09TD4156E:10b-14: lha yi rjes 'gro rgyal mtshan bzhin du rab tu btud //
T09TD4156E:10b-15: de nas gzhon nu nges par gshegs zhes gtam dag ni //
T09TD4156E:10b-16: bsgo bya skyes las bud med rnams kyis thob gyur na //
T09TD4156E:10b-17: bkur 'os skye bos mngon par rjes gnang byas pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:10b-18: blta bar 'dod pas lding khang shod du song bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:10b-19: yon tan ska rags brul zhing gegs byas de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:10b-20: gnyid log rab tu sad pas lta byed 'khrugs pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:10b-21: gnas lugs gtam gyis rnam par brgyan rnams rnam gzhag ste //
T09TD4156E:10b-22: ya mtshan gyur pas dogs med par ni yongs su song //
T09TD4156E:10b-23: gzhal yas khang gi skas kyi 'og gi sgra rab dang //
T09TD4156E:10b-24: dril chung sgra rnams dang ni gdu bu'i sgra rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:10b-25: rnam par skrag gyur khyim gyi bya yi tshogs rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:10b-26: phan tshun shugs rnams las kyang yang dag kun nas gtor //
T09TD4156E:10b-27: gang zhig 'dir ni yan lag rab mchog ma rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:10b-28: myur ba rab tu skyes gyur tsam tsam skyes rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:10b-29: lo ma 'dzin rnams rgyas shing skyed smad shing rta ni //
T09TD4156E:10b-30: yangs pa rnams kyis lci ba nyid phyir 'gro ba bzung //
T09TD4156E:10b-31: mtha' gcig legs par rab tu sbyar ba'i rgyan rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:10b-32: rnam par sbas ba rnam par gsal bas ngo tsha bas //
T09TD4156E:10b-33: skyen por 'gro bar nus pa yin yang gzhan ma yin //
T09TD4156E:10b-34: 'gro ba nges par bzung ste myur min song bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:11a-0: phan tshun rab tu bcer bas ril por gyur pa @11a * //
T09TD4156E:11a-2: / yang dag drud las bskyod gyur rna lung 'khyil ba can //
T09TD4156E:11a-3: de dag rnams kyi de tshe sgra bcas rgyan rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:11a-4: rlung bgrod skar khung rnams su rab tu zhi bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:11a-5: rlung bgrod skar khung rnams las rnam par mthon pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:11a-6: phan tshun thang chen gyur pa'i rna lung 'khyil pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:11a-7: bud med rnams kyi 'dam skyes 'dra ba'i 'dam skyes zhal //
T09TD4156E:11a-8: lding khang rnams su bkod pa rnams ni rnam par mdzes //
T09TD4156E:11a-9: de nas khang bzangs lang tsho ma rnams kyis khyab cing //
T09TD4156E:11a-10: ya mtshan la ni rab phye skar khung rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:11a-11: lha mo dang bcas gzhal med rnams kyi nam mkha' bzhin //
T09TD4156E:11a-12: dpal dang ldan pa'i grong khyer kun nas mdzes par gyur //
T09TD4156E:11a-13: skar khung rnams kyis rnam par yangs pa ma yin las //
T09TD4156E:11a-14: phan tshun 'gram par bkod pa'i rna lung can rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:11a-15: 'dam skyes padma rnams kyi tshogs rnams bcings pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:11a-16: rab myos mchog ma rnams kyi zhal ni mdzes par gyur //
T09TD4156E:11a-17: gzhon nu de la lam du rnam par blta ba yi //
T09TD4156E:11a-18: bud med de rnams sa la 'gro 'dod ltar mdzes shing //
T09TD4156E:11a-19: gyen du gdong phyogs de la rab tu lta ba yi //
T09TD4156E:11a-20: mi rnams gnam la 'gro bar 'dod bzhin mdzes par gyur //
T09TD4156E:11a-21: lus dang dpal gyis mchog tu 'bar bar gyur pa yi //
T09TD4156E:11a-22: rgyal po'i sras de mthong nas bud med de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:11a-23: nges par dgongs pa gzhan min bsam pa dag pa yis //
T09TD4156E:11a-24: 'di yi chung ma skal pa bzang zhes dal bus smra //
T09TD4156E:11a-25: gzugs kyi dngos su me tog can dang mtshungs shing //
T09TD4156E:11a-26: rnam par ring zhing rgyas pa'i dpung pa can 'di ni //
T09TD4156E:11a-27: dpal nyid dor nas chos la nye bar gshegs zhes te //
T09TD4156E:11a-28: de la de dag rnams kyis zhes kho na byas //
T09TD4156E:11a-29: rnam par dul la gtsang zhing brtan pa'i cha lugs can //
T09TD4156E:11a-30: grong pa rnams kyis de ltar rgyal po'i lam khyab pa //
T09TD4156E:11a-31: de ni sngon du gzhon nus mthong nas dga' bas te //
T09TD4156E:11a-32: bdag gi srid pa gzhan ma cung zhig brtags pa 'dra //
T09TD4156E:11a-33: grong khyer de yang mtho ris bzhin du rab dga' ba //
T09TD4156E:11a-34: mngon par gzigs nas gtsang mar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:11a-35: sa gzhi skyong ba'i sras po yang dag bskul don du //
T09TD4156E:11b-0: 'khogs pa'i mi rgan rab tu 'gro bar @11b sprul gyur to //
T09TD4156E:11b-1: de nas gzhon nu yis ni rga bas zil non zhing //
T09TD4156E:11b-2: mi rnams las ni tha dad dbyibs can de gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:11b-3: g-yo ba med cing de nyid du ni zhugs pa'i spyan //
T09TD4156E:11b-4: chags par gyur cing kha lo 'dzin pa la smras so //
T09TD4156E:11b-5: mngon par nyer 'ongs mi de su yin 'dren pa kye //
T09TD4156E:11b-6: skra rnams dkar zhing dbyug pa la ni lag pas brten //
T09TD4156E:11b-7: smin mas kun nas mig g-yogs 'khogs shing yan lag drung //
T09TD4156E:11b-8: rnam 'gyur 'di ni tha mal gang 'dod yin nam ci //
T09TD4156E:11b-9: de skad ces smra shing rta rab tu 'dren pa po //
T09TD4156E:11b-10: lha mchog de rnams nyid kyi blo ni rmongs byas shing //
T09TD4156E:11b-11: don ni bsrung bya yin yang skyon med mthong gyur te //
T09TD4156E:11b-12: de yis sa skyong bdag nyid skyes la nges par gsol //
T09TD4156E:11b-13: gzugs kyi gnod byed stobs kyi rnam par za ba po //
T09TD4156E:11b-14: rgan pa rnams kyi 'joms byed mya ngan rnams kyi sa //
T09TD4156E:11b-15: dran pa rnams kyi nyams byed dbang po rnams kyi dgra //
T09TD4156E:11b-16: 'di ni rgas pa zhes bya gang gis 'di bcom mo //
T09TD4156E:11b-17: 'dis kyang byis pa nyid dang 'o ma 'thung gyur cing //
T09TD4156E:11b-18: dus kyis la yongs su gnyid log gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:11b-19: rim gyis lus rab ldan pa'i lang tshor gyur nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:11b-20: rim gyis de nyid kho nas rga bar nye bar song //
T09TD4156E:11b-21: de skad ces smras rgyal po'i bdag nyid skyes pa ste //
T09TD4156E:11b-22: cung zhig 'dar la kha lo sgyur la 'di skad smras //
T09TD4156E:11b-23: skyon 'di kho po la yang 'byung ba min nam ci //
T09TD4156E:11b-24: de bzhin 'di la kha lo sgyur ba yis gsol to //
T09TD4156E:11b-25: 'di ni na tshod rab mchog tshe dang ldan pa'i yang //
T09TD4156E:11b-26: gdon mi za bar dus kyi dbang gis 'byung bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:11b-27: de bzhin rgas pa gzugs kyi rnam par nyams pa bor ;
T09TD4156E:11b-28: /'jig rten ba yi shes pa nyid ngang mthong ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:11b-29: de nas sngon gyi bsam pa dag pa'i blo mnga' ba //
T09TD4156E:11b-30: rnam rgyas bskal bar bsags pa'i bsod nams las can dang //
T09TD4156E:11b-31: rdo rje chen po'i sgra la nye bar ba lang bzhin //
T09TD4156E:11b-32: rgas pa thos nas gzhon nu kun nas yi mug gyur //
T09TD4156E:11b-33: dbugs ni ring du brgyus nas rang gi mgo bsgul zhing //
T09TD4156E:11b-34: 'khogs pa de la spyan ni rnam par zhugs nas su //
T09TD4156E:11b-35: rga ba dang bcas skye ba de rnams gzigs gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:11b-36: sems ni khong du chud pa de yis tshig 'di smras //
T09TD4156E:11b-37: dran pa dang ni gzugs dang pha rol gnon pa yang //
T09TD4156E:12a-0: de ltar rgas pas rnam dpyod med par @12a * //
T09TD4156E:12a-2: 'di lta bu ra ni mngon sum nyid du song na yang //
T09TD4156E:12a-3: 'jig rten pa dag skyo med nyer 'gro kho na'o //
T09TD4156E:12a-4: de ltar song la 'dren pa rta rnams phyir zlog la //
T09TD4156E:12a-5: khyod ni khyim nyid du ni skyes par rab tu song //
T09TD4156E:12a-6: rgas pa'i 'jigs pa'i sems su gnas pa kho bo la ;
T09TD4156E:12a-7: / skyed mos tshal gyi sa la bde ba ga la yod //
T09TD4156E:12a-8: de nas rgyal po'i sras po de yi bka' lung gis //
T09TD4156E:12a-9: kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir la bzlog par gyur //
T09TD4156E:12a-10: de nas gzhon nus pho brang de nyid kho nar ni //
T09TD4156E:12a-11: bsam pa'i dbang gis stong pa bzhin du rab tu thob //
T09TD4156E:12a-12: gang gi tshe na de yang bde pa ma yin te //
T09TD4156E:12a-13: rgas pa rgas pa zhes ni rab tu yongs su rtog / de nas mi dbang gis ni rjes gnang de ni slar //
T09TD4156E:12a-14: rim gyis de nyid kho nas phyi rol gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:12a-15: de nas gzhan yang lus la nad dang yongs ldan pa //
T09TD4156E:12a-16: lha mchog de rnams nyid kyis bskyed cing sprul pa'i mi //
T09TD4156E:12a-17: zas gtsang rgyal po'i sras po can der song nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:12a-18: gzigs nas kha lo sgyur ba de nyid la smras pa //
T09TD4156E:12a-19: gsus pa sbom zhing dbugs dag skyod pa'i lus pho can //
T09TD4156E:12a-20: lag pa cha shas zha zhing rid la skya bseng lus //
T09TD4156E:12a-21: aa ma zhes ni snying rje'i ngag dag smras pa po //
T09TD4156E:12a-22: gzhan la brten nas gnas pa'i mi de su zhig yin //
T09TD4156E:12a-23: de nas kha lo sgyur bas smras pa zhi ba kye //
T09TD4156E:12a-24: 'di yi khams ni rab 'khrugs rab stobs rab tu 'phel //
T09TD4156E:12a-25: nad ces bya ba mngon brjod shin tu don med chen po ste //
T09TD4156E:12a-26: nus kyang gang gis de ni rab dbang med par byas //
T09TD4156E:12a-27: rjes su brtse bcas mi de la ni gzigs bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:12a-28: rgyal po'i sras des slar yang 'di skad ces smras pa //
T09TD4156E:12a-29: skyes gyur skyon de so sor 'di nyid kho na'i 'am //
T09TD4156E:12a-30: nad kyi 'jigs la skye dgu rnams kyi spyi la yin //
T09TD4156E:12a-31: de nas shing rta rab tu 'dren pa des smras pa //
T09TD4156E:12a-32: gzhon nu nyes pa de ni thun mong gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:12a-33: de ltar nad rnams dag ni yongs su gtsor ba ni //
T09TD4156E:12a-34: nang mthar phyin na 'jig rten dga' bar nye bar gshegs //
T09TD4156E:12a-35: de ltar don thos sems ni khong du chud pa de //
T09TD4156E:12a-36: chu rlabs nang song ri bong can bzhin rab 'dar zhing //
T09TD4156E:12a-37: brtse ba thugs rje mnga' bas gsung ngag tshig 'di ni //
T09TD4156E:12b-0: cung zhig dngar ba'i dbyangs kyis rab tu smras @12b pa'o ;
T09TD4156E:12b-1: / skye dgu rnams la rnam par zhen pa'i nad 'di ni //
T09TD4156E:12b-2: 'jig rten pa dag rang bzhin gnas shing blo gtad byed //
T09TD4156E:12b-3: mi shes rnam par rgya chen ae ma mi rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:12b-4: gang zhig nad las rnam par grol rnams bzhad gad byed //
T09TD4156E:12b-5: 'dren pa phyi rol rab tu 'gro las phyir log la//
T09TD4156E:12b-6: mi dbang pho brang nyid du shing rta rab tu song //
T09TD4156E:12b-7: bdag gi nad kyi 'jigs pa thos nas dga' ba las //
T09TD4156E:12b-8: sems ni 'khums pa bzhin du rab tu bcom par gyur //
T09TD4156E:12b-9: de ltar lan gnyis phyir log de ni rab gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:12b-10: sa yi bdag po yis kyang yongs su gros byas so //
T09TD4156E:12b-11: de yi phyir log nges pa'i mtshan ma thos gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:12b-12: bdag cag rnams ni 'di yis yang dag 'dor snyam ste //
T09TD4156E:12b-13: lam rnams gtsang mar lhag par byed pa po rnams la //
T09TD4156E:12b-14: khros shing 'khrugs kyang chad pa drag pos gcod pa med //
T09TD4156E:12b-15: slar yang sras po de la khyad par 'phags pa dang //
T09TD4156E:12b-16: ldan pa'i yul la rab tu dpyod pa rnams mdzad cing //
T09TD4156E:12b-17: dbang po g-yo ba nyid kyi phyir yang chags snyam ste //
T09TD4156E:12b-18: bdag cag rnam par mi 'dor zhes ni mgon blangs so //
T09TD4156E:12b-19: gang gi tshe na sgra sgrogs dbang po'i don rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:12b-20: sras po 'di la pho brang 'khor na dga' ba med //
T09TD4156E:12b-21: de nas ro gzhan rol gyur cig zhes sems shing //
T09TD4156E:12b-22: phyi rol ltad mo la ni rnam par bka' stsal to //
T09TD4156E:12b-23: brtse ba las ni sras po'i dgongs ba rtogs nas su //
T09TD4156E:12b-24: de la chags pa'i skyon rnams 'ga' zhig ma bsams nas //
T09TD4156E:12b-25: sgyu rtsal rnams la mngon par shes zhes res ma'i gtso //
T09TD4156E:12b-26: mdzangs ma rnams la des ni yang dag bka' stsal to ;
T09TD4156E:12b-27: / de nas khyad par du yang mi yi dbang po'i lam //
T09TD4156E:12b-28: legs par brgyan byas nyid dang yongs su brtags pa la //
T09TD4156E:12b-29: 'dren pa dang ni shing rta brjes nas rgyal po yis //
T09TD4156E:12b-30: gzhon nu phyi rol du ni rab tu gshegs su gzhug / de nas de ltar rgyal po'i bu ni gshegs pa na //
T09TD4156E:12b-31: lha mchog de rnams nyid kyis rnam par sprul pa yi //
T09TD4156E:12b-32: srog song shi ba'i ro de lam du bteg pa ni //
T09TD4156E:12b-33: 'dren pa dang ni gzhon nus mthong ste gzhan gyis min //
T09TD4156E:12b-34: de nas 'dren pa rgyal po'i sras po des smras pa //
T09TD4156E:12b-35: zhan zhing stug pa'i mi rnams dag ni rjes 'brang zhing //
T09TD4156E:13a-0: rgyan gyis brgyan pa yin yang kun nas du ba @13a * //
T09TD4156E:13a-2: / mi bzhi rnams kyis bteg pa pha gi su zhig yin //
T09TD4156E:13a-3: de nas gtsang ba'i bdag nyid gtsang mar gnas pa yi //
T09TD4156E:13a-4: lha rnams dag gis sems ni zil non 'dren pa po //
T09TD4156E:13a-5: nges ni brjod par bya ba min kyang don 'di ni //
T09TD4156E:13a-6: don ldan dbang phyug la ni rab tu rnam par gsol//
T09TD4156E:13a-7: blo dang dbang po srog gi yon tan dang bral zhing //
T09TD4156E:13a-8: gnyid log ming bral rtsva dang shing du gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:13a-9: brtson 'grus ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed nas bsrungs nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:13a-10: sdug pa sdug pa rnams kyis spangs pa de ni su yin nam //
T09TD4156E:13a-11: de ltar tshig ni rab tu 'dren pa las thos nas //
T09TD4156E:13a-12: cung zhig kun nas bskyod cing de nyid la smras pa //
T09TD4156E:13a-13: chos 'di nyid ni skye ba 'di nyid kyang gi'am //
T09TD4156E:13a-14: mthar gyur 'di 'dra skye dgu kun gyi yin nam ci //
T09TD4156E:13a-15: de nas rab tu 'dren pas 'di nyid la gsol pa //
T09TD4156E:13a-16: mthar gyur las 'di skye dgu rnams ni kun gyi ste //
T09TD4156E:13a-17: dman dang 'bring dang bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyi //
T09TD4156E:13a-18: 'jig rten dag ni rnam par nges par rnam par nyams par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:13a-19: de nas mi dbang sras pa de ni bstan na yang //
T09TD4156E:13a-20: 'chi ba thos nas de ma thag tu yi mug cing //
T09TD4156E:13a-21: dpung pas shing rta'i shing gi rtse la rab 'khyud nas //
T09TD4156E:13a-22: gdangs snyan dang ldan dbyangs kyis rab tu smras pa'o ;
T09TD4156E:13a-23: /'di ni nges par skye dgu rnams kyi mthar thug ste //
T09TD4156E:13a-24: 'jig rten pa dag 'jigs pa spangs shing bag med la //
T09TD4156E:13a-25: mi rnams dag gi sems rnams sra ba snyam pa ste //
T09TD4156E:13a-26: lam la gnas rnams de ltar rang bzhin nyid du gnas //
T09TD4156E:13a-27: de phyir 'dren pa shing rta'i kha ni phyir bzlog dang //
T09TD4156E:13a-28: bdag cag sa la rnam par rgyu pa'i yul dus min //
T09TD4156E:13a-29: nyam thag dus su rnam par nyams pa shes nas ni //
T09TD4156E:13a-30: sems dang bcas pa gang 'dra 'di na bag med yin //
T09TD4156E:13a-31: mi bdag bdag skyes kyis ni de skad smras na yang //
T09TD4156E:13a-32: de yis shing rta de ni phyir la ma bzlog ste //
T09TD4156E:13a-33: khyab par ldan pa yin yang mi dbang brten pa la //
T09TD4156E:13a-34: padma'i tshogs bcas nags nyid du ni gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:13a-35: de nas me tog rgyas ldan gzhon nu'i rkang 'thung zhing //
T09TD4156E:13a-36: yongs su bskor zhing rab dga' myos pa'i khu byug can //
T09TD4156E:13a-37: gzhal med khang ldan padma dang bcas mdzes pa'i rdzing //
T09TD4156E:13b-0: dga' ba'i tshal @13b 'dra dge ba'i nags de gzigs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:13b-1: lha mchog mas bskor grong khyer brgyan byed bdag po'i gzhir //
T09TD4156E:13b-2: brtul zhugs gsal ldan thub pa bgegs kyis 'jigs pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:13b-3: yan lag mchog ma'i tshogs khyab mi skyong bdag skyes sras //
T09TD4156E:13b-4: de nas stobs las nags der spyan drangs so //
T09TD4156E:13b-5: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:13b-6: thugs skyo ba skyes pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o /
T09TD4156E:13b-8: // / de nas skyed mos tshal de nas //
T09TD4156E:13b-9: ya mtshan gyis ni mig g-yos rnams //
T09TD4156E:13b-10: bud med rnams ni khyo thob bzhin //
T09TD4156E:13b-11: mi skyong sras la mdun du 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:13b-12: 'ongs nas de la de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:13b-13: ya mtshan rab rgyas spyan ma drangs //
T09TD4156E:13b-15: phrin las yang dag spyod pa byas //
T09TD4156E:13b-16: g-yo med dga' ba rnams gsal ba'i //
T09TD4156E:13b-17: spyan mig rnams kyis 'thung ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:13b-18: yid dkrugs 'dod pas sems g-yengs rnams //
T09TD4156E:13b-19: de la yongs su bskor nas gnas //
T09TD4156E:13b-20: lhan skyes rgyan rnams kyis bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:13b-21: mtshan ni mdzes rnams kyis brgyan pa //
T09TD4156E:13b-22: 'dod lha lus dang ldan no zhes //
T09TD4156E:13b-23: de la mi mo de rnams snyam //
T09TD4156E:13b-24: zhi ba nyid phyir brtan nyid phyir //
T09TD4156E:13b-25: gsang ba'i 'od zer zla ba nyi //
T09TD4156E:13b-26: sa la dngos su babs pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:13b-27: de la kha cig rnams kyis shes //
T09TD4156E:13b-28: de yi lus kyis g-yengs de rnams //
T09TD4156E:13b-29: nges bzung lus ni rnam 'gyur zhing //
T09TD4156E:13b-30: phan tshun mig rnams kyis bsnun nas //
T09TD4156E:13b-31: dal bus dbugs ni rnam par brgyus //
T09TD4156E:13b-32: de ltar mi mo de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:13b-33: de ni mig tsam gyis mthong nyid //
T09TD4156E:13b-34: smra ba med cing dga' med par //
T09TD4156E:13b-35: 'di yi mthu yis non par gyur //
T09TD4156E:13b-36: de ltar de rnams rtsom bral zhing //
T09TD4156E:13b-37: snying rjes rnam par 'khrugs mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:13b-38: bram ze mdun na 'don gyi sras //
T09TD4156E:13b-39: blo ldan 'char kas tshig smras so //
T09TD4156E:13b-40: kun gyi sgyu rtsal kun shes shing //
T09TD4156E:13b-41: dgongs pa len la mkhas ma rnams ;
T09TD4156E:13b-42: / gzugs dang mdzangs dang ldan pa ste //
T09TD4156E:13b-43: rang gi yon tan gtsor phyin no //
T09TD4156E:13b-44: lus ngan gyi yang skyed tshal dang //
T09TD4156E:13b-45: byang gi sgra mi snyan na yang //
T09TD4156E:13b-46: yon tan 'di rnams kyis mdzes te //
T09TD4156E:13b-48: chags bral rnams dang drang srong yang //
T09TD4156E:14a-2: lha mo rnams kyis shes pa yis //
T09TD4156E:14a-3: lha rnams la yang len par ro //
T09TD4156E:14a-4: dgongs pa shes dang rtsed 'jo dang //
T09TD4156E:14a-5: mdzangs dang gzugs ni phun tshogs pas //
T09TD4156E:14a-6: bud med rnams kyis chags nus na //
T09TD4156E:14a-7: skyes pa rnams kyis smos ci dgos //
T09TD4156E:14a-8: rnam pa de ltar rab sbyar ba //
T09TD4156E:14a-9: de yi rang gi spyod yul las //
T09TD4156E:14a-10: rnam pa de ltar spyod pa 'di //
T09TD4156E:14a-11: khyod kyi drang po'i tshig ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:14a-12: khyod kyi 'di ni ngo tsha bas //
T09TD4156E:14a-13: mig 'khums bag ma gsar pa yi //
T09TD4156E:14a-14: spyod pa dang mtshungs yang na ni //
T09TD4156E:14a-15: ba glang skyong gi chung ma'i 'os //
T09TD4156E:14a-16: gang yang 'di ni dpa' ba ste //
T09TD4156E:14a-17: dpal gyi mthu las chen po yin //
T09TD4156E:14a-18: bud med kyi yang gzi che ste //
T09TD4156E:14a-19: de phyir 'di yang nges par bya //
T09TD4156E:14a-20: sngon yang ka shi'i mdzes ma ni //
T09TD4156E:14a-21: smad 'tshong ma yi drang srong che //
T09TD4156E:14a-22: lha yis thub par dka' ba yang //
T09TD4156E:14a-23: drang srong rgyas pas rkang pas brdungs //
T09TD4156E:14a-24: m'a na thal goo tam dge slong ni //
T09TD4156E:14a-25: smad 'tshong gtso mo byin ma yin //
T09TD4156E:14a-26: dga' 'dod de yi don ched du //
T09TD4156E:14a-27: sngon gyi tshe na ro rnams bton ;
T09TD4156E:14a-28: / goo ta ma mun rings ming //
T09TD4156E:14a-29: drang srong chen po tshe rings po //
T09TD4156E:14a-30: kha dog dbyibs mchog ma yin pa'i //
T09TD4156E:14a-31: bud med kyis ni tshim par byas //
T09TD4156E:14a-32: drang srong rva skyes thub ba mchog / bud med yul la mi mkhas pa //
T09TD4156E:14a-33: rnam pa sna tshogs thabs rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:14a-34: zhi mas de ltar blangs shing pham//
T09TD4156E:14a-35: sna tshogs bshes gnyen drang srong che //
T09TD4156E:14a-36: brtul zhugs chen po brtan pa yang //
T09TD4156E:14a-37: lha mo mar srung mas phrogs te //
T09TD4156E:14a-38: lo bcu rnams la nyi mar shes //
T09TD4156E:14a-39: drang srong de rnams de rnams sogs //
T09TD4156E:14a-40: bud med kyis sgyur blangs gyur na //
T09TD4156E:14a-41: rol zhing lang tsho snga ma yis //
T09TD4156E:14a-42: mi bdag sras po smos ci dgos //
T09TD4156E:14a-43: de ltar gyur na yid ches shing //
T09TD4156E:14a-44: 'di ni mi skyong rigs kyi dpal //
T09TD4156E:14a-45: 'di las phyir phyogs ma yin pa //
T09TD4156E:14a-46: ji ltar de ltar nan tan mdzod //
T09TD4156E:14a-47: lang tsho ldan ma 'ga' zhig rnams //
T09TD4156E:14a-48: mtshungs pa'i skye bo 'phrog pa ste //
T09TD4156E:14a-49: mchog dang mchog min dag gi sems //
T09TD4156E:14a-50: len pa gang de bud med rnams //
T09TD4156E:14a-51: de ltar 'char ka'i tshig thos nas //
T09TD4156E:14a-52: bud med de rnams phug pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:14a-53: gzhon nu len par rab mtshon te //
T09TD4156E:14a-54: bdag nyid yang dag kun nas 'dzegs //
T09TD4156E:14a-56: de rnams smin dang lta dang sgeg / dgod dang rol dang 'gro ba yis //
T09TD4156E:14b-0: kun nas @14b bskyod pa'i spyod pa byas //
T09TD4156E:14b-1: rgyal po'i bka' lung sbyar phyir dang //
T09TD4156E:14b-2: gzhon nu nyid kyang 'jam phyir dang //
T09TD4156E:14b-3: rgyags pa yis ni myos pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:14b-4: yid mi ches ba myur bar dor //
T09TD4156E:14b-5: glang mo'i tshogs dang thabs cig tu //
T09TD4156E:14b-6: glang po gangs can nags na ltar //
T09TD4156E:14b-7: de nas mi mo'i skye bo yis ;
T09TD4156E:14b-8: / gzhon nu bskor zhing nags na spyad //
T09TD4156E:14b-9: rnam par mdzes pa'i skyed tshal na //
T09TD4156E:14b-10: lha mos bskor ba'i nyi ma bzhin //
T09TD4156E:14b-11: yid 'ong nags der gzhon nu de //
T09TD4156E:14b-12: bud med rnams ni mdun 'gro bar //
T09TD4156E:14b-13: rnam par sgeg bcas gzhon nu ma //
T09TD4156E:14b-14: rgyags pas ma spangs de rnams dga' //
T09TD4156E:14b-15: sra zhing zlum rgyas lhan cig pa'i //
T09TD4156E:14b-16: nu ma rnams kyis de la reg / dpung pa las brul 'jam ring mnyen //
T09TD4156E:14b-17: lag pa'i ljon shing stobs med ma //
T09TD4156E:14b-18: kha cig bden min 'phrul pa ru //
T09TD4156E:14b-19: byas nas de la stobs las 'khyud //
T09TD4156E:14b-20: kha cig zangs ma chum mchu can //
T09TD4156E:14b-21: kha cig chang gi dri ngag gis //
T09TD4156E:14b-22: gcig pu dben par sdod cig ces //
T09TD4156E:14b-23: 'di yi rna bar shab shib byed //
T09TD4156E:14b-24: kha cig bka' lung stsol ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:14b-25: byug pa gsher mas rab smras te //
T09TD4156E:14b-26: 'dir ni gus par gyis shig ces //
T09TD4156E:14b-28: kha cig gser gyi ska rags kyi //
T09TD4156E:14b-29: cal col rnams kyis tsam tsom dang //
T09TD4156E:14b-30: phra mo 'dir gyi gos gyon zhing //
T09TD4156E:14b-31: 'di la ro smad ston cing bskor //
T09TD4156E:14b-32: yang dang yang du myos ma'i rgyus //
T09TD4156E:14b-33: gzhan ma dar sngon nyil ba ste //
T09TD4156E:14b-34: ska rags phan tshun sdud pa ni //
T09TD4156E:14b-35: mtshan mo glog phreng bzhin du mdzes //
T09TD4156E:14b-36: ts'a ta'i me tog yal ga rgyas //
T09TD4156E:14b-37: bzung nas gzhan ni 'phyang gyur la //
T09TD4156E:14b-38: gser gyi bum par mtshungs pa yis //
T09TD4156E:14b-39: lo ma 'dzin pa ston par byed //
T09TD4156E:14b-40: kha cig padma'i nags tshal nas //
T09TD4156E:14b-42: padma'i zhal gyi logs gnas shing //
T09TD4156E:14b-43: padma'i dpal bzhin bsdad par gyur //
T09TD4156E:14b-44: rang gnas de la bskul ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:14b-45: bslus par gyur zhes mig rnams kyis ;
T09TD4156E:14b-46: / kha cig mngon bar 'dren bcas lag / don ldan dngar ba'i glu len no //
T09TD4156E:14b-47: dge ba'i gdong gis gzhan mas ni //
T09TD4156E:14b-48: smin pa'i gzhu ni rnam bkang ste //
T09TD4156E:14b-49: bskor gnas brtan dang rol pa yis //
T09TD4156E:14b-50: 'di yi spyod la rjes zlos byas //
T09TD4156E:14b-51: rgyas zlum nu ldan kha cig ni //
T09TD4156E:15a-2: khyod ni thob par gyur cig ces //
T09TD4156E:15a-3: mthon po rnams kyis bzhad cing smras //
T09TD4156E:15a-5: me tog phreng ba'i tshal gyis bcings //
T09TD4156E:15a-6: kha cig cod bcas dngar mo yis //
T09TD4156E:15a-7: ngag gi zhags pa rnams kyis bzung //
T09TD4156E:15a-9: ts'u ta'i snyem bzung nas ni //
T09TD4156E:15a-10: me tog 'di ni gang gi zhes //
T09TD4156E:15a-11: rgyags pas rnam par 'khrugs shing dris //
T09TD4156E:15a-12: kha cig 'gros dang cha lugs ni //
T09TD4156E:15a-13: skyes pa bzhin du byas nas ni //
T09TD4156E:15a-14: sa 'dir rgyal bar gyur cig kye //
T09TD4156E:15a-15: bud med kyis 'pham de la smras //
T09TD4156E:15a-16: de nas g-yo ba'i mig can 'gas //
T09TD4156E:15a-17: autpal sngon po snom byed cing //
T09TD4156E:15a-18: cung zhig rgyags skad tshig rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:15a-19: mi skyong bdag skyes la smras so //
T09TD4156E:15a-20: gzigs shing jo bo ts'u ta'i shing //
T09TD4156E:15a-21: me tog sbrang rtsi'i dris khyab la //
T09TD4156E:15a-23: gser gyi bu na bkag pa 'dra //
T09TD4156E:15a-24: mya ngan med pa'i shing 'di gzigs //
T09TD4156E:15a-26: bung ba 'dir ni sgra bsgrags pa //
T09TD4156E:15a-27: me yis tshig pa yin pa 'dra //
T09TD4156E:15a-28: ts'u ta'i shing gis yang dag 'khyud //
T09TD4156E:15a-29: gzigs shing ti la ka yi shing //
T09TD4156E:15a-30: bud med lus ser chags pa yis //
T09TD4156E:15a-31: skyes pa gos dkar gon pa 'dra //
T09TD4156E:15a-32: rab rgyas ku ra ba ka gzigs //
T09TD4156E:15a-33: ma zos pa yi smug rtsi'i 'od //
T09TD4156E:15a-34: bud med rnams kyi sen 'od kyis //
T09TD4156E:15a-35: sma phab gyur te dud pa 'dra //
T09TD4156E:15a-36: gzhon nu mya ngan med 'di gzigs //
T09TD4156E:15a-37: 'dab ma rnams kyis spras pa gang //
T09TD4156E:15a-38: kho mo'i lag pa mdzes pa yis //
T09TD4156E:15a-39: ngo mtshar gyur te gnas pa 'dra //
T09TD4156E:15a-40: rdzing bu gzigs shing 'gram skyes pa'i //
T09TD4156E:15a-41: lcang ma rnams kyis rab tu bskor //
T09TD4156E:15a-42: dkar po'i dar gyi gos gon pa'i //
T09TD4156E:15a-43: rab myos ma rnams nyal ba 'dra //
T09TD4156E:15a-44: bud med rnams la bdag nyid che //
T09TD4156E:15a-45: gzigs shig ngang pa chu 'di la //
T09TD4156E:15a-46: rgyab na bsgo bya'i bran bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:15a-48: / rab tu myos pa'i khu byug ni //
T09TD4156E:15a-49: skad grags sgra ni gson mdzod cig / khu byug gzhan ni mngon sum du /
T09TD4156E:15a-51: mkha' la rgyu ba rnams kyi yang //
T09TD4156E:15a-52: rgyags pa dpyid kyis khyer te 'dos //
T09TD4156E:15a-53: bsam bya min sems skye bo ni //
T09TD4156E:15b-0: shes rab can du @15b rlom pa med //
T09TD4156E:15b-1: de ltar dar la bab pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:15b-2: yid dkrugs 'dod pas sems dregs shing //
T09TD4156E:15b-3: sna tshogs tshul ni de dang des //
T09TD4156E:15b-4: gzhon nu la ni nye bar brtsams //
T09TD4156E:15b-5: de / ltar kun nas g-yengs na yang //
T09TD4156E:15b-6: brten pas dbang po dkris pa de //
T09TD4156E:15b-7: 'chi bar bya zhes skyo byas shing //
T09TD4156E:15b-9: de rnams kyi ni gnas skabs de //
T09TD4156E:15b-10: gzigs nas skyes mchog dam pa des //
T09TD4156E:15b-11: mnyam la skyo dang brtan pa yi //
T09TD4156E:15b-12: thugs kyis bsams par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:15b-13: ci zhig bud med 'di rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:15b-14: lang tsho g-yo bar rtogs pa min //
T09TD4156E:15b-15: gang phyir gzigs kyi myos pa ni //
T09TD4156E:15b-16: gang zhig dga' bas nyams par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:15b-17: gang gi nang du bying ba ru //
T09TD4156E:15b-18: nges par de rnams kyis mi mthong //
T09TD4156E:15b-19: 'gro ba nad kyi chos can la //
T09TD4156E:15b-20: 'jigs pa spangs te de ltar dga' //
T09TD4156E:15b-22: nges par mngon par shes min zhing //
T09TD4156E:15b-23: de ltar rang gnas skyo med par //
T09TD4156E:15b-24: rtsed mo dang ni bzhad gad byed //
T09TD4156E:15b-25: rga dang na dang 'chi ba yang //
T09TD4156E:15b-26: shes ldan yin na sems ldan su //
T09TD4156E:15b-28: nyal byed rgod pa smos ci dgos //
T09TD4156E:15b-30: mchog tu 'khogs gang de mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:15b-31: rang gnas gyur zhing skyo med pa //
T09TD4156E:15b-32: ji ltar sems med de ltar de //
T09TD4156E:15b-33: me tog rnams dang 'bras bu yis //
T09TD4156E:15b-34: rnam par spangs par gyur pa'i shing //
T09TD4156E:15b-35: 'gyel lam yang na bcad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:15b-36: shing gzhan mdzes par byed ma yin //
T09TD4156E:15b-37: de ltar bsam gtan mchog mthong nas ;
T09TD4156E:15b-38: / yul rnams la ni 'dod pa thal //
T09TD4156E:15b-39: 'char ka tshul lugs bstan bcos shes //
T09TD4156E:15b-40: mdza' bo nyid kyis de la smras //
T09TD4156E:15b-41: kho bo mi skyong gis byin te //
T09TD4156E:15b-42: khyod la grogs su nus pa lo //
T09TD4156E:15b-43: gang phyir khyed la smra 'dod pa //
T09TD4156E:15b-44: rab dga' ldan pa de phyir ro //
T09TD4156E:15b-45: phan pa min las rab 'gegs shing //
T09TD4156E:15b-46: phan pa la yang rjes rab 'jug / sdug pa na yang yongs mi gtong//
T09TD4156E:15b-47: yongs rdzogs shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
T09TD4156E:15b-48: bdag de byams par dam bcas nas //
T09TD4156E:15b-49: skyes bu'i don la phyir phyogs pa //
T09TD4156E:15b-50: gal te khyod la btang snyoms byed //
T09TD4156E:15b-51: grogs po nyid kyang ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:15b-52: de phyir mdza' bor gyur nas smras //
T09TD4156E:16a-0: @16a * // gzhon nu'i lus dang ldan pa ni //
T09TD4156E:16a-2: yul la mkhas pa'i gzugs brnyan min //
T09TD4156E:16a-3: de yi ngo tsha'i rgod don dang //
T09TD4156E:16a-4: bdag nyid dga' ba'i don nyid du //
T09TD4156E:16a-5: bden min gyis kyang mi mo yi //
T09TD4156E:16a-6: rjes su 'jug pa rigs pa yin //
T09TD4156E:16a-8: bud med rnams kyis sems 'ching ste //
T09TD4156E:16a-9: brtse ba'i yon tan skye gnas phyir //
T09TD4156E:16a-10: yid la 'dod pa bud med yin //
T09TD4156E:16a-11: de phyir rnam par spangs pa'i spyan //
T09TD4156E:16a-12: snying la gzhan du phyir bltas kyang //
T09TD4156E:16a-13: 'di yi yul dang rjes mthun par //
T09TD4156E:16a-14: mkhas pa rnam par dpyad par 'os //
T09TD4156E:16a-15: mkhas pa sman yin bud med la //
T09TD4156E:16a-16: mkhas pa rab mchog rgyan yin no //
T09TD4156E:16a-17: mkhas pa dang bral gzugs dag ni //
T09TD4156E:16a-18: me tog med pa'i nags dang 'dra //
T09TD4156E:16a-19: yang na mkhas pa'i rang bzhin gyi //
T09TD4156E:16a-20: bsam pa rang bzhin khas len mdzod //
T09TD4156E:16a-21: yul rnams nyes par dka' thob nas //
T09TD4156E:16a-22: phyi shol byed pa 'os ma yin//
T09TD4156E:16a-23: sngon tshe lha yi dbang pos kyang //
T09TD4156E:16a-24: 'dod pa mchog ces shes byas nas //
T09TD4156E:16a-25: goo tam thub pa'i dga' ldan ma //
T09TD4156E:16a-26: bshol med ma la 'dod pa byas //
T09TD4156E:16a-27: zla ba'i chung ma snar ma ni //
T09TD4156E:16a-28: drang srong ri byis don du gnyer //
T09TD4156E:16a-29: de nas de dang 'dra ba yi //
T09TD4156E:16a-30: brkam bya ma ni rnyed ces thos //
T09TD4156E:16a-31: au bha thya yi chung ma ni //
T09TD4156E:16a-32: rlung gi bu mo mthun ma la //
T09TD4156E:16a-33: dka' thub chen po'i phur bu yis //
T09TD4156E:16a-34: bar dva dza bskyed par gyur //
T09TD4156E:16a-35: drang srong phur bu'i chung ma ni //
T09TD4156E:16a-36: sbyin sreg ma la sbyin sreg mchog //
T09TD4156E:16a-37: zla ba yis ni lag pa yi //
T09TD4156E:16a-38: lha yi las byed bskyed par gyur //
T09TD4156E:16a-39: sngon tshe bu mo nag mo ni //
T09TD4156E:16a-40: chur skyes ma las skyes ma la //
T09TD4156E:16a-41: rtsib logs skyes ni chags skyes shing //
T09TD4156E:16a-42: ya nu ni yi gling du phyin //
T09TD4156E:16a-43: gnod sbyin phreng ma rigs ngan ma //
T09TD4156E:16a-44: snod ma la ni dga' 'dod pas //
T09TD4156E:16a-45: gong ma sreg ni za ba'i bu //
T09TD4156E:16a-46: thub pa gnas mchog gis bskyed do //
T09TD4156E:16a-47: 'gro mgyogs rgyal po drang srong nyid //
T09TD4156E:16a-48: na tshod rnam par song ba yi //
T09TD4156E:16a-49: lha mo sna tshogs mchod mar bcas //
T09TD4156E:16a-50: sna tshogs shing rta'i nags su dga' //
T09TD4156E:16a-51: bud med 'grogs min zhi ba ni //
T09TD4156E:16a-52: skya bseng gis ni shes nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:16a-53: dga' ma'i gzugs yon gyis bkug ste //
T09TD4156E:16a-54: 'dod las skyes pa'i bde ba bsten //
T09TD4156E:16a-55: skyed mdzad rgyal po dmar ser yang //
T09TD4156E:16a-56: bram ze'i bu mo phrogs nas ni /
T09TD4156E:16b-0: @16b na babs thob pa nyid yin kyang //
T09TD4156E:16b-1: yid dkrugs 'dod pa ma bsten min //
T09TD4156E:16b-2: de la sogs pa bdag nyid ches //
T09TD4156E:16b-3: yul rnams smad pa yin na yang //
T09TD4156E:16b-4: dga' ba'i ched du longs spyad de //
T09TD4156E:16b-5: yon tan ldan la sngon nyid do //
T09TD4156E:16b-6: khyod kyang rigs pa las 'thob cing //
T09TD4156E:16b-7: stobs ldan gzugs ldan dar la bab //
T09TD4156E:16b-9: yul rnams la ni phyi shol byed //
T09TD4156E:16b-10: de ltar 'jam zhing lung dang bcas //
T09TD4156E:16b-11: de yis tshig ni gsan gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:16b-12: 'brug gi sgra skad dbyangs kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:16b-13: gzhon nu yis ni lan smras so //
T09TD4156E:16b-15: khyod la mdza' bo nyid du gsal //
T09TD4156E:16b-16: gang du bdag la ngan par sems //
T09TD4156E:16b-17: 'dir ni khyod la rjes zhi bgyi //
T09TD4156E:16b-18: yul rnams la ni phyi shol byed //
T09TD4156E:16b-19: 'jig rten de'i bdag nyid du shes //
T09TD4156E:16b-20: 'gro ba mi rtag par shes nas //
T09TD4156E:16b-21: 'dir ni bdag yid dga' ba min //
T09TD4156E:16b-22: rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste //
T09TD4156E:16b-23: gal te 'di gsum ma yin na //
T09TD4156E:16b-24: yid du 'ong ba'i yul rnams la //
T09TD4156E:16b-25: kho bo yang ni dga' bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:16b-26: gal te bud med rnams kyi lus //
T09TD4156E:16b-27: de nyid rtag par 'gyur na ni //
T09TD4156E:16b-28: skyon ldan 'dod pa rnams la yang //
T09TD4156E:16b-29: kho bo'i sems ni 'dod la phyogs //
T09TD4156E:16b-30: gang tshe 'di dag rnams kyi gzugs //
T09TD4156E:16b-32: bdag nyid kyi yang 'dod med na //
T09TD4156E:16b-33: rmongs las der ni dga' bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:16b-34: rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i tshes //
T09TD4156E:16b-35: rga na 'chi ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:16b-36: skyo ba med par rol ba ni //
T09TD4156E:16b-37: ri dags dang ni bya dang mtshungs //
T09TD4156E:16b-38: bdag nyid chen po 'di rnams kyang //
T09TD4156E:16b-39: 'dod pa'i bdag nyid ces smras gang //
T09TD4156E:16b-40: 'dir ni skyo bar bya ba ste //
T09TD4156E:16b-41: gang tshe de rnams kyi yang tshad //
T09TD4156E:16b-42: gang du phyi las zad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:16b-43: bdag nyid chen por mi sems te //
T09TD4156E:16b-44: yul rnams la ni chags pa'am //
T09TD4156E:16b-45: sbyor min bdag nyid ldan nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:16b-46: mkhas pa yis kyang dpe brjod cing //
T09TD4156E:16b-47: bden min gyis kyang bud med kyi //
T09TD4156E:16b-48: skye la zhugs zhes smras pa gang //
T09TD4156E:16b-49: bden min bdag gis shes ma yin //
T09TD4156E:16b-50: gang du drang min rjes 'jug pa //
T09TD4156E:16b-51: de la bdag gis sred pa med //
T09TD4156E:16b-52: dngos po kun gyi tshogs ba de //
T09TD4156E:16b-53: gal te smon na med par shog //
T09TD4156E:16b-54: mi brtan pa yi dad pa dang //
T09TD4156E:16b-55: skyon du mthong ba'i nus pa yis //
T09TD4156E:16b-56: chags pa skyes par gyur pa'i sems //
T09TD4156E:16b-57: slu bar bya ba ci zhig yin //
T09TD4156E:17a-1: med skyes pa'i chags skyes shing //
T09TD4156E:17a-2: bud med skyes pa phan tshun du //
T09TD4156E:17a-3: gal te de ltar slu na ni //
T09TD4156E:17a-4: lta bar nus pa nyid ma yin //
T09TD4156E:17a-5: de ltar gyur na sdug bsngal gyis //
T09TD4156E:17a-6: nyam thag rga 'chi'i skal ba can //
T09TD4156E:17a-8: slu bar 'os pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:17a-9: ae ma shin tu brtan la stobs ldan khyod kyi sems //
T09TD4156E:17a-10: 'dod pa g-yo ba rnams su snying po mthong gyur la //
T09TD4156E:17a-11: shin tu rno zhing 'jigs pa'i yul la zon mdzad cing //
T09TD4156E:17a-12: rga dang rgud pa nad kyi 'jigs pa rnam sems shing //
T09TD4156E:17a-13: 'gro ba rnams ni me yis tshig pa bzhin thos na //
T09TD4156E:17a-14: zhi ba 'thob min brtan min dga' ba ga la zhig / the tshom med par 'chi zhes rab tu shes pa yi //
T09TD4156E:17a-15: mi rnams gang gi snying la chags pa rab skyed pa //
T09TD4156E:17a-16: de yi sems ni lcags las gyur par shes pa ste //
