T09TD4156E:17a-17: 'jigs pa che la chags pa gang zhig du ba med //
T09TD4156E:17a-18: de nas gzhon nu yis ni 'dod pa rnams kyis bsten //
T09TD4156E:17a-19: 'joms byed gtam ni rnam par nges pa'i bdag nyid mdzad //
T09TD4156E:17a-20: skye bo rnams kyi mig gi 'gro bya gsal byed kyi //
T09TD4156E:17a-21: dkyil 'khor sa 'dzin ri bo la ni nub par gyur //
T09TD4156E:17a-22: de nas rgyan dang me tog phreng ba 'bras med 'dzin //
T09TD4156E:17a-23: sgyu rtsal yon tan gyis dang rab dgas 'bras med rnams //
T09TD4156E:17a-24: rang gi sems la yid dkrugs 'dod pa rnams smad nas //
T09TD4156E:17a-25: yid la re nyams bud med rnams ni grong du thal //
T09TD4156E:17a-26: de nas grong khyer skyed mos tshal song skye bo'i dpal //
T09TD4156E:17a-27: legs par brtags nas spyod la so sor brtul te yang //
T09TD4156E:17a-28: thams cad mi rtag par gyur rnam par sems bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:17a-29: slar yang mi skyong bdag skyes grong du rnam par zhugs ;
T09TD4156E:17a-30: / de nas de yi yid ni yul la rnam par phyir phyogs rgyal pos thos gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:17a-31: snying la song ba'i zug la glang chen bzhin du mtshan mo de la gnyid ma log / de nas sngags mang rnam pa sna tshogs lam rnams dag gis thang chad blon por bcas //
T09TD4156E:17a-32: des ni 'dod pa las gzhan sras kyi blo yi nges pa gzigs ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:17a-33: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dang gas chen po las /
T09TD4156E:17a-34: bud med kyis gegs byas pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
T09TD4156E:17a-36: // / de ltar yul rnams dam pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:17a-37: sred du bcug kyang sh'akya'i rgyal po'i sras po de //
T09TD4156E:17b-0: dug @17b bsgos mda' yis snying la pug pa'i seng ge bzhin //
T09TD4156E:17b-1: bde ba rnyed pa ma yin brtan par gshegs ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:17b-2: de nas res 'ga' zhig na blon po'i bu mkhas shing //
T09TD4156E:17b-3: grogs gyur sna tshogs gtam gyis rjes su 'brangs byas pa //
T09TD4156E:17b-4: nags kyi sa la 'gro 'dod lta bar 'dod pa yis //
T09TD4156E:17b-5: mi yi lha yis rjes gnang phyi rol rab tu gshegs //
T09TD4156E:17b-6: gsar pa'i gser gyi srab dang dril bu chung ngu dang //
T09TD4156E:17b-7: rab tu g-yo ba'i rnga yab mdzes pa'i gser sga dang //
T09TD4156E:17b-8: stan bcas dam pa'i rta la mngon par zhon nas ni //
T09TD4156E:17b-9: tog la ljon dang chu skyes tog can bzhin du gshegs //
T09TD4156E:17b-10: de ni mchog tu rnam par rgyang ring nags mtha'i sa //
T09TD4156E:17b-11: nags tshal 'dod dang sa yi yon tan las gshegs te //
T09TD4156E:17b-12: chu gnyer bzhin du rnam par bkram pa'i gshol lam can //
T09TD4156E:17b-13: nor 'dzin sa la zhing dag rmo ba gzigs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:17b-14: gshol gyi phya las rnam bkram rtsva myug ku sha dang //
T09TD4156E:17b-15: shi gyur 'bu srin srog chags phra mos khyab pa ste //
T09TD4156E:17b-16: rnam pa de 'dra'i sa de yang dag mngon gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:17b-17: rang gi skye bo bsad pa la bzhin mya ngan gyur //
T09TD4156E:17b-18: zhing dag rmo ba'i skyes bu rnams ni rnam gzigs pa //
T09TD4156E:17b-19: rlung gis gtor ba'i rdul gyis rnam 'gyur kha dog can //
T09TD4156E:17b-20: khur bas thang chad rnam par 'khrugs pa'i glang rnams la ;
T09TD4156E:17b-21: /'phags pa mchog gis mchog tu brtse ba'i snying rje mdzad //
T09TD4156E:17b-22: de nas mgyogs 'gro'i rgyab nas dal bus babs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:17b-23: sa la rnam par rgyu zhing mya ngan dang ldan pa //
T09TD4156E:17b-24: skye bo dag gi skye dang 'god pa rnam sems zhing //
T09TD4156E:17b-25: nges par bkren pa 'di zhes smras shing nyam thag gyur //
T09TD4156E:17b-26: bsam pa yis kyang rnam par dben pa mngon bzhed cing //
T09TD4156E:17b-27: rjes su 'ongs pa'i mdza' bshes de rnams phyir bzlog nas //
T09TD4156E:17b-28: kun nas mngon par g-yo zhing mdzes pa'i lo 'dab can //
T09TD4156E:17b-29: 'dzam bu'i rtsa ba skye bo med par de gshegs so //
T09TD4156E:17b-30: rin chen bee d'urya dang mtshungs pa'i rtsva 'jam can //
T09TD4156E:17b-31: gtsang mar ldan pa'i sa gzhi der ni de zhugs te //
T09TD4156E:17b-32: 'gro ba'i skye ba dang ni 'god pa rnams sems shing //
T09TD4156E:17b-33: yid ni brtan pa'i lam la dmigs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:17b-34: yul la 'dod sogs sems kyi nad las rnam grol ba'i //
T09TD4156E:17b-35: sems gnas pa ni de ma thag tu thob gyur la //
T09TD4156E:17b-36: bsam gtan dang po zag pa med pa'i rab spyod pa //
T09TD4156E:18a-1: bcas zhi ba thob par gyur //
T09TD4156E:18a-2: rnam par dben pa las skyes thob nas de nas ni //
T09TD4156E:18a-3: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba sems kyi ting nge 'dzin //
T09TD4156E:18a-4: yid kyis 'jig rten 'gro ba yang dag rab brtags nas //
T09TD4156E:18a-5: 'di nyid de nas gzhan ni rab tu rtogs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:18a-6: kye ma skye bo bkren pa gang zhig rang dbang ni //
T09TD4156E:18a-7: yod min rga dang na dang rnam par nyams pa'i chos //
T09TD4156E:18a-8: nad pa dang ni shi dang rga bas nyam thag gam //
T09TD4156E:18a-9: gzhan la rgyags pas long zhing shes pa med pas smod //
T09TD4156E:18a-10: 'dir ni gal te bdag gis rang dang mtshungs gyur pa //
T09TD4156E:18a-11: gzhan gyi rang bzhin dag la de ltar smod ba ni //
T09TD4156E:18a-12: mchog gi chos 'di rnam par rtog pa kho bo yi //
T09TD4156E:18a-13: mtshungs par gyur pa ma yin nus pa'ang gzhan med do //
T09TD4156E:18a-14: 'gro ba'i rga dang na dang rgud pa'i nyes pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:18a-15: de ltar ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gzigs de yi //
T09TD4156E:18a-16: stobs dang lang tsho dang ni srog la rab zhugs pa'i //
T09TD4156E:18a-17: bdag tu gyur pa'i rgyags pa skad cig gis med gyur //
T09TD4156E:18a-18: de ni dga' ba med cing rjes su gdung med la //
T09TD4156E:18a-19: the tshom som nyir ma gyur gnyid dang rmugs pa med //
T09TD4156E:18a-20: 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la yang dag ma chags shing //
T09TD4156E:18a-21: gzhan la rnam par sdang bar ma gyur phyi shol med //
T09TD4156E:18a-22: de ltar bdag nyid chen po de yi rdul med cing //
T09TD4156E:18a-23: rnam par dag pa'i blo gros 'di ni 'phel gyur la ;
T09TD4156E:18a-24: / skyes bu gzhan dag rnams kyis mthong bar ma gyur pa'i //
T09TD4156E:18a-25: dge slong cha lugs ldan pa'i skyes bu nye bar 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:18a-26: su zhig yin pa smros zhes mi yi lha sras kyis //
T09TD4156E:18a-27: de la mngon par dris gyur de la des smras pa //
T09TD4156E:18a-28: mi yi skyes mchog skye dang 'chi bas 'jigs pa yi //
T09TD4156E:18a-29: thar pa'i phyir ni rab tu zhugs pa'i dge sbyong yin //
T09TD4156E:18a-30: bdag ni 'gro ba zad pa'i chos ni thar 'dod cing //
T09TD4156E:18a-31: dge zhing 'gyur ba med pa'i gnas de tshol ba ste //
T09TD4156E:18a-32: rang gi skye bo dang ni skye bor mnyam pa'i blo //
T09TD4156E:18a-33: yul rnams la ni chags pa'i nyes pa phyir log pa'o //
T09TD4156E:18a-34: skye bo med pa'i gnas khang dang ni ri 'am nags //
T09TD4156E:18a-35: shing gi rtsa ba 'ga' zhig tu ni gnas pa yi //
T09TD4156E:18a-36: don dam phyir ni ji ltar nyer ldan slong mo ba //
T09TD4156E:18a-37: sred bral yongs su 'dzin pa med par rnam par rgyu //
T09TD4156E:18a-38: de ltar gzigs pa'i rgyal po'i sras po de nyid la //
T09TD4156E:18a-39: 'di skad smras nas nam mkha' la ni gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:18b-0: de ni de yi lus kyis sangs rgyas gzhan gzigs @18b shing ;
T09TD4156E:18b-1: / lha na gnas pa de yi dran pa'i ched du 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:18b-2: mkha' la mkha' 'gro bzhin du gshegs pa de la ni //
T09TD4156E:18b-3: mi mchog yang dag dga' bar gyur zhing ya mtshan gyur //
T09TD4156E:18b-4: de nas chos kyi 'du shes nye bar thob gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:18b-5: mngon par nges 'byung cho ga la ni blo gros mdzad //
T09TD4156E:18b-6: de nas dbang po dang mnyam dbang po'i rta thul ba //
T09TD4156E:18b-7: grong la rab tu 'jug 'dod rta la rab 'dzegs shing //
T09TD4156E:18b-8: 'khor gyi skye bo dag kyang mngon par 'dod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:18b-9: de nyid phyir na mngon 'dod nags ni ma bsnyen to //
T09TD4156E:18b-10: de ni rga dang 'chi ba zad par byed 'dod pa //
T09TD4156E:18b-11: nags su gnas phyir blo gros dran pa la bzung nas /
T09TD4156E:18b-12: gnyis 'thung dbang po nags kyi sa nas grong du ltar //
T09TD4156E:18b-13: 'dod pa las min grong la slar yang rab tu zhugs //
T09TD4156E:18b-14: de ni yang dag mthong nas sh'akya'i bu mo zhig / rab zhugs lam la thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas shing //
T09TD4156E:18b-15: kye ma spyan dbang gang gi bdag po 'di 'dra 'dir //
T09TD4156E:18b-16: mo de bde ma mya ngan 'das ma zhes smras so //
T09TD4156E:18b-17: de nas dbyangs 'di sprin chen dbyangs dang ldan pa yis //
T09TD4156E:18b-18: yongs su thos nas mchog tu zhi ba rnyed gyur la //
T09TD4156E:18b-19: mya ngan 'das zhes sgra skad thos pa dang ldan des //
T09TD4156E:18b-20: yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'i chos gar blo gros mdzad //
T09TD4156E:18b-21: de nas gser gyi ri bo'i rtse mo'i sku mnga' zhing //
T09TD4156E:18b-22: glang chen phyag dang 'brug gi sgra dbyangs khyu mchog spyan //
T09TD4156E:18b-23: seng ge'i stobs dang ri bong can gyi zhal mnga' bas //
T09TD4156E:18b-24: mi zad chos la chags skyes po brang rab tu 'thob //
T09TD4156E:18b-25: de nas mtho ris dag na lha yi 'dun sa ru //
T09TD4156E:18b-26: lha dbang 'bar ba la ni bkug 'gyed gzhon nu bzhin //
T09TD4156E:18b-27: blon po'i tshogs kyis nye bar bsnyen pa'i mi bdag la //
T09TD4156E:18b-28: ri dags dbang po'i 'gros dang ldan pa mngon par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:18b-29: rab tu btud nas thal mo dang bcas smras gyur ba //
T09TD4156E:18b-30: mi dbang bdag la legs par rjes su gnang ba byin //
T09TD4156E:18b-31: nges par skye bo 'di ni rnam par 'bral ba ste //
T09TD4156E:18b-32: thar pa'i ched du yongs su rnam par gshegs par bgyi //
T09TD4156E:18b-33: de ltar de'i tshig nges par thob nas rgyal po ni //
T09TD4156E:18b-34: lag ldan gyis ni mngon snun ljon pa ltar g-yos shing //
T09TD4156E:18b-35: ka ma la dang rab mtshungs thal mo dag bzung nas //
T09TD4156E:18b-36: mchi ma dang ni gre ba kha zhing tshig 'di smras //
T09TD4156E:18b-37: brtse ba'i blo gros 'di ni rab tu thong mdzod cig / khyed kyi chos la bsnyen pa'i dus ni ma yin te //
T09TD4156E:19a-1: po dang ni blo gros g-yo ba na //
T09TD4156E:19a-2: chos kyi spyod pa gsungs pa rnams ni skyon mang ngo //
T09TD4156E:19a-3: yul rnams su ni dbang po ya mtshan glo bur zhing //
T09TD4156E:19a-4: brtul zhugs g-yo ba rnams su nges par nus med la //
T09TD4156E:19a-5: khyad par du ni dben par mngon par mi shes pa //
T09TD4156E:19a-6: dar la bab pa'i yid ni dgon pa nas g-yo'o //
T09TD4156E:19a-7: mtshon gyur khyod la phun sum tshogs pa gtad nas ni //
T09TD4156E:19a-8: kho bo yi yang chos dga' chos kyi dus yin te //
T09TD4156E:19a-9: rnam par gnon pa bstan pa rnam par gnon pa yis //
T09TD4156E:19a-10: bla ma spangs nas khyod kyi chos kyis chos ma yin //
T09TD4156E:19a-11: de phyir khyod kyis nan tan nges pa 'di dor la //
T09TD4156E:19a-12: khyod ni re zhig khyim gnas chos la dga' bar gyis //
T09TD4156E:19a-13: dar la bab bas bde ba rnams ni longs spyad nas //
T09TD4156E:19a-14: skyes bu'i dka' thub nags su 'jug pa nyams dga'o //
T09TD4156E:19a-15: de ltar rgyal po'i tshig 'di rnam par gsan nas ni //
T09TD4156E:19a-16: ka la ping ka'i dbyangs kyis lan ni smras pa ste //
T09TD4156E:19a-17: rgyal po gal te bdag gi khas len bzhi rnams su //
T09TD4156E:19a-18: khyed kyis 'gyur na dka' thub nags ni mi bsnyen to //
T09TD4156E:19a-19: bdag gi srog ni 'chi ba nyid du mi 'gyur zhing //
T09TD4156E:19a-20: bdag gi rang gnas gyur 'di nad kyis mi 'phrogs la //
T09TD4156E:19a-21: bdag gi lang tsho rgas pa yis ni mi g-yeng zhing //
T09TD4156E:19a-22: phun sum tshogs pa 'di ni rgud pas ma gtor na'o //
T09TD4156E:19a-23: de ltar rnyed par dka' ba'i don smras gyur pa yi //
T09TD4156E:19a-24: sras po la ni sh'akya'i rgyal pos tshig smras pa //
T09TD4156E:19a-25: shin tu rab tu zhugs pa'i blo 'di thong mdzod cig / shin tu yid la re ba 'phya zhing sha thang 'chad //
T09TD4156E:19a-26: de nas lhun po ltar lcis bla ma la smras pa //
T09TD4156E:19a-27: gal te rim pa de dag med de shol mi thebs //
T09TD4156E:19a-28: 'bar ba'i me yis tshig pa'i khang pa nas //
T09TD4156E:19a-29: phyi rol 'byung bar 'dod pa 'dzin par nus ma yin //
T09TD4156E:19a-30: gang gi tshe na 'gro ba nges par 'bral ba ste //
T09TD4156E:19a-31: chos phyir ma yin 'di ni rnam par 'bral ba mchog /'o na bdag la 'chi bas dbang med 'bral byed cing //
T09TD4156E:19a-32: rang gi don ma byas shing tshim pa ma yin nyid //
T09TD4156E:19a-33: de ltar mthar bzhed sras po de yis nges pa ni //
T09TD4156E:19a-34: sa yi bdag po yis ni nges par thos nas ni //
T09TD4156E:19a-35: 'gro bar mi bya zhes ni mngon par brjod nas su //
T09TD4156E:19a-36: slar yang bsrung ba dag ni 'dod pa mchog rnams mdzad //
T09TD4156E:19a-37: dga' zhi zhi ba sngon 'gro bskur sti mang po las //
T09TD4156E:19b-0: @19b blon po rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin dpe bstan zhing ;
T09TD4156E:19b-1: / bla mas mchi ma lhung ba rnams kyis shol btab ste //
T09TD4156E:19b-2: de nas de ni mya ngan bzhin du khyim la zhugs //
T09TD4156E:19b-3: rna lung 'khyil pa g-yo bas 'o byas gdong ldan ma //
T09TD4156E:19b-4: dbugs rlung stug pos rnam par bskyod pa'i nu ma can //
T09TD4156E:19b-5: bstan pa min pa'i mig ldan bud med rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:19b-6: ri dags mo rnams kyis bzhin mngon par gyen du lta //
T09TD4156E:19b-7: gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra dkar ser mdog de ni //
T09TD4156E:19b-8: yan lag mchog ma rnams kyi snying ni myos mdzad cing //
T09TD4156E:19b-9: ngag dang reg bya dang ni lus dang yon tan gyis //
T09TD4156E:19b-10: thos byed lus dang lta byed bdag gi dngos rnams phrogs ;
T09TD4156E:19b-11: / nyin mo rnam par thal tshe de nas khang bzangs la //
T09TD4156E:19b-12: lus kyis nyi ma bzhin du mngon par gsal ba ni //
T09TD4156E:19b-13: rab rib rnam par 'joms 'dod bdag nyid snang ba yis //
T09TD4156E:19b-14: nyi ma shar ba lhun po la bzhin kun nas 'dzegs //
T09TD4156E:19b-15: gser gyis 'bar zhing gsal ba'i sgron ma'i shing dang ni //
T09TD4156E:19b-16: aa ga ru mchog nag po'i bdug pas gang ba'i ltor //
T09TD4156E:19b-17: mngon par 'dzegs nas rdo rjes spras shing sna tshogs pa //
T09TD4156E:19b-18: rab mchog gser gyi bzhugs gdan la ni bsnyen pa'o //
T09TD4156E:19b-19: zla ba ltar dkar gangs dang ldan pa'i rtse mo na //
T09TD4156E:19b-20: nor dbang bdag nyid skyes la lha mo'i tshogs 'dus bzhin //
T09TD4156E:19b-21: de nas lus mchog ma rnams dbang po dang mtshungs mchog / de la mtshan mor sil snyan rnams kyis nye bar gnas //
T09TD4156E:19b-22: mchog rab lha yi sil snyan 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang //
T09TD4156E:19b-23: de yang de yis bskyed par ma gyur dga' ba med //
T09TD4156E:19b-24: dam pa'i don gyi bden phyir legs pa de yi ni //
T09TD4156E:19b-25: mngon par nges par 'byung 'dod gang la dga' ma gyur ;
T09TD4156E:19b-26: / de nas der ni brtul zhugs mchog gyur 'og min gyi //
T09TD4156E:19b-27: lha rnams kyis ni 'di yi nges pa rtogs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:19b-28: lus kyi rnam 'gyur rnam par 'gyur byas dus gcig la //
T09TD4156E:19b-29: myos ma'i skye bo rnams ni gnyid du 'gro bar byas //
T09TD4156E:19b-30: de la kha cig dga' ba yin yang khros pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:19b-31: pang du son pa'i gser gyi snod ni sna tshogs pa'i //
T09TD4156E:19b-32: pi wang rnam par spangs nas lag pa g-yo ba la //
T09TD4156E:19b-33: 'gram pa rnam par bkod nas nyal bar gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:19b-34: 'khyog min bung ba'i phreng ba sgra sgrogs padma dang //
T09TD4156E:19b-35: chu bo'i ngogs na chu sbur rab tu rgod pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:19b-36: gzhan rnams nu mar rnam nyil dkar po'i dar gon zhing //
T09TD4156E:20a-0: @20a * // gling bu lag par sbyar zhing gnyid log rnam par mdzes / de bzhin gzhan rnams padma gsar pa'i snying po ltar //
T09TD4156E:20a-1: 'jam zhing gdung bya gser gyis 'bar ba'i dbu brgyan ni //
T09TD4156E:20a-2: 'dus pa'i lag pa dag gis dga' ba bzhin du ni //
T09TD4156E:20a-3: rdza rnga nyid ni yongs su 'khyud nas gnyid log gyur //
T09TD4156E:20a-4: de bzhin gzhan ni gsar ba'i gser gyis rnam brgyan zhing //
T09TD4156E:20a-5: bgo ba'i gos ni ser po mchog dag gon pa ste //
T09TD4156E:20a-6: kar ni ka ra'i yal ga glang pos bsgyel ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:20a-7: dbang med par ni sdug ma gnyid kyis 'gyel bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:20a-8: de bzhin gzhan ni skar khung logs la sngas nas ni //
T09TD4156E:20a-9: nyal bar gyur pa'i lus kyi mchod sdong rnams 'khyog pa //
T09TD4156E:20a-10: rta babs la ni sha la bhanydza ka bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:20a-11: mdzes pa'i do shal rnam par 'phyang ba rnam par mdzes //
T09TD4156E:20a-12: de bzhin gzhan gyi zhal gyi padma rnam rgyas shing //
T09TD4156E:20a-13: 'gram pa'i logs la nor bu'i rna lung gis dmugs pa //
T09TD4156E:20a-14: 'dab ma brgya pa'i sdong bu'i phyed ni 'khyog pa la //
T09TD4156E:20a-15: gnas pa'i kar ni da bas bskyod bzhin g-yos par gyur //
T09TD4156E:20a-16: gzhan ni ji ltar rnam par zhugs bzhin gnyid log cing //
T09TD4156E:20a-17: nu ma'i khur gyis mngon par dung pa'i lus po rnams //
T09TD4156E:20a-18: lag pa'i zhags pa gser gyi gdu bu can rnams kyis//
T09TD4156E:20a-19: phun tshun nye bar 'khyud nas rnam par gnas te mdzes pa'o //
T09TD4156E:20a-20: rnam par g-yo zhing bskyod pa'i gser gyi skud pa can //
T09TD4156E:20a-21: rna ba'i shog dril kun nas 'khrugs pa'i gdong gis ni //
T09TD4156E:20a-22: yongs su smra ldan pi wang chen po 'khyud nas ni //
T09TD4156E:20a-23: bud med kha cig grogs mo bzhin du gnyid log go //
T09TD4156E:20a-24: lang tsho ma gzhan lag pa'i dpung pa'i yul las ni //
T09TD4156E:20a-25: kun nas rnam 'phyang mdzes pa'i logs can pa na wa //
T09TD4156E:20a-26: sgyeg bcas dga' ba'i mthar ni thang chad sdug pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:20a-27: brla gnyis dag ni dbus su blangs nas nyal ba'o //
T09TD4156E:20a-28: rab tu yang dag 'khums gyur padma dmar po'i mdzod //
T09TD4156E:20a-29: nyi ma nub par gyur tshe rdzing bu rnams ji ltar //
T09TD4156E:20a-30: rnam rgyas mig dang mdzes pa'i smin ma yod na yang //
T09TD4156E:20a-31: gzhan rnams mig rnams btsums shing mdzes par ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:20a-32: de bzhin gzhan ni mgo skyes lhod pa las 'khrugs shing //
T09TD4156E:20a-33: rgyan dang dar rnams dpyi la rnam nyil de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:20b-0: yan lag ma yi gzugs @20b brnyan glang pos bcom pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:20b-1: mgrin pa'i skud pa'i do shal rnam par bkram zhing nyal //
T09TD4156E:20b-2: brtan ldan lus ni yon tan rnams dang ldan na yang //
T09TD4156E:20b-3: gzhan rnams kyang ni dbang med ngo tshad rnam spangs shing //
T09TD4156E:20b-4: rnam par 'gyur zhing bskyod pa'i yan lag gya gyu dang //
T09TD4156E:20b-5: dbugs ni rnam par rgyu zhing lus po gsal bar gnyid //
T09TD4156E:20b-6: gzhan gyi rgyan dang me tog phreng ba rnam brul zhing //
T09TD4156E:20b-7: mdud pa'i gos rnams rnam par nyil gyur 'du shes med //
T09TD4156E:20b-8: btsums pa ma yin dkar po g-yo ba dang bral mig / srog song ro ltar nyal ba rnam par mdzes ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:20b-9: kha sbyar rnam par gdangs te lus po rab brgyang zhing //
T09TD4156E:20b-10: kha yi chu ni rab 'dzags gsang ba rnam rab gsal //
T09TD4156E:20b-11: gzhan ma dag ni chang gis 'khrul par gyur pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:20b-12: lus rgyas rnam par 'gyur bar gnyid log mdzes ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:20b-13: de ltar sems pa dang ni rigs kyi rjes 'gro'i gzugs //
T09TD4156E:20b-14: rnam pa sna tshogs rab myos skye bo de nyal ba ;
T09TD4156E:20b-15: / rlung gis kun nas bskyod gyur gser gyi padma yi //
T09TD4156E:20b-16: rdzing bu dang ni mtshungs pa'i gzugs ni mdzes par gyur //
T09TD4156E:20b-17: de ltar rnam par 'gyur la brtan min spyod pa can //
T09TD4156E:20b-18: de ltar nyal ba'i lang tsho ldan ma de mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:20b-19: lus kyi yon tan ldan zhing smra ba'i yid 'ong yang //
T09TD4156E:20b-20: mi skyong sras po des ni rnam par smad par gyur //
T09TD4156E:20b-21: mi gtsang rnam par 'gyur ba gson pa'i 'jig rten te //
T09TD4156E:20b-22: bud med rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo 'di 'dra ba //
T09TD4156E:20b-23: bgo ba rnams dang rgyan rnams kyis kyang slu ba ste //
T09TD4156E:20b-24: bud med rnams kyi yul la skyes pa chags par 'gro //
T09TD4156E:20b-25: gal te skyes pas bud med rnams kyi rang bzhin ni //
T09TD4156E:20b-26: rmi lam rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin du rnam dpyad na //
T09TD4156E:20b-27: nges par 'dir ni bag med 'phel ba ma yin la //
T09TD4156E:20b-28: 'on kyang yon tan rtog pa bcom ste chags par 'gro //
T09TD4156E:20b-29: de ltar de yi go skabs rnam par rig nas ni //
T09TD4156E:20b-30: mtshan mor phyi ru 'gro 'dod yang dag skyes par gyur //
T09TD4156E:20b-31: 'di yi sems ni kun nas rtog nas de nas ni//
T09TD4156E:20b-32: lha rnams dag gis khang pa'i sgo ni phye bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:20b-33: de nas lang tsho ldan ma nyal ba de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:20b-34: smad cing de ni lding khang logs nas babs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:20b-35: mngon par babs nas de nas som nyi rnam bral bar //
T09TD4156E:20b-36: khang pa'i rim pa dang por phyi ru rnam par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:21a-0: de ni mgyogs 'gro bsrungs la go bar @21a * //
T09TD4156E:21a-2: skyen par 'dun pa la ni 'di skad ces smras so //
T09TD4156E:21a-3: bsngags ldan rta ni khyer shog myur ba dang ldan pas //
T09TD4156E:21a-4: bdud rtsi thob phyir 'di las di ring bdag skom mo //
T09TD4156E:21a-5: bdag gi snying la de ring tshim pa skyes gyur zhing //
T09TD4156E:21a-6: nges pa yang ste ji ltar blo gros la zhugs pa //
T09TD4156E:21a-7: skye bo med pa la yang mgon dang ldan pa ste //
T09TD4156E:21a-8: nges par 'dod pa'i don ni mngon du phyogs par 'du //
T09TD4156E:21a-9: ngo tsha nyid dang yang dag 'dud pa spangs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:21a-10: long tsho ma rnams bdag gi gdong du ji bzhin nyal //
T09TD4156E:21a-11: sgo ni rang bzhin ji ltar rnam par dbye ba la //
T09TD4156E:21a-12: nges par bdag ni 'di nas di ring 'gro ba'i dus //
T09TD4156E:21a-13: mi dbang brtan pa'i don ni rnam par rig na yang //
T09TD4156E:21a-14: jo bo bka' lung des ni de nas rab bzung nas //
T09TD4156E:21a-15: yid la pha rol po yis yang dag bskul ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:21a-16: mgyogs 'gro khyer te 'ong ba la ni blo gros byas //
T09TD4156E:21a-17: de nas gdong gi gser gyi srab kyis gang ba ste //
T09TD4156E:21a-18: rgyab na yang ba'i stan g-yogs dag gis nye bar g-yogs //
T09TD4156E:21a-19: stobs dang sems pa mgyogs dang rjes 'gro nyer ldan pa //
T09TD4156E:21a-20: de yis rta mchog de la der ni nye bar 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:21a-21: snga ma'i rtsa ba rtsib logs gsum ga rab rgyas shing //
T09TD4156E:21a-22: rgyab dang rna ba lus skyes spu ni thung zhing dul //
T09TD4156E:21a-23: rgyab kyi rtsib ma dag ni dud cing rnam rgyal la //
T09TD4156E:21a-24: mchu dang dpral ba brang dang dpyi ni rab rgyas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:21a-25: zhi zhing ka ma la dang mtshungs pa'i phyag gis kyang //
T09TD4156E:21a-26: sku stong rnam par spangs des de la nyer 'khyud nas //
T09TD4156E:21a-27: rgyal mtshan sde la dmag dpon rab tu 'jug pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:21a-28: mngar mo'i yi ge'i tshig gis zhal ta mdzad pa'o //
T09TD4156E:21a-29: g-yul du khyod la mngon par zhon nas sa skyong gis //
T09TD4156E:21a-30: dgra bo rnams ni lan grangs mang por nges par gtor //
T09TD4156E:21a-31: bdag kyang 'chi med go 'phang ji lta ba bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:21a-32: mgyogs 'gro'i gtso bo nye bar thob pa de ltar mdzod //
T09TD4156E:21a-33: yul thob bde ba la dang nor bsgrub pa la rung //
T09TD4156E:21a-34: g-yul 'gyed pa na 'khor ni nges par rnyed bla ste //
T09TD4156E:21a-35: brgyud par lhung ba la ngang chos la brten par rung //
T09TD4156E:21a-36: skyes bu yi yang 'khor ni rnyed par dka' ba'o //
T09TD4156E:21a-37: 'di nyid du yang gang zhig 'khor du gyur pa ni //
T09TD4156E:21a-38: sdig pa'i las la dang ni chos dang ldan la rung //
T09TD4156E:21a-39: ji ltar bdag gi nang gi bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa //
T09TD4156E:21a-40: mi de rnams kyang de yi cha shas skal ba yi //
T09TD4156E:21b-0: de phyir chos dang ldan pa @21b 'di ni yongs shes nas //
T09TD4156E:21b-1: bdag ni 'di las nges 'byung 'gro la phan pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:21b-2: mgyogs 'gro mchog skye shugs dang rnam par gnon pa yis //
T09TD4156E:21b-3: bdag phan la dang 'gro phan la ni 'bad par gyis //
T09TD4156E:21b-4: de ltar mdza' bshes bzhin du rjes su bslabs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:21b-5: mgyogs 'gro mchog la mi mchog 'gro 'dod de //
T09TD4156E:21b-6: dkar la dkar min 'gros kyi 'od zer lung ldan pa //
T09TD4156E:21b-7: nyi ma ston ka'i sprin la bzhin du yang dag 'dzegs //
T09TD4156E:21b-8: de nas 'khor gyi skye bos go bar byed pa'i skad //
T09TD4156E:21b-9: mtshan mor gtum pa dam pa'i rta des yongs bkag cing //
T09TD4156E:21b-10: 'gram pa'i sgra med 'tsher ba'i skad ni rab zhi bar//
T09TD4156E:21b-11: 'jigs pa'i sgra ni dor ba'i gom pa'i 'gros kyis gshegs //
T09TD4156E:21b-12: gser gyi gdu bu'i rgyan ni lag pa'i mkhrig ma la //
T09TD4156E:21b-13: ka ma la 'dras ka ma la rnams rnam byas nas //
T09TD4156E:21b-14: lus 'dud gnod sbyin rnams ni de nas 'di yis ni //
T09TD4156E:21b-15: tshim gyur lag pa'i rtse mos rmig pa rnams bzung ngo //
T09TD4156E:21b-16: lci mo'i sgo gtan sgo glegs yang dag bcad pa gang //
T09TD4156E:21b-17: bde bar gnyis 'thung gis kyang phyed pa ma yin pa //
T09TD4156E:21b-18: mi skyong sras po gshegs tshe skad med grong khyer dang //
T09TD4156E:21b-19: sgo khang de rnams rang nyid rnam par bye bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:21b-20: mngon par gdong phyogs yab dang sras po byis pa dang //
T09TD4156E:21b-21: skye bo rjes su chags dang phun tshogs mchog dag ni //
T09TD4156E:21b-22: blo gros byas shing ltos pa med par dor nas ni //
T09TD4156E:21b-23: yab kyi grong nas de ni de nas rnam par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:21b-24: de nas de ni rnam rgyal 'dam skyes yangs pa'i spyan //
T09TD4156E:21b-25: grong khyer kun nas gzigs nas seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa //
T09TD4156E:21b-26: skye dang 'chi ba dag gi pha rol ma mthong bar //
T09TD4156E:21b-27: grong khyer ser skya zhes byar rab tu mi 'jug go //
T09TD4156E:21b-28: de ltar de yi gsung ni nges par thos nas ni //
T09TD4156E:21b-29: nor gyi bdag po'i 'khor rnams dag ni dga' bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:21b-30: rab tu dga' ba'i yid can lha yi tshogs rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:21b-31: nan tan pha rol song ba de la bsngags pa byas //
T09TD4156E:21b-32: me yi lus can mtho ris gnas pa gzhan rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:21b-33: 'di yis nges pa shin tu dka' ba rnams rig nas //
T09TD4156E:21b-34: sprin stug gseb nas zla ba'i 'od zer 'thon pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:21b-35: mtshan mo'i mun pa'i lam ni rab tu gsal bar byas //
T09TD4156E:21b-36: nyi ma'i mgyogs 'gro lta bu'i mgyogs 'gro de //
T09TD4156E:21b-37: yid kyis sprul pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:22a-1: rta 'dren pas gzi nyams skar ldan bar snang la //
T09TD4156E:22a-2: de ni shin tu mang po'i dpag tshad rnams su gshegs //
T09TD4156E:22a-3: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:22a-4: phyi rol du mngon par byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o /
T09TD4156E:22a-6: // / de nas 'gro mig nyi ma ni ;
T09TD4156E:22a-7: / mngon par shes pa'i yud tsam na //
T09TD4156E:22a-8: ngan spong bu yi dka' thub gnas //
T09TD4156E:22a-9: mi mchog des ni gzigs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:22a-10: blo phab gnyid log ri dags dang //
T09TD4156E:22a-11: rang gnas gnas par bya gang zhig / gzigs nas ngal sos bzhin du dang //
T09TD4156E:22a-12: don ni byas pa bzhin du gyur //
T09TD4156E:22a-13: de ni rgyags pa med don dang //
T09TD4156E:22a-14: dka' thub mchod pa'i don nyid dang //
T09TD4156E:22a-15: rang gi rjes su srung ba la //
T09TD4156E:22a-16: rta yi rgyab nas babs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:22a-17: mngon par babs nas kyang reg cing //
T09TD4156E:22a-18: dga' zhing mig gis 'khru ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:22a-19: nges par 'khor zhes rta dang ni //
T09TD4156E:22a-21: 'di ni mkha' lding dper mgyogs la//
T09TD4156E:22a-23: 'dis ni bdag gi stobs dang ni //
T09TD4156E:22a-24: zhi ba bdag la gus pa bstan //
T09TD4156E:22a-25: thams cad nas don gzhan yin kyang //
T09TD4156E:22a-26: khyod kyi snying la bzung ba ste //
T09TD4156E:22a-27: gang gi jo bo dag la dga' //
T09TD4156E:22a-29: gus pa med la nus pa yod //
T09TD4156E:22a-30: nus pa med la gus pa ldan //
T09TD4156E:22a-31: gus pa ldan dang nus pa ste //
T09TD4156E:22a-33: de phyir skal ba chen po'i las //
T09TD4156E:22a-35: gang zhig khyod kyis bsams pa 'di //
T09TD4156E:22a-36: 'bras bu las kyang gzhan du phyogs //
T09TD4156E:22a-37: skye bo 'bras bu la gnas pa'i //
T09TD4156E:22a-38: mthun phyogs skye bo gang gis min ;
T09TD4156E:22a-39: / zlog la rang gi skye bo yang //
T09TD4156E:22a-40: phal cher pha rol skye bor gyur //
T09TD4156E:22a-41: rigs kyi don du bu bzung zhing //
T09TD4156E:22a-42: gsos pa'i don du pha bskyed la //
T09TD4156E:22a-43: sred pa'i bsam pas chags skye ste //
T09TD4156E:22a-44: byed pa med par rang nyid med //
T09TD4156E:22a-45: mang po brjod cing mdor bsdus nas //
T09TD4156E:22a-46: bdag gi dga' chen legs byas te //
T09TD4156E:22a-47: rta blangs nas ni phyir log dang //
T09TD4156E:22a-48: bdag ni 'dod pa'i gnas rab thob //
T09TD4156E:22a-49: de skad smras nas phyag chen te //
T09TD4156E:22a-50: rjes su bsngags par byed 'dod pas //
T09TD4156E:22a-51: rgyan rnams kun nas btogs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:22a-52: gdung sems ldan pa 'di la byin //
T09TD4156E:22a-53: dbu rgyan dag nas nor bu gsal //
T09TD4156E:22a-54: sgron ma'i las la blangs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:22b-0: nyi ma @22b 'bigs byed la bzhin des //
T09TD4156E:22b-1: tshig 'di smras bzhin bzhugs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:22b-3: lan mang btud nas mi skyong ni //
T09TD4156E:22b-4: kun nas gdung bzlog pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:22b-5: blo phebs par ni gsol bar bya //
T09TD4156E:22b-6: skye dang 'chi ba nyams don du //
T09TD4156E:22b-7: dka' thub nags tshal rab thob ste //
T09TD4156E:22b-8: mtho ris skom pas nges min zhing //
T09TD4156E:22b-9: brtse ba med min khros pa min //
T09TD4156E:22b-10: de phyir de ltar mngon byung ba //
T09TD4156E:22b-11: bdag la mya ngan 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:22b-12: yun rings 'dus par gyur nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:22b-13: dus kyis 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:22b-14: gang phyir nges par 'bral ba ste //
T09TD4156E:22b-15: de phyir thar phyir bdag gi blo //
T09TD4156E:22b-16: slar yang rang gi skye bo las //
T09TD4156E:22b-17: rnam par 'bral ba gang las min //
T09TD4156E:22b-18: mya ngan spong phyir nges 'byung ba //
T09TD4156E:22b-19: bdag la mya ngan 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:22b-20: mya ngan rgyud ni 'dod la chags //
T09TD4156E:22b-21: chags pa can la mya ngan bya //
T09TD4156E:22b-22: 'di yang snga ma rnams la grags //
T09TD4156E:22b-23: kho bo cag la nges par gnas //
T09TD4156E:22b-24: de ltar ster byar gyur pa las //
T09TD4156E:22b-26: skyes bu rnams la phyin log tu //
T09TD4156E:22b-27: nor gyis ster byar gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:22b-28: sa la chos kyi bdag po yang //
T09TD4156E:22b-29: rnyed dka' yang ni ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:22b-30: gang yang 'di ni dus min par //
T09TD4156E:22b-31: nags su song ba yin zhe na //
T09TD4156E:22b-32: srog kyang g-yo bar gyur pa na //
T09TD4156E:22b-33: chos la dus yod ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:22b-34: de phyir da lta nyid du bdag ;
T09TD4156E:22b-35: / dge ba bsag ces nges pa ste //
T09TD4156E:22b-36: 'chi ba'i dgra ni gnas pa na //
T09TD4156E:22b-37: gson pa la ni blo gtad cing //
T09TD4156E:22b-38: zhi ba khyod kyis de la sogs //
T09TD4156E:22b-39: sa 'dzin bdag la zhu bya ste //
T09TD4156E:22b-40: ji ltar bdag ni mi dran pa //
T09TD4156E:22b-41: de ltar nyid du 'bad pa gyis //
T09TD4156E:22b-42: gzhan yang bdag la yon tan med //
T09TD4156E:22b-43: khyod kyis mi bdag la smra bya //
T09TD4156E:22b-44: yon tan med las brtse ba 'dor //
T09TD4156E:22b-45: brtse ba dor las mya ngan med //
T09TD4156E:22b-46: de ltar tshig 'di thos gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:22b-48: mchi mas 'dud pa'i tshig nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:22b-49: thal mo sbyar te lan gsol ba //
T09TD4156E:22b-50: jo bo khyod kyis dgongs pa ni //
T09TD4156E:22b-51: gnyen la ngal ba ster ba 'dis ;
T09TD4156E:22b-54: khyod kyis nges pa 'di lta bus //
T09TD4156E:22b-55: su yis mchi ma 'byung ba med //
T09TD4156E:22b-56: lcags las gyur pa'i snying la'ang ste //
T09TD4156E:22b-57: brtse bas 'khrug la smos ci dgos //
T09TD4156E:22b-58: gzhal med khang gi mal 'os pa'i //
T09TD4156E:22b-59: shin tu gzhon nu 'di gang na //
T09TD4156E:23a-0: @23a * // ku sha'i myu gu rno ba can //
T09TD4156E:23a-1: dka' thub nags kyi sa gang na //
T09TD4156E:23a-2: khyod kyi 'bad pa thos nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:23a-3: rta gang bdag gis blangs pa 'di //
T09TD4156E:23a-4: mgon po de ni stobs kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:23a-5: lha yis byed du bcug pa 'dra //
T09TD4156E:23a-6: khyed kyi nan tan nges pa 'di //
T09TD4156E:23a-7: rang dbang shes na gang gi phyir //
T09TD4156E:23a-8: nye bar len te mgyogs 'gro'i rta //
T09TD4156E:23a-9: ser skya'i gzhi yi mya ngan gnas //
T09TD4156E:23a-10: med pa po yis dam chos bzhin //
T09TD4156E:23a-11: rgyal po brtse ba bgres pa dang //
T09TD4156E:23a-12: sras po sdug go 'dor ba ni //
T09TD4156E:23a-13: phyag chen de ni 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:23a-14: dam pa'i bya ba byed bcom yin //
T09TD4156E:23a-15: yang dag bskyed pas yongs su ni //
T09TD4156E:23a-16: thang chad gnyis pa'i ma de dang //
T09TD4156E:23a-17: lha mo brjod par 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:23a-18: ma ning gis ni dpal thob bzhin //
T09TD4156E:23a-19: sras po byis pa yon tan ldan //
T09TD4156E:23a-20: rigs btsun bdag po'i brtul zhugs ma //
T09TD4156E:23a-23: snyan grags chos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog //
T09TD4156E:23a-24: zhen pa ldan pas grogs mchog bzhin //
T09TD4156E:23a-26: ci ste gnyen dang rgyal srid dag //
T09TD4156E:23a-27: 'dor ba nyid du blo gros mdzad //
T09TD4156E:23a-28: bdag gi 'gros ni khyod zhabs la //
T09TD4156E:23a-30: ma ghu'i bu ni bshes bzang bzhin //
T09TD4156E:23a-31: khyod ni dgon par dor nas su //
T09TD4156E:23a-32: me yis tshig pa'i sems kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:23a-33: grong du 'gro bar nus pa med //
T09TD4156E:23a-35: rgyal pos bdag la ci zhig gsung //
T09TD4156E:23a-37: 'os pa mi thong na ci zhig smra //
T09TD4156E:23a-38: gang yang yon tan med pa yang //
T09TD4156E:23a-39: mi bdag la smos gsung ba yang //
T09TD4156E:23a-40: skyon med thub pa'i bzhin khyod kyi //
T09TD4156E:23a-41: ma gyur pa de ci zhig smra //
T09TD4156E:23a-42: ngo tsha dang bcas sems gyis ni //
T09TD4156E:23a-43: lce ni thogs par gyur pa yi //
T09TD4156E:23a-44: bdag ni gal te yang smra ba //
T09TD4156E:23a-45: de la dad par 'os pa su //
T09TD4156E:23a-46: gang zhig zla ba'i 'od rno bar //
T09TD4156E:23a-48: khyed kyis skyon shes des skyon ni //
T09TD4156E:23a-50: / rtag tu rjes su brtse bcas dang //
T09TD4156E:23a-51: rtag par snying rje shes pa yi /
T09TD4156E:23a-52: brtse ba spong ba tshul min te //
T09TD4156E:23a-53: phyir log bdag la bka' drin mdzod //
T09TD4156E:23a-54: de ltar mya ngan gyis non pa'i //
T09TD4156E:23a-56: rang gnas mchog tu brtan pa yis //
T09TD4156E:23b-0: smra ba'i mchog gis bka' @23b stsal to ;
T09TD4156E:23b-1: /'dun pa bdag dang bral ba la //
T09TD4156E:23b-2: kun nas gdung ba 'di thong cig / lus can 'gro ba tha dad la //
T09TD4156E:23b-3: dgongs pa sna tshogs nges pa yin //
T09TD4156E:23b-4: gang yang brtse las rang gi skye //
T09TD4156E:23b-5: bdag gis rang ni mi 'dor te //
T09TD4156E:23b-6: 'chi bas phan tshun dbang med par //
T09TD4156E:23b-8: sred pa chen po'i sdug bsngal gyi //
T09TD4156E:23b-9: mngal gang gis ni bdag bzung ste //
T09TD4156E:23b-11: bdag su bdag gi de su yin //
T09TD4156E:23b-12: ji ltar sgong skyes gnas shing la //
T09TD4156E:23b-13: yang dag 'dus nas rnam par bral //
T09TD4156E:23b-15: nges par 'bral ba'i mtha' yin no //
T09TD4156E:23b-16: ji ltar sprin rnams 'dus nas ni //
T09TD4156E:23b-19: bdag dang srog chags rnams kyi lugs //
T09TD4156E:23b-21: slus nas rnam par 'bral ba de //
T09TD4156E:23b-22: de phyir rmi lam 'dus gyur la //
T09TD4156E:23b-23: bdag gi ba nyid bzod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:23b-24: shing rnams 'dab ma dmar po dang //
T09TD4156E:23b-25: lhan cig skyes te rnam par 'bral //
T09TD4156E:23b-26: gzhan dang gzhan gyi 'bral ba ni //
T09TD4156E:23b-27: 'gyur ba ma yin smos ci dgos //
T09TD4156E:23b-28: de phyir de ltar gyur na ni //
T09TD4156E:23b-29: zhi ba gdung ba ma byed song //
T09TD4156E:23b-30: gal te yang ni brtse ba 'bebs //
T09TD4156E:23b-31: song nas kyang ni slar yang shog / kho bo cag la ltos byas pa'i //
T09TD4156E:23b-32: ser skya'i gzhi na skye bo la //
T09TD4156E:23b-33: der song brtse ba thong cig dang //
T09TD4156E:23b-34: 'di yi nges la nyon cig smos //
T09TD4156E:23b-35: rga dang 'chi ba zad byas nas //
T09TD4156E:23b-36: yang na myur du 'ong ba'i gtam //
T09TD4156E:23b-37: rtsom pa nyams shing don ma byas //
T09TD4156E:23b-38: yang na nyams par 'gyur ba smros //
T09TD4156E:23b-39: de ltar 'di yi tshig thos nas //
T09TD4156E:23b-40: bsngags ldan mgyogs 'gro'i mchog gis ni //
T09TD4156E:23b-41: lce yis zhabs la rab ldags te //
T09TD4156E:23b-42: mchi ma dron mo phyung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:23b-43: dra ba dang ni bkra shis rtags //
T09TD4156E:23b-44: 'khor lo dbus ldan phyag gis ni //
T09TD4156E:23b-45: gzhon nus de la reg gyur cing //
T09TD4156E:23b-46: na tshod bzhin du rnam par smras /
T09TD4156E:23b-47: bsngags ldan mchi ma ma 'don cing //
T09TD4156E:23b-48: dam pa'i rta nyid 'di bstan to //
T09TD4156E:23b-49: sron mdzod khyod kyi ngal ba 'dis //
T09TD4156E:23b-51: de nas ral gri rnon po nor bu'i yu ba can //
T09TD4156E:23b-52: gser gyi phra ni sna tshogs dang ldan 'dun pa yi //
T09TD4156E:24a-0: lag na yang dag gnas pa brtan pa des bsnams @24a * //
T09TD4156E:24a-2: / khung bu dag nas sbrul bzhin zhugs nas rab tu drungs //
T09TD4156E:24a-3: autpa la yi 'dab ma sngon po de drangs nas //
T09TD4156E:24a-4: sna tshogs dbu rgyan dbu skrar bcas pa rab bcad cing //
T09TD4156E:24a-5: rdzing bu dag na ngang pa bzhin du rnam bkram pa //
T09TD4156E:24a-6: 'od zer dang ldan bar snang dag la de gtor ro //
T09TD4156E:24a-7: mchod pa mngon par 'dod phyir rnam mang bkur sti'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:24a-8: lha ni gnas pas rab tu bkram pa de bzung ste //
T09TD4156E:24a-9: ji lta ba bzhin de ni lha ni lha tshogs rnams //
T09TD4156E:24a-10: lha yi khyad par 'phags pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas //
T09TD4156E:24a-11: rgyan ni bud med ldan pa rnam par spangs nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:24a-12: dbu las dpal ni rnam par rgyang ring byas nas ni //
T09TD4156E:24a-13: nags su gser gyi ngang pa'i mtshan ma gos gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:24a-14: brtan pa des ni gos dag mngon par 'dod par gyur //
T09TD4156E:24a-15: de nas lha ni gnas par ri dags sngon po'i lus //
T09TD4156E:24a-16: dgongs pa rnam dag 'di yi dgongs pa rnams rig nas //
T09TD4156E:24a-17: kha bsgyur dur smrig gos can nye logs mngon par 'ongs ;
T09TD4156E:24a-18: / de la sh'akya'i rgyal po skyes kyis mngon par smras //
T09TD4156E:24a-19: khyod kyi dge yi ngur smrig drang srong rgyal mtshan dang //
T09TD4156E:24a-20: 'tshe ba byed pa'i gzhu 'di rigs pa ma yin te //
T09TD4156E:24a-21: de phyir zhi ba gal te 'dir ni chags med na //
T09TD4156E:24a-22: bdag la rab tu byin la 'di dang 'di snoms mdzod //
T09TD4156E:24a-23: rngon pas smras pa 'dod sbyin 'dod pa snying po las //
T09TD4156E:24a-24: 'di yis blo ni phab nas ri dags rnams gsod do //
T09TD4156E:24a-25: brgya byin mtshungs pa gang de 'dis ni don 'gyur na //
T09TD4156E:24a-26: ae ma rab tu bzhes la dkar po de gsol mdzod //
T09TD4156E:24a-27: de nas de ni mchog tu rab tu dga' ba yis //
T09TD4156E:24a-28: nags su byung ba'i na bza' blangs shing gos dor la //
T09TD4156E:24a-29: rngon pa nyid kyang lha yi lus nyid rnam bzung ste //
T09TD4156E:24a-30: dkar po de nyid blangs nas lha ni gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:24a-31: de nas gzhon nu dang ni rta mchog skyong ba des //
T09TD4156E:24a-32: de ltar gshegs pa de la ya mtshan skyes gyur te //
T09TD4156E:24a-33: nags nas byung ba'i na bza' nyid dang de la ni //
T09TD4156E:24a-34: slar yang ri mor bya ba mang po skyen par mdzad //
T09TD4156E:24a-35: gdong ni mchi ma dang bcas 'dun pa rnams bzlog nas //
T09TD4156E:24a-36: bdag nyid chen po brtan dang grags pa 'chang ba ste //
T09TD4156E:24a-37: mtshams kyi sprin gyis g-yogs pa'i skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin //
T09TD4156E:24a-38: dur smrig gyon zhing gdung sems gang yin de nas gshegs //
T09TD4156E:24b-0: de nas de ltar jo bo @24b rgyal srid mi bzhed par //
T09TD4156E:24b-1: dka' thub nags su gshegs pa mdog nyams snang ba na //
T09TD4156E:24b-2: mgyogs 'gro 'chang de phyag rgyas gyen du bskyod byas nas //
T09TD4156E:24b-3: shin tu rnam par du zhing sa la 'gyel gyur to //
T09TD4156E:24b-4: rnam par bltas nas slar yang sgra bcas par du zhing //
T09TD4156E:24b-5: bsngags ldan rta la lag pa dag gis nyer 'khyud nas //
T09TD4156E:24b-6: de nas kho chad yang dang yang du zlos bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:24b-7: lus kyis song bar gyur kyang sems kyis ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:24b-8: la lar rab tu sems zhing la lar rnam par du //
T09TD4156E:24b-9: la lar sa rab tu 'brad cing la lar 'gyel //
T09TD4156E:24b-10: de nas 'gro bzhin gus pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal zhing ;
T09TD4156E:24b-11: / dbang med lam na bya ba mang po byas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:24b-12: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:24b-13: bsngags ldan phyir la bzlog pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o /
T09TD4156E:24b-15: // / de nas 'dun pa ngu zhing gdong ni mchi ma can //
T09TD4156E:24b-16: bzlog nas nags su 'dun pa'i dka' thub chags med pa //
T09TD4156E:24b-17: don kun grub pa'i lus kyis mngon par zil mnan nas //
T09TD4156E:24b-18: dka' thub gnas de grub pa bzhin du rab tu thob //
T09TD4156E:24b-19: de nas ri dags rgyal po'i 'gros can rgyal po'i sras po de //
T09TD4156E:24b-20: ri dags gnas der ri dags bzhin du rab zhugs pa //
T09TD4156E:24b-21: phun tshogs rnams dang bral yang lus kyi phun tshogs kyis //
T09TD4156E:24b-22: dka' thub gnas ldan kun gyi mig dag phrogs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:24b-23: khur ldan rnams bzhin mgo bo rnams ni phyed dud pas //
T09TD4156E:24b-24: lag na gnya' shing bcas par 'gro gyur ya mtshan la //
T09TD4156E:24b-25: de bzhin 'khor los sgyur ba chung ma dang bcas pa //
T09TD4156E:24b-26: dbang po dang mtshungs de mthong song bar ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:24b-27: sbyin sreg bud shing phyir ni bram ze rnams phyin nas //
T09TD4156E:24b-28: me tog lo 'dab rgyas pa'i lag pa gtsang ma rnams //
T09TD4156E:24b-29: dka' thub gtso bo rnams ni blo rnams byas na yang //
T09TD4156E:24b-30: gshegs pa mthong ste klog glar song bar ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:24b-31: chu gter sngon po bzhin du mthong nas rma bya rnams ;
T09TD4156E:24b-32: / dga' zhing gyen du dud cing skad dag 'don gyur la //
T09TD4156E:24b-33: rgya skyegs ri dags spyod ldan rnams dang ri dags rnams //
T09TD4156E:24b-34: 'bru rnams bor nas mngon par gdong phyogs gnas par gyur //
T09TD4156E:24b-35: 'od zer ldan pa shar ba lta bur 'bar ba yis //
T09TD4156E:24b-36: bu ram shing pa'i rigs kyi sgron ma de mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:25a-0: @25a * // sbyin sreg 'jo rnams bzhos pa yin na yang //
T09TD4156E:25a-1: rab tu dga' ba skyes te rab tu 'jo gyur to //
T09TD4156E:25a-2: 'di ni nor sbyin rnams kyi brgyad pa yin nam ci //
T09TD4156E:25a-3: tha skar dag gi nang nas gcig ni 'phos sam zhes //
T09TD4156E:25a-4: de mthong ba la ya mtshan skyes par gyur pa yi //
T09TD4156E:25a-5: thub pa rnams kyi tshig der mthon por sgrogs bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:25a-6: lha yi khyu mchog gnyis pa'i lus po lta bu dang //
T09TD4156E:25a-7: 'jig rten rgyu dang mi rgyu'i snying po lta bu dang //
T09TD4156E:25a-8: gang 'dod pa yis nyi ma mngon par babs 'dra ba //
T09TD4156E:25a-9: des ni nags tshal mtha' dag rab tu snang bar mdzod //
T09TD4156E:25a-10: de nas gdung gnas bde rnams kyi ji lta bzhin ;
T09TD4156E:25a-11: / nye bar snyan gsan phab cing mngon par mchod gyur la //
T09TD4156E:25a-12: de ni chu bcas chu 'dzin lta bu'i dbyangs kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:25a-13: chos 'dzin rnams la slar yang rab tu mchod par gyur //
T09TD4156E:25a-14: de nas rnam par thar bzhed brtan pa de yis ni //
T09TD4156E:25a-15: dka' thub sna tshogs rnams la nges par rnam gzigs shing //
T09TD4156E:25a-16: mtho ris mngon 'dod bsod nams byas pa'i skye bo yis //
T09TD4156E:25a-17: khyab pa'i dka' thub gnas der rjes su dpyad par gyur //
T09TD4156E:25a-18: dka' thub nor can rnams kyi dka' thub nags tshal der //
T09TD4156E:25a-19: dka' thub rnam par 'gyur ba rnams ni nges gnas nas //
T09TD4156E:25a-20: rjes su gshegs pa'i dka' thub ldan pa kha cig la //
T09TD4156E:25a-21: zhi bas de nyid rnam par shes bzhed 'di gsungs so //
T09TD4156E:25a-22: gang phyir chos kyi cho ga 'di ni mi shes pa //
T09TD4156E:25a-23: bdag gis dka' thub gnas mthong de ring snga ma'o //
T09TD4156E:25a-24: de phyir khyod kyis bdag la smra bar 'os min te //
T09TD4156E:25a-25: nges pa gang zhig gang la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
T09TD4156E:25a-26: de nas dka' thub rnam par rgyu ba'i gnyis skyes des //
T09TD4156E:25a-27: sh'akya'i khyu mchog khyu mchog rnam par gnon pa po //
T09TD4156E:25a-28: de la rim gyis dka' thub khyad par rnams dang ni //
T09TD4156E:25a-29: dka' thub 'bras bu dang bcas gtam ngag byas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:25a-30: grong byung bza' ba ma yin chu la rab skyes pa'i //
T09TD4156E:25a-31: 'dab ma rnams dang chu dang 'bras bu rtsa ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:25a-32: thub pa rnams kyi spyod pa 'di ni lung ji ltar //
T09TD4156E:25a-33: dka' thub rnams kyi rnam rtog tha dad de de'o //
T09TD4156E:25a-34: kha cig ri dags bzhin du rtsva rnams la spyod la //
T09TD4156E:25a-35: gzhan rnams bor ba yis ni mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya ltar 'tsho //
T09TD4156E:25a-36: kha cig lag 'gro rnams dang lhan cig 'tsho ba ste //
T09TD4156E:25b-0: grog mkhar gyur ba @25b rnams ni nags na rlung gis so //
T09TD4156E:25b-1: rdo yis rab 'bad bsgrub pa'i spyod pa gzhan rnams te //
T09TD4156E:25b-2: kha cig rang gi so yis nye bar blangs shing za //
T09TD4156E:25b-3: de bzhin gzhan ni gzhan gyi don du bcos byas nas //
T09TD4156E:25b-4: gal te lhag ma yod na bya ba byed pa'o //
T09TD4156E:25b-5: chu yis gsher ba'i ral pa'i tshogs can kha cig ni ;
T09TD4156E:25b-6: / gsang sngags sngon 'gro lan gnyis me la sbyin sreg cing //
T09TD4156E:25b-7: kha cig nya dang mnyam par chu la rnams zhugs nas //
T09TD4156E:25b-8: rus sbal bzhin du lus rnams rab tu bskum pa'o //
T09TD4156E:25b-9: de ltar dus su bsags pa'i dka' thub nags tshogs kyi //
T09TD4156E:25b-10: mchog gis lhar 'gro gzhan gyis mi yi 'jig rten te ;
T09TD4156E:25b-11: / sdug bsngal lam gyis bde ba nye bar thob phyir dang //
T09TD4156E:25b-12: chos kyi rtsa ba bde ba nyid du gsungs phyir ro //
T09TD4156E:25b-13: de skad ces sogs rkang gnyis dbang po'i sras po yis //
T09TD4156E:25b-14: dka' thub nor dang ldan pa de yi tshig gsan nas //
T09TD4156E:25b-15: de nyid gzigs pa min yang ngoms par ma gyur la //
T09TD4156E:25b-16: bdag tu song ba 'di ni dal bus gsungs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:25b-17: sdug bsngal bdag nyid dka' thub rnam pa du ma ste //
T09TD4156E:25b-18: dka' thub bdag gi 'bras bu mtho ris gtso bo'o //
T09TD4156E:25b-19: 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'gyur ba dang ldan la //
T09TD4156E:25b-20: nyung ngu la ngal 'di ni gdung gnas rnams kyi'o //
T09TD4156E:25b-21: phangs pa rnams dang gnyen dang yul rnams bor nas ni //
T09TD4156E:25b-22: gang zhig mtho ris phyir ni rnam par spyod byed la //
T09TD4156E:25b-23: de rnams rnam par bral te nges par 'gro 'dod la //
T09TD4156E:25b-24: slar yang shin tu 'ching ba chen po nyid yin no //
T09TD4156E:25b-25: lus kyi ngal du ba gdung ba'i bya ba rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:25b-26: 'dod pa'i rgyu las rab tu 'jug par 'dod pa'o ;
T09TD4156E:25b-27: /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i skyon rnams yongs su mi rtog par //
T09TD4156E:25b-28: sdug bsngal gyis de sdug bsngal kho na rjes su tshol //
T09TD4156E:25b-29: 'chi bas skye dgu rnams kyis rtag par 'jigs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:25b-30: 'bad pa yis ni slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod //
T09TD4156E:25b-31: rab tu zhugs par gyur na nges par 'chi ba ste //
T09TD4156E:25b-32: 'di nyid du ni gang las 'jigs pa rnams lhung ngo //
T09TD4156E:25b-33: 'di yi don du gcig rnams ngal bar rab 'jug cing //
T09TD4156E:25b-34: gzhan rnams mtho ris don du ngal ba 'thob pa ste //
T09TD4156E:25b-35: bde ba'i don du sred pa'i bkren pa don ma byas //
T09TD4156E:25b-36: gson pa'i 'jig rten nges par don med nyid du lhung //
T09TD4156E:26a-0: gang zhig dman pa dor nas khyad 'phags @26a * //
T09TD4156E:26a-2: 'bad pa 'di ni nges par smad pa ma yin la //
T09TD4156E:26a-3: shes ldan rnams dang mnyam pa'i yongs su gdung ba yis //
T09TD4156E:26a-4: bya ba ma yin de 'dir slar yang byed pa'o //
T09TD4156E:26a-5: lus kyi gtser bas gal te 'dir ni chos yin na //
T09TD4156E:26a-6: lus kyi bde ba chos ma yin par 'gyur ba ste //
T09TD4156E:26a-7: pha rol du ni bde ba chos kyis kyang 'thob la //
T09TD4156E:26a-8: de phyir 'di yis chos kyi chos min 'bras bu'o //
T09TD4156E:26a-9: gang gi phyir na bsams pa'i dbang gis lus yin la //
T09TD4156E:26a-10: rab tu 'jug pa dang ni zlog pa dag kyang ngo //
T09TD4156E:26a-11: de phyir sems kyi dul ba nyid ni rig pa ste //
T09TD4156E:26a-12: sems las gzhan ba'i lus ni shing dang mnyas ba'o //
T09TD4156E:26a-13: bza' ba gtsang bas gal te bsod nams 'dod na ni //
T09TD4156E:26a-14: de phyir ri dags rnams kyang bsod nams yod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:26a-15: phyi rol skyes bu gang dag rnams kyang 'bras bu las //
T09TD4156E:26a-16: bskal pa'i nyes pas don rnams gzhan du kha bltas so //
T09TD4156E:26a-17: bsod nams phyir ni sdug bsngal mngon par mtshams sbyor na //
T09TD4156E:26a-18: 'on sdug bsngal mngon par mtshams sbyor tshad ma min //
T09TD4156E:26a-19: de ltar gang dag las ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:26a-20: stegs zhes rab tu zhugs te chu la reg par byed //
T09TD4156E:26a-21: de yang de yi snying la tshim pa tsam yin te //
T09TD4156E:26a-22: chu yis sdig pa dag par byed pa ma yin phyir //
T09TD4156E:26a-23: yon tan ldan bas rig pa'i chu ni gang dang gang //
T09TD4156E:26a-24: de dang de ni sa la gal te stegs 'dod na //
T09TD4156E:26a-25: chu yang the tshom med par chu nyid kho na ste //
T09TD4156E:26a-26: de phyir yon tan ldan rnams kho na stegs su go //
T09TD4156E:26a-27: de ltar rigs pa mang po ldan pa de dang de //
T09TD4156E:26a-28: smras te rnam par mdzes pa'i nyi ma nub bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:26a-29: de nas sbyin sreg du bas kha dog 'gyur ba'i shing //
T09TD4156E:26a-30: dka' thub rab tu zhi ba'i khrus sar rnam par zhugs //
T09TD4156E:26a-31: mngon par bton pa'i rab tu 'bar ba'i me yis thal ba ni //
T09TD4156E:26a-32: dbang bskur byas pa'i drang srong skye bos khyab pa ste //
T09TD4156E:26a-33: bzlas bya'i dbyangs kyis kun nas skad sgrogs lha yi tshogs //
T09TD4156E:26a-34: chos kyi lam gyi las kyi mtha' bzhin rab tu zhugs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:26a-35: de ni mtshan mo thang 'ga' mtshan mor byed 'od kyis //
T09TD4156E:26a-36: dka' thub rnams la yongs su rtog cing zhugs gyur la //
T09TD4156E:26a-37: dka' thub thams cad yongs su brtags shing mkhyen gyur na //
T09TD4156E:26a-38: dka' thub zhing gi thang de las ni gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:26a-39: de'i gzugs bdag nyid chen por sod ba'i yid rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:26b-0: dka' thub gnas ldan rnams ni de nas de @26b rjes gshegs //
T09TD4156E:26b-1: 'phags min sdig pa rnams kyis zil non yul las ni //
T09TD4156E:26b-2: drang srong chen po rnams ni chos bzhin pha rol gshegs //
T09TD4156E:26b-3: de nas ral pa shing shun zur phud kyis rol ba'i //
T09TD4156E:26b-4: dka' thub nor dang ldan ba de rnams des gzigs shing //
T09TD4156E:26b-5: de dag rnams kyis dka' thub rnams la rjes brten te //
T09TD4156E:26b-6: dpal dang ldan la dge ba'i shing gi rtsa bar gnas //
T09TD4156E:26b-7: de nas dka' thub gnas ldan rnams ni nyer 'ongs nas //
T09TD4156E:26b-8: mi mchog de la yongs su bskor nas gnas gyur la //
T09TD4156E:26b-9: de dag rnams kyi rgyan pos mchod ma sngon btang ste //
T09TD4156E:26b-10: dus kyi zhi bas tshig 'di rab tu 'di smras so //
T09TD4156E:26b-11: khyod kyis byon tshe gdung gnas gang ba bzhin gyur la //
T09TD4156E:26b-12: rab tu gshegs tshe stong pa bzhin du rab tu thob //
T09TD4156E:26b-13: de phyir brtse ba 'di ni 'bor bar 'os men te //
T09TD4156E:26b-14: 'tsho bar 'dod pa'i phangs pa'i tshe yis lus bzhin no //
T09TD4156E:26b-15: lha yi drang srong tshangs pa'i drang srong rgyal po yis //
T09TD4156E:26b-16: drang srong gis bsnyen bsod nams nye bar gang ldan ri //
T09TD4156E:26b-17: dka' thub nor ldan rnams kyi dka' thub de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:26b-18: gang gi nye logs dag nas mang por 'gyur ba'o //
T09TD4156E:26b-19: de bzhin kun nas bsod nams dag gi stegs gyur la //
T09TD4156E:26b-20: nam mkha'i 'og gi them skas dag tu gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:26b-21: lha yi drang srong rnams dang drang srong chen po ni //
T09TD4156E:26b-22: chos kyi bdag nyid bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis bsnyen //
T09TD4156E:26b-23: 'di nas slar yang khyad 'phags chos kyi ched las ni //
T09TD4156E:26b-24: byang gi phyogs nyid kho nar bsnyen par nus pa ste //
T09TD4156E:26b-25: blo dang ldan pas gom pa gcig tu gyur pa yang //
T09TD4156E:26b-26: lho yi phyogs su 'gro bar nus pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:26b-27: dka' thub nags 'dir ji ste bya ba ngan pa 'am //
T09TD4156E:26b-28: bsre ma'i chos sam ltung ba min nam mi gtsang bar //
T09TD4156E:26b-29: khyed kyis mthong ste gang gis khyed 'di bzhugs 'dod min //
T09TD4156E:26b-30: de ni gsung la re zhig sred par bzhugs mdzod cig / dka' thub gter dang rab tu mtshungs par gyur pa la //
T09TD4156E:26b-31: 'di rnams kyis ni dka' thub grogs su 'dod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:26b-32: dbang po dang mnyam khyed dang lhan cig gnas pa ni //
T09TD4156E:26b-33: phur bu yi yang mngon par mtho ba 'dren pa yin //
T09TD4156E:26b-34: dka' thub ldan pa'i gtso bos de skad ces smras te //
T09TD4156E:26b-35: srid pa rab tu nyams phyir dam bca' byas pa yis //
T09TD4156E:26b-36: mkhas pa'i gtso bo des ni dka' thub ldan dbus su //
T09TD4156E:26b-37: nang du song ba'i rang bzhin smras par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:27a-1: la sdug cing rang gi skye bo dang mtshungs pa'i //
T09TD4156E:27a-2: drang po'i bdag nyid chos 'dzin thub pa rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:27a-3: bdag la rnam pa de ltar bsam pa skyes pa yis //
T09TD4156E:27a-4: bdag gi dga' ba mchog dang bkur sti skyes par gyur //
T09TD4156E:27a-5: mdor bsdus gyur na brtse zhing bsnyen pa 'di rnams dag / snying la song ba'i ngag rnams dag gis khrus byas bzhin //
T09TD4156E:27a-6: kun nas 'dzin med chos can bdag gi dga' ba ni //
T09TD4156E:27a-7: de ring slar yang cung zhig g-yos par gyur pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:27a-8: de ltar rab tu zhugs pa'i khyed cag skyabs 'os rnams //
T09TD4156E:27a-9: shin tu phyogs su lhung ba yang dag bstan pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:27a-10: bor nas 'gro zhes kho bo yi yang sdug bsngal te //
T09TD4156E:27a-11: ji ltar gnyen 'dun rnams ni spangs pa de ltar ro //
T09TD4156E:27a-12: khyed cag rnams kyi chos 'di mtho ris ched du ste //
T09TD4156E:27a-13: bdag gi mngon par mtho bar yang srid ma yin phyir //
T09TD4156E:27a-14: nags der gang gi bdag ni sdod 'dod ma yin te //
T09TD4156E:27a-15: chos las ldog pa rab tu 'jug pa tha dad phyir //
T09TD4156E:27a-16: de phyir nags 'di dag na gang gis yongs 'gro ba //
T09TD4156E:27a-17: bdag gi ma dga' ma yin pha rol spyod log min //
T09TD4156E:27a-18: sngon gyi dus na rjes mthun chos la gnas pa yi //
T09TD4156E:27a-19: drang srong chen po thams cad rnams dang mtshungs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:27a-20: de nas don dang ldan la bde zhing yid du 'ong //
T09TD4156E:27a-21: legs mthun mdangs dang ldan la snying po dang ldan pa //
T09TD4156E:27a-22: gzhon nu'i tshig ni dka' thub ldan pa de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:27a-23: thos nas khyad 'phags dang ldan bkur sti mang pos gshegs //
T09TD4156E:27a-24: de nas gnyis skyes thal ba la nyal kha cig ni //
T09TD4156E:27a-25: lus ring gtsug tor dang ldan shing shun gos gyon zhing //
T09TD4156E:27a-26: mig ni cung zad dmar ser sna ni phra la rings //
T09TD4156E:27a-27: lag gcig spyi blugs ldan pas tshig 'di smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:27a-28: khyod kyis nges pa nyid du rgya chen blo ldan zhing //
T09TD4156E:27a-29: gzhon nu khyed kyi skye ba la ni nyes pa gzigs //
T09TD4156E:27a-30: mtho ris dang ni nyes pa yang dag rnam spyod phyir //
T09TD4156E:27a-31: thar pa gang gi blo gros yod pa de yin no //
T09TD4156E:27a-32: mchod sbyin dka' thub nges ba de dang de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:27a-33: chags pa dang ldan mtho ris la ni 'gro bar 'dod //
T09TD4156E:27a-34: dgra bo bzhin du chags dang lhan cig g-yul sprad nas //
T09TD4156E:27a-35: sems pa rang ldan thar pa ru ni 'gro bar 'dod //
T09TD4156E:27a-36: de phyir gal te khyod kyi blo gros 'di nges na //
T09TD4156E:27b-0: skyen par khyed nyid 'bigs byed phug par gshegs mdzod @27b cig ;
T09TD4156E:27b-1: / gang zhig mthar thug nges par legs pa thob ba'i mig //
T09TD4156E:27b-2: thub pa 'di ni de ru mtshan mo min par gnas //
T09TD4156E:27b-3: de phyir khyod kyis de nyid lam ni thob 'gyur la //
T09TD4156E:27b-4: sred par gyur na yang dag rab tu thob par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:27b-5: bdag gi mthong ba ji ltar blo gros de de ltar //
T09TD4156E:27b-6: de nyid kyi yang blo gros bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:27b-7: gsal zhing mtho ba'i shangs dang rnam rgyas yangs pa'i spyan //
T09TD4156E:27b-8: zangs mdog ya mchu ma mchu rno dkar mche ba can //
T09TD4156E:27b-9: ljags ni dmar zhing phra ba'i zhal dang ldan pa 'di //
T09TD4156E:27b-10: shes bya'i rgya mtsho mtha' dag la ni 'gro ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:27b-11: khyod kyi zab pa dang ni gting dpag dka' gang dang ;
T09TD4156E:27b-12: / gang zhig sgron ma nyid dang mtshan rnams gang yin pas //
T09TD4156E:27b-13: sngon gyi bskal par drad srong gis kyang ma mthong ba'i //
T09TD4156E:27b-14: slob dpon nyid des la mngon par dga' nas gshegs //
T09TD4156E:27b-15: dka' thub ldan pa de rnams kyis kyang de la yang //
T09TD4156E:27b-16: cho ga bzhin rjes byas nas dka' thub nags der gshegs //
T09TD4156E:27b-17: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dang gas chen po las //
T09TD4156E:27b-18: dka' thub kyi nags su zhugs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o /
T09TD4156E:27b-20: // / de nas mgyogs 'gro spyod de yid mi bde gyur te //
T09TD4156E:27b-21: de ltar jo bo nags su nga med par gshegs la //
T09TD4156E:27b-22: lam du mya ngan med pa 'bad pa byas gyur te //
T09TD4156E:27b-23: de lta na yang de yi mchi ma khogs ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:27b-24: gang la jo bo'i bka' la mtshan mo gcig gis ni //
T09TD4156E:27b-25: mgyogs 'gro de dang gshegs par gyur pa'i lam //
T09TD4156E:27b-26: lam de nyid la 'gro zhag dag ni brgyad rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:27b-27: jo bo nyid dang bral ba de yis sems shing 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:27b-28: 'thon ba med pas rgyags pa med bar gyur pa yis //
T09TD4156E:27b-29: bsngags ldan mgyogs 'gro nyid kyang mdangs med rgyu ba ste //
T09TD4156E:27b-30: de ltar rgyan de rnams kyis brgyan par byas na yang //
T09TD4156E:27b-31: de yis dor bas dpal ni song ba bzhin du gyur //
T09TD4156E:27b-32: phyir log nas kyang dka' thub nags su mngon phyogs te //
T09TD4156E:27b-33: snying rje bar ni yang dang yang du drag tu 'tsher //
T09TD4156E:27b-34: lam na ltogs pa ldan pa yin yang 'bru dang chu //
T09TD4156E:27b-35: ji ltar sngon bzhin mngon par ma dga' ma bslangs so //
T09TD4156E:27b-36: de nas 'gro la phan pa'i bdag nyid bdag nyid chen po des //
T09TD4156E:27b-37: ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer rnam par dman pa la //
T09TD4156E:27b-38: nyin mor byed pas bor ba'i nam mkha' 'bras med bzhin //
T09TD4156E:28a-1: stong pa bzhin du nye bar song //
T09TD4156E:28a-2: padma dkar po dang bcas chu yis mdzes gyur zhing //
T09TD4156E:28a-3: me tog 'dzin pa'i shing rnams kyis ni brgyan pa yang //
T09TD4156E:28a-4: grong khyer pa rnams rab tu dga' ba song gyur te //
T09TD4156E:28a-5: de yi nye ba'i nags de nags ltar mdzes ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:28a-6: de ltar lta byed mchi mas bcom pa'i mi rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:28a-7: rab tu 'bar min zhan pa'i yid kyis phyogs su skor //
T09TD4156E:28a-8: 'ong du mi ster ba bzhin gnyis po de grong du //
T09TD4156E:28a-9: dal bus log pa'i khrus bzhin mngon par song bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:28a-10: sh'akya'i rigs kyi drang srong dang bral 'ongs pa yis //
T09TD4156E:28a-11: lus zags 'gres dang ldan pa de gnyis mthong nas kyang//
T09TD4156E:28a-12: sngon tshe shing rta bcu pa'i shing rta 'ongs pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:28a-13: grod khyer skye bo rnams ni lam du mchi ma phyung //
T09TD4156E:28a-14: de nas mya ngan nye bar ldan ba'i skye bo dag / mchi ma byung ba rnams kyis 'dun pa la smras pa //
T09TD4156E:28a-15: grong khyer yul 'khor dga' mdzad rgyal bo'i sras po de //
T09TD4156E:28a-16: khyed kyis gang du bor zhes rgyab nas rjes su 'gro ;
T09TD4156E:28a-17: / de nas gus ldan skye bo de la des smras pa //
T09TD4156E:28a-18: mi dbang sras po bdag gis yongs su bor ba min //
T09TD4156E:28a-19: du bzhin skye bo med pa'i nags su kho bo dang //
T09TD4156E:28a-20: khyim bdag cha lugs dag kyang de yis rnam par spangs //
T09TD4156E:28a-21: de yi tshig ni skye bo de rnams kyis thos nas //
T09TD4156E:28a-22: nges par shin tu dka' ba nyid ces nges par song gyur la //
T09TD4156E:28a-23: 'gyel zhing mig skyes chu ni rnam par 'thor ba ste //
T09TD4156E:28a-24: yid la smod cing bdag nyid kyis ni 'bras bu long //
T09TD4156E:28a-25: de nas smras pa gnyis skyes rgyal bo'i shugs mnga' ste //
T09TD4156E:28a-26: gang du gshegs pa'i nags der di ring zhugs par bgyi //
T09TD4156E:28a-27: lus can dbang po ma tshang rnams kyi ji lta bar //
T09TD4156E:28a-28: de dag bral bas bdag cag 'tshe bar 'dod pa med //
T09TD4156E:28a-29: de dang bral ba'i grong khyer 'di ni nags yin la //
T09TD4156E:28a-30: de dang yang dag ldan pa'i nags de grong khyer yin //
T09TD4156E:28a-31: lha ni lha min gsod tshe brgya byin gyis ji ltar //
T09TD4156E:28a-32: de dag bral bas bdag gi grong khyer mdzes ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:28a-33: de nas slar yang gzhon nu phyir la log ces te //
T09TD4156E:28a-34: yan lag ma rnams skar khung phreng rnams rab thob ste //
T09TD4156E:28a-35: mgyogs 'gro'i rgyab ni rnam par dben ba mthong gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:28a-36: slar yang skar khung rnams ni rnam par bkag nas du //
T09TD4156E:28a-37: brtul zhugs dang ni mya ngan dag gis yid dub cing //
T09TD4156E:28b-0: brtul zhugs la rab zhugs @28b pas sras po nyer thob phyir //
T09TD4156E:28b-1: bzlas byas shing gi lha yi khang par mi bdag gis //
T09TD4156E:28b-2: bsam pa ji ltar bya ba de dang de rnams byas //
T09TD4156E:28b-3: de nas mig dag mchi mas rab tu gang ba des //
T09TD4156E:28b-4: mgyogs 'gro blangs nas mgyogs 'gro rjes su 'gro ba ste //
T09TD4156E:28b-5: g-yul 'gyed pa na dgra bos jo bo khyer ba ltar //
T09TD4156E:28b-6: mya ngan dag gis mngon bcom mi skyong khang par zhugs //
T09TD4156E:28b-7: mi dbang rgyal po'i khab tu rnam par zhugs pa na //
T09TD4156E:28b-8: rnam par blta zhing mig dag mchi ma 'bab pa yis //
T09TD4156E:28b-9: skye bo la ni sdug bsngal rab tu rtogs 'jug bzhin //
T09TD4156E:28b-10: bsngags ldan mgyogs 'gro gsal ba'i dbyangs kyis dus par gyur //
T09TD4156E:28b-11: de nas khang pa'i dbus na spyod pa'i bya rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:28b-12: nye bar brtags pa'i mgyogs 'gro dam bar byed rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:28b-13: mi dbang sras po log par gshegs la the tshom ste //
T09TD4156E:28b-14: mgyogs 'gro de yi dbyangs la so sor ram 'degs byas //
T09TD4156E:28b-15: ji ltar bsngags ldan mgyogs 'gro 'tsher bar byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:28b-16: nges par gzhon nu khab tu rnam par zhugs snyam ste ;
T09TD4156E:28b-17: / dga' ba phul du byung bas bslus pa'i sbye bo rnams //
T09TD4156E:28b-18: skye bo'i bdag bo'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nye logs song //
T09TD4156E:28b-19: shin tu dga' ba las ni mya ngan gyis brgyal rnams //
T09TD4156E:28b-20: gzhon nu blta ba la ni g-yo ba'i spyan ma rnams //
T09TD4156E:28b-21: ston ka'i chu gter sprin las glog ni g-yo ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:28b-22: bud med rnams ni sred pas khyim nas phyir la 'thon //
T09TD4156E:28b-23: lan bu rnam par 'phyang zhing dar gos dri ma can //
T09TD4156E:28b-24: mig rtsi dang bral mchi mas mig bcom gdong rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:28b-25: mtshan mo zad tshe skya rengs kyis mkhar skar ma bzhin //
T09TD4156E:28b-26: byi ngor dang bral bud med rid rnams mdzes ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:28b-27: rkang pa rkang gdub dang bral zangs mdog ma chags rnams //
T09TD4156E:28b-28: gdong pa rna lung dang bral mgrin ba drang po rnams //
T09TD4156E:28b-29: rang bzhin gyis rgyas brla ni 'og phab dang bral rnams //
T09TD4156E:28b-30: nu mdo shal dang bral stod g-yogs tshad rnams so //
T09TD4156E:28b-31: rten dang bral ba'i 'dun pa dang ni mgyogs 'gro nyid //
T09TD4156E:28b-32: mig ni mchi ma dang ldan de rnams kyis mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:28b-33: nags mthar khyu mchog dang bral ba glang rnams bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:28b-34: sems khral gdong ldan yan lag mchog ma rnams ni dus //
T09TD4156E:28b-35: de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo mchi ma dang bcas par //
T09TD4156E:28b-36: be'u nyams pa'i ma he mo ltar mnyes gshin ma //
T09TD4156E:28b-37: gser gyi chu shing lo 'dab rnam par g-yo ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:28b-38: goo ta ma mas ni lag pa bzung nas 'gyel //
T09TD4156E:29a-0: @29a * // dpung pa lag pa mnyam zhing gzi brjid bcom pa yis //
T09TD4156E:29a-1: bud med gzhan rnams yid mi bde bas sems med bzhin //
T09TD4156E:29a-2: mchi ma ma bton 'o dod 'bod min dbugs med par //
T09TD4156E:29a-3: g-yo bral ri mo bris pa bzhin du gnas par gyur //
T09TD4156E:29a-4: brtan min bdag po'i mya ngan gyis brgyal bud med gzhan //
T09TD4156E:29a-5: rnam par lta byed nas 'bab rgyun gyi gdong rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:29a-6: sa 'dzin ri bo nas 'bab rgyun gyi rdo ba ltar //
T09TD4156E:29a-7: tsandan rab bskus nu ma rnams la rnam par 'thor //
T09TD4156E:29a-8: de rnams kyis ni mig chus btab ba'i gdon rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:29a-9: rgyal po'i khab de de tshe mdzes par gyur pa ni //
T09TD4156E:29a-10: chu gsar dus na chu gter char gyis btab pa yi //
T09TD4156E:29a-11: chu 'dzin padma rnams kyis rdzing bu ji ltar ro //
T09TD4156E:29a-12: rgyas shing bar med legs par zlum pa'i sor mo can //
T09TD4156E:29a-13: rgyan bral rtsa mi mngon pa'i yan lag mchog ma rnams //
T09TD4156E:29a-14: rlung gis g-yos pa'i ljon shing rang gi 'dab mas ltar //
T09TD4156E:29a-15: padma lta bu'i lag pa rnams kyis brang rnams brdungs //
T09TD4156E:29a-16: nags rlung gis sgul padma lta bur g-yos pa yis //
T09TD4156E:29a-17: ngang pa rnams kyi 'khrigs pa rnams kyis chu klung ltar //
T09TD4156E:29a-18: brang brdungs rab bskyod 'brel mtho'i nu ma rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:29a-19: de lta na yang mi mo de rnams mdzes par gyur //
T09TD4156E:29a-20: ji ltar brang rnams la ni lag pas zug byas pa //
T09TD4156E:29a-21: de ltar lag pa rnams la brang ni zug byed cing //
T09TD4156E:29a-22: le lo can ma brtse med stobs med ma yis der //
T09TD4156E:29a-23: lag pa'i rtse dang brang rnams phan tshun zug byas so //
T09TD4156E:29a-24: de nas khros pas rab tu dmar ba'i spyan ldan ma //
T09TD4156E:29a-25: sems khral gyis sbrel mgrin pa kha zhing ldab ldib dang //
T09TD4156E:29a-26: shugs ring phyung bas 'o ma 'dzin g-yo brtan pa yi //
T09TD4156E:29a-27: mya ngan mchi ma 'dzin pa'i grags 'dzin mas smras ba //
T09TD4156E:29a-28: mtshan mo gnyid log dbang med bdag ni rnam spangs nas //
T09TD4156E:29a-29: 'dun ba 'dod pa'i shing rta de ni gang du thal //
T09TD4156E:29a-30: gsum po mnyam du song la khyod dang bsngags ldan ni //
T09TD4156E:29a-31: nye bar 'ongs pas kho mo'i yid ni g-yos par gyur //
T09TD4156E:29a-32: kho mo 'phags min brtse min bshes ma yin pa'i las //
T09TD4156E:29a-33: phul phyung de 'dir byas nas da ni ci la du //
T09TD4156E:29a-34: mchi ma ma 'don khyod kyi sems ni sim par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:29a-35: khyod kyi mchi ma dang ni las de gtam ma yin //
T09TD4156E:29a-36: dga' dang dbang du song dang phan dang legs pa dang //
T09TD4156E:29a-37: ci lta ba bzhin don byed khyod nyid dang 'grogs shing //
T09TD4156E:29b-0: @29b slar mi ldog pa'i ched du jo bo sras po thal //
T09TD4156E:29b-1: khyod kyis nga la 'bras bcas sems ni dga' bar gyis //
T09TD4156E:29b-2: mi yi dbang po'i dgra bo dag ni mchog yin la //
T09TD4156E:29b-3: sbyor min la mkhas shes rab med pa'i bshes mchog min //
T09TD4156E:29b-4: nges par mdza' bshes rnam par mi mkhas khyod kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:29b-5: 'di yi rigs kyi nye bar nub pa chen po byas //
T09TD4156E:29b-6: rab chags dri mas 'dres shing dmar ba'i mig can ma //
T09TD4156E:29b-7: kun nas rgyan dang bral ba 'di rnams mya ngan byed //
T09TD4156E:29b-8: gangs ldan ri bo dang mnyam bdag po gsan na yang //
T09TD4156E:29b-9: bud med rnams ni yugs sa mo bzhin mdzes pa nyams //
T09TD4156E:29b-10: 'di dag rnams kyang bya 'dab lag pa rnam bskyod cing //
T09TD4156E:29b-11: rtag par phug ron rnams kyi ring ba'i skad rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:29b-12: de dang bral bas 'bras med pho brang 'khor dang bcas //
T09TD4156E:29b-13: gzhal med khang pa'i gtsang rnams shin tu du ba 'dra //
T09TD4156E:29b-14: skye bo 'di ni kun nas don med 'dod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:29b-15: bsngags ldan mgyogs 'gro de yang nges pa nyid du'o //
T09TD4156E:29b-16: mtshan mo skye bo gnyid che rkun pos rin chen bzhin ;
T09TD4156E:29b-17: / bdag gi 'di ltar 'di nas nor rdzas thams cad stor //
T09TD4156E:29b-18: mgyogs 'gro 'dis ni mda' yi rma srol byung rnams kyang //
T09TD4156E:29b-19: sron par nus zhes grags na lcags rnams smos ci dgos //
T09TD4156E:29b-20: bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i dpal ni blangs gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:29b-21: 'dis ni lcags lhung 'jigs las song ba yin nam ci ;
T09TD4156E:29b-22: / mi dbang pho brang yongs su gang ba bzhin du ni //
T09TD4156E:29b-23: 'phags pa min las da lta drag tu 'tsher bar byed //
T09TD4156E:29b-24: gang gi tshe na bdag gi dga' ba phyi rol gshegs //
T09TD4156E:29b-25: de yi tshe na mgyogs 'gro lkugs pa thang chad gyur //
T09TD4156E:29b-26: gal te skye bo dag la go bar 'tsher byed dam //
T09TD4156E:29b-27: yang na rmig pas sa la rmig pa'i sgra byed dam //
T09TD4156E:29b-28: yang na 'gram pa'i sgra ni mchog tu bskyod na ni //
T09TD4156E:29b-29: bdag la sdug bsngal 'di 'dra 'byung ba ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:29b-30: de ltar 'dir ni lha mo'i smre sngags la brten zhing //
T09TD4156E:29b-31: mchi mas 'dud pa yi ge'i chig dag thos gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:29b-32: 'og tu gdong phyogs mchi ma dang bcas thal sbyar te //
T09TD4156E:29b-33: 'dun pas lan 'di dal bus smras par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:29b-34: lha mo bsngags ldan la ni smod par 'os min zhing //
T09TD4156E:29b-35: kho bo la yang khro bar mdzad pa 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:29b-36: kho bo cag gi skyon min lha mo mkhyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:29b-37: mi yi lha de lha bzhin bkra shis kun gyis gshegs //
T09TD4156E:30a-0: bdag gis rgyal po'i brtan pa @30a * //
T09TD4156E:30a-2: lha nyid gang dag gis ni stobs las byas pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:30a-3: bdag gis mgyogs 'gro 'di ni nye bar 'ongs pa de //
T09TD4156E:30a-4: lam na ngal ba med par de ltar rdzas su song //
T09TD4156E:30a-5: mgyogs 'gro mchog 'di nyid kyang gshegs tshe sa la ni //
T09TD4156E:30a-6: bar snang dag la bzung bzhin rmig pas ma reg cing //
T09TD4156E:30a-7: de bzhin lha yi ched du gdong ni sdogs byas bzhin //
T09TD4156E:30a-8: 'gram pa'i sgra ni byas min 'tsher ba dag kyang med //
T09TD4156E:30a-9: gang las sa skyong bdag nyid skyes pa gshegs pa na //
T09TD4156E:30a-10: de tshe sgo ni rang nyid bye bar gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:30a-11: mtshan mo'i mun pa nyi mas bzhin du bsal gyur te //
T09TD4156E:30a-12: de yi phyir yang lha yi cho ga de zung shig / gang phyir mi dbang bka' las skye bo stong phrag dag / khang pa dang ni grong khyer nyid du bag yod kyang //
T09TD4156E:30a-13: de tshe de ni gnyid kyis phrogs shing ma sad de //
T09TD4156E:30a-14: de yi phyir yang lha yi cho ga de zung shig //
T09TD4156E:30a-15: gang phyir nags na gnas la mthun pa'i gos dag ni //
T09TD4156E:30a-16: lha na gnas pas dus su 'di la byin gyur la //
T09TD4156E:30a-17: rgyan dag mkha' la rab tu gtor ba de khyer te //
T09TD4156E:30a-18: de yi phyir yang lha yi cho ga de zung shig //
T09TD4156E:30a-19: de phyir de ltar lha mo nged gnyis la skyon du //
T09TD4156E:30a-20: ji ltar song ba de la rtog par 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:30a-21: mgyogs 'gro 'di dang bdag gi 'dod pa mi mdzad par //
T09TD4156E:30a-22: de ni lha rnams dag gis rjes 'gro byas shing gshegs //
T09TD4156E:30a-23: de ltar bdag nyid chen po de yis rab gshegs pa //
T09TD4156E:30a-24: lha yi mtshar mang bud med de rnams kyis thos nas //
T09TD4156E:30a-25: rab tu gshegs las yid la 'bar ba yang 'thob ste //
T09TD4156E:30a-26: mya ngan rab tu nyams bzhin ngo mtshar ldan par thal //
T09TD4156E:30a-27: de nas yid mi bde bas yongs lding mig can ma //
T09TD4156E:30a-28: phrug gu rab tu nyams pa'i 'ol ba sdug bsngal bzhin //
T09TD4156E:30a-29: rmongs gyur nyid kyang mchi ma dang ldan gdong gis smras //
T09TD4156E:30a-30: rlabs chen dang ldan 'jam zhing dkar min dge ba ste //
T09TD4156E:30a-31: so so so sor rtsa ba nas 'khrungs gyen du 'khyil //
T09TD4156E:30a-32: de yid bu skyes sa la 'thor ba de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:30a-33: mi dbang dbu rgyan la ni yongs su dkri bar 'os //
T09TD4156E:30a-34: phyag ni rab 'phyang ri dags rgyal po'i stobs mnga' zhing //
T09TD4156E:30a-35: khyu mchog chen po'i spyan ldan gser 'bar 'od mnga' ba //
T09TD4156E:30a-36: 'brug dang rnga yi sgra ldan sku stod rnam par yangs //
T09TD4156E:30a-37: de ltar gyur kyang dka' thub gnas su gnas par 'os //
T09TD4156E:30a-38: sor mo legs skyes 'jam zhing dra bas 'brel pa dang //
T09TD4156E:30b-0: long bu mi mngon padma'i @30b rtsa ba ltar 'jam la //
T09TD4156E:30b-1: dbus na 'khor lo dang bcas zhabs ni de dag gis //
T09TD4156E:30b-2: drang srong rnams kyi nags mtha'i sa la 'gro 'am ci //
T09TD4156E:30b-3: khang bzangs logs na khri dang gdan la 'os pa ste //
T09TD4156E:30b-4: rin chen na bza' lci min tsandan gyis spras shing //
T09TD4156E:30b-5: de yi lus ni mdangs dang ldan pa nags dag tu //
T09TD4156E:30b-6: grang dang dro dang chu 'od rnams su bskor ram ci //
T09TD4156E:30b-7: rigs dang gzugs dang stobs dang sems pa dag dang ni //
T09TD4156E:30b-8: thos dang phun sum tshogs dang na tshod kyis khengs shing //
T09TD4156E:30b-9: slong bar ma yin ster ba nyid du mngon 'ongs pa //
T09TD4156E:30b-10: de ni pha rol dag la slong mo rgyu 'am ci //
T09TD4156E:30b-11: gser khri dang zhing gzims mal dag la gzims nas ni //
T09TD4156E:30b-12: mtshan mo sil snyan sgra rnams dag gis rab slong ba //
T09TD4156E:30b-13: gos kyi phyogs gcig bar nas yi logs la ni //
T09TD4156E:30b-14: bdag gi brtul zhugs ltan de de ring ji ltar gzims //
T09TD4156E:30b-15: snying rje'i smre sngags rab tu zlos pa 'di thos nas //
T09TD4156E:30b-16: bud med de rnams phan tshun lag pas yongs 'khyud de //
T09TD4156E:30b-17: ljon shing g-yos las me tog las ni sbrang rtsi bzhin //
T09TD4156E:30b-18: rnam par lta byed dag nas chu dag 'thor ba'o //
T09TD4156E:30b-19: de nas ngang pa med pa'i ngang mo bzhin du ni //
T09TD4156E:30b-20: grags 'dzin ma ni nor 'dzin sa la 'gyel gyur la //
T09TD4156E:30b-21: rnam par 'khrugs shing yang dang yang du ldab ldib kyi //
T09TD4156E:30b-22: skad kyis de dang de dag rnam par smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:30b-23: chos dang lhan cig spyod pa mgon med kho mo ni //
T09TD4156E:30b-24: de yis dong nas gal te chos ni byed 'dod cing //
T09TD4156E:30b-25: chos dang lhan cig spyod ma dang bral dka' thub gang //
T09TD4156E:30b-26: yongs su longs spyod 'dod 'di'i chos ni ga la zhig //
T09TD4156E:30b-27: sngon gyi sa skyong rnams des nges par ma mthong ste //
T09TD4156E:30b-28: legs mthong chen po la sogs mes po chen po rnams //
T09TD4156E:30b-29: bdag po ldan ma dang bcas nags su gshegs gyur la //
T09TD4156E:30b-30: kho mo dang bral chos byed 'dod pa de ltar ltos //
T09TD4156E:30b-31: mchod sbyin du 'am rig byed cho gas 'dus byas shing //
T09TD4156E:30b-32: pho mo gnyis la dbang bskur de yi 'bras bu ni //
T09TD4156E:30b-33: gzhan du mnyam bor longs spyod 'dod pa ma mthong ste //
T09TD4156E:30b-34: de nas bdag la 'di yi chos la ser sna skyes //
T09TD4156E:30b-35: bdag nyid la ni sdud dang phan tshun phrag dog cing //
T09TD4156E:30b-36: yang yang rtsod par chos 'ga' des ni nges par shes //
T09TD4156E:30b-37: khro ba kho mo spangs nas dbang chen 'jig rten du //
T09TD4156E:30b-38: 'jigs med lha mo las ni dga' ba len par 'dod //
T09TD4156E:31a-0: de la lus kyi yon tan bzung ba'i @31a * //
T09TD4156E:31a-2: ci 'dra zhig gam 'di ni bdag gis bsam mno ste //
T09TD4156E:31a-3: bdag gi gus pa nyid dang bud med bor nas ni //
T09TD4156E:31a-4: nags su gang phyir des ni dka' thub rnams la gdung //
T09TD4156E:31a-5: nges par bdag gi 'dod 'di mtho ris bde phyir min //
T09TD4156E:31a-6: sems ldan skye bo de ni rnyed par dka' ba min //
T09TD4156E:31a-7: sdug pa des kyang bdag la 'di'am gzhan du rung //
T09TD4156E:31a-8: gang gis ma spangs zhes ni bdag gi yid la re //
T09TD4156E:31a-9: gal te bdag ni jo bo'i gzigs byed yangs pa'i zhal //
T09TD4156E:31a-10: gtsang zhing bzhad pa gyen du blta ba'i skal med na //
T09TD4156E:31a-11: skal ba dman par 'os min sgra gcan 'dzin de yang //
T09TD4156E:31a-12: pha yi pang na yongs su gnas par nam zhig 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:31a-13: ae ma yid mda' 'di yi lus ni shin tu gzhon //
T09TD4156E:31a-14: yid ni mi rnams kyis bsngags shin tu sra ba ste //
T09TD4156E:31a-15: ngag gi skad grag rab zos dgra yang dga' ba yi //
T09TD4156E:31a-16: bu ni byis pa 'di 'dra kye ma spong bar byed //
T09TD4156E:31a-17: bdag gi 'dod pa'i sems kyang shin tu sra ba ste //
T09TD4156E:31a-18: rdo las gyur ram yang na lcags las byas pa'am //
T09TD4156E:31a-19: bder 'os jo bo dbal dor nags su song ba la //
T09TD4156E:31a-20: mgon med ldan pa gad zhig dum bur ma song ngo //
T09TD4156E:31a-21: de lhar lha mo bdag bo'i mya ngan gyis brgyal te /
T09TD4156E:31a-22: sems shing rnam zlos lan cig ma yin 'di dus la //
T09TD4156E:31a-23: rang bzhin brtan yang dam ba mo de mya ngan gyis //
T09TD4156E:31a-24: brtan pa dran pa ma yin ngo tsham byas so //
T09TD4156E:31a-25: de nas de ltar mya ngan gyis smra rnam 'khrugs pa'i //
T09TD4156E:31a-26: grags 'dzin ma ni sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:31a-27: char gyis btang bas padma chen po bzhin du ni //
T09TD4156E:31a-28: mchi bcas gdong gis bud med rnams ni cho nges 'debs //
T09TD4156E:31a-29: bzlas brjod rdzogs shing sbyin sreg bkra shis byas gyur te //
T09TD4156E:31a-30: mi skyong nyid kyang lta gang dag nas phyir gshegs pa //
T09TD4156E:31a-31: rdo rje'i sgra yis glang po ji bzhin skye ba yi //
T09TD4156E:31a-32: nyam thag sgra des kun nas bcom zhing g-yos par gyur //
T09TD4156E:31a-33: 'dun pa dang ni bsngags ldan gnyis po mthong nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:31a-34: sras kyi nges par brten pa yang dag gsan nas ni //
T09TD4156E:31a-35: bde sogs bdag po'i ltad mo zin pa'i rgyal mtshan bzhin //
T09TD4156E:31a-36: mya ngan gyis bcom sa yi bdag po 'gyel bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:31a-37: de nas sras po'i mya ngan gyis rmongs yud tsam zhig //
T09TD4156E:31a-38: skye bo mtshungs mnyam mngon pa'i skye bos bzung gyur la //
T09TD4156E:31b-0: chab kyis gang ba'i spyan gyis mgyogs @31b bgro la gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:31b-1: sa yi logs nas sa skyong gis ni sme sngags bton //
T09TD4156E:31b-2: g-yul 'gyed pa na dga' chen mang po byas nas ni //
T09TD4156E:31b-3: bsngags ldan khyod kyis bdag gi dga' ba ma yin byas //
T09TD4156E:31b-4: bdag gi dga' ba yon tan dga' de gang gis ni //
T09TD4156E:31b-5: dga' ba yin yang dga' ba med bzhin nags su bor //
T09TD4156E:31b-6: de phyir de nyid gang du gshegs pa der bdag khyer //
T09TD4156E:31b-7: yang na de ni slar yang skyen bar khyer la shog / tshabs cher na ba'i sman dang bral bas de bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:31b-8: de dang bral bas bdag gi 'tsho ba med pa'o //
T09TD4156E:31b-9: rgyal bu gser 'bab 'chi bas phrogs par gyur pa na //
T09TD4156E:31b-10: dka' thub gang las yang dag rgyal ba shi ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:31b-11: bdag kyang chos 'dzin sras po gshegs par gyur pa na //
T09TD4156E:31b-12: bdag nyid thar 'dod bdag nyid med pa lta bur gyur //
T09TD4156E:31b-13: rgyal rigs bcu byas khyab bdag skye dgu'i bdag po ni //
T09TD4156E:31b-14: mchog dang mchog min shes pa nyi ma'i sras po yi //
T09TD4156E:31b-15: bu ni phangs shing sdug bsngal dam pa dang bral la //
T09TD4156E:31b-16: yid mi bde byas yid kyi rmongs pa gang las min //
T09TD4156E:31b-17: rgyal bo aa dza'i sras po blo dang ldan pa ni //
T09TD4156E:31b-18: mi bdag dbang po'i grogs la bdag gi 'dod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:31b-19: sras po nags su song la gang zhig lhar song la //
T09TD4156E:31b-20: mchi ma don yod ma yin bkren pas 'chos so kye //
T09TD4156E:31b-21: khyod kyang bdag gi chu yi snyim pa de gang du //
T09TD4156E:31b-22: phrogs pa'i dka' thub gnas der bzang po bdag la smros //
T09TD4156E:31b-23: de la bdag gi skom pa 'dis ni yongs 'dod de //
T09TD4156E:31b-24: bdag gi srog ni yi dags 'gro bar 'dod //
T09TD4156E:31b-25: de ltar sras dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal skyes gyur te //
T09TD4156E:31b-26: sa dang 'dra ba'i lhan skyes brtan pa rnam spangs nas //
T09TD4156E:31b-27: r'a ma'i mya ngan dag gis shing rta bcu pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:31b-28: mi skyong 'du shes bral bzhin mang po rnam par la bas //
T09TD4156E:31b-29: de nas de la thos dang dul dang yon tan ldan //
T09TD4156E:31b-30: rab bgres mdun na 'don dang blon po blo gros kyis //
T09TD4156E:31b-31: mnyam par gzhag 'di ji lta ba bzhin smas gyur te //
T09TD4156E:31b-32: yongs su gdung ba'i gdong min mya ngan med pa'ang min //
T09TD4156E:31b-33: mi mchog brtan pa mya ngan thong la brtan par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:31b-34: mya ngan bzhin du mchi ma 'don par 'os ma yin //
