T09TD4156E:31b-35: me tog phreng ba rnying bzhin phun tshogs bor nas ni //
T09TD4156E:31b-36: sa na mi skyong mang po nags su shin tu song //
T09TD4156E:32a-1: de yi dgongs pa nges pa 'di sngon tshe //
T09TD4156E:32a-2: drang srong dkar ming de yi tshig ni dran par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:32a-3: mtho ris su yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la //
T09TD4156E:32a-4: skad cig kyang de gnas par bde bas nus ma yin //
T09TD4156E:32a-5: gal te yang de mi mchog 'bad pas byas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:32a-6: myur bar bka' lung stsol mdzod ji snyed 'dir 'gro bgyi //
T09TD4156E:32a-7: sna tshogs rnams kyi khyed kyi sras po de yi ni //
T09TD4156E:32a-8: sna tshogs mang bo'i 'thab mo de rnyed der byed shog / de nas de gnyis la ni mi bdag gis bslabs la //
T09TD4156E:32a-9: de phyir nges par 'di nas khyed gnyis mngon par song //
T09TD4156E:32a-10: bu la lhag par chags pa'i nags kyi bya yi bzhin //
T09TD4156E:32a-11: bdag gi sems ni dga' bar rab tu song ma yin //
T09TD4156E:32a-12: dam pa zhes ni mi dbang bstan las blon po dang //
T09TD4156E:32a-13: mdun na 'don pa de gnyis nags der song bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:32a-14: byas zhes gna' ma'i skye bo dang bcas btsun mor bcas //
T09TD4156E:32a-15: mi skyong gis kyang bya ba lhag ma rab tu mdzad //
T09TD4156E:32a-16: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:32a-17: btsun mo'i 'khor smre sngags bton pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o /
T09TD4156E:32a-19: // / de nas de'i tshe mdun na 'don dang blon po de //
T09TD4156E:32a-20: mi skyong mchi ma'i lcag gis mngon par bsnun pa dag / phug pa'i dam pa'i rta bzhin 'bad pa thams cad las //
T09TD4156E:32a-21: bsam pa bzang pos skyen par nags der song bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:32a-22: 'dra ba'i rjes 'brangs ngal ba skyes pa de gnyis ni //
T09TD4156E:32a-23: dka' thub nags der dus su nye bar phyin nas ni //
T09TD4156E:32a-24: rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul dor de dul ba'i spyod pa yis //
T09TD4156E:32a-25: drang srong shes ldan bu yi khang par nye bar song //
T09TD4156E:32a-26: de dag gis ni tshul bzhin bram ze de mchod nas //
T09TD4156E:32a-27: de ni de dag la yang rjes mthun mchod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:32a-28: gdan byas pa dag bdag tu lta ba bcad nas ni //
T09TD4156E:32a-29: shes ldan sras po gdan gnas pa la gtam smras so //
T09TD4156E:32a-30: mdangs gtsang gtsang zhing rnam par grags pa'i yangs pa mnga' //
T09TD4156E:32a-31: bu ram shing pa'i rigs su rab 'khrungs rgyal po yis //
T09TD4156E:32a-32: shru ka rab tu 'dzin dang gsang sngags yongs 'dzin la //
T09TD4156E:32a-33: nag por skye bo 'di ni khyod kyis rig par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:32a-34: dbang po dang mtshungs de yi rgyal ba dang mtshungs sras //
T09TD4156E:32a-35: rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dag ni sgrol 'dod de //
T09TD4156E:32b-0: @32b 'di na mngon par nye bar 'ongs grag de yi phyir //
T09TD4156E:32b-1: bdag cag nye bar 'ongs par bcom ldan mkhyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:32b-2: de dag la des smras pa phyag ring gyur pa de //
T09TD4156E:32b-3: rab tu thob gyur gzhon nu shes pa min pa min //
T09TD4156E:32b-4: chos 'di 'khor bar byed ces mngon par mkhyen nas ni //
T09TD4156E:32b-5: mngon par gdong phyogs ma yin thar bzhed skyen par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:32b-6: de nas de las de nyid de dag nyer thob nas //
T09TD4156E:32b-7: bram ze de la snyan dngags phab nas de ma thag / dub kyang ma dub pa bzhin rgyal po la gus pas //
T09TD4156E:32b-8: de nyid gang nas gshegs pa de nas rab tu song //
T09TD4156E:32b-9: song ste de nas de dag gi ni rngon pa dang //
T09TD4156E:32b-10: rnam par bral ba'i sku lus rab tu 'bar ba de //
T09TD4156E:32b-11: nyi ma sdug po'i longs spyod dag la zhugs pa ltar //
T09TD4156E:32b-12: lam ni shing gi rtsa bar nye bar bzhugs pa mthong //
T09TD4156E:32b-13: de nas de la mdun na 'don dang sngags 'dzin bcas //
T09TD4156E:32b-14: theg pa rnam par spangs nas nye bar gshegs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:32b-15: slar gnas thub pa'i bu ni g-yon gyi lhar bcas pas //
T09TD4156E:32b-16: nags gnas lhag spyod lta bar 'dod pa ji ltar ro //
T09TD4156E:32b-17: lha na pa ba sangs dang phur bus dbang chen bzhin //
T09TD4156E:32b-18: de dag gis ni de nyid bskyed cing mchod pa'o //
T09TD4156E:32b-19: lha na pa sangs phur bu dag la dbang chen bzhin //
T09TD4156E:32b-20: mchod 'os des ni de gnyis dag la slar mchod do //
T09TD4156E:32b-21: sbyor bar song ba'i zla ba nye sar nab so bzhin //
T09TD4156E:32b-22: de nas kun nas mngon par rjes gnang byas pa ni //
T09TD4156E:32b-23: de dag sh'a kya'i rigs kyi rgyal mtshan de yi ni //
T09TD4156E:32b-24: nye logs dag tu song ba rnam par mdzes par gyur //
T09TD4156E:32b-25: shing gi rtsa bar gnas pa mngon par 'bar ba yi //
T09TD4156E:32b-26: rgyal po'i sras po de la mdun na 'don gyis smras //
T09TD4156E:32b-27: lha na yongs 'dus dag la brgya byin sras po ni //
T09TD4156E:32b-28: rgyal ba nye bar gnas la phur bu ji ltar ro //
T09TD4156E:32b-29: khyod kyi mya ngan zug rngu snying la btags pa na //
T09TD4156E:32b-30: sa yi logs la rmongs shing brgyal bar gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:32b-31: gzhon nu mig gi chu yi char ltar rgyal po yis //
T09TD4156E:32b-32: gang zhig khyod la smras pa 'di ni mkhyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:32b-33: khyod kyis chos la rab dmigs nges par shes pa ste //
T09TD4156E:32b-34: khyod kyi 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i don ni shes pa'o //
T09TD4156E:32b-35: khyod kyi dus ma yin par nags su bsnyen las bdag / me dang rab mtshungs mya ngan me yis tshig pa'o //
T09TD4156E:33a-1: spyon chos dga' dag gi dga' ston du //
T09TD4156E:33a-2: chos kyi don du blo gros de nyid thong mdzod dang //
T09TD4156E:33a-3: chu bo'i shugs kyis 'gram ngogs mngon par bcom pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:33a-4: bdag la mya ngan shugs 'dir rab tu 'phel ba'o //
T09TD4156E:33a-5: rlung dang nyi ma me dang thog chen rnams kyi ni //
T09TD4156E:33a-6: 'jug pa gang zhig sprin dang chu me ri rnams su //
T09TD4156E:33a-7: rnam par 'byer dang skems dang srog dang 'byed rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:33a-8: bdag cag rnams la mya ngan gyis 'jug pa de byed //
T09TD4156E:33a-9: de phyir re zhig nor 'dzin bdag nyid longs spyod la //
T09TD4156E:33a-10: dus su bstan bcos mthong ste nags su gshegs gyur te //
T09TD4156E:33a-11: 'byung po thams cad la ni brtse ba chos yin phyir //
T09TD4156E:33a-12: mi 'dod gnyen 'dun kho bo la ni ltos par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:33a-13: chos de nags nyid kho nar 'grub pa ma yin te //
T09TD4156E:33a-14: sdom brtson rnams kyis nges par grong khyer na yang 'grub //
T09TD4156E:33a-15: 'dir ni blo dang 'bad pa dag ni mtshan ma ste //
T09TD4156E:33a-16: nags dang stag ni 'jigs pa dag gi mtshan ma'o //
T09TD4156E:33a-17: dbu rgyan 'dzin zhing dpung par rna cha do shal dang //
T09TD4156E:33a-18: dpung rgyan rnam par rengs pa'i phyag mnga' mi dbang rnams //
T09TD4156E:33a-19: phun tshogs yan lag dbus na yongs su gnas rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:33a-20: khyim na gnas kyang thar ba'i lam ni rab tu thob //
T09TD4156E:33a-21: bstan pa'i nu bo stobs dang rdo rje'i lag pa dang //
T09TD4156E:33a-22: rnam mdzes bu dang chu stod de nas mthar gnas lha //
T09TD4156E:33a-23: lus 'phags rgyal po skyes byed dang ni de bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:33a-24: grong dang ljon shing can dang sde rgyal rgyal po rnams //
T09TD4156E:33a-25: nyes legs chos kyi cho ga la ni rnam dul ba'i //
T09TD4156E:33a-26: me bdag khyim na gnas pa de rnams mkhyen mdzod la //
T09TD4156E:33a-27: nor gyi bdag po dang ni mi skyong dpal dag ste //
T09TD4156E:33a-28: gnyis po dag kyang de phyir dus gcig mkhyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:33a-29: mngon par dbang bskur byas pa'i chu yis brlan pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:33a-30: gdung ba skyob pa'i gdugs bzung khyed la drag tu ni //
T09TD4156E:33a-31: nye bar 'khyud nas kun nas gyen du lta ba ste //
T09TD4156E:33a-32: dga' ba des ni nags su rab tu 'jug par 'dod //
T09TD4156E:33a-33: de ltar mchi mas 'dud pa'i yi ge'i tshig gis ni //
T09TD4156E:33a-34: khyed nyid la ni sa yi bdag pos smras pa ste //
T09TD4156E:33a-35: thos nas de la brtse zhing de la dga' don du //
T09TD4156E:33a-36: khyed kyi brtse bas rjes su 'gro bar 'os pa'o //
T09TD4156E:33a-37: khyod las byung ba'i mya ngan chu ni gting med pa'i //
T09TD4156E:33b-0: @33b sdug bsngal rgya mtshor sh'akya'i rgyal po nub gyur te //
T09TD4156E:33b-1: de phyir mgon po rgya mtshor bying la gru bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:33b-2: dman zhing rten dang bral ba de ni sgrol mdzod cig / chu bo gang g'a'i lto nas byung ba 'jigs byed dang //
T09TD4156E:33b-3: lhag spyod dang ni ngan spong sras po lhag spyod kyis //
T09TD4156E:33b-4: pha yi dga' ba'i don du las byas thos nas ni //
T09TD4156E:33b-5: khyed kyang yab kyi bzhed pa mdzad par 'os pa lags //
T09TD4156E:33b-6: gnyen bshes be'u nyams par gyur pa'i ba bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:33b-7: rgyun mi 'chad par nyam thag snying rjer du ba mo //
T09TD4156E:33b-8: drang srong ri byi bsnyen zhing phyogs su ma song ba //
T09TD4156E:33b-9: yang dag skyed bar byed ba'i lha mo mkhyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:33b-10: ngang pa rnam par bral ba'i ngang mo lta bu dang //
T09TD4156E:33b-11: nags na glang po dang bral glang mo lta bu ni //
T09TD4156E:33b-12: mgon dang bcas kyang mgon med dman zhing nyam thag pa'o //
T09TD4156E:33b-13: btsun mo gzigs pa yis ni skyob par 'os pa yin //
T09TD4156E:33b-14: sras gcig byis pa sdug bsngal 'os pa ma yin pa //
T09TD4156E:33b-15: kun nas gdung ba mthar gyur pa ni 'dren pa ste //
T09TD4156E:33b-16: gang ba'i zla ba sgra gcan nye bar bsgyur las bzhin //
T09TD4156E:33b-17: sgra gcan 'dzin de gnyen gyi mya ngan las thar mdzod //
T09TD4156E:33b-18: pho brang btsun mo'i 'khor dang grong khyer mtha' dag ni //
T09TD4156E:33b-19: khyed dang bral ba'i bud shing can gyi mya ngan me //
T09TD4156E:33b-20: phyir 'byung dbugs ni du ba mun pa'i rtse mo yis //
T09TD4156E:33b-21: tshig pa dag ni khyed la lta ba'i chu 'dod do //
T09TD4156E:33b-22: mdun na 'don pa de yi tshig dag gsan gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:33b-23: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gang ba'i sems dpa' des //
T09TD4156E:33b-24: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes pas yud tsam zhig / bsam gtan mdzad nas rigs pa'i lan 'di smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:33b-25: pa rnams kyi ni bu la dgongs pa shes pa ste //
T09TD4156E:33b-26: gang zhig bdag las skyong gi ni khyad par du //
T09TD4156E:33b-27: shes pa yin yang na dang rga dang rgud pa las //
T09TD4156E:33b-28: 'jigs te nags su phyin nas rang gi skye bo dor //
T09TD4156E:33b-29: mthar ni gal te dga' ba dang bral ma yin na //
T09TD4156E:33b-30: rang gi skye bo dga' ba lta 'dod cis ma yin ;
T09TD4156E:33b-31: / gang tshe yun ring gyur kyang rnam par 'bral ba ste //
T09TD4156E:33b-32: de phyir bla ma brtse ba yin yang 'dor bar bgyi //
T09TD4156E:33b-33: gang yang bdag gi ched du mi yi bdag po yi //
T09TD4156E:33b-34: mya ngan khyod kyis smras des bdag la dga' ba med //
T09TD4156E:33b-35: gang phyir rmi lam yang dag 'dus par gyur rnams su //
T09TD4156E:34a-1: bar 'gyur la kun nas gdung bar byed //
T09TD4156E:34a-2: 'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:34a-3: de bzhin du yang khyod kyi blo gros nges par song //
T09TD4156E:34a-4: bu min gnyen min kun nas gdung ba'i rgyu yin bzhin //
T09TD4156E:34a-5: 'ching ba de ni shes pa med pa'i mtshan ma nyid //
T09TD4156E:34a-6: lam du 'gro rnams 'dir ni 'dus pa ji lta ba'i //
T09TD4156E:34a-7: skye dgu rnams ni dus su nges par 'bral ba ste //
T09TD4156E:34a-8: gnyen 'dun dam 'cha' skye bos rnam par dman pa yi //
T09TD4156E:34a-9: shes rab ldan pa'i skye bos mya ngan bsnyen nam ci //
T09TD4156E:34a-10: gzhan du rang gi skye bo dor nas 'dir 'ongs la //
T09TD4156E:34a-11: 'dir yang rab tu bslus nas slar yang 'gro ba ste //
T09TD4156E:34a-12: der song nas kyang pha rol gzhan du 'gro 'gyur la //
T09TD4156E:34a-13: de ltar 'dor ldan skyo la rjes su brten nam ci //
T09TD4156E:34a-14: gang tshe mngal nas bzung ste gnas skabs thams cad du //
T09TD4156E:34a-15: gsod pa'i phyir ni 'chi ba rab tu gnas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:34a-16: bu la dga' ba der ni khyed kyis smras pa yi //
T09TD4156E:34a-17: bdag gi nags su brten pa gang phyir dus ma yin //
T09TD4156E:34a-18: yul la mngon par lhung tshe dus ma yin pa de //
T09TD4156E:34a-19: de bzhin nor gyi cho gar zhugs pa dus yin no //
T09TD4156E:34a-20: dus rnams kun du dus kyi 'gro ba khyab pa ste //
T09TD4156E:34a-21: dge legs nges par thob pa dus yod ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:34a-22: gang yang rgyal pos bdag la rgyal srid 'dir bzhad la //
T09TD4156E:34a-23: de yang yab kyi rgya chen mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste //
T09TD4156E:34a-24: sred pa las ni nad pa'i mi 'phrod zas bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:34a-25: bdag gis rab tu 'dzin par nus pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:34a-26: gti mug rmongs pa'i gzhi ma mi skyong rgyal po nyid //
T09TD4156E:34a-27: rab tu 'thob par mi ni mkhas pas gang phyir nus //
T09TD4156E:34a-28: gang du skyo ba dang bcas rgyags dang ngal dub dang //
T09TD4156E:34a-29: pha rol log par spyod pas ches la gnod pa'o //
T09TD4156E:34a-30: 'dzam bu chu gser bzhin du gsal ba'i lding khang ni //
T09TD4156E:34a-31: dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang po lta bu dang //
T09TD4156E:34a-32: gza' yis 'khrugs pa'i padma dang bcas chu lta bu //
T09TD4156E:34a-33: rgyal srid dang ni gser dag sdug bsngal dag gi rten ;
T09TD4156E:34a-34: / de ltar rgyal srid chos min bde ba ma yin pa //
T09TD4156E:34a-35: ji ltar mi gtsang skyes te mi dbang snga ma rnams //
T09TD4156E:34a-36: sdug bsngal yongs su spang bya na tshod rab mchog tshe //
T09TD4156E:34a-37: rgyal srid nges par dor nas nags su song bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:34a-38: rin chen bzhin du tshim ba mchog ni nyer mkhyud nas //
T09TD4156E:34b-0: 'brog @34b dgon dag na rtsva dag zos pa mchog yin la //
T09TD4156E:34b-1: sbrul nag bzhin du mthong ba ma yin nyes pa ni //
T09TD4156E:34b-2: rnyed bla'i dpal dang lhan cig nyal ba mchog ma yin //
T09TD4156E:34b-3: rgyal srid rnam par spangs pa rgyal po rnams kyi chos //
T09TD4156E:34b-4: mngon par 'dod pas nags su rab 'jug bsngags pa ste //
T09TD4156E:34b-5: nags tshal yongs su dor nas khyim du rab 'jug pa //
T09TD4156E:34b-6: dam bca' nye bar bcom pa'i 'thad pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:34b-7: rigs su skyes shing sems pa dang bcas mi gang gis //
T09TD4156E:34b-8: chos ni mngon par 'dod pas nags su rab zhugs la //
T09TD4156E:34b-9: ngur smrig rab tu dor nas ngo tsha rnam spangs nas //
T09TD4156E:34b-10: grong khyer 'joms pa yi yang grong la bsnyen ma yin //
T09TD4156E:34b-11: sred dang rnam par rmongs dang yang na 'jigs pa yis //
T09TD4156E:34b-12: gang zhig skyugs pa'i bza' ba slar yang len byed la //
T09TD4156E:34b-13: sred pa de ni rmongs dang yang na 'jigs pa yis //
T09TD4156E:34b-14: 'dod pa rnams ni dor nas slar yang len par byed //
T09TD4156E:34b-15: gang zhig rab 'bar khang pa dag nas ci zhig ltar ;
T09TD4156E:34b-16: / byung nas slar yang de nyid kho nar rab 'jug la //
T09TD4156E:34b-17: nyes pa mthong de khyim na gnas pa dor nas ni //
T09TD4156E:34b-18: rmongs pas slar yang len par mngon par 'dod pa'o //
T09TD4156E:34b-19: gang yang mi skyong khyim na gnas pas thar pa ni //
T09TD4156E:34b-20: 'thob pa dang ldan zhes thos de ni med pa ste //
T09TD4156E:34b-21: zhi ba gtso bo'i thar pa'i chos ni gang la yang //
T09TD4156E:34b-22: chad pa gtso bo'i rgyal po'i chos ni gang du'o //
T09TD4156E:34b-23: zhi ba dga' ba gal te rgyal srid dman pa ste //
T09TD4156E:34b-24: rgyal srid la blo gal te zhi ba rnam par nyams //
T09TD4156E:34b-25: grang dang dro dang me dang chu yi gcig nyid bzhin //
T09TD4156E:34b-26: zhi ba dang ni rno nyid 'thad pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:34b-27: me dang chu yi 'du ba yod pa ma yin la //
T09TD4156E:34b-28: khram dang drang po'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:34b-29: 'phags dang sdig pa'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin te //
T09TD4156E:34b-30: zhi dang chad pa'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:34b-31: de phyir sa 'dzin bdag po de rnams nges pas sam //
T09TD4156E:34b-32: rgyal po'i srid rnams spangs te zhi ba thob pa can //
T09TD4156E:34b-33: rgyal srid dag la bsnyen nam dbang po sbas nyid las //
T09TD4156E:34b-34: mthar ma thug par thar par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byas //
T09TD4156E:34b-35: de dag rnams kyi rgyal srid la zhi ji lta bzhin //
T09TD4156E:34b-36: bdag ni nags tshal rab thob nges pas ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:34b-37: khyim dang gnyen gyi 'du shes zhags pa bcad nas ni //
T09TD4156E:34b-38: thar gyur slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:35a-1: nyid rnam shes yon tan rjes mthun pa //
T09TD4156E:35a-2: re 'dod spangs shing gtan tshigs ldan pa sgrogs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:35a-3: mi dbang bdag nyid skyes kyi smra ldan thos gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:35a-4: gsang sngags 'dzin pa yis kyang lan ni smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:35a-5: gang zhig chos kyi cho gar nges pa khyod kyi 'di//
T09TD4156E:35a-6: rig pa min pa ma yin 'di ni dus rig min //
T09TD4156E:35a-7: na tshod la gnas yab ma mya ngan phyir byin nas //
T09TD4156E:35a-8: chos 'dod khyod kyi chos ma yin par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:35a-9: nges par khyed kyi blo yang shin tu phra min pa //
T09TD4156E:35a-10: yang na chos dang don dang 'dod par mkhas ma min //
T09TD4156E:35a-11: gang zhig ma mthong 'bras bu'i don du khyed nyid kyis ;
T09TD4156E:35a-12: / mngon sum don ni yongs su brnyas par mdzad nas gshegs //
T09TD4156E:35a-13: yang srid yod ces kha cig dag ni smra ba ste //
T09TD4156E:35a-14: med ces kha cig dag ni nges par dam 'cha'o //
T09TD4156E:35a-15: de ltar gang tshe don 'di the tshom gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:35a-16: de phyir longs spyod par nus dpal ni nye bar gnas //
T09TD4156E:35a-17: gal te slar yang rab tu 'jug pa gang yang yod //
T09TD4156E:35a-18: der ni ji ltar 'bad pa dag la dga' bar bgyi //
T09TD4156E:35a-19: ci ste gzhan du rab tu 'jug pa gang yang med //
T09TD4156E:35a-20: 'gro ba 'di yi 'bad rtsol med las thar pa 'grub //
T09TD4156E:35a-21: kha cig 'jig rten pha rol yod ces smra ba ste //
T09TD4156E:35a-22: thar pa'i sbyor ba la ni bsngags pa byed ma yin ;
T09TD4156E:35a-23: / ji ltar me yi dro dang chu yi gsher ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:35a-24: de ltar rab tu 'jug par rang bzhin nyid du smra //
T09TD4156E:35a-25: dge dang mi dge nyid dang srid dang srid min la //
T09TD4156E:35a-26: kha cig rang bzhin las zhes bsngags pa byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:35a-27: gang phyir 'di dag thams cad rang bzhin las yin te //
T09TD4156E:35a-28: de yi phyir yang rab tu 'bad pa don med 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:35a-29: gang zhig dbang po rnams kyis nges par rab spyod pa //
T09TD4156E:35a-30: yul rnams la ni dga' ba dang ni mi dga' nyid //
T09TD4156E:35a-31: gang zhig dga' dang nad rnams dag gis sbyor byed de //
T09TD4156E:35a-32: de la gang gis 'bad dam de ni rang bzhin no //
T09TD4156E:35a-33: chu rnams kyis ni me rnams zhi bar nye 'gro zhing //
T09TD4156E:35a-34: 'od zer rnams kyis chu ni skams par byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:35a-35: lus la yang dag gnas pa'i 'byung ba tha dad rnams //
T09TD4156E:35a-36: gcig nyid gyur nas 'gro ba dag ni 'dren par byed //
T09TD4156E:35a-37: gang zhig lag pa rkang pa lto rgyab mgo rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:35a-38: mngal du song ba'i ngo bo nges par sgrub byed la //
T09TD4156E:35b-0: @35b gang tshe bdag nyid de yi de yis sbyor ba ste //
T09TD4156E:35b-1: rang bzhin las byung de shes rnams kyis de smra'o //
T09TD4156E:35b-2: bya dang ri dags rnams kyi sna tshogs ngo bo dang //
T09TD4156E:35b-3: tsher ma'i rnon po nyid du rab tu byed pa su //
T09TD4156E:35b-4: rab tu 'jug pa 'di kun rang bzhin las yin la //
T09TD4156E:35b-5: 'dod pa byed pa yod min 'bad pa gang las so ;
T09TD4156E:35b-6: / de bzhin gzhan rnams dbang phyug las skyes smra ba ste //
T09TD4156E:35b-7: der ni skyes bu'i rab tu 'jug pa la don ci //
T09TD4156E:35b-8: 'gro ba'i rab tu 'jug la gang nyid rgyu yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:35b-9: ldog pa la ni nges par de nyid rgyu yin no //
T09TD4156E:35b-10: kha cig bdag gi mtshan ma nyid du smra ba ste //
T09TD4156E:35b-11: rab tu skye ba nyid dang srid pa zad pa yang ;
T09TD4156E:35b-12: /'bad pa med las rab tu skye bar smra ba ste //
T09TD4156E:35b-13: 'bad pa yis ni thar pa 'thob par smra pa'o //
T09TD4156E:35b-14: lha yi mchod sbyin drang srong rnams kyi rig byed dang //
T09TD4156E:35b-15: pha yi bu lon med pa bu rnams kyis te mi //
T09TD4156E:35b-16: gang gi grol ba yod pa de yi thar pa zhes //
T09TD4156E:35b-17: bu lon gsum po de dang lhan cig skyes pa'o ;
T09TD4156E:35b-18: / de ltar cho ga'i bya ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni //
T09TD4156E:35b-19: 'bad rtsol bcas pa'i thar pa de shes rnam smra la //
T09TD4156E:35b-20: 'bad rtsol ldan pa yin yang rnam par gnon pa yis //
T09TD4156E:35b-21: thar pa 'dod pa rnams ni ngal ba thob par byed //
T09TD4156E:35b-22: de phyir zhi ba gal te thar gus yod na //
T09TD4156E:35b-23: cho gar brjod pa ji ltar rigs pas bsnyen mdzod dang //
T09TD4156E:35b-24: 'di yi nye bar 'thad pa de ltar gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:35b-25: mi yi bdag po'i kun nas gdung ba nyams par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:35b-26: dka' thub nags tshal dag nas khang par 'jug pa la //
T09TD4156E:35b-27: khyod kyi skyon gyi blo gros gang zhig rab zhugs te //
T09TD4156E:35b-28: yab gcig der yang khyod kyi bsam par ma gyur dang ;
T09TD4156E:35b-29: / snga ma rnams kyang nags nas rang gi khang par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:35b-30: dka' thub nags na gnas pa bu rnams kyis bskor te //
T09TD4156E:35b-31: rgyal po aa ma ri sha grong du zhugs gyur la //
T09TD4156E:35b-32: de bzhin 'phags min rnams kyis sa ni rnam bcom pa //
T09TD4156E:35b-33: dka' thub nags nas 'ongs nas rangs byed kyis gsungs so ;
T09TD4156E:35b-34: / de bzhin rdo ba dang bcas bdag po'i ljon shing ming //
T09TD4156E:35b-35: nags gnas bu dang bcas pa grong du bzhugs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:35b-36: tshangs pa'i drang srong gyur dang thub pa gnas 'jog las //
T09TD4156E:35b-37: sbyin sreg dang bcas mtha' can lha yis dpal bzung ngo //
T09TD4156E:35b-38: rnam pa de ltar chos dang grags par rab bzhugs pa //
T09TD4156E:36a-0: @36a * // nags rnams bor nas khang khyim rnams su song ba ste //
T09TD4156E:36a-1: de phyir dka' thub nags nas chos kyi ched du nyid //
T09TD4156E:36a-2: khyim na rab tu 'gro ba skyon yod ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:36a-3: de nas mi skyong rgyal po'i dga' dang phan pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:36a-4: byas pa'i blon po de yi tshig dag gsan nas ni //
T09TD4156E:36a-5: dman min ma 'khrugs chags min brtan dang gnas pa la //
T09TD4156E:36a-6: myur min tshig ni rgyal po sras kyis smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:36a-7: 'dir ni yod dang med ces the tshom gang de ni //
T09TD4156E:36a-8: gzhan gyi tshig gis bdag la 'di na nges pa med //
T09TD4156E:36a-9: dka' thub dang ni zhi bas de nyid rtogs gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:36a-10: gang 'dir nges par bdag nyid kyis ni gzung bar bgyi //
T09TD4156E:36a-11: phan tshun gnod cing mi gsal the tshom skye ba yi //
T09TD4156E:36a-12: lta ba dag ni len par bdag gis nus ma yin //
T09TD4156E:36a-13: mun par long bas long ba'i lam mkhan byed pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:36a-14: mkhas pa'i skye bo su zhig gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro //
T09TD4156E:36a-15: de nyid ma mthong gyur kyang 'on kyang kho bo yi //
T09TD4156E:36a-16: dge dang mi dger the tshom na dge blo gros gyur //
T09TD4156E:36a-17: 'bras bu med phyir la yang dge ba'i bdag nyid mchog / smod pa'i bdag nyid de nyid la yang bde ba med //
T09TD4156E:36a-18: rnam gzhag med pa'i lung 'di yang ni mthong gyur nas ;
T09TD4156E:36a-19: / tshad ldan rnams kyis gang smras de ni legs rtogs mdzod //
T09TD4156E:36a-20: nyes la rab dman tshad ldan nyid ni rtogs mdzod dang //
T09TD4156E:36a-21: nyes pa rab tu dman pas bden min smra ba yin //
T09TD4156E:36a-22: khyim la 'jug par dmigs gang bdag la khyod kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:36a-23: smras shing rangs byed la sogs rnams ni dpe bstan te //
T09TD4156E:36a-24: de rnams tshad min chos des rnams su nus med cing //
T09TD4156E:36a-25: tshad ma'i ched du brtul zhugs rnams ni yongs su zad //
T09TD4156E:36a-26: de lta na yang nyi ma sa la lhung gyur la //
T09TD4156E:36a-27: gangs dang ldan pa'i ri bos brtan nyid 'dor na yang //
T09TD4156E:36a-28: de nyid ma mthong yul la kha bltas dbang po ni //
T09TD4156E:36a-29: khyim rnams dag la so so skye bo mi bsnyen to //
T09TD4156E:36a-30: bdag ni 'bar bar gyur pa'i me la 'jug pa ste //
T09TD4156E:36a-31: don ma byas par khyim gyi gzhi la rab mi 'jug / de ltar thugs rgyal ldan des dam bca' mdzad gyur cing //
T09TD4156E:36a-32: ji ltar 'dod bzhin bzhengs nas ngar 'dzin med par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:36b-0: de nas mchi ma dang bcas blon @36b dang gnyis skyes gnyis //
T09TD4156E:36b-1: de yi bstan pa nyid dang nges pa thos gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:36b-2: gti mug bzhin ldan rjes su song nas sdug bsngal ga / dal bus song nas grong khyer nyid du sod par gyur //
T09TD4156E:36b-3: de nas de la brtse dang mi skyong la gus las //
T09TD4156E:36b-4: de dag ltos byas rab tu song zhing gnas gyur la ;
T09TD4156E:36b-5: / gsal zhing snang bas nyi ma blta bar dka' ba ltar //
T09TD4156E:36b-6: de ni lam du lta bar ma nus 'dor bar min //
T09TD4156E:36b-7: mchog tu gshegs te gshegs pa shes phyir de dag gis //
T09TD4156E:36b-8: so pa'i skyes bu gtsang ma sbas pa rnams byas nas //
T09TD4156E:36b-9: dga' zhing sras po 'dod pa'i rgyal po la song nas //
T09TD4156E:36b-10: ji ltar blta'am zhes ni ji ltar yang song ngo //
T09TD4156E:36b-11: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dang gas chen po las /
T09TD4156E:36b-12: gzhon nu rjes su tshol ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o /
T09TD4156E:36b-14: // / sku stod rgyas shing rgya chen rgyal po'i sras po ste //
T09TD4156E:36b-15: bsreg bya dang bsngags bdag po de dag rnams spangs te //
T09TD4156E:36b-16: dba' rlabs g-yo ba'i chu bo gang g'a rgal nas ni //
T09TD4156E:36b-17: dpal dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:36b-18: ri rnams dag gis legs par sbas dang brgyan pa dang //
T09TD4156E:36b-19: dge dang dka' thub gter bas gzung dang gtsang ba ste //
T09TD4156E:36b-20: zhi ba rang byung tshangs pa mtho ris logs su bzhin //
T09TD4156E:36b-21: ri lngas mtshan pa'i grong khyer rab tu thob par gyur //
T09TD4156E:36b-22: zab mor gyur pa'i mdangs dar de yi lugs gsal ba //
T09TD4156E:36b-23: skyes bu rnams ni shin tu gnon pa mthong gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:36b-24: khyu mchog rgyal mtshan de yi brtul zhugs brtan pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:36b-25: der ni de tshe skye bo rnams ni ya mtshan gyur //
T09TD4156E:36b-26: de rab mthong nas gzhan gang ma song de gnas shing //
T09TD4156E:36b-27: der ni gang zhig lam na gnas de rjes 'gro zhing //
T09TD4156E:36b-28: gang zhig skyen por song ste brtan por song gyur la //
T09TD4156E:36b-29: kha cig bsdad pa gang yin de ni langs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:36b-30: skye bo kha cig de la mchod pa'i lag pa yis //
T09TD4156E:36b-31: bsti stang byas nas kha cig mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing //
T09TD4156E:36b-32: kha cig gnyen po'i tshig gis mngon par stod byed cing //
T09TD4156E:36b-33: kha cig de la rab tu mchod nas song bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:36b-34: de rab mthong nas sna tshogs cha lugs rnams ngo tsha //
T09TD4156E:36b-35: rab bkram tshig ni lam du smra ba med par song //
T09TD4156E:37a-0: dngos su gzhan du chos rnams @37a * //
T09TD4156E:37a-2: kha cig tshul ma yin pa'i blo gros ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:37a-3: lha dang mtshungs pa'i mi dbang sras po de mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:37a-4: bya ba gzhan ma rnams kyang rgyal po'i lam du ni //
T09TD4156E:37a-5: mchod mang bkur sti sngon 'gro bud med rnams kyi 'am //
T09TD4156E:37a-6: skyes pa rnams kyis mig dang ngoms par ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:37a-7: dpral ba 'am smin ma dag dang zhal lam spyan dag dang //
T09TD4156E:37a-8: sku 'am phyag dag dang ni 'gros sam zhabs dag ni //
T09TD4156E:37a-9: gang gis de yi gang nyid der ni mthong gyur pa //
T09TD4156E:37a-10: de nyid kyis ni de yi mig dag bcings par gyur //
T09TD4156E:37a-11: smin ma mdzod spu dang bcas spyan dag yangs pa dang //
T09TD4156E:37a-12: sku lus mdzes shing dge ba'i dra ba dang ldan phyag / sa skyong nyid du 'os pa'i dge slong cha lugs de //
T09TD4156E:37a-13: mthong nas rgyal po'i khab kyi phun tshogs g-yos par gyur //
T09TD4156E:37a-14: de nas khang pa'i phyi nas rnam rgyas skye bo'i tshogs //
T09TD4156E:37a-15: ma ga dh'a yi khyim gyi ngo bo bzo sbyangs kyis //
T09TD4156E:37a-16: mthong bar gyur te de yi rgyu mtshan dris pa ste //
T09TD4156E:37a-17: de nas 'di la skyes bu rnams kyis de smras so //
T09TD4156E:37a-18: ye shes mchog gam yang na sa yi dpal dag ni //
T09TD4156E:37a-19: 'thob par 'gyur zhes bram ze rnams kyis gang smras pa //
T09TD4156E:37a-20: rab tu gshegs par skye bos nges par mthong ba yi //
T09TD4156E:37a-21: sh'akya'i bdag po'i sras po de ni 'di yin no //
T09TD4156E:37a-22: de nas don thos yid kyis chags shing zhen gyur pa'i //
T09TD4156E:37a-23: rgyal po yis ni skyes bu de nyid la smras pa //
T09TD4156E:37a-24: de ni gang du song zhes rnam par shes par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:37a-25: de nas de ltar bgyi zhes skyes bu rjes su song //
T09TD4156E:37a-26: g-yo mi spyan ni gnya' shing gang tsam gzigs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:37a-27: gsung ni kun nas snyoms shing zab mo'i 'gros mnga' ba //
T09TD4156E:37a-28: g-yo ba'i sems dang lus rnams dag ni nges bsdams nas //
T09TD4156E:37a-29: dge slong mchog nyid de yang bsod snyoms la gshegs so //
T09TD4156E:37a-30: ji ltar nye bar 'thad pa'i bsod snyoms bsnams nas ni //
T09TD4156E:37a-31: rnam par dben zhing char rab 'bab par rab gshegs la //
T09TD4156E:37a-32: der ni tshul bzhin rigs pas mngon par gsol gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:37a-33: de ni sa 'dzin ri bo skya bseng la 'dzegs so //
T09TD4156E:37a-34: ro dha'i nags kyis nye bar sbas pa'i ri bo der //
T09TD4156E:37a-35: rma bya'i skad kyis rab gang lo ma'i spyil bo na //
T09TD4156E:37a-36: 'char ri'i steng na nyi ma gzhon nu ji lta bar //
T09TD4156E:37b-0: ngur smrig gos kyis nyi ma'i nyi ma de mdzes @37b so ;
T09TD4156E:37b-1: / der ni de nyid rgyal po'i 'khor de mthong gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:37b-2: bzo sbyangs rgyal po la ni gtam dag byas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:37b-3: thos nas rgyal po des kyang mchod pha mang po las //
T09TD4156E:37b-4: der ni sbas pa'i rjes su 'brang bas rab tu song //
T09TD4156E:37b-5: skya bseng ri bo mchog la skya bseng na dang ni //
T09TD4156E:37b-6: brtson 'grus mnyam zhing ri bo dang mnyam sku lus can //
T09TD4156E:37b-7: mi yi seng ge'i 'gros can cod pan 'dzin pa ste //
T09TD4156E:37b-8: ral pa g-yo ba'i seng ge bzhin du 'dzegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:37b-9: de nas de yi steng na rtse mor gyur pa yi //
T09TD4156E:37b-10: byang chub sems dpa' dbang po nye bar zhi ba ni //
T09TD4156E:37b-11: ri bong gis mtshan sprin gyi sbubs nas byung ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:37b-12: skyil mo krung gis bzhugs nas rnam par mdzes pa mthong //
T09TD4156E:37b-13: gzugs dang phun sum tshogs dang nye bar zhi ba yi //
T09TD4156E:37b-14: chos kyi sprul pa bzhin du nye bar bzhugs de la //
T09TD4156E:37b-15: ya mtshan dang bcas rab tu bsnyen ldan mi dbang po //
T09TD4156E:37b-16: rang byung la ni brgya byin gyis bzhin nye bar gnas //
T09TD4156E:37b-17: rigs pa yis ni rigs pa rig pa rnams kyi mchog / khams mnyam gyur pa de la song nas dris pa ste //
T09TD4156E:37b-18: de nyid kyis kyang mtshungs shing zhi bas mi skyong la //
T09TD4156E:37b-19: yid ni rang bzhin gnas dang nad med smras par gyur //
T09TD4156E:37b-20: de nas gtsang la glang po'i rna ba ltar sdo ba'i //
T09TD4156E:37b-21: rdo ba'i logs la rgyal po yang dag nges gnas shing //
T09TD4156E:37b-22: nye sar nye bar bsdad nas rjes su mthun pa yis //
T09TD4156E:37b-23: de yi dgongs pa rnam par shes 'dod 'di smras so //
T09TD4156E:37b-24: rim pas 'ongs pa nyid dang yongs su brtags pa ste //
T09TD4156E:37b-25: khyod kyi rigs kyis bdag gi dga' ba mchog yin la //
T09TD4156E:37b-26: gang phyir bdag la rang gi na tshod smra 'dod pa //
T09TD4156E:37b-27: skyes te de phyir brtse ba'i tshig 'di mkhyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:37b-28: khyod kyi rigs ni rnam rgyas sngon du nyi ma ste //
T09TD4156E:37b-29: lus kyang na tshod gsar pa gsal la mdzes pa 'di //
T09TD4156E:37b-30: gang phyir 'di ni khyod kyi blo gros rim med pas //
T09TD4156E:37b-31: slong mo nyid la mngon dga' rgyal srid la ma yin //
T09TD4156E:37b-32: khyod kyi lus 'di tsandan dmar po 'os pa ste //
T09TD4156E:37b-33: ngur smrig gis dkris de ni 'os pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:37b-34: lag pa 'di ni skye dgu skyong bar 'os pa ste //
T09TD4156E:37b-35: gzhan gyis byin pa'i bza' ba za bar 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:37b-36: de phyir zhi ba gal te yab kyi rgyal srid la //
T09TD4156E:37b-37: khyod kyi yab kyi brtse las stobs kyis mi 'dod cing //
T09TD4156E:38a-0: @38a * // khyod kyi blo gros rim par bzod par ma gyur na //
T09TD4156E:38a-1: skyen par kho bo'i yul gyi phyed la longs spyod mdzod //
T09TD4156E:38a-2: de lta na ni rang gi skye la gnod min zhing //
T09TD4156E:38a-3: dus kyi rim pa yis kyang dpal gang bsngags pa ste //
T09TD4156E:38a-4: de phyir khyod kyis bdag la brtse ba mdzod cig dang //
T09TD4156E:38a-5: dam pa rnams dang bcas pas dam pa'i dpal 'phel lo //
T09TD4156E:38a-6: ci ste da ni rigs kyis khengs pa nyid las ni //
T09TD4156E:38a-7: bdag cag rnams la khyod la blo gtad yon tan med //
T09TD4156E:38a-8: sde rgyas rnams ni mda' yis rnam par dkrugs byas nas //
T09TD4156E:38a-9: bdag dang bcas pas pha rol rnams ni pham par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:38a-10: de phyir 'dir ni gnyis dbus gcig blo tshol mdzod la //
T09TD4156E:38a-11: chos don 'dod pa rnams la chog bzhin bsnyen mdzod //
T09TD4156E:38a-12: 'di na sde tshan gsum po chags las rnam bzlog nas //
T09TD4156E:38a-13: 'di dang gzhan du phyin nas lhung ba kun nas 'thob //
T09TD4156E:38a-14: gang zhig don dang chos la gnod nas 'dod pa dang //
T09TD4156E:38a-15: chos dang 'dod pa yongs su brnyas nas don dang ni //
T09TD4156E:38a-16: 'dod dang don dag nye bar zhi bas chos de ni //
T09TD4156E:38a-17: don byas gal te mtha' dag 'dod na don yin no //
T09TD4156E:38a-18: de phyir sde tshan gsum la nges par bsnyen pa yis //
T09TD4156E:38a-19: khyod kyis gzugs 'di 'bras bu bcas pa nyid du mdzod //
T09TD4156E:38a-20: chos dang don dang 'dod pa dman min thob pa la //
T09TD4156E:38a-21: mi rnams dag gis dman min skyes bu'i don du smra //
T09TD4156E:38a-22: de phyir gzhu ni rnam par 'gengs 'os rgyas pa'i phyag /'di dag 'bras bu med par byed par 'os min te //
T09TD4156E:38a-23: nga las nu bzhin 'dis ni 'jig rten gsum rnams kyang //
T09TD4156E:38a-24: pham par 'os pa yin na sa 'dir smos ci dgos //
T09TD4156E:38a-25: brtse bas nges par de ni bdag gis smra ba ste //
T09TD4156E:38a-26: ya mtshan gyis min dbang phyug nyid kyi chags pas min //
T09TD4156E:38a-27: khyod kyis dge slong nyid kyi cha lugs 'di mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:38a-28: rjes su brtse ba skyes nas mchi ma rang byung ngo //
T09TD4156E:38a-29: de phyir rang rigs rab mtshungs khyod kyi gzugs ji srid //
T09TD4156E:38a-30: rga bas zil gyis mnan nas slar yang ma 'ongs par //
T09TD4156E:38a-31: slong mo'i gnas 'dod 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod la //
T09TD4156E:38a-32: dus su chos la dga' ba chos ni gyis mdzod cig /'khogs pas nges par chos ni 'thob par nus pa ste //
T09TD4156E:38a-33: 'dod pa nye bar spyod la rgas pa'i 'gro ba med //
T09TD4156E:38a-34: de phyir dar la bab pa'i 'dod pa rnams smra ste //
T09TD4156E:38b-0: bar ma'i nor yin rgan po rnams @38b kyi chos yin no //
T09TD4156E:38b-1: gson pa'i 'jig rten dag na chos dang don dag ni //
T09TD4156E:38b-2: rnam par 'gal bar gyur ba yin phyir lang tsho rnams //
T09TD4156E:38b-3: yang dag srung ba yin yang thub par dka' ba ste //
T09TD4156E:38b-4: gang phyir 'dod pas lam de las ni 'phrog par byed //
T09TD4156E:38b-5: na tshod 'khogs pa rnams ni rnam spyod ldan pa ste //
T09TD4156E:38b-6: shin tu brtan pa'i gnas skabs mchog tu sod ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:38b-7: ngo tsha ba nyid phyir dang song ba ma yin phyir //
T09TD4156E:38b-8: 'bad pa nyung dus zhi ba'i bdag nyid gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:38b-9: de nyid phyir na g-yo zhing yul ni gtso bo dang //
T09TD4156E:38b-10: rab myos bzod pa ma yin ring por mthong min la //
T09TD4156E:38b-11: 'brog dgon dag la des par thar nas dbugs phyung bzhin //
T09TD4156E:38b-12: g-yo sgyu mang bo'i lang tsho shin tu 'das nas so //
T09TD4156E:38b-13: de phyir mi brtan g-yo la bag med ldan pa yi //
T09TD4156E:38b-14: na tshod gsar pa 'di ni re zhig rnam par 'ong //
T09TD4156E:38b-15: 'dod pa'i lha yi sngon du na tshod dben yin la //
T09TD4156E:38b-16: dbang po rnams las bsrung bar nus pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:38b-17: ci ste khyod kyi chos nyid mdzad par 'dod pa ni //
T09TD4156E:38b-18: mchod spyin gyis lha mchod mdzod 'di ni rigs kyi chos //
T09TD4156E:38b-19: mchod spyin rnams kyis mtho ris logs ni byin brlabs nas //
T09TD4156E:38b-20: lha dbang nyid kyang mtho ris logs su gshegs par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:38b-21: gser gyi dpung rgyan rnam par bcings pa'i phyag rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:38b-22: nor bu'i sgron mas 'bar ba'i dpung rgyan sna tshogs can //
T09TD4156E:38b-23: mi skyod drang srong rnams dang drang srong chen po rnams //
T09TD4156E:38b-24: ngal bas gar gshegs 'gros der mchod spyin rnams kyis gshegs //
T09TD4156E:38b-25: de ltar ma gadh'a yi bdag pos tshig smras pa //
T09TD4156E:38b-26: gang zhig dbang po'i bzhin du smra ba yang dag mdzes //
T09TD4156E:38b-27: sna tshogs du ma'i sa phyogs ti se'i gangs ri ltar //
T09TD4156E:38b-28: rgyal po'i sras des de thos gyur nas rnam ma g-yos //
T09TD4156E:38b-29: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:38b-30: bzo sbyangs sngon du song ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o /
T09TD4156E:38b-32: // / de nas bshes kyi sgo nas phan pa min pa'i don //
T09TD4156E:38b-33: de ltar ma ga dh'a yi bdag pos smras pa yis //
T09TD4156E:38b-34: rang gnas rnam par 'gyur mi na rigs gtsang gtsang pa po //
T09TD4156E:38b-35: zas gtsang rgyal po'i sras kyis tshig 'di smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:38b-36: seng ges mtshan pa'i yangs pa'i rigs su rab skyes pa //
T09TD4156E:38b-37: khyed kyi chog de ni ngo mtshar che ma yin //
T09TD4156E:39a-0: gang phyir bshes gnyen phyogs su @39a * //
T09TD4156E:39a-2: yongs su dag pa'i spyod pas spyod pa de yin no //
T09TD4156E:39a-3: rang rigs rjes su spyod pas dam pa min la byams //
T09TD4156E:39a-4: dbang po mtshang ba la dpal bzhin gnas min la //
T09TD4156E:39a-5: snga mas byas pa'i dga' ba rim rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:39a-6: de ni dam pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar byed //
T09TD4156E:39a-7: don ni dka' ba rnams su mi rnams gang zhig gis //
T09TD4156E:39a-8: mdza' bo rnams kyis mnyam pa'i don gyur 'jig rten na //
T09TD4156E:39a-9: bshes gnyen de rnams blo yis yongs su shes bgyi ste //
T09TD4156E:39a-10: rang gnas dag ni 'phel bar gang gi phyir ma yin //
T09TD4156E:39a-11: de ltar gang gis rdzas dag thob nas 'jig rten na //
T09TD4156E:39a-12: bshes rnams dang ni chos la nges par sbyor byed pa //
T09TD4156E:39a-13: de rnams kyis ni nor gyi snying po thob pa ste //
T09TD4156E:39a-14: mthar ni nyams las gdung bskyed par byed ma yin //
T09TD4156E:39a-15: rgyal po mdza' bo nyid dang 'phags pa nyid kyis kyang //
T09TD4156E:39a-16: khyod kyi nges pa gang zhig bdag la dmigs pa 'di //
T09TD4156E:39a-17: mdza' bo nyid kyis 'dir ni rjes su bsnyad bgyi ste //
T09TD4156E:39a-18: rgol ba gzhan min 'dir ni bdag gis smra bar bgyi //
T09TD4156E:39a-19: bdag gis rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnam rig nas //
T09TD4156E:39a-20: thar pa 'dod pas chos 'di rab tu thob pa ste //
T09TD4156E:39a-21: gnyen 'dun dga' pa mchi ma'i gdong ldan rnams spangs nas //
T09TD4156E:39a-22: mi dge'i rgyur gyur 'dod pa rnams ni sngon nyid do //
T09TD4156E:39a-23: bdag ni yul rnams dag la ji ltar 'jigs pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:39a-24: de ltar sgrul gyi dug rnams la ni mi 'jigs shing //
T09TD4156E:39a-25: nam mkha' dag las 'phos pa'i thog rnams las min la //
T09TD4156E:39a-26: rlung dang bcas pa'i me rnams dag las ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:39a-27: mi rtag 'dod pa rnams kyis dge ba'i nor rku zhing //
T09TD4156E:39a-28: stong pa rmi lam sgyu ma dang mtshungs 'jig rten na //
T09TD4156E:39a-29: yid la smos pa yis kyang rmongs par byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:39a-30: mi yi sems ni bdag nyid gnas pa smos ci 'tshal //
T09TD4156E:39a-31: kye ma 'dod pas zil gyis non na mtho ris su //
T09TD4156E:39a-32: bde ba thob min 'chi ba'i 'jig rten na smos ci //
T09TD4156E:39a-33: rlung grogs ldan pa'i me yis bud shing gis ji ltar //
T09TD4156E:39a-34: sred dang bcas pa'i 'dod pa rnams kyis tshim pa med //
T09TD4156E:39a-35: 'gro na 'dod pa rnams dang mnyam pa'i don med med //
T09TD4156E:39a-36: rmongs las de rnams kho nar skye bo rab tu chags //
T09TD4156E:39a-37: de nyid shes nas de ltar don med 'jigs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:39b-0: shes ldan su zhig rang gis don @39b med mngon par 'dod //
T09TD4156E:39b-1: rgya mtsho'i gos can sa ni kun nas thob nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:39b-2: rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol rgal bar 'dod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:39b-3: rgya mtsho'i chu bo rnams dang chu bran rnams kyis ltar //
T09TD4156E:39b-4: 'jig rten pa yi 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med //
T09TD4156E:39b-5: lha yis gser gyi char pa dag kyang phab gyur la //
T09TD4156E:39b-6: gling rnams bzhi po mtha' dag la yang longs spyad de //
T09TD4156E:39b-7: brgya byin gyi yang gdan phyed dag kyang rab thob nas //
T09TD4156E:39b-8: nga las nu ni yul rnams dag la ngoms pa med //
T09TD4156E:39b-9: lhan lha rnams kyi yang rgyal srid longs spyad nas //
T09TD4156E:39b-10: mchod sbyin brgya pa lha min 'jigs las rab nyams tshe //
T09TD4156E:39b-11: rgyags las drang srong chen po rnams la'ang khur bcom nas //
T09TD4156E:39b-12: 'dod pa rnams la ngoms med sgra med lhung bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:39b-13: ae la'i rgyal pos mtho ris rnams ni rnam dkrugs te //
T09TD4156E:39b-14: brla mdzes lha mo de nyid dbang du blangs nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:39b-15: sred phyir drang srong rnams las gser dag phrogs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:39b-16: yul rnams la ni ngoms med nyams par song bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:39b-17: lha min las ni dbang chen dbang chen las dgra med //
T09TD4156E:39b-18: dgra med las slar dbang chen gang du nyer song ste //
T09TD4156E:39b-19: mtho ris dang ni sa 'am yul ni de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:39b-20: bskal ba'i tshogs 'khrugs rnams la su zhing /
T09TD4156E:39b-22: shing shun gos can rtsa ba 'bras bu chu za zhing //
T09TD4156E:39b-23: lag 'gro'i sbrul ltar ring ba'i ral ba'i khur rnams kyang //
T09TD4156E:39b-24: gang gis don gzhan ma yin thub pa yang nyams te //
T09TD4156E:39b-25: 'dod pa zhes bya'i dgra bo rnams ni su yis tshol //
T09TD4156E:39b-26: rno ba'i mtshon cha dang ni rno 'dzin mtshon cha yang //
T09TD4156E:39b-27: gang gi don du 'jigs sde las ni 'chi thob la //
T09TD4156E:39b-28: de dag rnams kyi dge min sems kyang spyod rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:39b-29: 'joms phyir de phyir brtul zhugs rnams kyis smos ci dgos //
T09TD4156E:39b-30: yul rnams su ni mya ngan nyung ngur shes gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:39b-31: kun nas sbyor zhing mchog tu ngoms pa med pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:39b-32: dam pa rnams kyis smod cing nges par sdig pa ste //
T09TD4156E:39b-33: 'dod pa'i mig can dug ni su yis len par byed //
T09TD4156E:39b-34: zhing gi las la sogs pa rnams kyis nyam thag cing //
T09TD4156E:39b-35: 'dod pa rnams la mi tshar rnams kyi rang gnas dang //
T09TD4156E:39b-36: 'dod pa'i bdag nyid rnams kyi rang gnas thob nas ni //
T09TD4156E:39b-37: 'dod pa rnams ni spong bar sems ldan rnams kyis nus //
T09TD4156E:40a-1: 'dod pa rnams su rgyags pa nyer 'thob phyir //
T09TD4156E:40a-2: 'dod pa can la 'dod 'byor rgud pa shes bya ste //
T09TD4156E:40a-3: rgyags las bya ba min byed bya ba ma yin la //
T09TD4156E:40a-4: gang gis zad cing ngan 'gror nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:40a-5: gang la 'bad pas thob cing yongs su bskyangs pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:40a-6: rnam par bslus nas slar yang so sor 'gro ba ste //
T09TD4156E:40a-7: bdag nyid ldan pas g-yar po dang mtshungs de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40a-8: 'dod pa rnams la 'di na mkhas pa su zhig dga' //
T09TD4156E:40a-9: btsal nas dang ni blangs nas skom pa skyes pa yin //
T09TD4156E:40a-10: gang rnams mi 'dod sdug bsngal bar ni yongs 'gro la //
T09TD4156E:40a-11: 'jig rten dag na rtsva sgron dang mtshungs de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40a-12: 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su mi dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:40a-13: dga' ldan min pa'i snying la gang gis rnam rmugs te //
T09TD4156E:40a-14: rnam par nyams par 'gro 'gyur bde bar 'gro min zhing //
T09TD4156E:40a-15: kun nas khros pa'i sbrul dang rab mtshungs de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40a-16: 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:40a-17: ltogs pas nyam thag khyi bzhin rus pa zos nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:40a-18: gang rnams la ni ngoms par 'gyur pa ma yin nyid //
T09TD4156E:40a-19: 'khogs pa'i nus pa'i keng rus dang mnyam de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40a-20: 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:40a-21: gang gi rgyal po rkun po chu dang me rnams las //
T09TD4156E:40a-22: thun mong gyur pa nyid phyir sdug bsngal sred byed de //
T09TD4156E:40a-23: rab tu gtor ba'i sha dang mtshungs bde rnam su //
T09TD4156E:40a-24: 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:40a-25: dgra bo dang ni gnyen 'dun 'brel pa rnams las kyang //
T09TD4156E:40a-26: gang la gnas pa rnams ni skyen par rgud pa ste //
T09TD4156E:40a-27: skye mched dang mtshungs nye bar 'tshe ba de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40a-28: 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:40a-29: ri dang nags dang chu dang rgya mtsho rnams su yang //
T09TD4156E:40a-30: gang la rnam par 'phyo ba rnams ni lhung 'gyur te //
T09TD4156E:40a-31: ljon shing rtse mo'i 'bras bu dang mtshungs de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40a-32: 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin /
T09TD4156E:40a-34: // rnam pa sna tshogs 'bad pa drag po 'thob pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:40a-35: gang gis skad cig gis 'dir nyams par 'gyur ba ste //
T09TD4156E:40a-36: rmi lam nye bar longs spyod dang mtshungs de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40b-0: 'dod pa rnams la sems @40b ldan su yi dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:40b-1: gang rnams bsgrubs nas dang ni rnam par spel nas dang //
T09TD4156E:40b-2: yongs su bskyangs nas dang ni bde bar 'gro min la //
T09TD4156E:40b-3: lci ba'i me ma mur dang rab mtshungs de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40b-4: 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:40b-5: gtum po long byed bcom brlag pa dang dan da ka / gang gi don du sgra ngan rnams ni nyams gyur la //
T09TD4156E:40b-6: ro bsregs shing dang rab tu mtshungs pa de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40b-7: 'dod pa rnams la bdag ldan su yi dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:40b-8: lha min mdzes sbyin dang ni nye pa'i mdzes sbyin bdag / gang gi don du phan tshun dgrar song nyams gyur la //
T09TD4156E:40b-9: mdza' bshes gyur cing rnam par 'bral ba de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40b-10: 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:40b-11: gang dag rnams kyi don du chu dang me la dang //
T09TD4156E:40b-12: sha za rnams la bdag nyid 'dir ni 'dor ba ste //
T09TD4156E:40b-13: dge ba ma yin dgra bor gyur pa de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:40b-14: 'dod pa rnams la sems ldan su yi dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:40b-15: bshes med 'dod pa'i don du bkren por byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:40b-16: gsod dang 'ching ba la sogs sdug bsngal rab thob la //
T09TD4156E:40b-17: 'dod pa'i don du sems ni bkren pa'i dka' thub can //
T09TD4156E:40b-18: gson pa'i 'jig rten 'ching ba dang ni ngal bar 'gro //
T09TD4156E:40b-19: ri dags rnams ni gsod phyir glu yis 'phrog byed la //
T09TD4156E:40b-20: gzugs kyi don du phye ma le ba rnams mer mchod zhing //
T09TD4156E:40b-21: sha dag don gnyer nya yis lcags ni za ba ste //
T09TD4156E:40b-22: de phyir yul rnams don med nyid du 'bras bu smin //
T09TD4156E:40b-23: 'dod pa'i longs spyod yin zhes gang gi blo yin la //
T09TD4156E:40b-24: kha cig longs spyod rnams ni yongs su spyod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:40b-25: gos sogs rdzas kyi yon tan yin phyir 'jig rten na //
T09TD4156E:40b-26: sdug bsngal zhi bar byed ces rab tu gzung bar bya //
T09TD4156E:40b-27: skom pa rab tu zhi phyir chu dag 'dod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:40b-28: bkres pa rnam par nyams phyir bza' ba de bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:40b-29: rlung dang gdud ba sgrib pa'i ched du khang pa ste //
T09TD4156E:40b-30: mdoms dang grang bsgrib pa'i phyir ni bgo ba'o //
T09TD4156E:40b-31: de bzhin nyid ni rnam par 'joms phyir gnas yin la //
T09TD4156E:40b-32: de bzhin lam la ngal ba nyams phyir theg pa ste //
T09TD4156E:40b-33: de bzhin gnas ni rnam par sbyong phyir stan yin la //
T09TD4156E:40b-34: gtsang dang nad med stobs la brten phyir khrus yin no //
T09TD4156E:41a-1: pa'i ched du gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:41a-2: de bzhin skye dgu rnams kyi yul nas longs spyod min //
T09TD4156E:41a-3: rab tu zhi ba'i cho gar rab zhugs shes rab can //
T09TD4156E:41a-4: longs spyod rnams ni bza' zhes su yis khas len byed //
T09TD4156E:41a-5: gang zhig 'gro ba'i gdung bas rnam par gdungs pa ni //
T09TD4156E:41a-6: longs spyod yin zhes grang ba'i bya bar nan tan byed //
T09TD4156E:41a-7: sdug bsngal zhi ba'i bdag nyid la ni rab 'jug cing //
T09TD4156E:41a-8: des ni 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod 'du shes byed //
T09TD4156E:41a-9: gang phyir 'dod pa rnams la mtha' gcig gyur min te //
T09TD4156E:41a-10: de phyir bdag gis de la longs spyod 'du shes med //
T09TD4156E:41a-11: dngos po gang nyid kyis ni bde ba ster byed pa //
T09TD4156E:41a-12: de nyid kyis ni slar yang sdug bsngal 'dren par byed //
T09TD4156E:41a-13: bgo ba lci mo dang ni lci ba ma yin nyid //
T09TD4156E:41a-14: grang dang dro ba'i tshe na bde dang bde min la //
T09TD4156E:41a-15: zla 'od rnams dang tsandan nyid kyang dro ba na //
T09TD4156E:41a-16: bde ba'i phyir dang sdug bsngal phyir yin grang ba na'o ;
T09TD4156E:41a-17: / gang phyir rnyed dang ma rnyed la sogs 'jig rten na //
T09TD4156E:41a-18: kun gyi gnyis su 'dzin pa rnams ni rab zhugs te //
T09TD4156E:41a-19: de phyir mtha' gcig bde ba yod pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:41a-20: sa na skyes bu kha cig mtha' gcig sdug bsngal min //
T09TD4156E:41a-21: bde dang sdug bsngal nyid ni rnam par 'dres mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:41a-22: rgyal srid dang ni bran nyid mnyam pa bdag gi lugs //
T09TD4156E:41a-23: rgyal po nyid ni rtag par rgod pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:41a-24: bran ni kun nas gdung ba nyid kyang ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:41a-25: gang phyir mi skyong nyid du bka' lung lhag par gyur //
T09TD4156E:41a-26: de phyir rgyal po'i sdug bsngal dag ni chen po nyid ;
T09TD4156E:41a-27: / kun nas brten pa'i shing dang rab mtshungs rgyal po ni //
T09TD4156E:41a-28: srid pa'i rgyu las yongs su ngal bar 'gro ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:41a-29: rgyal srid 'dor ldan bshes min mang por mi skyong gis //
T09TD4156E:41a-30: gal te blo gtad 'cha' bar gyur na rgud pa ste //
T09TD4156E:41a-31: ci ste yang na blo gtad nye bar byed min na //
T09TD4156E:41a-32: 'dir ni 'jigs ldan rgyal po'i bde ba zhes bya ci //
T09TD4156E:41a-33: gang tshes ni mtha' dag rgyal bar gyur nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:41a-34: gnas pa'i ched du grong khyer gcig pu nyid mthong zhing //
T09TD4156E:41a-35: de nyid la yang pho brang gcig pu bsnyen bya ste //
T09TD4156E:41a-36: rgyal por gyur pa pha rol don du ngal lam ci //
T09TD4156E:41b-0: rgyal po sdod pa'i gnas kyang @41b gnya' shing gcig nyid do //
T09TD4156E:41b-1: de bzhin bkres pa 'gegs phyir bza' ba tsam yin la //
T09TD4156E:41b-2: de bzhin nyal lam gcig dang stan ni gcig nyid de //
T09TD4156E:41b-3: lhag dang lhag min mi skyong gis ni rgyags phyir ro //
T09TD4156E:41b-4: gal te tshim pa'i don du 'bras bu de 'dod na //
T09TD4156E:41b-5: rgyal srid rnams dang bral yang bdag ni tshim pa yod //
T09TD4156E:41b-6: tshim pa yod par gyur na skyes bu'i 'jig rten na //
T09TD4156E:41b-7: khyad par med pa ma yin thams cad khyad par ro //
T09TD4156E:41b-8: de phyir dge dang zhi ba'i lam ni rab thob pa //
T09TD4156E:41b-9: kho bo 'dod pa rnams la slu bya ma yin la //
T09TD4156E:41b-10: mdza' bshes nyid du dran par byas nas yang ngang yang //
T09TD4156E:41b-11: dam bca' nges par skyongs zhes bdag la smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:41b-12: bdag ni nags su zhugs pa mi bzod pas min la //
T09TD4156E:41b-13: dgra bo'i mda' rnams kyis ni mgo bo 'dar ba min //
T09TD4156E:41b-14: 'bras bu lhag pa rnams las re ba byas min te //
T09TD4156E:41b-15: de phyir khyed kyi tshig de bzung ba ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:41b-16: gang zhig yang yang shin tu sos 'debs khros pa'i sbrul //
T09TD4156E:41b-17: spangs nas slar yang len pa la ni nan tan byed //
T09TD4156E:41b-18: yang na sreg pa'i rang bzhin 'bar ba'i rtsva yi me //
T09TD4156E:41b-19: spangs nas 'dod pa rnams ni slar yang de yis brten //
T09TD4156E:41b-20: gang zhig ma long long ba'i phyir ni 'dod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:41b-21: grol ba 'ching ba'i phyir dang phyug po nor med phyir //
T09TD4156E:41b-22: rang bzhin gnas pa'i sems ni bsnyon pa'i sems phyir la //
T09TD4156E:41b-23: yul gyi bdag nyid phyir ni 'dod par de yis byed //
T09TD4156E:41b-24: gang zhig 'dir ni mchog tu zhi ba'i bde ba dang //
T09TD4156E:41b-25: gzhan du sdug bsngal rnams ni kun nas sgrib pa ste //
T09TD4156E:41b-26: byed ldan rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs las sgrol 'dod pa //
T09TD4156E:41b-27: slong mo nye bar rgyu zhes rjes su brtse bya min //
T09TD4156E:41b-28: gang zhig 'dir ni zhi ba'i bde ba 'thob min la //
T09TD4156E:41b-29: gzhan du sdug bsngal rnams kyis rab tu 'dzin byed cing //
T09TD4156E:41b-30: phun tshogs chen po'i bdag nyid la yang rnam gnas pa'i //
T09TD4156E:41b-31: sred pas zil gyis gnon la rjes su brtse bar byas //
T09TD4156E:41b-32: sems pa yi dang spyod pa yi dang rigs nyid kyi /
T09TD4156E:41b-33: khyod kyis brjod pa la ni rjes su mthun pa ste //
T09TD4156E:41b-34: sems pa yi dang spyod pa yi dang rigs nyid kyi //
T09TD4156E:41b-35: kho bo yi yang dam bca' 'dren par mtshungs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:41b-36: bdag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i mda' yis rnam phug pa //
T09TD4156E:41b-37: zhi ba thob par 'dod pas rnam bar nges 'byung ste //
T09TD4156E:42a-2: 'dod pa med na kye ma mi rnams su smos ci //
T09TD4156E:42a-3: mi skyong gang yang sde gsum mtha' dag brten pa ni //
T09TD4156E:42a-4: rab mchog mi yi don zhes khyed kyis bdag la smras //
T09TD4156E:42a-5: de ltar don med ces ni bdag gi bstan pa 'dir //
T09TD4156E:42a-6: mdzad ldan sde tshan gsum ni tshim byed kyang ma yin //
T09TD4156E:42a-7: gang du dga' bar 'gro min 'jigs min nad ma yin //
T09TD4156E:42a-8: skyod min nye bar 'da' min sems kyi nad rnams min //
T09TD4156E:42a-9: gang na yang dang yang du bya ba yod min pa //
T09TD4156E:42a-10: de nyid skyes bu'i don ni mchog tu shes pa'o //
T09TD4156E:42a-11: ji srid na tshod so ma rnam par 'gyur bar 'gro //
T09TD4156E:42a-12: de srid dga' ba yongs su skyongs mdzod zhes smras pa //
T09TD4156E:42a-13: 'di ni nges pa ma yin g-yo bar mthong ba ste //
T09TD4156E:42a-14: rga ba brtan pa min dang lang tsho brtan ldan mthong //
T09TD4156E:42a-15: rang gi las mkhan mthar byed gang gi 'gro ba ni //
T09TD4156E:42a-16: na tshod kun la dbang med rnam par 'gugs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:42a-17: rnam gzhag ma yin rnam par nyams tshe gang ltar ni ;
T09TD4156E:42a-18: / zhi 'dod mkhas pa dag gis dga' ba rtogs par byed //
T09TD4156E:42a-19: gang tshe dga' ba'i gzhu dang nad rnams bkram pa'i mda' //
T09TD4156E:42a-20: mthar byed dge ba ma yin rngon pa bzhin gnas pas //
T09TD4156E:42a-21: skye dgu'i ri dvags bskal pa'i nags brten rnams gtor te //
T09TD4156E:42a-22: na tshod rab mchog la dmigs yid la re ba yi //
T09TD4156E:42a-23: de phyir gzhon nam rgan dang yang na byis pa ni //
T09TD4156E:42a-24: rab tu 'jug par 'dod dam rnam par ldog pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:42a-25: chos ldan bdag nyid byas pa ji lta bar gyur pa //
T09TD4156E:42a-26: de ltar myur ba ldan pas 'dir ni bya bar 'os //
T09TD4156E:42a-27: yang na 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rigs su 'os pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:42a-28: chos phyir mchod sbyin bya ba gyis zhes gang smras pa //
T09TD4156E:42a-29: gang zhig gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bya bas 'dod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:42a-30: mchod sbyin rnams la phyag 'tshal bde ba 'dod pa med //
T09TD4156E:42a-31: 'bras bu 'dod pas dbang med pha rol gsod pa la //
T09TD4156E:42a-32: snying rje'i bdag nyid dam pa rnams kyi rigs tshul min //
T09TD4156E:42a-33: gang yang mchod sbyin dag gi 'bras bu rtag gyur pa //
T09TD4156E:42a-34: snying rje'i bdag nyid gang gis de ltar byas nas ci //
T09TD4156E:42a-35: sems ni zhi ba yis sam tshul khrims brtul zhugs kyis //
T09TD4156E:42a-36: gal te chos tshul gzhan gyi cho ga ma yin la //
T09TD4156E:42a-37: de lta na yang mchod sbyin bsnyen par 'os min te //
T09TD4156E:42a-38: gang du gzhan la 'tshes nas 'bras bur brjod pa'o //
T09TD4156E:42b-0: 'di @42b nyid du yang re zhig skyes bu gnas pa yi //
T09TD4156E:42b-1: bde ba gang zhig pha rol 'tshe bas rab zhugs pa //
T09TD4156E:42b-2: de yang brtse bcas blo dang ldan pa'i 'dod min te //
T09TD4156E:42b-3: gang zhig sred pa'i mtha' mar mi mthong kye ma ci //
T09TD4156E:42b-4: rgyal po 'khor bar bdag gi yid ni dga' med cing //
T09TD4156E:42b-5: 'bras bur rab tu 'jug phyir bdag ni bslu bya min //
T09TD4156E:42b-6: chu 'dzin char gyis brgyab pa'i ljon shing bzhin du ni //
T09TD4156E:42b-7: kun du song ba'i rab tu 'jug pa rnams ni g-yo //
T09TD4156E:42b-8: rnam par thar pa smra ldan rtsibs phur thub pa ni //
T09TD4156E:42b-9: blta bar 'dod pas bdag ni 'dir yongs de yi phyir //
T09TD4156E:42b-10: mi skyong khong la dge bar gyur cig de ni 'gro //
T09TD4156E:42b-11: bdag gi de nyid ltos med dag ni bzod par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:42b-12: lha na dbang po bzhin srungs rtag par nyi bzhin srungs //
T09TD4156E:42b-13: yon tan gyis srungs sa srungs 'dir ni dge legs srungs //
T09TD4156E:42b-14: tshe srungs 'phags pa yis srungs dam pa'i bu rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:42b-15: dpal srungs rgyal po'i bdag nyid kyis ni chos srungs shig / kha ba'i dgra yi rdeg las skyes pa las skyes nas //
T09TD4156E:42b-16: ji ltar gnyis skyes gang zhig lus ni rnam thar 'gro //
T09TD4156E:42b-17: kha ba'i dgra yi dgra yis khyim gyi dgra 'joms nang //
T09TD4156E:42b-18: nang du de ltar gang zhig yid ni rnam par thar gshegs mdzod //
T09TD4156E:42b-19: thal mo dang bcas re thob mi skyong gis smras pa //
T09TD4156E:42b-20: khyed kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bgegs med thob par shog / bya ba byas pa kun nas thob ba dus su 'dir //
T09TD4156E:42b-21: kho bo yi yang rjes su 'dzin pa khyed kyis mdzad pa'o //
T09TD4156E:42b-22: de ltar gyur zhes brtan pa'i dam bca' mdzad nas sa skyong la //
T09TD4156E:42b-23: de nas de ni thams cad sgrol gyi dka' thub gnas su gshegs //
T09TD4156E:42b-24: yongs su gshegs pa de mthong nas kyang ya mtshan gyur pa yi //
T09TD4156E:42b-25: mi skyong nyid kyang ri yi tshogs kyi grong khyer nyid du song //
T09TD4156E:42b-26: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:42b-27: 'dod pa la rnam par smod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T09TD4156E:42b-29: // / de nas lus kyis gang ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:42b-30: bu ram shing ba'i zla ba yis //
T09TD4156E:42b-31: zhi bar gnas ba'i thub pa yis //
T09TD4156E:42b-32: rtsibs 'phur gyis ni gnas su bsnyen //
T09TD4156E:42b-33: sgyu rtsal shes kyi rigs de yis //
T09TD4156E:42b-34: rgyang nas gzigs nas mthon po yis //
T09TD4156E:42b-35: legs par 'ongs zhes smras pa ste //
T09TD4156E:42b-36: drung du nye bar gshegs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:42b-37: de gnyis phan tshun rigs par ni //
T09TD4156E:43a-0: @43a * // khams ni snyoms par dris nas su //
T09TD4156E:43a-1: shing gtsang brtul zhugs gdan dag la //
T09TD4156E:43a-2: sa phyogs gtsang bar bzhugs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:43a-3: bkur mang rnam par yangs pa yis //
T09TD4156E:43a-4: lta byed dag gis 'thung ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:43a-5: mi skyong sras po bzhugs de la //
T09TD4156E:43a-6: thub pa mchog des smras ba'o //
T09TD4156E:43a-7: zhi ba bdag gi shes pa ltar //
T09TD4156E:43a-9: gnyis 'thung rgyags pas zhags pa ltar //
T09TD4156E:43a-10: brtse ba'i zhags pa bcad nas 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:43a-11: khyod kyi yid ni shes rab dang //
T09TD4156E:43a-12: kun nas brtan pa ldan pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:43a-13: dug gi ljon ba'i 'bras bu bzhin //
T09TD4156E:43a-14: gang khyod dpal dor nas 'ongs so //
T09TD4156E:43a-15: longs spyad lhag ma'i phreng ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:43a-16: bu rnams dag la dpal byin nas //
T09TD4156E:43a-17: sa skyong 'khogs pa'i na tshod rnams //
T09TD4156E:43a-18: gang zhig nags 'ongs ngo mtshar min //
T09TD4156E:43a-19: bdag gi lugs ni ngo mtshar te //
T09TD4156E:43a-20: so ma'i na tshod la khyod kyis //
T09TD4156E:43a-21: yul gyi spyod yul la gnas pa //
T09TD4156E:43a-22: dpal nyid longs ma spyad nas 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:43a-23: de phyir chos 'di shes pa la //
T09TD4156E:43a-24: khyod ni dam pa'i snod yin la //
T09TD4156E:43a-25: ye shes gru po byin brlabs nas //
T09TD4156E:43a-26: skyen par sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sgrol //
T09TD4156E:43a-27: gang yang slob mar shes pa na //
T09TD4156E:43a-28: dus kyis bstan bcos la 'jug ste //
T09TD4156E:43a-29: zab pa las dang nan tan las //
T09TD4156E:43a-30: bdag gi yongs rtog khyod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:43a-31: de ltar rtsibs 'phur nyid kyi tshig / mi yi drang srong nges gsan nas //
T09TD4156E:43a-32: mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa yis //
T09TD4156E:43a-33: lan gnyis rab tu smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:43a-34: don ma byas kyang 'di yi ni //
T09TD4156E:43a-35: don byas bzhin du da lta nyid //
T09TD4156E:43a-36: chags dang bral ba gang 'di ni //
T09TD4156E:43a-37: dam pa khyed kyi mngon du gyur //
T09TD4156E:43a-39: sgrol bar 'dod pas gru bzhin dang //
T09TD4156E:43a-40: gro bar 'dod pas lam mkhan bzhin //
T09TD4156E:43a-41: khyed mthong ba la bdag gis shes //
T09TD4156E:43a-43: gal te gsung byar dgongs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:43a-45: de ltar rtsibs 'phur gyis gzhon nu'i ;
T09TD4156E:43a-46: / bdag nyid che las bskul ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:43a-47: rang nyid kyi ni bstan bcos kyi //
T09TD4156E:43a-48: nges par mdor bsdus gsungs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:43a-49: ji ltar 'khor ba yin pa la //
T09TD4156E:43a-50: ji ltar nges par ldog pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:43a-51: nyan pa rnams kyi mchog grub mtha' //
T09TD4156E:43a-52: kho bo'i 'di ni gson mdzod cig / rang bzhin dang ni rnam 'gyur dang //
T09TD4156E:43b-0: @43b skye dang 'chi dang rga ba ste //
T09TD4156E:43b-1: re zhig sems pa zhes brjod pa //
T09TD4156E:43b-2: brtan pa'i sems pa de shes mdzod //
T09TD4156E:43b-3: de la rang bzhin shes bya ba //
T09TD4156E:43b-4: rang bzhin shes ba shes par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:43b-5: 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid dang //
T09TD4156E:43b-6: blo dang mi gsal ba nyid do //
T09TD4156E:43b-7: rnam 'gyur zhes bya mkhyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:43b-8: yul rnams dang ni dbang po rnams //
T09TD4156E:43b-9: lag pa rkang pa dag dang ni //
T09TD4156E:43b-10: 'phongs dang mdoms dang de bzhin yid //
T09TD4156E:43b-11: 'di yi zhing ni shes pa la //
T09TD4156E:43b-12: zhing shes pa zhes bya ba ste //
T09TD4156E:43b-13: zhing shes pa zhes bdag nyid du //
T09TD4156E:43b-14: bdag tu bsam byed rnams kyis smras //
T09TD4156E:43b-15: slob ma dang bcas ser skya yis //
T09TD4156E:43b-16: 'di ni rab tu rtogs zhes dran //
T09TD4156E:43b-17: bu dang bcas pa'i rtogs pa yang //
T09TD4156E:43b-18: skye dgu'i bdag por 'di brjod do //
T09TD4156E:43b-19: skye ba nyid dang rga ba dang //
T09TD4156E:43b-20: na ba dang ni 'chi ba dang //
T09TD4156E:43b-21: de ni gsal zhes rtogs bya ste //
T09TD4156E:43b-22: bzlog las mi gsal ba yang do //
T09TD4156E:43b-23: mi shes pa dang las dang srid //
T09TD4156E:43b-24: 'khor ba'i rgyu rnams shes bya ste //
T09TD4156E:43b-26: snying stobs de ni 'da' ba med //
T09TD4156E:43b-27: log pa las dang ngar 'dzin las //
T09TD4156E:43b-28: the tshom las dang mngon 'phyo las //
T09TD4156E:43b-29: khyad par med las thabs min las //
T09TD4156E:43b-30: chags pa las dang mngon lhung las //
T09TD4156E:43b-31: de la log pa zhes bya ba //
T09TD4156E:43b-32: phyin ci log tu 'jug pa ste ;
T09TD4156E:43b-33: / bsam par bya ba gzhan sems shing //
T09TD4156E:43b-34: bya ba gzhan ni byed pa'o //
T09TD4156E:43b-35: smra ba dang rig pa dang //
T09TD4156E:43b-36: 'gro ba nga dang gnas pa nga //
T09TD4156E:43b-39: gang zhig the tshom med dngos rnams //
T09TD4156E:43b-40: gcig tu gyur pas mthong ba ste //
T09TD4156E:43b-41: the tshom med pas 'jim gong ltar //
T09TD4156E:43b-42: de 'dir the tshom du brjod do //
T09TD4156E:43b-43: gang zhig nga nyid de nyid 'di //
T09TD4156E:43b-44: yin dang blo dang las yin la //
T09TD4156E:43b-45: gang zhig drangs te de nyid nga //
T09TD4156E:43b-46: zhes gang de ni mngon par 'phyo //
T09TD4156E:43b-47: rab rgyas rab rgyas ma yin pa'i //
T09TD4156E:43b-48: khyad par med pa'i khyad shes kye //
T09TD4156E:43b-49: rang bzhin rnams kyis gang shes pa ;
T09TD4156E:43b-50: / de ni khyad par med ces dran //
T09TD4156E:43b-52: bsang gtor dang ni mngon 'thor sogs //
T09TD4156E:43b-53: thabs min zhes ni shes ldan gyis //
T09TD4156E:43b-54: rab tu rtogs bya thabs shes kyi //
T09TD4156E:43b-55: chags pa mi skye yul rnams la //
T09TD4156E:43b-56: yid ngag blo dang las rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:44a-2: de ni mngon par chags zhes dran //
T09TD4156E:44a-4: gang zhig sdug bsngal mngon snyam ste //
T09TD4156E:44a-5: gang zhig 'khor bar lhung shes bya //
T09TD4156E:44a-6: de ltar mkhas skye ma rig pa //
T09TD4156E:44a-7: gnas skabs lnga ni rab thob ste //
T09TD4156E:44a-8: mun pa rmongs pa rmongs pa che //
T09TD4156E:44a-9: mun las gyur pa gnyis nyid do //
T09TD4156E:44a-10: de la mun pa le lor dang //
T09TD4156E:44a-11: rmongs pa skye 'chir rtogs par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:44a-12: rmongs pa chen po 'dod pa zhes //
T09TD4156E:44a-13: kun nas rmongs med mkhyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:44a-15: chen por yang ni rab rmongs byed //
T09TD4156E:44a-16: de phyir phyag chen 'di dag ni //
T09TD4156E:44a-17: rmongs pa chen po zhes dran no //
T09TD4156E:44a-18: mun las gyur pa khro nyid du //
T09TD4156E:44a-19: lhag par byed pa'o khro med kyis //
T09TD4156E:44a-20: mi shes mun las gyur pa ni //
T09TD4156E:44a-21: skyo bar rab bshad skyo med kye //
T09TD4156E:44a-23: gnas skabs lnga dang ldan pa ste //
T09TD4156E:44a-24: 'khor bar sdug bsngal gyur pa yi /
T09TD4156E:44a-25: skye ba rnams su 'bab par byed //
T09TD4156E:44a-26: lta bo nyan po shes pa po //
T09TD4156E:44a-27: bya ba dang ni rgyu nyid dag / da zhes de ltar 'ongs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:44a-30: skye ba'i rgyun la rab tu 'jug / rgyu med pa las 'bras bu med //
T09TD4156E:44a-31: de ltar rnam par shes par 'os ;
T09TD4156E:44a-32: / de la rgyun rab rab rgyas mig / gsal ba dang ni mi gsal nyid //
T09TD4156E:44a-33: thar pa 'dod pa bzhin rnams te //
T09TD4156E:44a-34: yang dag 'gro ba rigs par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:44a-35: bzhi po de dag ji lta bzhin //
T09TD4156E:44a-37: de phyir 'jig rten na tshangs pa //
T09TD4156E:44a-38: mchog tu tshangs par smra ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:44a-39: tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyod byed 'dir //
T09TD4156E:44a-40: tshangs pa rnams kyis gnas par byed //
T09TD4156E:44a-41: mi skyod sras kyis thub pa de'i //
T09TD4156E:44a-42: tshig 'di de ltar gsan nas ni //
T09TD4156E:44a-43: mthar thug go 'phang nyid dang ni //
T09TD4156E:44a-44: thabs mngon pa dag dran pa'o //
T09TD4156E:44a-45: ji ltar ji srid gang du ni //
T09TD4156E:44a-46: tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di spyad cing //
T09TD4156E:44a-47: chos 'di yis ni mthar thug pa //
T09TD4156E:44a-48: khyod kyis rnam par bshad par 'os //
T09TD4156E:44a-49: de ltar thub pas bstan bcos ltar //
T09TD4156E:44a-50: rnam gsal don ni mdor bsdus pas //
T09TD4156E:44a-51: cho ga'i rtog pa gzhan nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:44a-52: chos de de la smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:44a-53: 'dis ni dang por khyim spangs nas //
T09TD4156E:44b-0: slong mo'i @44b rtags ni bsten pa ste //
T09TD4156E:44b-1: phrin las rnam par rgyas pa yi //
T09TD4156E:44b-2: tshul khrims blangs nas 'jug par byed //
T09TD4156E:44b-3: byed ldan rtsod med bstan bcos rig / mchog tu tshim pa la gnas nas //
T09TD4156E:44b-4: gang dang de yis gang dang der //
T09TD4156E:44b-5: rnam dben gnas ni bsten pa'o //
T09TD4156E:44b-6: de nas chags las 'jigs mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:44b-7: chags pa med las mchog zhi yang //
T09TD4156E:44b-8: dbang po'i grong ni nges bzung ste //
T09TD4156E:44b-9: yid la zhi ni 'bad pa byed //
T09TD4156E:44b-10: de nas 'dod pa rnams las dang //
T09TD4156E:44b-11: gnod sems sogs las rnam dben nyid //
T09TD4156E:44b-12: bsam gtan dang po rnam dpyod ldan //
T09TD4156E:44b-13: rnam par dben pa las skyes thob //
T09TD4156E:44b-14: bsam gtan bde ba de thob nas //
T09TD4156E:44b-15: de dang de nyid rnam dpyod cing //
T09TD4156E:44b-16: sngar med bde ba thob pa yis //
T09TD4156E:44b-17: byis pa'i skye bo 'phrog par byed //
T09TD4156E:44b-18: 'dod dang sdang ba rnam smad ba'i //
T09TD4156E:44b-20: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten thob pa ste //
T09TD4156E:44b-21: yongs su tshim pas gnas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:44b-22: rnam dpyod yid ni skyong byed rnams //
T09TD4156E:44b-23: mkhas par rnam par shes nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:44b-24: de las rnam par grol ba ni //
T09TD4156E:44b-25: bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ldan thob //
T09TD4156E:44b-26: gang zhig khyad par ma mthong zhing //
T09TD4156E:44b-27: dga' ba de yis phrogs pa de //
T09TD4156E:44b-28: 'od gsal ba yi lha rnams su //
T09TD4156E:44b-30: gang yang dga' pa'i bde de las //
T09TD4156E:44b-31: yid ni rnam par dben byed pa //
T09TD4156E:44b-32: dga' ba'i bde ba dang bral ba //
T09TD4156E:44b-33: bsam gtan gsum pa thob par byed //
T09TD4156E:44b-35: gang zhig chags min btang snyoms shing //
T09TD4156E:44b-36: bde dang sdug bsngal rnam spangs pa'i //
T09TD4156E:44b-37: bsam gtan bzhi pa thob par byed ;
T09TD4156E:44b-38: / bde dang sdug bsngal zhi phyir dang //
T09TD4156E:44b-39: sems kyi bya ba med pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:44b-40: thar zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis //
T09TD4156E:44b-41: der yang kha cig 'bad ba byed //
T09TD4156E:44b-42: bsam gtan de yi 'bras bu ni //
T09TD4156E:44b-43: 'bras bu che bas lhas mnyam par //
T09TD4156E:44b-44: longs spyod shes rab che rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:44b-45: chen po'i dus su smra ba'o //
T09TD4156E:44b-46: ting 'dzin de las rnams langs shing //
T09TD4156E:44b-47: lus skyes skyon rnams mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:44b-48: lus las rnam par ldog pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:44b-49: shes ldan bsam gtan la 'jog go //
T09TD4156E:44b-50: de nas bsam gtan de bor nas //
T09TD4156E:44b-51: khyad par la ni nges byas pa'i //
T09TD4156E:44b-52: shes rab ldan de 'dod las bzhin //
T09TD4156E:45a-2: lus 'di la ni kha gang du //
T09TD4156E:45a-3: de la yongs su rtog pa ste //
T09TD4156E:45a-4: de nas rdzas sdug rnams la yang //
T09TD4156E:45a-5: nam mkhar lhag par mos par byed //
T09TD4156E:45a-6: nam mkhar song ba'i bdag nyid du //
T09TD4156E:45a-7: bsdus nas gzhan du blo ldan gyis //
T09TD4156E:45a-8: de nyid mtha' med par mthong zhing ;
T09TD4156E:45a-10: nang na mkhas pa gzhan dag ni //
T09TD4156E:45a-11: bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis bzlog nas //
T09TD4156E:45a-12: ci yang med ces mthong ba ni //
T09TD4156E:45a-13: ci yang med pa zhes dran no //
T09TD4156E:45a-14: de nas gur nas bya bzhin dang //
T09TD4156E:45a-15: gong bu dag nas srin pa la bzhin //
T09TD4156E:45a-16: zhing shes lus las 'thon pa las //
T09TD4156E:45a-17: thar pa zhes ni mngon par brjod //
T09TD4156E:45a-18: de nyid shes pa'i mkhas pa yis //
T09TD4156E:45a-19: gang zhig thar pa zhes brjod pa //
T09TD4156E:45a-20: 'di de tshangs pa dam pa ste //
T09TD4156E:45a-21: rtags med rtag cing 'gyur ba med //
T09TD4156E:45a-22: de ltar thabs dang thar pa dag / bdag gis khyod la bstan pa ste //
T09TD4156E:45a-23: gal te shes shing gal te srid //
T09TD4156E:45a-24: ji lta ba bzhin rtogs par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:45a-25: rgyal 'dod bu dang skyed byed dang //
T09TD4156E:45a-26: gzhan mi 'bral ba rgan po dang //
T09TD4156E:45a-27: thar pa 'dod pa gzhan rnams kyang //
T09TD4156E:45a-29: de yi dam pa'i tshig 'di dang //
T09TD4156E:45a-30: rnam par dpyod pa yang bzung nas //
T09TD4156E:45a-31: sngon du rgyu yi stobs thob pas //
T09TD4156E:45a-32: lan ni smras par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:45a-33: gong nas gong du zhi ba yi //
T09TD4156E:45a-34: ye shes phra mo 'di thos shing //
T09TD4156E:45a-35: zhing shes yongs su ma btang phyir //
T09TD4156E:45a-36: de ni mthar thug min par go //
T09TD4156E:45a-37: rnam gyur dang ni rang bzhin las //
T09TD4156E:45a-38: zhing shes grol bar kho bo yis //
T09TD4156E:45a-39: rab tu skye ba'i chos su dang //
T09TD4156E:45a-40: sa bon chos su snyam pa'o //
T09TD4156E:45a-41: gang yang rnam dag bdag nyid ni //
T09TD4156E:45a-42: nges par thar zhes rtog pa ste //
T09TD4156E:45a-43: slar yang rkyen dag yod pa las //
T09TD4156E:45a-44: de ni grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
T09TD4156E:45a-45: ji ltar dus sbyor sa dang chu //
T09TD4156E:45a-46: me las sa bon skye ma yin //
T09TD4156E:45a-47: de bzhin rkyen ni de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:45a-48: skye ba de yang bdag gi lugs //
T09TD4156E:45a-49: gang zhig mi shes las sred rnams //
T09TD4156E:45a-50: spangs las thar pa rtogs byed pa //
T09TD4156E:45a-51: de ni mchog tu yongs spong ba //
T09TD4156E:45a-52: bdag yod gyur na yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:45a-53: spangs nas spangs nas gsum po 'di //
T09TD4156E:45a-54: khyad par du yang nyer 'thob cing //
T09TD4156E:45a-55: gang du bdag ni gnas gyur pa //
T09TD4156E:45a-57: skyon rnams phra ba nyid las dang //
T09TD4156E:45b-0: sems kyi bya ba med las @45b dang ;
T09TD4156E:45b-1: / tshe ni ring pa nyid las kyang //
T09TD4156E:45b-2: thar par kyang ni yongs su rtog / ngar 'dzin par ni yongs spong bar //
T09TD4156E:45b-3: gang de yongs su rtog byed la //
T09TD4156E:45b-4: bdag spyod gyur nas ngar 'dzin pa //
T09TD4156E:45b-5: yongs su spong ba yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:45b-6: drang srong rnams kyis ma spangs pa //
T09TD4156E:45b-7: 'di ni yon tan med ma yin //
T09TD4156E:45b-8: de phyir yon tan med gyur na //
T09TD4156E:45b-9: 'di yi thar par mi brjod do //
T09TD4156E:45b-10: yon tan can gyis yon tan gyi //
T09TD4156E:45b-11: ldog pa yod pa ma yin te //
T09TD4156E:45b-12: gzugs dang 'gro ba dang bral ba'i //
T09TD4156E:45b-13: me ni nye bar 'thob ma yin //
T09TD4156E:45b-14: lus las sngon du lus can dang //
T09TD4156E:45b-15: yon tan las sngar yon tan can //
T09TD4156E:45b-16: ma yin de phyir dang por grol //
T09TD4156E:45b-17: lus bzhin slar yang 'ching bar byed //
T09TD4156E:45b-18: zhing shes lus dang ma bral ba //
T09TD4156E:45b-19: shes pa yin nam shes min nyid //
T09TD4156E:45b-20: gal te shes 'di shes bya yod //
T09TD4156E:45b-21: shes bya yod na mi grol lo //
T09TD4156E:45b-22: ci ste khyod la shes mi 'grub //
T09TD4156E:45b-23: bdag tu rtog pas ci zhig bya //
T09TD4156E:45b-24: bdag dang bral yang shes pa ni //
T09TD4156E:45b-25: rab grub shing dang rtsig pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:45b-26: gang phyir gong nas gong du ni //
T09TD4156E:45b-27: de ltar rtsibs 'phur gyi ni chos //
T09TD4156E:45b-28: mkhyen nas de ni ma tshim zhing //
T09TD4156E:45b-29: mtha' dag min zhes shes nas su //
T09TD4156E:45b-30: de nas so sor gshegs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:45b-31: de nas khyad par chos 'dod pa //
T09TD4156E:45b-32: lhag spyod kyi ni gnas su gshegs //
T09TD4156E:45b-33: de yi bdag tu 'dzin las kyang //
T09TD4156E:45b-34: des ni lta bar sred ma gyur ;
T09TD4156E:45b-36: thub pa lhag spyod kyis shes nas //
T09TD4156E:45b-38: cung zad med las gzhan 'gro thob //
T09TD4156E:45b-39: gang phyir dmigs pa phra mo ni //
T09TD4156E:45b-42: de phyir der ni re 'dod min //
T09TD4156E:45b-43: gang phyir der ni blo gnas shing //
T09TD4156E:45b-44: gzhan du rab tu rgyu pa med //
T09TD4156E:45b-45: phra zhing rno ldan de phyir der //
T09TD4156E:45b-47: de phyir de yang rab thob nas //
T09TD4156E:45b-49: byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dod pas //
T09TD4156E:45b-50: de phyir lhag spyod dor ba'o //
T09TD4156E:45b-51: de nas de yi gnas thob nas //
T09TD4156E:45b-52: dge legs don gnyer nges byas nas //
T09TD4156E:45b-53: gang yang rgyal ba'i drang srong gis //
T09TD4156E:45b-54: grong khyer zhes bya'i gnas bsnyen no //
T09TD4156E:45b-56: gtsang mar gtsang zhing pha rol gnon //
T09TD4156E:45b-57: dben pa'i gnas ni mngon 'dod ba'i //
T09TD4156E:45b-58: thub pa yis ni gnas mdzad do //
T09TD4156E:46a-0: de nas de ni sngar brten @46a * //
T09TD4156E:46a-2: / dbang po lnga yi dbang las khengs //
T09TD4156E:46a-3: mun pas bsnyen pa'i brtul zhugs can //
T09TD4156E:46a-4: dge slong lnga rnams des gzigs so //
T09TD4156E:46a-5: bsod nams kyis bsgrubs nor nad med //
T09TD4156E:46a-6: dbang don rnams kyis dbang phyug bzhin //
T09TD4156E:46a-7: dge slong de rnams kyis kyang 'dir //
T09TD4156E:46a-8: de mthong gyur nas nye bar gnas //
T09TD4156E:46a-9: de'i dbang gis gnas slob ma rnams //
T09TD4156E:46a-10: dbang po g-yos pas yid bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:46a-11: rab tu de rnams kyis mchod cing //
T09TD4156E:46a-12: rnam par dul las rjes su 'jug /'chi dang skye ba mthar byed la //
T09TD4156E:46a-13: de nas thabs ni 'di yis zhes //
T09TD4156E:46a-14: bza' ba med par shes pa yis //
T09TD4156E:46a-15: dka' thub gdung ba rnams brtsams so //
T09TD4156E:46a-16: bsmyung gnas cho ga du ma rnams //
T09TD4156E:46a-17: mi yis spyod dka' rnams mdzad cing //
T09TD4156E:46a-18: las ni thob bzhed lo drug tu //
T09TD4156E:46a-19: bdag gi sku lus rig par mdzad //
T09TD4156E:46a-20: pha mtha' med pa'i 'khor ba yi //
T09TD4156E:46a-21: pha rol thob par 'dod pa nges //
T09TD4156E:46a-22: bza' ba'i dus su til dang 'bru//
T09TD4156E:46a-23: rab sha rnams ni re re gsol //
T09TD4156E:46a-24: dka' thub gdung ba des de yi //
T09TD4156E:46a-25: sku las bri bar byas pa gang //
T09TD4156E:46a-26: slar yang de yi gzi brjid kyis //
T09TD4156E:46a-27: sku lus nye bar 'phel byas gyur //
T09TD4156E:46a-28: ston ka'i dkar phyogs dang po yi //
T09TD4156E:46a-29: zla bas ku mu ta rnams bzhin //
T09TD4156E:46a-30: rid kyang dpal grags ring min zhing //
T09TD4156E:46a-31: gzhan gyis mig rnams tshim par mdzad //
T09TD4156E:46a-32: rus lpags lhag ma lhag med par //
T09TD4156E:46a-33: tshil dang sha dang khrag rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:46a-34: zad kyang zab mo ma zad par //
T09TD4156E:46a-35: rgya mtsho bzhin du de mdzes so //
T09TD4156E:46a-36: de nas sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pas //
T09TD4156E:46a-37: ngal dub gdung bas don med bsal //
T09TD4156E:46a-38: nyon mongs lus can thub pa ni ;
T09TD4156E:46a-39: / srid las 'jigs pa blo mdzad do //
T09TD4156E:46a-40: chos 'di chags bral phyir min zhing //
T09TD4156E:46a-41: rtogs phyir ma yin thar phyir min //
T09TD4156E:46a-42: de tshe 'dzam bu'i rtsa bar gang //
T09TD4156E:46a-43: bdag gis thos te nges pa yin //
T09TD4156E:46a-44: 'di ni stobs chung gis thob par //
T09TD4156E:46a-45: nus pa min phyir gus 'ongs shing //
T09TD4156E:46a-46: sku yi stobs ni 'phel don du ;
T09TD4156E:46a-47: / slar yang 'di ni rjes su bsams //
T09TD4156E:46a-48: bkres dang skom pas yongs gtser zhing //
T09TD4156E:46a-49: ngal las rang gnas med pa'i sems //
T09TD4156E:46a-50: yid kyis thob bya'i 'bras bu ni //
T09TD4156E:46a-51: ldog pa med pa gang zhig 'thob //
T09TD4156E:46a-52: rtag par dbang po tshim pa las //
T09TD4156E:46a-53: yang dag gnas pa 'thob pa ste //
T09TD4156E:46b-0: dbang po yang @46b dag tshim nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:46b-1: yid ni rang bzhin gnas pa 'thob //
T09TD4156E:46b-2: dang zhing rab dang yid kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:46b-3: ting 'dzin nye bar skye ba ste //
T09TD4156E:46b-4: ting 'dzin gyis sbyar sems kyi ni //
T09TD4156E:46b-5: bsam gtan sbyor ba rab tu 'jug / bsam gtan rab tu zhugs pa las //
T09TD4156E:46b-6: rnyed dka' zhi zhing dga' med mchog /'chi med go 'phang de chos rnams //
T09TD4156E:46b-7: gang gis thob pa rab thob po //
T09TD4156E:46b-8: de phyir bza' ba rtsa ba ste //
T09TD4156E:46b-9: 'di ni thabs zhes nges pa yin //
T09TD4156E:46b-10: bza' ba byed la brtan pa ni //
T09TD4156E:46b-11: dpag med blo yis blo mdzad nas //
T09TD4156E:46b-13: lag byin 'gram gyi ljon shing ni //
T09TD4156E:46b-14: gus pa yis dud yal ga'i rtses //
T09TD4156E:46b-15: sku lus rid pa dal bus drangs //
T09TD4156E:46b-16: de nas lha rnams kyis bskul ba'i //
T09TD4156E:46b-17: ba lang skyong bdag bu mo ni //
T09TD4156E:46b-18: snying la dga' skyes 'gyur ba yi //
T09TD4156E:46b-19: dga' stobs ma ni der 'ongs so //
T09TD4156E:46b-20: dung dkar gyis 'bar lag pa can //
T09TD4156E:46b-21: la ba sngon po gon pa mo //
T09TD4156E:46b-22: dbu ba dang bcas chu sngon phreng //
T09TD4156E:46b-23: chu mchog ya mu na bzhin no //
T09TD4156E:46b-24: spyan mig autpala rab rgyas shing //
T09TD4156E:46b-25: dad pas 'phel ba'i dga' ma des //
T09TD4156E:46b-26: de la mgo yis rab btud nas //
T09TD4156E:46b-28: des de gsol nas de la ni //
T09TD4156E:46b-29: skye ba'i 'bras bu thob byas nas //
T09TD4156E:46b-30: yang dag dbang po drug tshim ste //
T09TD4156E:46b-31: byang chub 'thob par nus par gyur //
T09TD4156E:46b-32: phul byung rgyas pa'i sku mnga' zhing //
T09TD4156E:46b-33: rang gi grags bcas thub pa ni //
T09TD4156E:46b-34: nus gyur rgya mtsho gnyis dag gis //
T09TD4156E:46b-35: mdzes dang bstan pa gcig pus bzung //
T09TD4156E:46b-36: bdag ni nges par grol ba la //
T09TD4156E:46b-37: blo ldan khams lnga rnams kyis ltar //
T09TD4156E:46b-38: kun nas 'jug ces rnam shes nas //
T09TD4156E:46b-39: dge slong lnga rnams kyis de dor //
T09TD4156E:46b-40: de nas 'bad rtsol gnyis pa ni //
T09TD4156E:46b-41: byang chub ched du nges mdzad de //
T09TD4156E:46b-42: rtsva 'jam bkram pa'i sa gzhi la //
T09TD4156E:46b-43: aa shvad tha yi rtsa bar gshegs //
T09TD4156E:46b-44: de tshe glang po'i 'gros mnga' ba'i //
T09TD4156E:46b-45: dpe med zhabs kyi sgra yis sad par byas pa ni //
T09TD4156E:46b-46: thub pa chen po'i byang chub des par rtogs pa yi //
