T09TD4156E:46b-47: grub mchog nag po zhes byas bstod pa smras par gyur //
T09TD4156E:46b-48: ji ltar thub pa khyod kyis zhabs kyis brdzis pa ni //
T09TD4156E:46b-49: yang nas yang du sa ni sgra skad sgrogs pa 'dra //
T09TD4156E:46b-50: ji ltar khyod kyi 'od ni nyi mar snang ba ste //
T09TD4156E:46b-51: khyod kyis nges par 'dod pa'i go 'phang mkhyen pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:46b-52: ji ltar mkha' la khug rta'i phreng ba rnams bskor zhing //
T09TD4156E:47a-1: spyan mnga' khyed la skor ba byed pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:47a-2: ji ltar mkha' la rlung rnams zhi bar 'gro ba ste //
T09TD4156E:47a-3: khyod kyis nges par de ring sangs rgyas 'gyur ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:47a-4: de nas glu mchog gis ni yang dag bstod pa ni //
T09TD4156E:47a-5: lco ga las ni gtsang ma'i rtsva rnams nyer blangs nas //
T09TD4156E:47a-6: byang chub shing chen rtsa ba dge la rab brtan cing //
T09TD4156E:47a-7: byang chub ched du dam bca' mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:47a-8: de nas gnyid log lto 'phye'i gdengs kas bsdus pa la //
T09TD4156E:47a-9: des ni rdo rje'i skyil krung g-yo med mchog bcings te //
T09TD4156E:47a-10: ji srid bya ba byas pa nyid ni ma thob par //
T09TD4156E:47a-11: de srid sa las gdan de 'byed par mi bgyi'o ;
T09TD4156E:47a-12: / de nas nges pa'i bdag nyid bcom ldan gdan mdzad tshe //
T09TD4156E:47a-13: lha na gnas rnams mnyam med dga' ba thob gyur la //
T09TD4156E:47a-14: ri dags tshogs rnams gnas par ma gyur bya rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:47a-15: rlung gis bsnun pa'i nags kyi ljon shing sgra med gyur //
T09TD4156E:47a-16: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:47a-17: ring 'phur dang lhag spyod kyi drung du gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o /
T09TD4156E:47a-19: // / der ni rnam par thar phyir dam bca' mdzad pa na //
T09TD4156E:47a-20: rgyal po'i rigs las rab 'khrungs drang srong chen po ni //
T09TD4156E:47a-21: der ni nye bar zhugs tshe 'jig rten rab dga' zhing //
T09TD4156E:47a-22: der ni bdud kyang dam pa'i chos kyi dgrar gyur to //
T09TD4156E:47a-23: gang la 'dod pa'i lhar ni 'jig rten na smra ba //
T09TD4156E:47a-24: sna tshogs mtshon cha me tog mda' can de bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:47a-25: 'dod pa rab tu spyod pa'i bdag po de nyid la //
T09TD4156E:47a-26: thar ba'i dgra bo bdud du dpe rjod byed pa'o //
T09TD4156E:47a-27: de yi bu ni rol pa dga' ba rgyags pa dang //
T09TD4156E:47a-28: bu mo dga' ma dges ma sred ma gsum rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:47a-29: de la sems kyi rnam par 'gyur ba dris pa ste //
T09TD4156E:47a-30: des ni de rnams la tshig mngon par smras //
T09TD4156E:47a-31: thub pa 'dis ni nges pa'i go cha rnam bzung zhing //
T09TD4156E:47a-32: sems pa'i mtshon cha blo yi mda' ni bsdogs byas nas //
T09TD4156E:47a-33: bdag cag yul rnams la ni rgyal 'dod bsdad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:47a-34: gang phyir 'dis ni bdag gi yid ni rnam par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:47a-35: gal te 'dis bdag zil gyis mnan nas 'gro ba ste //
T09TD4156E:47a-36: 'jigs pa la yang thar ba'i lam dag 'chad byed cing //
T09TD4156E:47a-37: lus 'phags jo bo spyod las lhung ba'i bzhin du ni //
T09TD4156E:47b-0: de phyir 'di @47b yis bdag gi yul ni de ring stongs //
T09TD4156E:47b-1: de phyir ji srid 'dis ni spyan mig ma thob cing //
T09TD4156E:47b-2: ji srid bdag gi spyod yul dag na gnas pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:47b-3: chu bo shin tu 'phel ba'i shugs kyis zam pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:47b-4: de srid 'di yi brtul zhugs 'joms su 'gro ba'o //
T09TD4156E:47b-5: de nas me tog las byas gzhu ni bzung nas dang //
T09TD4156E:47b-6: kun du rmongs par byed pa'i mda' lnga rnams bzung nas //
T09TD4156E:47b-7: skye dgu rnams kyi yid kyi rang gnas mi byed pa //
T09TD4156E:47b-8: de ni bur bcas aa shvad tha yi rtsa bar song //
T09TD4156E:47b-9: de nas srid pa 'khor ba'i pha rol rgal 'dod pa'i //
T09TD4156E:47b-10: thub pa rab tu zhi bar gdan la bzhugs pa la //
T09TD4156E:47b-11: lag pa g-yas pa mtshon cha'i rtse mor bdungs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:47b-12: mda' yis rol zhing bdud kyis 'di ni smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:47b-13: kye ho rgyal rigs 'chi bas 'jigs pa longs mdzod cig / thar pa'i chos ni spongs la 'jig rten mdzod //
T09TD4156E:47b-14: mda' dang mchod sbyin rnams kyis 'jig rten pham byas nas //
T09TD4156E:47b-15: 'jig rten dag nas dbang po'i go 'phang 'thob par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:47b-16: gang zhig mi dbang snga ma rnams kyis 'drims pa ste //
T09TD4156E:47b-17: nges par 'byung la 'di ni grags pa'i lam yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:47b-18: rgyal po'i drang srong rnams kyang rigs su skyes pa yis //
T09TD4156E:47b-19: slong mo rab thob la ni 'di ni bsngags ma yin //
T09TD4156E:47b-20: ji srid nges pa'i bdag nyid de ring mi ldang ba //
T09TD4156E:47b-21: dam bca' rnam par ma dor brtan par gyur cig dang //
T09TD4156E:47b-22: gang zhig nya dgra s'u rva ka la rnam spangs pa'i //
T09TD4156E:47b-23: de nyid bdag gis mda' 'di 'bar bar byas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:47b-24: 'dis ni cung zhig reg pa tsam gyis ae la de //
T09TD4156E:47b-25: zla ba'i tsha bo yin yang sems med gyur pa ste ;
T09TD4156E:47b-26: / zhi ba'i lus zhes bya ba de yang der 'gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:47b-27: zad pa'i dus su kye ma mi gzhan smos ci dgos //
T09TD4156E:47b-28: de phyir skyen par longs la 'du shes thob gyis dang //
T09TD4156E:47b-29: yang yang shin tu ro myang mda' ni mnan pa ste //
T09TD4156E:47b-30: dga' ma'i byar 'os dga' zhing dges pa rnams la ni //
T09TD4156E:47b-31: gang zhig ngang pa rnams la bzhin du mi 'phen no //
T09TD4156E:47b-32: gang tshe de skad brjod kyang chags pa dang bral ba'i //
T09TD4156E:47b-33: sh'akya thub pas gdan ni bshig pa ma yin nyid //
T09TD4156E:47b-34: de nas 'di la bdud kyis mda' ni 'phangs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:47b-35: bu mo rnams dang bu rnams bdun nas byas nas so //
T09TD4156E:47b-36: der ni de yis mda' ni rab tu 'phangs na yang //
T09TD4156E:48a-0: @48a * // chags par byas pa med cing brtan las g-yos pa med //
T09TD4156E:48a-1: de ltar de mthong gyur nas bdud ni yi mug cing //
T09TD4156E:48a-2: bsam mno yongs su ldan pa dal bus smras par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:48a-3: ri dbang bu mo la dmigs gang gis phug pa yi //
T09TD4156E:48a-4: bde 'byung lha yang yongs su g-yos par gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:48a-5: 'dis ni mda' de nyid la sems bar mi byed pa //
T09TD4156E:48a-6: sems med yin nam mda' 'di de ma yin nam ci //
T09TD4156E:48a-7: de phyir me tog mda' 'di 'os pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:48a-8: dga' ba ma yin dga' bar sbyor ba 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:48a-9: 'di ni zhi ba ma yin 'byung bo'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:48a-10: 'jigs dang bsdigs dang rdeg pa rnams ni 'os pa'o //
T09TD4156E:48a-11: de nas bdud kyis rang gi sde ni dran pa ste //
T09TD4156E:48a-12: sh'akya thub pa'i bgegs ni mnyam por byed 'dod pa //
T09TD4156E:48a-13: ral gri be con shing rtse ljon shing rtse gsum mdung lag rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-14: sna tshogs bsam pa dang ldan rjes su 'brangs rnams 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:48a-15: phag dang nya dang bong bu rnga mo'i gdong can rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-16: stag dang dom dang seng ge gnyis 'thung gdong can rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-17: mig gcig kha ni du ma mgo bo gsum ldan rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-18: gsus pa 'phyad ba rnams dang gsus pa che ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-19: brla rnams pus mo'i bar du bum pa'i bus mo rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-20: mche ba'i mtshon cha rnams dang sen mo'i mtshon cha rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-21: keng rus gdong can rnams dang gzugs ni mang po rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-22: gdong phyed gzhom pa rnams dang gdong ni chen po rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-23: thal skya rnams dang thig le dmar po sna tshogs rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-24: kha tv'am ga rnams dang ni spre'u ltar dud sgra rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-25: 'phongs 'phyang rnams dang glang po'i rna ba'i rna ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-26: pags pa'i gos can rnams dang gos dang bral ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-27: gdong phyed dkar po rnams dang lus phyed ljang gu rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-28: zangs mdog dung mdog rnams dang ljang gu dkar po rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-29: sbrul gyi sham thabs rnams dang de bzhin lag pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-30: rab tu sgra sgrogs dril bu 'khrugs pa'i ske rags rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-31: ta la'i tshad mnyam rnams dang mdung rnams bzung ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-32: byis pa'i tshad mnyam rnams dang mche ba gtsigs pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:48a-33: lug gi gdong can rnams dang bya yi mig can rnams //
T09TD4156E:48b-0: byi la'i gdong can @48b rnams dang mi yi lus can rnams //
T09TD4156E:48b-1: skra bkram rnams dang ral pa can dang byi bo rnams //
T09TD4156E:48b-2: gos dmar rnams dang rnam par 'khrugs pas dkris pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:48b-3: rab dga'i gdong can rnams dang gnyer ma'i gdong can rnams //
T09TD4156E:48b-4: gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams dang yid ni 'phrog pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:48b-5: kha cig dag ni 'pho zhing drag tu phan tshun du //
T09TD4156E:48b-6: mchan khung 'khyud cing de bzhin gzhan rnams mchongs //
T09TD4156E:48b-7: mkha' la 'gro ba rnams ni kha cig rtse ba ste //
T09TD4156E:48b-8: kha cig shing gi rtse mo rnams la zhon pa'o //
T09TD4156E:48b-9: kha cig rtse gsum bskor zhing gar ni byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:48b-10: kha cig dbyug pa gdengs shing thog sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:48b-11: kha cig dga' bas khyu mchog bzhin du skad 'don zhing //
T09TD4156E:48b-12: kha cig lus 'phos rnams las rab tu 'bar bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:48b-13: 'dzin par 'dod pa rnams dang 'joms par 'dod pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:48b-14: jo bo'i bka' ni rab tu skyong bar byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:48b-15: rnam pa de ltar 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nas ni //
T09TD4156E:48b-16: byang chub sems dpa' de la yongs su bskor nas gnas //
T09TD4156E:48b-17: mtshan mo snga ma la ni sh'akya'i khyu mchog dang //
T09TD4156E:48b-18: bdud kyi 'thab mo dus de rab tu mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:48b-19: nam mkha' gsal ba ma yin sa ni g-yos gyur la //
T09TD4156E:48b-20: phyogs rnams sgra dang bcas pa rab tu 'bar bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:48b-21: drag po'i shugs can rlung ni kun du g-yos gyur la //
T09TD4156E:48b-22: skar ma rnams ni mi snang zla ba gsal ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:48b-23: slar yang mtshan mor mun pa rnam par rgyas gyur la //
T09TD4156E:48b-24: rgya mtsho rnams ni thams cad kun du g-yos par gyur //
T09TD4156E:48b-25: sa gzhi 'dzin cing chos dag 'dzin pa'i klu rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:48b-26: thub pa chen po'i bgegs la bzod pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:48b-27: bdud las khros pas rnam par log pa'i mig can rnams //
T09TD4156E:48b-28: rngam pa bton zhing lus ni rnam par 'gyur ba'o //
T09TD4156E:48b-29: gcang mar lhag par gnas pa'i lha yi drang srong ni //
T09TD4156E:48b-30: dam chos bsgrub pa'i don du mngon par zhugs pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:48b-31: bdud las yid kyis rjes su brtse ba byas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:48b-32: chags dang bral ba las kyang khros bar ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:48b-33: 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid bdud kyi dpung ni de yis ni //
T09TD4156E:48b-34: byang chub rtsa ba de ni khyab pa mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:48b-35: chos kyi bdag nyid 'jig rten thar pa 'dod rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:48b-36: nam mkha' dag la h'a h'a'i sgra dag byas par gyur //
T09TD4156E:48b-37: chos kyi cho ga de ni nye bar nyams byed pa //
T09TD4156E:49a-1: gnas pa drang srong chen pos gzigs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:49a-2: ba lang rnams kyi dbus su seng ge gnas pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:49a-3: g-yo 'gul med cing rnam par 'gyur bar yang ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:49a-4: de nas de yi 'jigs pa'i ched du bdud kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:49a-5: 'byung po'i sde ni drag po rnams la bka' stsal zhing //
T09TD4156E:49a-6: de nas 'di yi sde des rang rang mthu rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:49a-7: de yi bstan pa dbye phyir blo gros byas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:49a-8: kha cig lce rnams g-yo zhing du mar rnam 'phyang zhing //
T09TD4156E:49a-9: mche ba'i rtse mo rnams rno mig rnams ljang ser zlum //
T09TD4156E:49a-10: kha rnams gdangs shing phur bu'i rna ba rnams bstan zhing //
T09TD4156E:49a-11: kun nas skrag par byed pa snyam du gnas zhes grag / des ni gzugs dang bsam pa dag gis mi bzad pa //
T09TD4156E:49a-12: rnam pa de dag nyid du gnas pa de rnams las //
T09TD4156E:49a-13: rtsed mo byed pa'i byis pa rgyags pa rnams las ni //
T09TD4156E:49a-14: drang srong chen po zug med skyo bar ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:49a-15: de nas kha cig khros pas lta byed rnam 'gyur zhing //
T09TD4156E:49a-16: 'di la dbyug brdeg par 'bad pa bya ba ste //
T09TD4156E:49a-17: sngon tshe grong khyer 'joms pa'i rdo rje dang bcas ltar //
T09TD4156E:49a-18: de nas 'di yi dbyug pa dang bcas lag pa rengs //
T09TD4156E:49a-19: kha cig rdo dang shing rnams gyen du 'phyar ba ni //
T09TD4156E:49a-20: thub pa la ni rnam par 'phen par ma nus te //
T09TD4156E:49a-21: 'bigs byed ri brags rnams ni rdo rjes bcom pa bzhin ;
T09TD4156E:49a-22: / shing rnams dang bcas rdo rnams bcas pa de bzhin lhung //
T09TD4156E:49a-23: kha cig mkha' la gyen du 'phur bas rdo rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:49a-24: dgra sta rnams dang shing rnams rnam par 'phangs pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:49a-25: kha dog gcig min mtshams sprin rkang pa rnams bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:49a-26: mngon par lhung ba ma yin nam mkhar gnas par gyur ;
T09TD4156E:49a-27: / gzhan ni de yi steng du 'bar ba'i khyu mchog gis //
T09TD4156E:49a-28: glang bu ri bo tsam pa'i rva can 'phangs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:49a-29: de ni 'phangs pa tsam du nam mkhar gnas pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:49a-30: de yi mthu las rnam pa brgyar ni gas par gyur //
T09TD4156E:49a-31: 'jig rten 'jig tshe lhun po rab tu 'bar ba yis //
T09TD4156E:49a-32: gser gyi bya skyibs rnams gyi phye ma rnam bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:49a-33: kha cig nyi ma shar ba bzhin du 'bar ba yi //
T09TD4156E:49a-34: me mdag char pa chen po mkha' las phab par gyur //
T09TD4156E:49a-35: byang chub shing gi rtsa bar rab tu rnam 'phangs pa'i //
T09TD4156E:49a-36: me stag 'phro ba dang bcas me mdag char pa de //
T09TD4156E:49a-37: drang srong dam pa mchog gis byams pa'i gnas pa las //
T09TD4156E:49b-0: @49b autpal dmar po'i 'dab ma'i char par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:49b-1: lus dang sems la rnam par gnod par bya ba'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:49b-2: rnam pa de ltar phab pa de dang de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:49b-3: rang gi nges pa'i gnyen 'dun nye bar 'khyud nas bzhin //
T09TD4156E:49b-4: sh'akya thub pa gdan las g-yos par ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:49b-5: de nas gzhan rnams 'khogs pa'i ljon shing rnams nas ltar //
T09TD4156E:49b-6: kha rnams las ni sbrul rnams rnam par skyugs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:49b-7: sngags kyis bcings bzhin de rnams de yi drung du ni //
T09TD4156E:49b-8: song ba ma yin dbugs min g-yos par ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:49b-9: gzhan rnams glog dang bcas shing thog dang bcas pa yis //
T09TD4156E:49b-10: chu 'dzin chen po gtum pa'i dbyangs ldan rnams gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:49b-11: ljon shing de la rdo ba'i char pa phab pa ste //
T09TD4156E:49b-12: de ni me tog char pa mdzes par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:49b-13: dbang phyug ma yin sron par dkar ba'i mi yi ni //
T09TD4156E:49b-14: snying la yongs su g-yos pa'i khro ba bzhin du ni //
T09TD4156E:49b-15: de nas gzhan gyis gzhu la mda' dag bkang ba ni //
T09TD4156E:49b-16: de nyid du ni 'bar zhing lhung bar ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:49b-17: yul la rab tu 'jug la 'khor ba la 'jigs pa //
T09TD4156E:49b-18: yongs su rtog pa po yi dbang po lnga rnams bzhin //
T09TD4156E:49b-19: gzhan rnams dag gis mda' lnga rab tu 'phangs pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:49b-20: nam mkhar gnas bzhin thub pa la ni ma lhung ngo //
T09TD4156E:49b-21: gzhan ni brdeg par 'dod pas khros shing rab bskor zhing //
T09TD4156E:49b-22: dbyug pa bzung nas drang srong chen po'i mngon du phyogs //
T09TD4156E:49b-23: don med byed pa'i nyes pa rnams la 'jig rten bzhin //
T09TD4156E:49b-24: des ni 'dod pa ma thob dbang med 'gyel bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:49b-25: bud med sprin pa nag mo lag na thod pa can //
T09TD4156E:49b-26: drang srong chen po'i thugs ni rmongs par byed ces grag / g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi blo ni lung la bzhin //
T09TD4156E:49b-27: der ni nges pa med par bskor zhing gnas ma yin //
T09TD4156E:49b-28: kha cig mig ni rab tu 'bar bar byas nas ni //
T09TD4156E:49b-29: mig gi me yis sbrul gyi dug bzhin bsreg 'dod pas //
T09TD4156E:49b-30: 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis nyer gnas dpal bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:49b-31: der ni drang srod bzhugs pa mthong bar ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:49b-32: ye shes ting 'dzin dag gis 'gro bya nyes legs chos //
T09TD4156E:49b-33: lus kyi ngal ba rnams kyis 'thob par 'dod pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:49b-34: de bzhin gzhan ni rdo ba lci mo bteg pa ni //
T09TD4156E:49b-35: rab tu 'bad pa rnam bcom don med ngal bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:49b-36: de bzhin gzhan rnams dred dang seng ge'i rnam pa yis //
T09TD4156E:50a-0: @50a * // chen po'i sgra rnams mthon po rab tu sgrogs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:50a-1: rdo rjes bsnun pa'i nam mkha' 'gas pa zhes snyam nas //
T09TD4156E:50a-2: sems can rnams ni gang gis kun nas 'khums par gyur //
T09TD4156E:50a-3: ri dags glang po rnams ni nyam thag skad 'don zhing //
T09TD4156E:50a-4: rnam par 'bros shing thim pa nyid du gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:50a-5: de yi mtshan mor phyogs rnams las ni nyin mo bzhin //
T09TD4156E:50a-6: nyam thag bya rnams skad 'don yongs su babs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:50a-7: rnam pa de ltar de rnams kyi sgra de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:50a-8: 'byung po thams cad rnams su g-yos pa yin na yang //
T09TD4156E:50a-9: khab rnams dag gi sgra rnams dag gis mkha' lding ltar //
T09TD4156E:50a-10: thub pa 'jigs pa ma yin 'khums par ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:50a-11: 'jigs pa 'dron pa yongs su bskor ba'i tshogs rnams las //
T09TD4156E:50a-12: ji lta ji ltar thub pa'i 'jigs pa ma yin pa //
T09TD4156E:50a-13: de lta de ltar chos 'dzin rnams kyi dgra bo yi //
T09TD4156E:50a-14: bdud rnams mya ngan las dang khros nas byer ba'o //
T09TD4156E:50a-15: de nas 'byung po cung zhig gzugs ni mtho ba ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:50a-16: khyad par 'phags par gyur pa nam mkhar gnas nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:50a-17: drang srong la gnod dgra ma yin la khros mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:50a-18: bdud lha chen po'i dbyangs kyis smras par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:50a-19: don med ngal bar byed par 'os pa ma yin bdud //
T09TD4156E:50a-20: 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid spongs la bde bar song mdzod dang //
T09TD4156E:50a-21: ri bo chen po lhun po rnams kyis bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:50a-22: khyod kyis bskyod cing bsgul bar nus pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:50a-23: sa yi brtan pa nyid dang chu yi gsher ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:50a-24: me yi dro ba nyid ni rab tu 'dor ba yang //
T09TD4156E:50a-25: bskal pa du mar bsgrub pa'i bsod nams las mnga' ba //
T09TD4156E:50a-26: 'dis ni nan tan nges par 'dor ba ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:50a-27: 'dis ni nges pa gang dang pha rol gnon pa dang //
T09TD4156E:50a-28: gzi brjid gang dang brtse ba skye dgu rnams la brten //
T09TD4156E:50a-29: 'od zer stong gis mun rnams ma bcom gnas bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:50a-30: 'di ni de nyid ma thob nas ni ldang ma yin //
T09TD4156E:50a-31: shing la bsrubs nas me ni rnyed par 'gyur ba ste //
T09TD4156E:50a-32: sa la brkos na chu yang 'thob par 'gyur ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:50a-33: rigs pa dang ni ldan pa'i thams cad byas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:50a-34: brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsgrub bya ma yin ci yang med //
T09TD4156E:50a-35: de phyir chags sogs nad rnams dag la gnas pa yi //
T09TD4156E:50a-36: 'jig rten nyam thag pa la thugs rje mnga' ba ni //
T09TD4156E:50b-0: @50b ye shes dman gyi don du yongs su ngal ba po //
T09TD4156E:50b-1: sman pa chen po 'di la bgegs 'os ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:50b-2: lam ngan mang po rnams kyis 'jig rten stor ba la //
T09TD4156E:50b-3: gang zhig zhi bas dam pa'i lam ni rjes tshol ba //
T09TD4156E:50b-4: chud zos pa la legs par ston byed ded dpon bzhin //
T09TD4156E:50b-5: ston mdzad de ni bskyod par rigs pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:50b-6: mun pa chen po sems can chud zos rnams la ni //
T09TD4156E:50b-7: ye shes sgron ma rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa 'di //
T09TD4156E:50b-8: mun pa la ni rab tu 'bar ba'i sgron ma yin //
T09TD4156E:50b-9: 'phags pa'i mya ngan 'da' bar byed par 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:50b-10: 'khor ba'i rnam 'gyur chu bo chen por 'gro ba ni //
T09TD4156E:50b-11: pha rol ma thob par ni bying bar gzigs nas ni //
T09TD4156E:50b-12: gang gis de ni sgrol bar byed la rab zhugs te //
T09TD4156E:50b-13: de la sdig pa 'phags pa su yis sems par byed //
T09TD4156E:50b-14: bzod pa'i chu rgyus bstan pa'i rtsa ba brtan pa ste //
T09TD4156E:50b-15: spyod pa'i me tog blo dang dran pa'i yal ga can //
T09TD4156E:50b-16: ye shes ljon shing chos kyi 'bras bu ster ba po ;
T09TD4156E:50b-17: /'phel bzhin pa ni zlog par 'os pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:50b-18: gang gi snying la rmongs pa'i zhags pa sra rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:50b-19: bcings pa'i skye dgu rnams kyi grol phyir blo mnga' zhing //
T09TD4156E:50b-20: 'gro ba bcings pa thar pa'i ched du 'o brgyal ba //
T09TD4156E:50b-21: de la brdegs pa khyod kyis 'thad pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:50b-22: byang chub ched du las gang dag na mdzad pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:50b-23: de rnams kyis ni nges par de ring dus yin la //
T09TD4156E:50b-24: ji ltar thub pa snga ma rnams ni de bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:50b-25: gnas der de bzhin 'di ni nye bar bzhugs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:50b-26: dbyig 'dzin sa gzhi yi ni lte ba 'di yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:50b-27: snying po dam pa mtha' dag dang ni ldan pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:50b-28: gang zhig 'di yis ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs bzod pa'i //
T09TD4156E:50b-29: sa yi phyogs de 'di las gzhan pa yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:50b-30: de phyir khro bar ma byed zhi bar nyer song la //
T09TD4156E:50b-31: bdud ni khyod kyi drags pas nga rgyal ma gyur cig / dpal ni mi brtan blo gtad par ni nus min zhing //
T09TD4156E:50b-32: go 'phang g-yo la rgyags par mngon par nyer 'gro zhing ;
T09TD4156E:50b-33: / de nas de yi tshig de yang dag thos nas dang //
T09TD4156E:50b-34: thub pa chen po'i g-yo ba med pa nyid mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:50b-35: gang gis mda' yis 'gro ba'i snying la rdeg byed pa'i //
T09TD4156E:50b-36: bdud ni 'bad pa bcom zhing yid mi bde bar song //
T09TD4156E:50b-37: dga' ba med cing 'bras med ngal ba byas pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:51a-1: mchog ljon shing rnams gtor te //
T09TD4156E:51a-2: dgrar gyur dgra bo'i dpung ni gtso bo bsad pa ltar //
T09TD4156E:51a-3: de nas 'di yi dpung ni phyogs phyogs bros pa'o //
T09TD4156E:51a-4: me tog tog can 'khor dang bcas pa bros shing nges par 'pham pa ni //
T09TD4156E:51a-5: drang srong chen po mun pa 'pham zhing rdul dang bral ba rgyal ba na //
T09TD4156E:51a-6: rgod pa dang bcas lang tshom bzhin zla ba dang bcas mkha' gsal zhing //
T09TD4156E:51a-7: chu yi snying po can gyi dri zhim me tog char pa bab par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:51a-8: de ltar sdig pa can ni nges par pham pa ni //
T09TD4156E:51a-9: de tshe phyogs ni rab snang mtshan mor byed pa mdzes //
T09TD4156E:51a-10: mkha' las me tog char rnams sa la bab pa ste //
T09TD4156E:51a-11: lang tsho ma bzhin ngal ba med par mtshan mo gsal //
T09TD4156E:51a-12: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dang gas chen po las /
T09TD4156E:51a-13: bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o /
T09TD4156E:51a-15: // / de nas brtan dang zhi ba yis //
T09TD4156E:51a-16: bdud kyi stobs ni pham mdzad nas //
T09TD4156E:51a-17: don dam rnam par mkhyen bzhed pa //
T09TD4156E:51a-18: bsam gtan mkhas de bsam gtan mdzad //
T09TD4156E:51a-19: bsam gtan cho ga thams cad la //
T09TD4156E:51a-20: dbang phyug dam pa rab brnyes nas //
T09TD4156E:51a-21: sngon gyi skye ba rim pa ni //
T09TD4156E:51a-22: dang po'i thun la dran pa'o //
T09TD4156E:51a-23: che ge mo bdag mid 'di ni //
T09TD4156E:51a-25: zhes ni skye ba stong phrag rnams //
T09TD4156E:51a-26: rjes su myong ba bzhin du dran //
T09TD4156E:51a-27: 'thad pa de dang de rnams su //
T09TD4156E:51a-28: skye bar 'chi ba dran nas ni //
T09TD4156E:51a-29: de nas sems can la thugs rjes //
T09TD4156E:51a-30: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis mdzad //
T09TD4156E:51a-31: rang gi skye bo bor nas ni //
T09TD4156E:51a-32: slar yang gzhan du bya ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:51a-35: de ltar nges pa'i bdag nyid ni //
T09TD4156E:51a-36: de yi dran par gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:51a-37: chu shing snying po snying po med //
T09TD4156E:51a-38: 'khor ba de ltar nges par ro //
T09TD4156E:51a-39: thun ni gnyis pa byung ba na //
T09TD4156E:51a-40: gnyis med pha rol gnon pa de //
T09TD4156E:51a-41: mig dang ldan pa kun gyi mchog / lha yi spyan ni thob par gyur //
T09TD4156E:51a-42: de nas des ni lha yi spyan //
T09TD4156E:51a-43: yongs su dag pa de yis ni //
T09TD4156E:51a-44: me long dri ma med pa ltar //
T09TD4156E:51a-45: 'jig rten mtha' dag la gzigs so //
T09TD4156E:51a-46: mchog dang mchog min las rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:51a-48: skye ba gzigs pa de yis ni //
T09TD4156E:51b-0: thugs rje'i bdag @51b nyid 'phel bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:51b-1: 'di rnams sdig pa'i las can rnams //
T09TD4156E:51b-3: 'di gzhan dge ba'i las can rnams //
T09TD4156E:51b-4: mtho ris su ni rab gnas so //
T09TD4156E:51b-5: shin tu mi bzad dmyal ba ru //
T09TD4156E:51b-6: rab tu 'jigs par gyur pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:51b-7: 'di rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis ;
T09TD4156E:51b-8: / kye ma bkren pas gtser par byed //
T09TD4156E:51b-9: kha cig me yi kha dog gi / lcags khu khol ma 'thung bar byed //
T09TD4156E:51b-10: lcags kyi ka ba tshan mo la //
T09TD4156E:51b-11: gzhan rnams cho nges 'debs shing 'dzeg / lcags zangs rnams su khas bub rnams //
T09TD4156E:51b-12: kha cig thug pa bzhin du 'tshed //
T09TD4156E:51b-13: me mdag phung po 'bar rnams su //
T09TD4156E:51b-14: kha cig snying rje bar sreg go //
T09TD4156E:51b-15: kha cig lcags kyi mche rno can //
T09TD4156E:51b-16: mi bzad khyi rnams kyis za zhing //
T09TD4156E:51b-17: kha cig ma rungs lcags mchu can //
T09TD4156E:51b-18: lcags 'dra'i bya rog rnams kyis za //
T09TD4156E:51b-19: kha cig gdung bas yongs ngal rnams //
T09TD4156E:51b-20: bsil ba'i grib ma mngon 'dod pas //
T09TD4156E:51b-21: ral gri'i lo ma'i nags sngon por //
T09TD4156E:51b-22: 'di rnams bcings pa bzhin du zhugs //
T09TD4156E:51b-23: kha cig sta re rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:51b-24: lag pa bteg rnams shing ltar 'gems //
T09TD4156E:51b-25: las rnams kyis bzung srog rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:51b-26: sdug bsngal na yang rnam mi smin //
T09TD4156E:51b-27: sdug bsngal zlog pa'i don ched du //
T09TD4156E:51b-28: bde ba yin zhes las gang byas //
T09TD4156E:51b-29: de yi 'bras de dbang med kyis //
T09TD4156E:51b-30: sdug bsngal kho na nyer longs spyod //
T09TD4156E:51b-31: bde don mi dge ba byas nas //
T09TD4156E:51b-32: gang de shin tu sdug bsngal rnams //
T09TD4156E:51b-33: de dag rnams kyi ro myang des //
T09TD4156E:51b-34: bde ba phra mo yang byed dam //
T09TD4156E:51b-35: sdig pa'i bdag nyid rgod rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:51b-36: sdig pa'i las ni byas pa gang //
T09TD4156E:51b-37: de ni mngon du gyur pa'i tshe //
T09TD4156E:51b-38: cho de rnams kyis rjes su myong //
T09TD4156E:51b-39: gal te de ltar sdig las can //
T09TD4156E:51b-40: las kyi 'bras bu mthong ba ste //
T09TD4156E:51b-41: dmigs su mngon par bsnun pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:51b-42: skyen par khrag ni skyugs pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:51b-43: lus kyi sdug bsngal rnams las dang //
T09TD4156E:51b-44: dmyal ba'i rnams las sems ldan gyi //
T09TD4156E:51b-46: ngal ba mchog ni bdag gi lugs //
T09TD4156E:51b-47: gzhan 'di sems kyis rnam g-yo las //
T09TD4156E:51b-48: byung ba'i las rnams sna tshogs kyis //
T09TD4156E:51b-49: byol song skye gnas sna tshogs su //
T09TD4156E:52a-0: nye bar skyes rnams gdung ba @52a * //
T09TD4156E:52a-2: / sha lpags spu dang so yi phyir //
T09TD4156E:52a-3: chags pa las sam rgyags pa las //
T09TD4156E:52a-4: gnyen 'dun rnams kyis mthong na yang //
T09TD4156E:52a-5: gang du snying rje bar gsod do //
T09TD4156E:52a-6: nus med ldan yang dbang med rnams //
T09TD4156E:52a-7: bkres skom ngal bas gtser ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:52a-8: lcags kyis bsnun pa'i dbyig can rnams //
T09TD4156E:52a-9: rta dang ba lang gyur rnams 'khol //
T09TD4156E:52a-10: stobs can rnams kyang stobs chung gi / glang por gyur pa rnams 'khol te //
T09TD4156E:52a-11: lcags kyus nyon mongs mgo bo rnams //
T09TD4156E:52a-12: rkang pa'i rting pa rnams kyis btags //
T09TD4156E:52a-13: phan tshun rnam par rtsod las dang //
T09TD4156E:52a-14: gzhan gyi dbang du gyur nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:52a-15: sdug bsngal gzhan rnams la yod kyang //
T09TD4156E:52a-16: gang la sdug bsngal khyad par ldan //
T09TD4156E:52a-17: phan tshun du ni rab phrad nas //
T09TD4156E:52a-18: ma gnas skam gnas rnams kyis dang //
T09TD4156E:52a-19: chur gnas chur gnas rnams kyis dang //
T09TD4156E:52a-20: mkhar gnas mkhar gnas rnams kyis 'joms //
T09TD4156E:52a-21: ser snas non pa'i sems ldan rnams //
T09TD4156E:52a-22: yi dags 'jig rten snang med du //
T09TD4156E:52a-23: skyes pa 'di rnams de bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:52a-24: bkres pa 'bras bu la longs spyod //
T09TD4156E:52a-25: khab mig lta bu'i kha rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:52a-26: ri bo lta bu'i lto ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:52a-27: bkres skom gyis bskyed sdug bsngal gyis //
T09TD4156E:52a-28: sdug bsngal skal can rnams gtser to //
T09TD4156E:52a-30: skyes bu gal te shes na ni //
T09TD4156E:52a-31: lus kyi cha shas rnams kyang ni //
T09TD4156E:52a-32: zhi ba bzhin du kun nas gtong //
T09TD4156E:52a-33: rang gi las rnams kyis bzung zhing //
T09TD4156E:52a-34: sred pas shin tu non pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:52a-35: bor ba'i mi gtsang ba rnams kyang ;
T09TD4156E:52a-36: / longs spyod par ni 'dis mi rnyed //
T09TD4156E:52a-37: 'di gzhan dmyal ba dang mtshungs pa'i //
T09TD4156E:52a-38: mngal phyin mi gtsang khu ba ru //
T09TD4156E:52a-39: nye bar skyes rnams mi rnams su //
T09TD4156E:52a-41: de sngon skye ba tsam na yang //
T09TD4156E:52a-42: lag pa rnon pos bzung ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:52a-43: ral gri rnams kyis gshegs pa ltar //
T09TD4156E:52a-44: gang du snying rje bar ni ngu //
T09TD4156E:52a-45: byams dang bsrung dang skyong rnams kyi //
T09TD4156E:52a-47: sdug bsngal las slar sdug bsngal drag / rang rang las kyis nyon mongs so //
T09TD4156E:52a-49: zhes ni gang du lhag par la//
T09TD4156E:52b-0: @52b sred dang yongs ldan byis rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:52b-1: rgyun chad med par rjes su myong //
T09TD4156E:52b-2: 'di gzhan bsod nams las rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:52b-3: mtho ris su ni skyes pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:52b-4: 'dod chags me yis drag tu ni //
T09TD4156E:52b-5: me ltar rab tu sreg par byed //
T09TD4156E:52b-6: yul rnams kyis ni ngoms med rnams //
T09TD4156E:52b-7: gang las 'di rnams gzi bcom ste //
T09TD4156E:52b-8: phred ba yongs rnyings zhags pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:52b-9: gyen du mig phyogs rnams lhung ngo //
T09TD4156E:52b-10: gang du lha mo rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:52b-11: sdug pa dbang med lhung ba la //
T09TD4156E:52b-12: snying la brtse ba ltos rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:52b-13: lag pa rnams kyis gos rnams 'dzin //
T09TD4156E:52b-14: gang zhig sa la lhung ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:52b-15: lus 'dud do shal g-yo rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:52b-16: sdug rnams gzhal med khang rnams nas //
T09TD4156E:52b-17: snying rje dang bcas ltung ba lta //
T09TD4156E:52b-18: rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan phreng can //
T09TD4156E:52b-19: gzhan 'dis sdug bsngal lhung rnams la //
T09TD4156E:52b-20: gdung rnams brtse dang g-yo ba yi //
T09TD4156E:52b-21: lta byed rnams kyi rjes su 'gro //
T09TD4156E:52b-22: 'dod pa can rnams lhung ba la //
T09TD4156E:52b-23: lag pa rnams kyis brang brdung zhing //
T09TD4156E:52b-24: 'khrugs chen gyi ltar nyam thag pa //
T09TD4156E:52b-25: lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis bstan to //
T09TD4156E:52b-26: kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs rdzing //
T09TD4156E:52b-27: kyi hud sdug pa gang na zhes //
T09TD4156E:52b-28: nyam thag pa rnams rnam zlos shing //
T09TD4156E:52b-29: lha la gnas rnams sa la lhung //
T09TD4156E:52b-30: las mang rnams kyis thob pa yis //
T09TD4156E:52b-31: mtho ris mi brtan g-yo ba la //
T09TD4156E:52b-32: 'bral bas byas pa'i sdug bsngal ni //
T09TD4156E:52b-34: kye ma ded las khyad par du //
T09TD4156E:52b-35: 'jig rten mdzad pa'i chos nyid de //
T09TD4156E:52b-36: 'dod chags bral ba thob nas kyang ;
T09TD4156E:52b-37: / gzhan rnams lha nas nges par lhung //
T09TD4156E:52b-38: 'di ni rtag par gnas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:52b-39: zhes ni nges pa'i sems ldan rnams //
T09TD4156E:52b-41: 'di lta bur ni mthong ma yin //
T09TD4156E:52b-42: dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal drag / dud 'gro rnams su phan tshun za //
T09TD4156E:52b-43: bkres skom sdug bsngal yi dags su //
T09TD4156E:52b-44: mi la tshol ba'i sdug bsngal lo //
T09TD4156E:52b-45: lha na sdug pa dang bral bas //
T09TD4156E:52b-46: skyed pa'i sdug bsngal phul byung ste //
T09TD4156E:52b-47: bskor ba gson pa'i 'jig rten gyis //
T09TD4156E:52b-48: gang na zhi ba nges par byed //
T09TD4156E:52b-49: 'khor ba'i chu bo rten med du //
T09TD4156E:53a-2: / tsam tsom du ni bskor ba yi //
T09TD4156E:53a-3: 'gro bas gnas ni thob ma yin //
T09TD4156E:53a-4: de ltar des ni 'gro ba lnga //
T09TD4156E:53a-5: lha yi spyan gyis gzigs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:53a-6: chu shing gshags pa bzhin du ni //
T09TD4156E:53a-7: srid par snying po rnyed ma yin //
T09TD4156E:53a-8: de nas de yi mtshan mo'i thun //
T09TD4156E:53a-9: gsum pa nye bar gnas pa na //
T09TD4156E:53a-11: bsam gtan rig pa mchog gis bsgoms //
T09TD4156E:53a-12: kye ma 'jig rten ngal thob gang //
T09TD4156E:53a-13: yang dang yang du skye ba dang //
T09TD4156E:53a-15: 'pho ba dang ni skye ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:53a-16: yang na sdug bsngal che 'di las ;
T09TD4156E:53a-17: / chags las long min gyis bsgribs pa //
T09TD4156E:53a-18: skyes long shin tu dog sa nas //
T09TD4156E:53a-19: phyi rol 'gro ba shes ma yin //
T09TD4156E:53a-20: de ltar bsams pa de yis ni //
T09TD4156E:53a-21: thugs kyis rnam dpyod gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:53a-22: gang du gyur na nges sam zhes //
T09TD4156E:53a-23: rga bas 'chi ba mngon par song //
T09TD4156E:53a-24: skye gnas nas de nyid bsgoms pa //
T09TD4156E:53a-25: de yis mngon par rtogs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:53a-26: rga dang 'chi ba dag gis ni //
T09TD4156E:53a-27: skye ba yod na rdzogs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:53a-28: mgo po yod na mgo bo yi //
T09TD4156E:53a-30: shing gi skye ba yod gyur na //
T09TD4156E:53a-32: de nas de yi slar gyur pa //
T09TD4156E:53a-33: skye ba 'di slar gang la zhes //
T09TD4156E:53a-34: de nas las srid las skye bar //
T09TD4156E:53a-35: skye ba yang dag mkhyen pa'o //
T09TD4156E:53a-36: des ni lha yi spyan gyis ni //
T09TD4156E:53a-37: las las 'jug par mkhyen pa ste //
T09TD4156E:53a-38: dbang phyug las min rang bzhin min //
T09TD4156E:53a-39: bdag las ma yin rgyu med min //
T09TD4156E:53a-40: ji ltar rig pa las gling bu //
T09TD4156E:53a-41: dang po'i tshigs ni bcad pa na //
T09TD4156E:53a-42: cho ga bzhin du kun myur 'gro //
T09TD4156E:53a-43: de ltar ye shes go rims so //
T09TD4156E:53a-44: de nas srid pa'i skye ba ni //
T09TD4156E:53a-45: mkhyen phyir thub pas blo gros mdzad //
T09TD4156E:53a-46: de nas srid pa'i skye ba des //
T09TD4156E:53a-47: nye bar len las byung bar mkhyen //
T09TD4156E:53a-48: tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin dang //
T09TD4156E:53a-49: 'dod blo bdag tu lta rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:53a-50: bud shing rnams kyis me bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:53a-51: 'di yis las ni nye bar len //
T09TD4156E:53a-52: gang gi rgyu las len pa zhes //
T09TD4156E:53a-53: de nas de yi gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:53a-54: de nas nye bar len pa'i rkyen //
T09TD4156E:53a-55: sred par des ni mkhyen pa'o //
T09TD4156E:53a-56: chung ngu'i me yis nags kyi me //
T09TD4156E:53b-0: rlung gis bud de bskyed pa @53b bzhin ;
T09TD4156E:53b-1: /'dod sogs nyon mongs rgya chen rnams //
T09TD4156E:53b-2: sred pa yis ni skyed par byed //
T09TD4156E:53b-3: de nas de yis bsams pa ni //
T09TD4156E:53b-4: sred pa gang las byung zhas so //
T09TD4156E:53b-5: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes //
T09TD4156E:53b-6: de nas rnam par nges pa mdzad //
T09TD4156E:53b-7: tshor bas mngon bcom skye dgu rnams //
T09TD4156E:53b-8: gnyen por byed la sred pa ste //
T09TD4156E:53b-9: skom pa med na chu la ni //
T09TD4156E:53b-10: kha cig mngon par dga' ba yin //
T09TD4156E:53b-11: de nas slar yang tshor ba yi //
T09TD4156E:53b-12: skye ba'i gnas ni gang zhes bsams //
T09TD4156E:53b-13: tshor ba tshor ba mthar byed kyis //
T09TD4156E:53b-14: reg pa'i rgyu can nyid du mkhyen //
T09TD4156E:53b-15: yul dang dbang po blo rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:53b-16: 'dus pa reg par brjod bya ste ;
T09TD4156E:53b-17: / gtsub shing las ni me bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:53b-18: gang las tshor ba skye ba'o //
T09TD4156E:53b-19: de nas reg pa rgyu yin zhes //
T09TD4156E:53b-20: de yis bsams par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:53b-21: de nas skye mched drug gi ni //
T09TD4156E:53b-22: rgyu can nyid du des mkhyen te //
T09TD4156E:53b-23: long bas gzugs ni mi rig cing //
T09TD4156E:53b-24: mig ni blo yis mi sbyor phyir //
T09TD4156E:53b-25: mig yod gyur na des sbyor te //
T09TD4156E:53b-26: de phyir dbang po yod na reg / de nas skye mched drug gis ni //
T09TD4156E:53b-27: skye ba mkhyen phyir blo gros mdzad //
T09TD4156E:53b-28: de nas de'i rgyu mid dang gzugs //
T09TD4156E:53b-29: rgyu la mkhas pas mkhyen pa'o //
T09TD4156E:53b-30: ji ltar myur gu yod pa las //
T09TD4156E:53b-31: lo ma sdong bu 'byung bar dran //
T09TD4156E:53b-32: de ltar ming dang gzugs yod na ;
T09TD4156E:53b-34: ming dang gzugs ni rgyu gang zhes //
T09TD4156E:53b-35: de yi de nas gyur de nas //
T09TD4156E:53b-36: de yi skye ba rnam shes su //
T09TD4156E:53b-37: ye shes pha rol son pas mkhyen //
T09TD4156E:53b-38: rnam par shes pa 'das pa na //
T09TD4156E:53b-39: ming dang gzugs ni rab gnas te //
T09TD4156E:53b-40: sa bon bskrun pa rdzogs pa na //
T09TD4156E:53b-42: de nas rnam par shes pa ni //
T09TD4156E:53b-43: gang las yin zhes bsams par gyur //
T09TD4156E:53b-44: ming dang gzugs la brten nas de //
T09TD4156E:53b-45: de nas de yi skya pha mkhyen //
T09TD4156E:53b-46: de nas rgyu yi go rims ni //
T09TD4156E:53b-47: mkhyen nas de yi blor gyur te //
T09TD4156E:53b-48: sems ni lugs 'byung bskor ba ste //
T09TD4156E:53b-49: gzhan du lugs las zlog par min //
T09TD4156E:53b-50: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen las ni //
T09TD4156E:53b-51: ming dang gzugs la brten nas ni //
T09TD4156E:53b-52: slar yang rnam par shes pa skye //
T09TD4156E:53b-53: ji ltar gru yis mi 'dren zhing //
T09TD4156E:53b-54: de bzhin rnam par shes pa dang //
T09TD4156E:53b-55: ming gzugs phan tshun gyi rgyu'o //
T09TD4156E:53b-56: ji ltar lcags ni 'bar ba yis //
T09TD4156E:54a-2: 'bar ba de yis de gdung ste //
T09TD4156E:54a-3: de bzhin phan tshun rgyu nyid do //
T09TD4156E:54a-4: de ltar rnam par shes pa las //
T09TD4156E:54a-5: ming gzugs 'byung ba mkhyen gyur pa //
T09TD4156E:54a-7: dbang po las byung reg pa'o //
T09TD4156E:54a-8: reg pa las skyes tshor ba mkhyen //
T09TD4156E:54a-9: tshor ba las skyes sred pa'o //
T09TD4156E:54a-10: sred pa las skyes len pa'o //
T09TD4156E:54a-11: len pa las ni de bzhin srid //
T09TD4156E:54a-12: srid pa las ni skye ba dag / skye bas rga shi 'byung bar mkhyen //
T09TD4156E:54a-13: 'gro ba dag ni rkyen rnams las //
T09TD4156E:54a-14: skyes zhes yang dag mkhyen pa'o //
T09TD4156E:54a-15: de nas 'di yi blo gros nges par song ba ni //
T09TD4156E:54a-16: skye ba zad las 'chi dang rga ba 'gags pa ste //
T09TD4156E:54a-17: srid pa nyams pa las kyang skye pa nyams pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:54a-18: len pa 'gags pa las ni srid pa rnam ldog cing //
T09TD4156E:54a-19: de nas srid 'gags pa las de ni 'gag pa ste //
T09TD4156E:54a-20: tshor ba yod pa min na sred pa yod ma yin//
T09TD4156E:54a-21: reg las chud zos gyur na tshor ba yod min zhing //
T09TD4156E:54a-22: skye mched 'jug pa med las reg pa zad pa'o //
T09TD4156E:54a-23: de bzhin ming dang gzugs ni yang dag 'gags pa las //
T09TD4156E:54a-24: skye mched drug po thams cad rnam par nyams par byed //
T09TD4156E:54a-25: rnam par shes pa 'gags las de dag 'gags pa ste ;
T09TD4156E:54a-26: /'du byed 'gags pa las kyang de ni 'gag pa'o //
T09TD4156E:54a-27: ma rig pa ni mtha' dag med las de bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:54a-28: 'du byed 'gag par drang srong chen pos mkhyen pa ste //
T09TD4156E:54a-29: 'di las mkhyen bya 'di ni yang dag mkhyen mdzad nas //
T09TD4156E:54a-30: sangs rgyas zhes ni 'jig rten na rab gnas par gyur //
T09TD4156E:54a-31: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rab tu shar ba yi //
T09TD4156E:54a-32: rtse mor myur 'gro dam pa'i lta ba'i lam gyis ni //
T09TD4156E:54a-33: srid rtse'i bar las mchog gyur bdag med rnam gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:54a-34: bud shing tshig pa'i me bzhin zhi bar gshegs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:54a-35: de nas bdag nyid mdzad pa de yi gyur pa ni //
T09TD4156E:54a-36: mchog gi drang srong mchog dang mchog min mkhyen pa'i tshogs //
T09TD4156E:54a-37: gna' ma rnams kyis don dam rgyu las gshegs pa yi //
T09TD4156E:54a-38: snying po'i lam 'di bdag gis lhag par thob par gyur //
T09TD4156E:54a-39: thun ni bzhi pa'i skya rengs shar ba'i yud tsam na //
T09TD4156E:54b-0: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'byung po rnams ni zhi @54b ba na ;
T09TD4156E:54b-1: / drang srong mchog gis 'gyur ba med pa'i go 'phang dang //
T09TD4156E:54b-2: kun gyi mgon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so //
T09TD4156E:54b-3: de nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen pa na //
T09TD4156E:54b-4: bud med chang gis myos bzhin sa ni g-yos gyur la //
T09TD4156E:54b-5: grub pa rnams kyis mngon gang phyogs ni rab snang ste //
T09TD4156E:54b-6: mkha' la rnga bo che rnams rab tu grag par gyur //
T09TD4156E:54b-7: dge ba'i rlung rnams rab tu zhi bar g-yos gyur zhing //
T09TD4156E:54b-8: sprin med 'o ma rnams ni lha yis char phab ste //
T09TD4156E:54b-9: ljon shing rnams la dus min me tog 'bras bu rnams //
T09TD4156E:54b-10: mchod pa rab tu sbyor ba'i ched bzhin brul bar gyur ;
T09TD4156E:54b-11: / man d'a ra ba'i me tog rnams dang padma dang //
T09TD4156E:54b-12: gser dang bee d'urya yi rang bzhin padma ni //
T09TD4156E:54b-13: mkha' las bab pa rnams kyis sh'akya thub pa'i sa //
T09TD4156E:54b-14: de tshe mtho ris bzhin du kun nas bkram par gyur //
T09TD4156E:54b-15: yud tsam de ni kha cig khro ba med gyur la //
T09TD4156E:54b-16: nad med gyur zhing mi dga' bar yang ma song ste //
T09TD4156E:54b-17: sdig pa bsnyen pa ma yin rgyags par ma byas shing //
T09TD4156E:54b-18: grub pa brnyes pa bzhin du 'jig rten zhi bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:54b-19: thar pa 'dod pa'i lha yi tshogs rnams dga' ba ste //
T09TD4156E:54b-20: sems can 'og tu song ba rnams kyang dga' bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:54b-21: yon tan phyogs kyis 'phel bas chos ni rgyas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:54b-22: rdul dang mun pa dag las 'gro ba gyen du byung //
T09TD4156E:54b-23: de yi las kyis ya mtshan dga' bas gang ba yi //
T09TD4156E:54b-24: bu ram shing pa'i rigs kyi mi skyong drang srong rnams //
T09TD4156E:54b-25: rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang drang srong che rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:54b-26: yang dag mchod rnams mkha' la gzhal med rnams su gnas //
T09TD4156E:54b-27: mthong min 'byung po'i tshogs kyis drang srong chen po yi //
T09TD4156E:54b-28: ston pa rnams ni mthon por 'thon zhing sgrogs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:54b-29: gson pa'i 'jig rten 'phel ba bzhin du dga' gyur zhing //
T09TD4156E:54b-30: ltung ba mchog la bzhin du bdud ni yi mug cing //
T09TD4156E:54b-31: de nas nad mi mnga' ba zhag bdun bdag nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:54b-32: sems la gzigs shing spyan mi 'dzums par bzhugs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:54b-33: kho bos 'dir ni rnam par thar pa brnyes so zhes //
T09TD4156E:54b-34: thub pas yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:54b-35: de nas rkyen nyid thob pa 'di ni thub pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:55a-1: cho gar rnams par gzhag pas gsan nas ni //
T09TD4156E:55a-2: zhi phyir 'jig rten dag la mchog tu brtse bas so //
T09TD4156E:55a-3: sangs rgyas spyan gyis rnam par gzigs par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:55a-4: lta ba ngan pas chud zos 'bad la 'khrugs pa yi //
T09TD4156E:55a-5: 'gro ba rdul ni rgya chen dang ldan gzigs nas dang //
T09TD4156E:55a-6: rnam thar chos ni mchog tu phra pa nyid gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:55a-7: g-yo ba med pa nyid phyir thugs ni mdzad par gyur //
T09TD4156E:55a-8: de nas sngon gyi dam bca' yang dag mkhyen gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:55a-9: zhi ba'i gdams pa la ni so sor nges par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:55a-10: de nas chen po'i rdul dang chung ngu'i rdul nyid dang //
T09TD4156E:55a-11: ldan pa'i skye bor yid ni rnam par dpyad pa'o //
T09TD4156E:55a-12: de nas zhi ba'i don du gdams pa'i ched du nges par ni //
T09TD4156E:55a-13: gzung ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs ni shes gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:55a-14: mngon par snang zhing 'gro la phan par 'dod pa can //
T09TD4156E:55a-15: mtho ris gnas pa'i gtso bo nyid ni nye bar 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:55a-16: sdig pa spangs shing don mdzad gdan la bzhugs pa po //
T09TD4156E:55a-17: mchog gi chos ni gzigs pa de la mchog gnyis so //
T09TD4156E:55a-18: mchog tu zhi bas rab tu bstod nas de gnyis kyis //
T09TD4156E:55a-19: 'jig rten phan pa'i don du tshig 'di gsol ba'o //
T09TD4156E:55a-20: ae ma 'gro ba 'di gang nor 'os 'di lta bu //
T09TD4156E:55a-21: skye dgu rnams la rjes su brtse mdzad khyed kyi thugs //
T09TD4156E:55a-22: 'jig rten na yod skye bo rnam par bsre ma'i rgyu //
T09TD4156E:55a-23: chen po'i rdul dang nyung ngu'i rdul nyid ldan pa'o //
T09TD4156E:55a-24: thub pa srid pa'i mtsho las rang nyid rab rgal nas //
T09TD4156E:55a-25: 'gro ba sdug bsngal byid ba rab tu drongs mdzod cig / legs pa'i dbang phyug gis ni phun sum tshogs pa thob nas bzhin //
T09TD4156E:55a-26: gzhan rnams la yang rang gi yon tan gyis sbyor mdzod //
T09TD4156E:55a-27: don mkhyen 'di na'i don dang pha rol du 'am gang //
T09TD4156E:55a-28: skye bo kha cig 'di na bdag gi phan pa byed //
T09TD4156E:55a-29: gang zhig 'jig rten dge ba'i ched du rab zhugs de //
T09TD4156E:55a-30: mi yi 'jig rten dang ni mtho ris su rnyed dka' //
T09TD4156E:55a-31: de ltar drang srong che la tshig 'di gsol nas ni //
T09TD4156E:55a-32: lha na gnas pa de gnyis ji ltar 'ongs par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:55a-33: thub pa yis kyang de yi tshig de rab mnod nas //
T09TD4156E:55b-0: 'gro ba rnam par thar @55b phyir nges par rgyas par mdzad //
T09TD4156E:55b-1: de nas bsod snyoms dus su phyogs bzhir drang srong la //
T09TD4156E:55b-2: lha na gnas pas lhung bzed rnams ni phul ba ste //
T09TD4156E:55b-3: goo ta mas bzhi po de rnams rab bzhes nas //
T09TD4156E:55b-4: de yi chos kyi ched du gcig nyid mdzad pa'o //
T09TD4156E:55b-5: de nas de tshe don bcas rab song tshong dpon gnyis //
T09TD4156E:55b-6: mdza' bshes nyid kyis lha yis rab tu bskul ba dag / rgya chen thugs mnga' drang srong che la thog ma ru //
T09TD4156E:55b-7: dga' ba dang ldan phyag byas nas ni bsod snyoms phul //
T09TD4156E:55b-8: rtsibs 'phur dang ni rangs byed bu ste de gnyis ni //
T09TD4156E:55b-9: chos 'dzin nus pa'i blo gros thub pas gzigs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:55b-10: de gnyis lha na gshegs par thugs kyis mngon gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:55b-11: dge slong lnga po rnams la thugs kyis gshegs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:55b-12: de nas zhi ba'i gdams pa las ni goo ta mas //
T09TD4156E:55b-13: nyi ma shar bas mun bzhin mun pa rnam 'joms phyir //
T09TD4156E:55b-14: b'a r'a na s'is brgyan pa'i sna tshogs nags tshal can //
T09TD4156E:55b-15: 'jigs byed shing rtas bsnyen pa'i grong khyer dge bar gshegs //
T09TD4156E:55b-16: de nas khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' glang chen myos pa'i 'gros ldan pa //
T09TD4156E:55b-17: 'gro ba mngon par rnam par 'dus phyir ka shis la gshegs bzhed pa //
T09TD4156E:55b-18: glang chen bzhin du rang gi sku lus ma lus phyir la rab log nas //
T09TD4156E:55b-19: thub pas spyan mig mi 'dzums par ni byang chub shing gi rtsa bar gzigs //
T09TD4156E:55b-20: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:55b-21: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
T09TD4156E:55b-23: // / zhi zhing mdangs ldan mdzad pa kun nas brnyes pa de //
T09TD4156E:55b-24: gcig pur rab gshegs mang po dang ni thabs cig bzhin //
T09TD4156E:55b-25: lam na dge slong chos ldan kha cig gis mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:55b-26: ya mtshan dang bcas thal mor bcas pas 'di skad gsol //
T09TD4156E:55b-27: dbang po'i rta ni g-yo bar dbang po'i rta thul zhing //
T09TD4156E:55b-28: sems can chags rnams ji ltar chags ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:55b-29: shin tu ro ldan gsar pa'i shes rab ro yis ni //
T09TD4156E:55b-30: ri bong gis mtshon dang mtshungs tshim par gyur pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:55b-31: brtan pa khyod kyi zhal ni ji ltar rab rgyas shing //
T09TD4156E:55b-32: 'dir ni dbang po rnams kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:56a-1: po'i spyan mnga' nges par don mdzad cing //
T09TD4156E:56a-2: khyod kyi bla ma su lags gang las grub ba gsungs //
T09TD4156E:56a-3: de rnams la des smras pa bdag la ston ba med //
T09TD4156E:56a-4: bdag la mchod bya med cing smad bya su yang med //
T09TD4156E:56a-5: mya ngan 'das pa thob cing gzhan rnams dang mi mnyam ;
T09TD4156E:56a-6: / bdag ni chos la rang byung du ni shes par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:56a-7: gang phyir gzhan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i rtogs bya ni //
T09TD4156E:56a-8: bdag gis mtha' dag rtogs pa de phyir sangs rgyas te //
T09TD4156E:56a-9: gang phyir bdag gi nyon mongs rnams ni dgra bzhin 'pham //
T09TD4156E:56a-10: de phyir zhi ba dag ni kun nas shes bar mdzod //
T09TD4156E:56a-11: sdug bsngal rnams kyis nyam thag grogs la phan don du //
T09TD4156E:56a-12: zhi ba kho bo 'di yang b'a r'a na s'ir 'gro //
T09TD4156E:56a-13: der ni 'chi med chos kyi rnga dag rdung ba ste //
T09TD4156E:56a-14: snyan grags bde ba'i phyir min nga rgyal phyir ma yin //
T09TD4156E:56a-15: rgal bas 'gro ba rnams ni rgal bar 'gyur bgyi zhing //
T09TD4156E:56a-16: grol bas sems can rnams ni yongs su thar bar bgyi //
T09TD4156E:56a-17: de ltar gson pa'i 'jig rten nyam thag par mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:56a-18: sngon du bdag gi dam bca' 'di ni gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:56a-19: 'di na kha cig nor ni thob nas bdag nyid ni //
T09TD4156E:56a-20: gcig tu nyid kyang 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar cing //
T09TD4156E:56a-21: skye po chen po ma btsums mig la gang gis kyang //
T09TD4156E:56a-22: khyad 'phags thob nas rnam par 'dzin pa de don yin //
T09TD4156E:56a-23: gang zhig skam la gnas pas mi ni chus khyer ba //
T09TD4156E:56a-24: 'dren par 'dod min de ni legs pa'i gzugs ma yin //
T09TD4156E:56a-25: gang zhig gter ni thob nas skye bo dbul po la //
T09TD4156E:56a-26: nor gyi sbyor ba med pa de ni sbyang po min //
T09TD4156E:56a-27: rang bzhin gnas pas nad kyis mngon par bcom pa la //
T09TD4156E:56a-28: lag tu song ba'i sman gyis gso bar rigs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:56a-29: de ltar lam ngan song ba'i ched du lam dag ni //
T09TD4156E:56a-30: nges par byad ba'i lam gyis bshad par 'thad pa yin //
T09TD4156E:56a-31: ji ltar sgron ma rab tu gsal bar byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:56a-32: de yi rgyu can dmar por 'gro ba ma yin nyid //
T09TD4156E:56a-33: de bzhin sangs rgyas nyid kyis ye shes rab gsal bar //
T09TD4156E:56a-34: mdzad de de phyir chags par 'gro ba ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:56a-35: ji ltar shing rnams la ni me dag nges pa dang //
T09TD4156E:56a-36: mkha' la rlung dang sa la chu ni nges pa ste //
T09TD4156E:56b-0: de bzhin @56b gang yang rnams su thub pa rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:56b-1: byang chub nges shing k'a shi rnams dang chos smra des //
T09TD4156E:56b-2: de nas nye bar 'ongs nas aa la la zhes pa //
T09TD4156E:56b-3: rnam par brjod nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab spangs nas //
T09TD4156E:56b-4: yang dang yang du ya mtshan mig ni g-yo ba yis //
T09TD4156E:56b-5: re 'dod skyes shing sangs rgyas la ni lta bzhin song //
T09TD4156E:56b-6: de nas thub pas rim gyis k'a si'i grod khyer ni //
T09TD4156E:56b-7: nor gnas snying po dang ni rab mtshungs gzigs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:56b-8: grogs mo bzhin du 'khyud nas yang dag 'dus pa ni //
T09TD4156E:56b-9: skal ldan shing rta dang ni b'a r'a na s'i nyid //
T09TD4156E:56b-10: mthu dang gzi brjid dag gis mngon par mdzes pa des //
T09TD4156E:56b-11: khu byug rnams kyis sgra sgrogs shing gi tshogs ldan zhing //
T09TD4156E:56b-12: drang srod chen pos bsnyen pa'i ri dags nags nyid du //
T09TD4156E:56b-13: rnam par mdzes pas nyi ma bzhin du rab 'thob po //
T09TD4156E:56b-14: koondi n+ya'i rigs dang de nas ming chen dang //
T09TD4156E:56b-15: rlangs pa dang ni rta thul de bzhin bzang rgyal te //
T09TD4156E:56b-16: dge slong lnga yis de ni rgyang ring nas gzigs nas //
T09TD4156E:56b-17: phan tshun du ni tshig 'di smras par gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:56b-18: bde ba'i bdag nyid dge slong goo ta ma 'di //
T09TD4156E:56b-19: dka' thub de las phyir log mngon par 'ongs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:56b-20: mngon du 'gro bya ma yin nges par phyag 'os min //
T09TD4156E:56b-21: dam bca' bcom pa mchod par 'os pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:56b-22: de ni brgya la gal te sdod par 'dod gyur na //
T09TD4156E:56b-23: de nyid la ni gtam 'di rab tu gsol mdzod da da //
T09TD4156E:56b-24: 'gron po nye bar 'ongs pa gang dang su la ni //
T09TD4156E:56b-25: 'phags pa rnams kyis mi byed par ni 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:56b-26: de ltar bya ba byas nas dge slong de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:56b-27: nye bar gnas pa'i nye bar sangs rgyas gshegs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:56b-28: ji lta ji ltar de rnams la ni nye bar gshegs //
T09TD4156E:56b-29: de lta de ltar de rnams dam bca' nyams par gyur //
T09TD4156E:56b-30: de nas kha cig 'di yi na bza' blangs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:56b-31: de bzhin gzhan ni phyag 'tshal nas ni lhung bzed bzung //
T09TD4156E:56b-32: kha cig 'di la 'os pa'i gdan ni phul ba ste //
T09TD4156E:56b-33: de bzhin gzhan gnyis zhabs bsil nye bar phul pa'o //
T09TD4156E:56b-34: de ltar rab byed mchod pa mang po ldan pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:56b-35: 'di la thams cad kyis ni bla mar spyod pa byas //
T09TD4156E:56b-36: rigs su mngon brjod de rnams kyis kyang ma spangs shing //
T09TD4156E:57a-0: de rnams la rjes brtse bcas @57a * //
T09TD4156E:57a-2: mchod 'os dgra bcom la ni gus pa ma yin pas //
T09TD4156E:57a-3: sngar gyi spyod pas dge slong rnams kye ma smra shig / bstod dang smad pa nges par bdag gis mnyam pa ste //
T09TD4156E:57a-4: khyed rnams bsod nams min las rnam par bzlog par bgyi //
T09TD4156E:57a-5: sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa'i ched du sangs rgyas shing //
T09TD4156E:57a-6: 'byung po kun la phan pas rab tu zhugs pa la //
T09TD4156E:57a-7: bla ma nye bar 'joms las ming gis gang smras de //
T09TD4156E:57a-8: ma rungs pa yi pha ma bzhin du chos 'chad do //
T09TD4156E:57a-9: de ltar drang srong chen po'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T09TD4156E:57a-10: smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis de skad gsungs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:57a-11: rmongs las snying po med pas chud zos de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:57a-12: gdong ni cung zad bzhad pa dang ldan rgol ba smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:57a-13: goo ta me re zhig dka' thub mchog dang ni //
T09TD4156E:57a-14: dam pa de yis de nyid rtogs pa ma yin te //
T09TD4156E:57a-15: don ni dga' bas bsgrub bya bde bas gnas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:57a-16: khyed kyis mthong zhes bya ba 'dir ni gtan tshigs gang //
T09TD4156E:57a-17: gang tshe de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de nyid la //
T09TD4156E:57a-18: de nas dge slong de rnams dang par gyur min te //
T09TD4156E:57a-19: byang chub pa yi lam ni de las gzhan du shes //
T09TD4156E:57a-20: de nas lam mkhyen pa yis lam ni bka' stsal pa //
T09TD4156E:57a-21: byis pa'i skye bo bdag nyid ngal bar ldan pa dang //
T09TD4156E:57a-22: dbang po'i spyod yul rnams la de bzhin chags pa ste //
T09TD4156E:57a-23: 'chi ba med pa'i lung gis lam ma yin pa'i phyogs //
T09TD4156E:57a-24: skyon dang ldan pa gnyis po de la ltos mdzod cig / gdung bar mngon par brjod pa'i lus kyi ngal rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:57a-25: yongs su 'khrugs shing rnam par gnod pa'i sems la ni //
T09TD4156E:57a-26: 'jig rten tha snyad kyang ni brgyal shes min na //
T09TD4156E:57a-27: dbang po las 'das de nyid lam ni kye ma ci //
T09TD4156E:57a-28: ji ltar sgron mas mtshan mo'i mun pa nyams pa ru //
T09TD4156E:57a-29: 'dir ni mngon par nyer 'gro chu rnams gtor bas min //
T09TD4156E:57a-30: de bzhin ye shes mi yis mi shes mun pa ni //
T09TD4156E:57a-31: nyams par sngon 'gro lus kyi ngal ba rnams kyis min //
T09TD4156E:57a-32: ji ltar me ni 'dod pas shing la 'bigs pa dang //
T09TD4156E:57a-33: rnam par 'gems pas me ni thob pa ma yin la //
T09TD4156E:57a-34: de nyid mngon pa'i thabs las bsrubs pas thob pa ste //
T09TD4156E:57b-0: de bzhin sbyor las 'chi @57b ba med thob ngal bas min //
T09TD4156E:57b-1: de ltar don med 'dod pa rnams la chags pa ni //
T09TD4156E:57b-2: rdul dang mun pa dag gis zil non sems ldan rnams //
T09TD4156E:57b-3: bstan bcos don la nus kyang grub pa thob min na //
T09TD4156E:57b-4: chags bral 'gog pa'i cho ga la ni sngon nyid do //
T09TD4156E:57b-5: ji ltar nad kyis mngon par bcom pa'i srog chags kyis //
T09TD4156E:57b-6: mi phan bza' ba za ba'i gso ba 'dir yod min //
T09TD4156E:57b-7: de bzhin mi shes nad kyis mngon par bcom pa yi //
T09TD4156E:57b-8: 'dod pa rnams la chags pa'i zhi ba gang las so //
T09TD4156E:57b-9: ji ltar skam pa'i rten la gnas pa'i rlung gis ni //
T09TD4156E:57b-10: bus pa'i me yi zhi ba yod pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:57b-11: de bzhin 'dod pa'i rten la gnas pa'i chags pa yis //
T09TD4156E:57b-12: rjes su song ba'i sems kyi zhi ba yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:57b-13: mtha' 'di gnyis po dag kyang rnam par dor byas nas //
T09TD4156E:57b-14: bdag gis lam gzhan dbu mas lhag par rtogs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:57b-15: shin tu sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i 'dren pa po //
T09TD4156E:57b-16: bde ba dang ni dge ba nyid dang bral ba'o //
T09TD4156E:57b-17: yang dag lta ba'i nyi mas rab tu gsal byas shing //
T09TD4156E:57b-18: rnam dag yang dag rtogs pa'i shing rtas drangs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:57b-19: yang dag brjod pa'i yang dag dag ni gtsug lag khang //
T09TD4156E:57b-20: dge ba'i bya ba'i skyed tshal brgya phrag mngon par dga' //
T09TD4156E:57b-21: smad pa med pa'i 'tsho ba lo legs chen po ste //
T09TD4156E:57b-22: yang dag rtsol bas stobs rab rjes su 'gro ba can //
T09TD4156E:57b-23: kun du yang dag dran pa'i sbas pas sbas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:57b-24: ting 'dzin gzims mal dang ni gdan dang khyab pa yis //
T09TD4156E:57b-25: de ltar mchog gi yan lag brgyad 'dir 'di lam ste //
T09TD4156E:57b-26: 'chi dang rga dang na ba rnams las 'dren pa po //
T09TD4156E:57b-27: gang la drangs nas bya ba thams cad byas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:57b-28: 'di dang che ge mor ni slan chad 'gro ba med //
T09TD4156E:57b-29: 'di ni sdug bsngal mtha' dag 'di ni mtshan ma ste //
T09TD4156E:57b-30: 'di ni 'gog pa 'di yi lam ni 'di yin te //
T09TD4156E:57b-31: de ltar ma thos chos kyi cho ga sngar med pa'i //
T09TD4156E:57b-32: rnam par mthar phyin bdag gi spyan mig skye ba'o //
T09TD4156E:57b-33: skye dang rga dang na dang de nas rgud pa dang //
T09TD4156E:57b-34: sdug pa dang bral mi sdug pa la sbyor ba dang //
T09TD4156E:57b-35: 'dod pa'i don ni rab tu 'thob pa med pa ste //
T09TD4156E:57b-36: rnam pa sna tshogs sdug bsngal 'di ni yongs su 'thob //
T09TD4156E:57b-37: 'dod pa'i bdag can gyi 'am bdag rgyal can gyi 'am //
T09TD4156E:58a-1: can gyi 'am yang na lus can ma yin pa'i //
T09TD4156E:58a-2: gang zhig yon tan med pa gang la rab zhugs kyang //
T09TD4156E:58a-3: mdor bsdus nas de sdug bsngal du ni shes par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:58a-4: de ltar 'bar ba zhi ba'i me ni chung na yang //
T09TD4156E:58a-5: lhan cig skyes pa dro ba'i ngo bo spong min nyid //
T09TD4156E:58a-6: de bzhin bdag tu 'du shes zhi sogs kyis phra yang //
T09TD4156E:58a-7: sdug bsngal bdag nyid can zhes bdag gi shin tu nges //
T09TD4156E:58a-8: ji ltar sa chu sa bon dus rnams myu gu'i bzhin //
T09TD4156E:58a-9: 'dod chags la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs skyon rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:58a-10: skyon las rab tu skyes pa'i las rnams nyid dag ni //
T09TD4156E:58a-11: sdug bsngal dag gi rgyur ni nges par shes par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:58a-12: mtho ris su 'am 'og tu srid pa'i rgyun las ni //
T09TD4156E:58a-13: 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyi tshogs rnams rgyu yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:58a-14: dman dang 'bring dang mchog ste sna tshogs nyid kyi ni //
T09TD4156E:58a-15: de dang der ni las rnams dag ni rtsa ba'o //
T09TD4156E:58a-16: nyes pa zad las 'khor ba'i rgyun ni yod min te //
T09TD4156E:58a-17: las zad pa las sdug bsngal de ni yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:58a-18: gang phyir don gang yong pa las ni kun 'byung ste //
T09TD4156E:58a-19: de phyir med pa las te slar yang 'byung ba med //
T09TD4156E:58a-20: gang du skye ba med cing rga med 'chi ba med //
T09TD4156E:58a-21: me med sa med chu med mkha' med rlung med la //
T09TD4156E:58a-22: thog ma bar dang mtha' med 'phags pa dbrog bya min //
T09TD4156E:58a-23: dge zhing 'gyur med 'gog pa de ni shes par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:58a-24: yan lag brgyad ldan gang zhig mngon brjod de lam ste //
T09TD4156E:58a-25: lhag par rtogs phyir 'di yi thabs de'i gzhan ma yin //
T09TD4156E:58a-26: lam 'di yin na ma mthong ba las 'jig rten rnams //
T09TD4156E:58a-27: de nyid dang ni nye du rnams ni yongs su 'khor //
T09TD4156E:58a-28: sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya zhing rgyu 'di ni //
T09TD4156E:58a-29: spad bya 'gog pa yang ni dbang du bya ba'o //
T09TD4156E:58a-30: de bzhin lam 'di yang ni bsgom par bya ba ste //
T09TD4156E:58a-31: de ltar 'di ni bdag gi blo gros rab zhugs so //
T09TD4156E:58a-32: sdug bsngal 'di ni yongs shes rgyu ni spangs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:58a-33: de bzhin du ni 'gog pa mngon du byas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:58a-34: de bzhin du ni 'di yi lam 'di bsgoms pa ste //
T09TD4156E:58a-35: de ltar 'dir ni bdag gi spyan mig rab zhugs so //
T09TD4156E:58a-36: ji srid du ni yang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa ni //
T09TD4156E:58a-37: bzhi ba'i rkang pa 'di rnams mthong ba ma yin pa //
T09TD4156E:58a-38: de srid bdag 'dir grol ba med pa zhes brjod cing //
T09TD4156E:58b-0: bdag nyid la ni don byas nyid du yang ma @58b mthong ;
T09TD4156E:58b-1: / gang tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rtogs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:58b-2: rtogs byas kyang ni dor byar 'os pa byas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:58b-3: de tshe bdag 'dir rnam par grol zhes brjod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:58b-4: bdag nyid la ni don byas nyid du yang mthong ngo //
T09TD4156E:58b-5: de ltar drang srong chen po thugs rje mnga' ba yis //
T09TD4156E:58b-6: 'dir ni chos dag de skad mngon par gsungs pa na //
T09TD4156E:58b-7: koondi n+ya'i rigs dang lha ni brgya phrag rnams //
T09TD4156E:58b-8: gtsang zhing rdul dang bral ba'i mig ni thob par gyur //
T09TD4156E:58b-9: bya ba thams cad nges par byas shing zhi ba de la ni //
T09TD4156E:58b-10: thams cad mkhyen pas khyu mchog bzhin du mthong po'i dbyangs kyis gsungs //
T09TD4156E:58b-11: khyod kyis shes shes bdag nyid chen po des ni tshig gsol pa //
T09TD4156E:58b-12: legs so khyod kyi blo gros mchog ni bdag gis shes pa'o //
T09TD4156E:58b-13: legs so bdag gis shes shes de nas des ni 'jig rten ni //
T09TD4156E:58b-14: koondi n+yas de yi go 'phang rigs ni bzung ba ste //
T09TD4156E:58b-15: bla ma dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob ma rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:58b-16: gtso bo nyid du chos la yang dag lhag par gshegs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:58b-17: sgra de sa la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis thos nas ni //
T09TD4156E:58b-18: rnam par rgyas pa'i dbyangs 'di rab tu gsol bar gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:58b-19: 'byung po rnams kyi 'chi med zhi ba'i ched du nges par ni //
T09TD4156E:58b-20: dam pa gzigs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de legs so //
T09TD4156E:58b-21: tshul khrims rtsibs dang zhi dang dul ba'i mu khyud blo rnams yangs //
T09TD4156E:58b-22: dran pas blo gros brtan pa brtson 'grus lta ba ngo tsha'i gzer //
T09TD4156E:58b-23: zab pa'i phyir dang brdzun med phyir dang legs par bstan nyid phyir //
T09TD4156E:58b-24: 'jig rten gsum na brtan zhing bstan bcos gzhan rnams kyis mi ldog / sa 'dzin gnod sbyin rnams las sgra ni nye bar thob byas nas //
T09TD4156E:58b-25: mkha' la lha yi tshogs rnams kyis ni dbyangs byas shing //
T09TD4156E:58b-26: de ltar thos nas mtho ris rim dang rim rnams kyis mthon por //
T09TD4156E:58b-27: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar du sgra yis nye bar 'dzegs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:58b-28: mtho ris dag na gnas pa'i bdag nyid ldan pa kha cig gis //
T09TD4156E:58b-29: drang srong che las 'jig rten gsum ni g-yo zhes thos nas ni //
T09TD4156E:58b-30: sna tshogs yul rnams la ni chags par gshegs pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:59a-1: srid pa gsum na zhi ba nyid du gshegs //
T09TD4156E:59a-2: de ltar 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog tu zhi ba'i ched du ni //
T09TD4156E:59a-3: mtho ris dang ni sa na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor tsam na //
T09TD4156E:59a-4: sprin bral mkha' las me tog dang bcas chu yi char bab cing //
T09TD4156E:59a-5: srid gsum gnas pa rnams kyis rnga po che rnams mngon par brdungs //
T09TD4156E:59a-6: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:59a-7: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o /
T09TD4156E:59a-9: // / de nas thams cad mkhyen pa yis //
T09TD4156E:59a-10: rta thul la sogs dge slong rnams //
T09TD4156E:59a-11: rab snyoms sems ldan de rnams kun //
T09TD4156E:59a-12: thar pa'i chos la bkod pa'o //
T09TD4156E:59a-13: nyi ma dang ldan skar ma ldas //
T09TD4156E:59a-14: nam mkhar zla ba ldan pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:59a-15: lnga sde pham pa'i lnga sde yis //
T09TD4156E:59a-16: kun nas bskor ba de mdzes so //
T09TD4156E:59a-17: de nas de tshe kha cig ni //
T09TD4156E:59a-18: mo rnams glos phab nyal mthong nas ;
T09TD4156E:59a-19: / grags pa zhes bya chen po'i bu //
T09TD4156E:59a-20: yang dag skyo bar nye bar song //
T09TD4156E:59a-21: 'di kun nye bar mdzes pa ste //
T09TD4156E:59a-22: zhes ni chig dang brjod bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:59a-23: dpal ldan mchog gi rgyan ldan pa //
T09TD4156E:59a-24: sangs rgyas ga la ba der song //
T09TD4156E:59a-25: sems dang nyon mongs mkhyen pas de //
T09TD4156E:59a-26: gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T09TD4156E:59a-28: tshur shog dge ba thob par gyis //
T09TD4156E:59a-29: de ltar rnam rgyas grags pa'i gsung //
T09TD4156E:59a-30: 'di ni thos nas tsha ba yis //
T09TD4156E:59a-31: nyam thag chu la 'dzul nas dang //
T09TD4156E:59a-32: mchog tu tshim pa nye bar 'od //
T09TD4156E:59a-33: sngon gyi rgyu yi stobs brten nas //
T09TD4156E:59a-34: de nas lus de nyid bzung ste //
T09TD4156E:59a-35: lus kyis dang ni sems kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:59a-36: dgra bcom nyid ni nye bar thob //
T09TD4156E:59a-37: ston ka'i chu yis bkrus pa yi //
T09TD4156E:59a-38: gos la tshon ni bkod pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:59a-39: dkar po'i blo yis dam pa'i chos //
T09TD4156E:59a-40: thos nas rab tu rtogs pa nyid ;
T09TD4156E:59a-41: / cha lugs de yis ngo tsha bzhin //
T09TD4156E:59a-42: gnas pa de ni gzigs gyur na //
T09TD4156E:59a-43: don mdzad dam pa'i don mkhyen pa //
T09TD4156E:59a-44: smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis smras //
T09TD4156E:59a-45: rtags ni chos kyi rgyu min zhing //
T09TD4156E:59a-46: 'byung po rnams la snyoms pa ste //
T09TD4156E:59a-47: zhi zhing dul la dbang po dul //
T09TD4156E:59b-0: brgyan pa yin @59b yang chos la spyod //
T09TD4156E:59b-1: gang zhig lus ni 'thon pa ste //
T09TD4156E:59b-2: sems kyis 'thon pa ma yin pa //
T09TD4156E:59b-3: nags na gnas kyang chags pa can //
T09TD4156E:59b-4: khyim na gnas shes de shes bya //
T09TD4156E:59b-5: gang zhig sems ni 'thon pa ste //
T09TD4156E:59b-6: lus kyis 'thon pa ma yin pa //
T09TD4156E:59b-7: khyim na gnas kyang nga med pa ;
T09TD4156E:59b-8: / nags na gnas shes de shes bya //
T09TD4156E:59b-9: khyim na gnas par gyur pa'i lam //
T09TD4156E:59b-10: rab tu byung bar gyur pa'i yang //
T09TD4156E:59b-11: gang gis bsgrub pa yod na ni //
T09TD4156E:59b-12: de yi thar pa mngon par brjod //
T09TD4156E:59b-13: ji ltar rgyal 'dod dgra sde la //
T09TD4156E:59b-14: rgyal phyir go cha 'dzin pa ste //
T09TD4156E:59b-15: de bzhin nyon mongs dgra de la ;
T09TD4156E:59b-17: de nas dge slong tshur shog ces //
T09TD4156E:59b-18: de bzhin gshegs pas de la gsungs //
T09TD4156E:59b-19: des ni dge slong rtags bzung ste //
T09TD4156E:59b-20: skad cig de nyid kyis grol to //
T09TD4156E:59b-21: de nas de yi rjes chags pas //
T09TD4156E:59b-22: de yi 'khor ni lnga bcu dang //
T09TD4156E:59b-23: gsum rnams nyid dang gcig nyid dang //
T09TD4156E:59b-24: chos de rab tu thob par gyur //
T09TD4156E:59b-25: 'dag chal gyis bsgos gos rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:59b-26: chu yis yang dag reg pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:59b-27: sngon tshe bsgoms pa'i las can rnams //
T09TD4156E:59b-28: de rnams myur du dag par gyur //
T09TD4156E:59b-29: de nas de tshe dgra bcom slob ma yi //
T09TD4156E:59b-30: dang po don byas drug cu thams cad la //
T09TD4156E:59b-31: dgra bcom rnams kyis mngon mchod dgra bcom pas //
T09TD4156E:59b-32: ji ltar 'os par yang dag bka' stsal to //
T09TD4156E:59b-33: dge slong rnams kyis sdug bsngal rgal //
T09TD4156E:59b-34: rang gi bya ba legs chen byas //
T09TD4156E:59b-35: pha rol sdug bsngal rnams la yang //
T09TD4156E:59b-36: rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i rigs ;
T09TD4156E:59b-37: / de phyir re re thams cad kyis //
T09TD4156E:59b-38: sa 'dir yongs su gshegs mdzod la //
T09TD4156E:59b-39: nyam thag 'jig rten ched du chos //
T09TD4156E:59b-40: rjes su brtse bas bstan par bya //
T09TD4156E:59b-41: grub phyir rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i sbun //
T09TD4156E:59b-43: rgyal po'i drang srong gis bsnyen pa'i //
T09TD4156E:59b-45: de nas de nyid mthong de rnams //
T09TD4156E:59b-46: de yi bka' las phyogs su song //
T09TD4156E:59b-47: rtsod bral bde bar gshegs pa ni //
T09TD4156E:59b-48: drang srong che yang ga yar gshegs //
T09TD4156E:59b-49: de nas dus su der gshegs nas //
T09TD4156E:59b-50: chos kyi dgon par nye bar gshegs //
T09TD4156E:60a-3: ri rnams dang ni nags rnams su //
T09TD4156E:60a-4: gnas rnams yod pa na yang de //
T09TD4156E:60a-5: rnam par 'du la bzhed stobs bcu bas //
T09TD4156E:60a-6: rab tu brten nas bslangs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:60a-7: de nas grub ba nyams tshad phyir //
T09TD4156E:60a-8: me khang lto 'phye ches bsnyen par //
T09TD4156E:60a-9: ma rungs gnas des 'di la byin //
T09TD4156E:60a-10: der gzims mtshan mor rang gnas shing //
T09TD4156E:60a-11: ltos bral thub ba chen po la //
T09TD4156E:60a-12: mthong ba'i dug can khros pa yi //
T09TD4156E:60a-13: sprul des mthong nas dbugs phyung ngo //
T09TD4156E:60a-14: de yi khro bas 'bar ba yi //
T09TD4156E:60a-15: me yi khang par gyur ba des //
T09TD4156E:60a-16: drang srong chen po'i sku lus la //
T09TD4156E:60a-17: 'jigs pa bzhin du mes ma reg / dus mtha'i me nyer zhi ba na //
T09TD4156E:60a-18: tshangs pa bzhugs pa mdzes pa ltar //
T09TD4156E:60a-19: me yi khang par bsregs na yang //
T09TD4156E:60a-21: gang tshe sangs rgyas der bzhugs tshe //
T09TD4156E:60a-22: gnod med g-yo ba med pa ste //
T09TD4156E:60a-23: de tshe klu de ya mtshan zhing //
T09TD4156E:60a-24: drang srong mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T09TD4156E:60a-25: ri dags nags der skye bo yis //
T09TD4156E:60a-26: thub pa der bzhugs shes gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:60a-28: dge slong tshig ces rjes su brtse //
T09TD4156E:60a-29: de nas mtshan mo 'das pa na //
T09TD4156E:60a-31: sbrul ni zhi bas lhung bzed kyis //
T09TD4156E:60a-32: blangs nas de la bstan pa'o //
T09TD4156E:60a-33: de nas sangs rgyas che bdag nyid //
T09TD4156E:60a-34: thos nas de ni ya mtshan gyur //
T09TD4156E:60a-35: de lta na yang bdag nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:60a-36: che zhing gong na med pa snyam //
T09TD4156E:60a-37: de nas dus su rab sbyar ba'i //
T09TD4156E:60a-38: sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul gzugs rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:60a-39: de yi sems de mkhyen nyid las //
T09TD4156E:60a-40: zhi ldan thub pas thugs dgongs mdzad //
T09TD4156E:60a-41: ji ltar bdag las rdzu 'phrul gyis //
T09TD4156E:60a-42: sangs rgyas khyad par 'phags pa snyam //
T09TD4156E:60a-43: de yi chos ni rab sgrub phyir //
T09TD4156E:60a-44: de tshe nges ni nges par byas //
T09TD4156E:60a-45: kun nas slar log gnas pa yis //
T09TD4156E:60a-46: lteng rgyas 'od srungs mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:60a-47: slob ma rnams kyi tshogs rnams kyang //
T09TD4156E:60a-48: lnga brgyas de yi chos la bsnyen //
T09TD4156E:60a-49: der ni spun zla slob mar bcas //
T09TD4156E:60a-50: mthar phyin shun lpags spangs pa na //
T09TD4156E:60a-51: ga ya chu klung zhes byas kyang //
T09TD4156E:60a-52: der song lam la bsnyen pa'o //
T09TD4156E:60a-53: de nas thub pas slob mar bcas //
T09TD4156E:60a-54: 'od srungs gsum po de rnams la //
T09TD4156E:60b-0: sa 'dzin ga ya'i rtse mor @60b ni ;
T09TD4156E:60b-1: / nges par mthar phyin gtam mdzad do //
T09TD4156E:60b-2: rnam par rtog pa'i skye gnas dang //
T09TD4156E:60b-3: gti mug rnam bkram du ba can //
T09TD4156E:60b-4: chags sdang me yis 'gro ba ni //
T09TD4156E:60b-5: thams cad dbang med par bsreg go //
T09TD4156E:60b-6: de ltar nyon mongs mes tshig cing //
T09TD4156E:60b-7: rab tu ma zhi mgon med can //
T09TD4156E:60b-8: rga na 'chi ba'i me rnams kyis ;
T09TD4156E:60b-9: / slar yang rgyun mi chad par sreg / rnam pa sna tshogs mes tshig pa'i //
T09TD4156E:60b-11: yid bcas dbang po dang bcas pa'i //
T09TD4156E:60b-12: gzugs la blo ldan skyo ba ste //
T09TD4156E:60b-13: skyo ba las ni chags bral ro //
T09TD4156E:60b-14: chags bral las ni rnam grol zhing //
T09TD4156E:60b-15: rnam grol de nas thams cad na ;
T09TD4156E:60b-16: / rnam par grol zhes shes pa'o //
T09TD4156E:60b-17: skye ba'i rgyun ni yongs 'dzad cing //
T09TD4156E:60b-18: tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'dir gnas la //
T09TD4156E:60b-19: byed pa thams cad byas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:60b-20: sred pa gzhan ni yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:60b-21: bcom ldan gyi gsung 'di thos nas //
T09TD4156E:60b-22: dge slong stong phrag dag gi sems //
T09TD4156E:60b-23: len pa med nas zag pa las //
T09TD4156E:60b-24: de ma thag tu rnam par grol //
T09TD4156E:60b-25: sbyin pa tshul khrims dul rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:60b-26: chos ni yongs su yongs bskor bzhin //
T09TD4156E:60b-27: de nas shes rab rgya che ba'i //
T09TD4156E:60b-28: 'od srungs gsum gyis sangs rgyas mdzes //
T09TD4156E:60b-29: chos don 'dod pa dang bral ba'i //
T09TD4156E:60b-30: sems can ngan pa'i srog bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:60b-31: bgres mchog de rnams kyis bor ba'i //
T09TD4156E:60b-32: dka' thub nags de mdzes ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:60b-33: de nas de rnams kyis yongs bskor //
T09TD4156E:60b-34: thub pa rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs //
T09TD4156E:60b-35: ma ga dh'a yi mi dbang phyir //
T09TD4156E:60b-36: sngon gyi dam bca' dran pa'o //

T09TD4156E:60b-38: de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu thob //
T09TD4156E:60b-39: blon po rnams ni rjes 'gro bas //
T09TD4156E:60b-40: thos nas rgyas po sngon du song //
T09TD4156E:60b-41: de nas rang gi skal mtshungs pa'i //
T09TD4156E:60b-42: rkang pa bzhon pas skye bo ni //
T09TD4156E:60b-43: ya mtshan gyis ni rnam yangs mig / ri yi lam nas phyi rol byung //
T09TD4156E:60b-44: ma ga dh'a yi mi dbang gis //
T09TD4156E:60b-45: thub mchog rgyang ma nas mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:60b-46: skyen pa dang bcas mchod pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:60b-47: shing rta las ni sa la babs //
T09TD4156E:60b-48: des ni rnga yab rlung yab dang //
T09TD4156E:60b-49: rjes su 'brang ba rnam spangs nas //
T09TD4156E:60b-50: tshangs pa la ni dbang pos bzhin //
T09TD4156E:60b-51: thub pa rgyal po sngon du song //
T09TD4156E:60b-52: cod pan rab g-yo mgo bo yis //
T09TD4156E:60b-53: drang srong mchog la phyag 'tshal nas //
T09TD4156E:60b-54: sa yi logs la rtsva 'jam la //
T09TD4156E:61a-2: der mi rnams kyis bsams par gyur //
T09TD4156E:61a-3: ae ma sh'akya thub pa'i stobs //
T09TD4156E:61a-4: 'od srungs bcom ldan drang srong ni //
T09TD4156E:61a-5: 'di yi slob ma nyid du song //
T09TD4156E:61a-6: de nas de'i sems sangs rgyas kyis //
T09TD4156E:61a-7: mkhyen nas 'od srungs la smras pa //
T09TD4156E:61a-8: 'od srungs yon tan gang mthong nas //

T09TD4156E:61a-10: chu sbyin chen po'i dbyangs kyis ni //

T09TD4156E:61a-14: gang phyir mchod dang sbyin sreg gi //

T09TD4156E:61a-20: de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs //
T09TD4156E:61a-21: gang phyir bzlas nas bsregs nas kyang //
T09TD4156E:61a-22: skye ba la ni thar min zhing //
T09TD4156E:61a-23: skye ba yi ni sdug bsngal che //
T09TD4156E:61a-24: de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs ;
T09TD4156E:61a-25: / gang phyir mchod sbyin dka' thub kyis //
T09TD4156E:61a-26: dge legs yin zhes yid gyur pa //

T09TD4156E:61a-28: de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs //
T09TD4156E:61a-29: gang phyir skye 'chi las grol ba //
T09TD4156E:61a-31: brjod pa bdag gis shes pa ste //
T09TD4156E:61a-32: de phyir me rnams bdag gis spangs //
T09TD4156E:61a-33: de ltar de'i tshig dang skyed cing //
T09TD4156E:61a-34: don dang ldan pas gsan gyur nas //
T09TD4156E:61a-35: 'dul ba'i slob dpon goo ta mas //
T09TD4156E:61a-36: dul ba'i 'od srungs la gsungs so //
T09TD4156E:61a-37: skal chen khyod ni legs par 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:61a-38: 'di ni legs byas byas min min //
T09TD4156E:61a-39: gang khyod tha dad chos rnams su //
T09TD4156E:61a-40: dge legs gang de nye bar thob //
T09TD4156E:61a-41: de phyir re zhig 'khor rnams ni //

T09TD4156E:61a-43: sna tshogs sdug bsngal ston bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:61a-44: yid ni yang dag skyo bar gyis //
T09TD4156E:61a-45: de nas mchog ces smras nas ni //
T09TD4156E:61a-46: bdag la bdag ni yongs bsdus nas //
T09TD4156E:61a-49: de mkhar sdong dum bzhin gnas shing //
T09TD4156E:61a-50: sa la bzhin du rnam par rgyu //
T09TD4156E:61a-51: khri la bzhin du bzhugs pa dang //
T09TD4156E:61a-53: slar yang me bzhin 'bar ba dang //
T09TD4156E:61a-54: slar yang sprin bzhin char 'bab ste //
T09TD4156E:61a-55: slar yang cig car shin tu ni //
T09TD4156E:61a-57: glog gi snang ba'i 'od ldan pa'i//
T09TD4156E:61b-0: @61b rab 'bab chu gter sprin bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:61b-2: rgya cher rnam par gnon te mdzes //
T09TD4156E:61b-3: der ni mig rnams chags byas nas //
T09TD4156E:61b-4: ya mtshan gyen phyogs skye bo rnams //
T09TD4156E:61b-5: mchod mang po las phyag 'tshal zhing //
T09TD4156E:61b-6: seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:61b-7: de nas rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas des //
T09TD4156E:61b-8: bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni //

T09TD4156E:61b-14: ma ga dh'a pa rnam nges so //
T09TD4156E:61b-15: de nas zhing byas mkhyen nas ni //
T09TD4156E:61b-16: dge phyir dge legs la gnas pas //
T09TD4156E:61b-17: chos thos par ni 'dod pa yi //
T09TD4156E:61b-18: bzo sbyangs la ni bka' stsal ba //

T09TD4156E:61b-20: dbang po thul ba dbang por bcas //
T09TD4156E:61b-21: sa yi bdag po gzugs nyid ni //
T09TD4156E:61b-22: skye ba dang ni rnam par nyams //
T09TD4156E:61b-24: skye dang 'gag pa shes bya ste ;
T09TD4156E:61b-25: / shes nas de gnyis yang dag par //
T09TD4156E:61b-26: lus ni yang dag rig par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:61b-27: skye dang 'gag pa'i chos can du //
T09TD4156E:61b-28: dbang po dang bcas lus shes nas //

T09TD4156E:61b-30: nye bar len min nyer 'gro min //
T09TD4156E:61b-31: lus dang dbang po blo rnams las //
T09TD4156E:61b-32: gzhan ni dmigs pa ma yin te//
T09TD4156E:61b-33: sdug bsngal 'di ni skye ba ste //
T09TD4156E:61b-36: bdag med bdag gi ba yang med //
T09TD4156E:61b-37: de tshe mchog tu mi g-yo ba'i //
T09TD4156E:61b-39: ngar 'dzin la sogs nyon mongs kyis //
T09TD4156E:61b-41: 'jig rten bdag med par mthong na //
T09TD4156E:61b-42: chags pa rnams las rnam par grol //
T09TD4156E:61b-43: mi bden par mthong 'ching ba ste //
T09TD4156E:61b-44: bden par mthong ba rnam par grol //
T09TD4156E:61b-47: gal te bdag yod gyur na de //
T09TD4156E:61b-48: rtag gam yang na mi rtag nyid //
T09TD4156E:61b-49: phyogs ni gnyis po 'di dag la //
T09TD4156E:61b-50: nyes pa chen po rab tu chags //
T09TD4156E:61b-51: gal te re zhig mi rtag gyur //
T09TD4156E:61b-53: yang srid yod pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:61b-55: ci sta rtag cing khyab bdag 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:61b-56: skye ba med dang skye ba min //
T09TD4156E:62a-0: nam mkha' khyab cing rtag pa @62a * //
T09TD4156E:62a-2: /'god pa med cing skye ba med //
T09TD4156E:62a-4: gang du mi gnas pa ma yin //
T09TD4156E:62a-5: 'di dang song nas dang thar par //
T09TD4156E:62a-6: thams cad du ni cig car 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:62a-7: khyab bdag nyid phyir bya med 'di'i //
T09TD4156E:62a-8: las kyi bya ba med par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:62a-9: las rnams ma byas pa las ni //
T09TD4156E:62a-12: bdag gi sdug bsngal byed ma yin //
T09TD4156E:62a-13: rang dbang gyur na sdug bsngal ni //
T09TD4156E:62a-14: bdag gis bdag gi byed pa su //
T09TD4156E:62a-15: bdag ni rtag pa nyid las ni //
T09TD4156E:62a-16: rnam par 'gyur ba skye min zhing //
T09TD4156E:62a-17: bde dang sdug bsngal thob pa las //
T09TD4156E:62a-18: de yis rnam par 'gyur ba mthong //
T09TD4156E:62a-19: ye shes thob pas dang nyon mongs //
T09TD4156E:62a-20: spangs las thar pa yod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:62a-21: bya ba med khyab bdag 'di yin //
T09TD4156E:62a-22: de phyir thar pa yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:62a-23: yod min gyur las de nyid kyis //
T09TD4156E:62a-24: bdag ste 'di ni brjod min la //
T09TD4156E:62a-25: rgyur gyur pas kyang ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:62a-26: 'di ni cung zad byed ma yin //
T09TD4156E:62a-27: bya ba las kyang gsal min zhing //
T09TD4156E:62a-28: gang rnams kyis 'di byas min la //
T09TD4156E:62a-29: rnam pa de ltar gyur min smra //
T09TD4156E:62a-30: de phyir bdag gi yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:62a-31: byed pa po med 'dir ni rig pa po yang med //
T09TD4156E:62a-32: bdag po med pa'i lus po 'di ni 'dren par byed //
T09TD4156E:62a-33: ji ltar 'khor ba'i chu bo rab tu bskor ba ste //
T09TD4156E:62a-34: smra ba de ni nyon mdzod nyan pa rnams kyi mchog / dbang po drug dang dbang po'i spyod yul drug rnams la //
T09TD4156E:62a-35: brten nas rnam par shes pa rnam drug 'char ba ste //
