T09TD4156E:92a-11: brtson 'grus kyis ni rnyed par dka' ba ci yang med //
T09TD4156E:92a-12: de phyir khur rnams mi 'bor bar ni bzod bgyis dang //
T09TD4156E:92a-13: gang zhig yang yang ngal bso nas ni srub byed pa //
T09TD4156E:92a-14: de yi shing la me ni rnyed par sla min zhing //
T09TD4156E:92a-15: brtson 'grus brtsams pas rnyed par sla bar 'gyur ba ste //
T09TD4156E:92a-16: de phyir sbyor ba yod na bya ba 'grub pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:92a-17: dran pa yod na skyon rnams 'jug pa ma yin te //
T09TD4156E:92a-18: dran pa dang mnyam mdza' bo med cing bsrung ba med //
T09TD4156E:92a-19: dran pa nyams las des par thams cad nyams pa ste //
T09TD4156E:92a-20: de phyir lus la song ba'i dran pa spang mi bya //
T09TD4156E:92a-21: ji ltar dpa' bo rnams ni go cha bzung nas su //
T09TD4156E:92a-22: dgra bo'i sde la 'jigs pa med rnams 'jug pa ste //
T09TD4156E:92a-23: de bzhin lus la dran pa'i go cha bgos nas su //
T09TD4156E:92a-24: brtan pa rnams ni yul gyi g-yul rnams la spyod do //
T09TD4156E:92a-25: mnyam par gzhag pa'i blo dang sems ni yongs bsdams shing //
T09TD4156E:92a-26: 'jig rten dag gi skye dang 'god pa shes pa ste //
T09TD4156E:92a-27: de phyir ting nge 'dzin la yongs su 'jug bya ste //
T09TD4156E:92a-28: ting 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i sems nad yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:92a-29: rnam par 'thor ba'i chu ni rnam par 'dzin don du //
T09TD4156E:92a-30: ji ltar 'bad pas dong dang 'bos ni byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:92a-31: ye shes chu ni gnas pa'i don du ting nge 'dzin //
T09TD4156E:92a-32: de ltar dong dad 'obs dang mtshungs par rab tu bstan //
T09TD4156E:92a-33: shes rab ldan pa yongs su 'dzin pa btang ba yi //
T09TD4156E:92a-34: chos 'di nang la mchog tu gzhol ba dag gis te //
T09TD4156E:92a-35: de ltar gnas pa'i grol ba yod cing 'di yi ni //
T09TD4156E:92a-36: phyin ci log ni khyim pa ma yin dge slong min //
T09TD4156E:92a-37: shes rab dga' dang 'chi ba'i mtsho chen dag la gru //
T09TD4156E:92b-0: rmongs @92b pa'i mun pa rnams la ji ltar sgron ma ste //
T09TD4156E:92b-1: nang rnams thams cad 'joms pa dag gi sman yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:92b-2: nyon mongs ljon shing 'joms byed mtshon cha rnon po yin //
T09TD4156E:92b-3: de phyir thos pa bsam pa bsgom pa rnams kyi ni //
T09TD4156E:92b-4: shes rab rnam par 'phel la rab tu 'jug par bya //
T09TD4156E:92b-5: gang gi shes rab rang bzhin lta byed mig yod pa //
T09TD4156E:92b-6: de ni mig dang bral yang mig dang ldan pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:92b-7: sems la rgyu ba'i spros pa de dang de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:92b-8: khyim na gnas pa spangs nas kyang ni grol min nyid //
T09TD4156E:92b-9: mchog tu zhi ba thob par 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di //
T09TD4156E:92b-10: shes nas spros pa med pa rnams su 'gyur bar bya //
T09TD4156E:92b-11: de phyir bag yod bla ma bzhin du bsnyen mdzod la //
T09TD4156E:92b-12: bag med dgra bo bzhin du rnam par spongs mdzod dang //
T09TD4156E:92b-13: bag yod pa las brgya byin gyi na dpal thob cing //
T09TD4156E:92b-14: bag med pa las lha min khengs rnams rnam par nyams //
T09TD4156E:92b-15: phan pa dang ldan rjes su brtse ba mnga' ba yi //
T09TD4156E:92b-16: ston pa thugs rje mnga' bas mdzad bya gang yin pa //
T09TD4156E:92b-17: de ni bdag gis byas shing dang ni rab bsdams pa //
T09TD4156E:92b-18: khyed cag rnams kyi sems ni zhi bas byas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:92b-19: ci ste ri rnams dang ni khang pa stong pa dang //
T09TD4156E:92b-20: dgon pa de rnams gang dang der ni yod pa na //
T09TD4156E:92b-21: rab tu sbyor la rtag tu 'bad pa bya ba ste //
T09TD4156E:92b-22: phyi nas yongs su gdung ba ldan par ma gyur cig / sman pa rang bzhin yang dag legs par shes nas ni //
T09TD4156E:92b-23: nad pa rnams la dam pa'i sman ni brjod bya ste //
T09TD4156E:92b-24: de yi dus kyis sbyar bar nges par bsten pa la //
T09TD4156E:92b-25: nad pa gang de bdag po yin te sman pa min //
T09TD4156E:92b-26: dpal ldan drang zhing mnyam la 'jigs pa med pa yi //
T09TD4156E:92b-27: lam ni lam mkhan gyis ni rnam par bstan pa na //
T09TD4156E:92b-28: thos nas gang zhig mi 'gro de yi nyams pa ste //
T09TD4156E:92b-29: bstan pas 'dren pa po ni bu lon yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:92b-30: sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa bzhi po kho bo yis //
T09TD4156E:92b-31: bstan pa rnams la 'di ni gang gi 'dod pa yod //
T09TD4156E:92b-32: de ni myur zhing spobs par pa dag la smros shig dang //
T09TD4156E:92b-33: the tshom shin tu rnam par dpyad bya bcad par bgyi //
T09TD4156E:92b-34: de ltar mthon por gsungs pa'i drang srong chen po la //
T09TD4156E:92b-35: the tshom med pa de rnams ci yang ma gsol to //
T09TD4156E:92b-36: sems kyis de dag rnams kyi sems kyi gting dpags nas //
T09TD4156E:93a-2: rlung ni g-yo ba ma yin nyi ma bsil ba dang //
T09TD4156E:93a-3: ri bong mtshan ma can ni dro ba nyid na yang //
T09TD4156E:93a-4: 'jig rten dag na rkang pa bzhi po de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:93a-5: bden pa min par byed par nus pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:93a-6: gang zhig sdug bsngal brjod pa de ni bde ba min //
T09TD4156E:93a-7: 'di yi rgyu gang rab tu skye bo de gzhan min //
T09TD4156E:93a-8: rgyu ni 'gags pa las ni nges par thar pa ste //
T09TD4156E:93a-9: gang zhig 'di yi lam ni thabs ma yin pa min //
T09TD4156E:93a-10: de phyir bdag nyid chen po bden pa bzhi rnams la //
T09TD4156E:93a-11: dge slong skye bo nges 'di gtam ci yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:93a-12: ston pa mya ngan 'da' ba rnyed par 'gyur zhes te ;
T09TD4156E:93a-13: / gang zhig don ni rdzogs pa ma yin sdug bsngal te //
T09TD4156E:93a-14: gang zhig tshogs pa 'di ni brtul zhugs gzhon nyid las //
T09TD4156E:93a-15: sngon du don ni mthong bar gyur pa ma yin pa //
T09TD4156E:93a-16: de yang khyed kyi gsung 'dis da ni de ma thag / glog gi 'od kyis lam bzhin yang dag mthong bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:93a-17: gang gi don gyi lhag ma yod pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:93a-18: gang yang srid pa'i mtsho yi pha rol phyin pa ste //
T09TD4156E:93a-19: mgon po shin tu skyen par nges par gshegs thos te //
T09TD4156E:93a-20: de dag gi yang snying la bsams par gyur pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:93a-21: de ltar 'phags pa ma 'gags pa yi tshig de yis //
T09TD4156E:93a-22: don ni rnam par shes kyang shes nas slar yang ni //
T09TD4156E:93a-23: gus ldan rnams kyi blo gros brtan po mdzad bzhed pa //
T09TD4156E:93a-24: byams pas slar yang sangs rgyas kyis ni bka' stsal to //
T09TD4156E:93a-25: gang phyir skal bar gnas kyang de ni nyams pa ste //
T09TD4156E:93a-26: phan tshun du ni 'du ba nges par yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:93a-27: bdag nyid kyi dang gzhan gyi don ni byas nas ni ;
T09TD4156E:93a-28: / kho bo gnas pa la ni dgos pa yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:93a-29: gang rnams mkhar dang sa na bdag gi gdul bya rnams //
T09TD4156E:93a-30: de rnams thar par byas shing rgyun la bcug pa ste //
T09TD4156E:93a-31: 'di las gzhan du slob ma rim dang rim rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:93a-32: nga yi chos 'di skye dgu rnams la gnas par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:93a-33: de phyir 'gro ba'i rang bzhin rnam par shes byas nas //
T09TD4156E:93a-34: bsam mno ma byed nges par rnam par 'bral ba ste //
T09TD4156E:93a-35: rnam pa de ltar 'gro ba shes nas su //
T09TD4156E:93a-36: ji ltar 'di ltar ma yin de ltar gyis mdzod cig / ye shes sgron mas mun pa rnam par bsal byas nas //
T09TD4156E:93b-0: srid pa rnams la snying po @93b med par mthong nas su //
T09TD4156E:93b-1: ji ltar nad ni nye bar zhi ba de ltar ni //
T09TD4156E:93b-2: tshe ni rnam par 'gags na tshim pa nyid yin no //
T09TD4156E:93b-3: dor bar bya zhing rtsod ldan lus zhes bya ba ni //
T09TD4156E:93b-4: srid pa'i mtsho yi rgyun ni rnam par 'gags pa na //
T09TD4156E:93b-5: don med byed pa'i dgra bo'i rnam par nyams las bzhin //
T09TD4156E:93b-6: tshe ni nye bar zhi bas tshim pa ma yin su //
T09TD4156E:93b-7: rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad rnam par 'god pa ste //
T09TD4156E:93b-8: de phyir khyed cag rnams ni legs par bag yod gyis //
T09TD4156E:93b-9: mya ngan 'da' ba'i dus ni yongs su gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:93b-10: khyed cag ma smra 'di ni bdag gi phyi ma'i chig / da nas bsam gtan rig pa rnams kyi mchog gis ni ;
T09TD4156E:93b-11: / yud tsam de la bsam gtan dang po thob mdzad nas //
T09TD4156E:93b-12: de las rnam par bzhengs nas gnyis par gshegs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:93b-13: rim gyis ma tshang med par thams cad la gshegs so //
T09TD4156E:93b-14: de nas rjes su rim pas rab tu byed pa dgu //
T09TD4156E:93b-15: snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs ni mtha' dag bsam gtan mdzad //
T09TD4156E:93b-16: de nas drang srong chen pos slar yang rim gyis ni //
T09TD4156E:93b-17: bsam gtan dang po de nyid la ni bab pa'o //
T09TD4156E:93b-18: de las rnam par bzhengs nas kyang ni rim gyis ni //
T09TD4156E:93b-19: bsam gtan bzhi pa la ni slar yang 'dzegs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:93b-20: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i cho ga las de rnams bzhengs shing //
T09TD4156E:93b-21: mngon sum nyid du nye bar zhi ba la gshegs so //
T09TD4156E:93b-22: de nas thub pa mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs pa na //
T09TD4156E:93b-23: char gyis snun pa'i ba lang bzhin du sa g-yos shing //
T09TD4156E:93b-24: phyogs kyi glang po rnams kyis sbyangs pa bzhin du ni //
T09TD4156E:93b-25: nam mkha' las kyang sgron ma rnams ni lhung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:93b-26: lha yi nags tshal sna tshogs shing rta sreg 'dod pa'i //
T09TD4156E:93b-27: nags kyi me ni bar snang dag la byung ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:93b-28: bud shing med cing rlung med du ba med pa'i me //
T09TD4156E:93b-29: phyogs ni sreg par byed pa byung bar gyur pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:93b-30: lha min 'joms par 'dod pa g-yul du 'jug pa na //
T09TD4156E:93b-31: khro ba brgya bas khro ba rnam par gtong ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:93b-32: de bzhin me stag brgya pa'i me ni skyug pa yi //
T09TD4156E:93b-33: dbang po'i rdo rje mi bzad pa rnams lhung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:93b-34: 'jig pa'i rlung rnams dag gis btags pa rnams kyi bzhin //
T09TD4156E:93b-35: 'dzin pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rtse mo rnams lhung zhing //
T09TD4156E:94a-2: phyag dar khur ba'i rlung ni drag tu g-yos par gyur //
T09TD4156E:94a-3: 'dam gyi chus bsgos sdong du gzhon nu rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:94a-4: lus ni yongs su dkris pa'i ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin //
T09TD4156E:94a-5: cung zhig 'od zer kha dog ngan pa de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:94a-6: 'od ni bcom ste zla ba mngon par gsal bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:94a-7: sprin dang bral yang mkha' la zla ba gnas na yang //
T09TD4156E:94a-8: mun pa mi bzad rnams kyis phyogs rnams rgyas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:94a-9: yud tsam de la mya ngan gyis ni zil non bzhin //
T09TD4156E:94a-10: chu bo rnams ni de ma thag tu chu dron 'bab //
T09TD4156E:94a-11: de nas nye sar skyes pa'i sha la'i shing dag gis //
T09TD4156E:94a-12: rang gis me tog mdzes pa 'jug pa dus min la //
T09TD4156E:94a-13: rnam par btud nas drang srong chen po'i sku lus ni //
T09TD4156E:94a-14: gser gyi stegs bu'i gzugs brnyan la ni yang dag gtor //
T09TD4156E:94a-15: mkha' la mgo bo lda rnams mi g-yo'i klu rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:94a-16: mya ngan gyis slar so sor dmar ba'i mig can rnams //
T09TD4156E:94a-17: rab tu gnyid log gdengs ka stod pa'i lus rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:94a-18: thub pa la ni gus pas lta bzhin gnas par gyur //
T09TD4156E:94a-19: nang du song ba'i kun nas gdung ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:94a-20: de rnams shin tu dron po'i dbugs ni brgyus pa ste //
T09TD4156E:94a-21: 'gro ba'i rang bzhi mi rtag pa ni rtogs nas su //
T09TD4156E:94a-22: mya ngan 'ongs pa min rnams mya ngan smad par gyur //
T09TD4156E:94a-23: nges par legs pa'i chos kyis cho gar rab zhugs pa //
T09TD4156E:94a-24: rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi 'dus pa dam pa de //
T09TD4156E:94a-25: chos la mngon par chags pas mya ngan ma byas shing //
T09TD4156E:94a-26: lha yi rten la mchi ma phyung bar ma gyur to //
T09TD4156E:94a-27: gtsang mar lhag par gnas pa'i byed ldan lha rnams kyang ;
T09TD4156E:94a-28: / drang srong chen po'i yang dag shin tu gus ldan rnams //
T09TD4156E:94a-29: rang gnas gyur zhing rnam par 'gyur ba ma song ste //
T09TD4156E:94a-30: 'jig rten dag ni rang bzhin rnam par smad pa'o //
T09TD4156E:94a-31: dri za'i rgyal po rnams dang de nas klu yi rgyal po rnams //
T09TD4156E:94a-32: gnod sbyin rnams dang dam chos la dga' lha rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:94a-33: mya ngan byed cing mya ngan mchog la gzhol rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:94a-34: rigs chen po yi nyam thag bzhin du kha la gyur //
T09TD4156E:94a-35: yid la re ba thob pa'i bdud kyi sde rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:94a-36: rab tu dga' bas skad ni 'thon zhing dgod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:94a-37: 'phyo zhing glu dbyangs gar byas dga' bar gyur pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:94b-0: rnga bo che dang rdza rnga pa ta @94b ha rnams brdungs //
T09TD4156E:94b-1: de nas rdo rje rtse mo bcom pa'i ri bo bzhin //
T09TD4156E:94b-2: chang dang bral ba'i gnyis 'thung dga' ba med pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:94b-3: nog gis rnam par dman pa'i dbyibs can khyu mchog bzhin //
T09TD4156E:94b-4: thub pa'i khyu mchog nub ba na ni 'jig rten gyur //
T09TD4156E:94b-5: nyin mor byed pas rab tu dman pa'i nam mkha' bzhin ;
T09TD4156E:94b-6: / ba mos bsregs pa'i padma dang ldan rdzing bu bzhin //
T09TD4156E:94b-7: nor dang bral zhing bya ba med pa'i rigs bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:94b-8: srid pa nyams mdzad rab tu nyams las 'gro bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:94b-9: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
T09TD4156E:94b-10: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o /
T09TD4156E:94b-12: // / de nas ngang pa stong dang ldan pa'i lha yi ni //
T09TD4156E:94b-13: gzhal med khang nas gdong ni cung zhig rab btud nas //
T09TD4156E:94b-14: yud tsam thams cad mkhyen pa la ni bltas nas su //
T09TD4156E:94b-15: lha na gnas pa chen po gzhan zhig gis smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:94b-16: kye ma 'gro na dngos po thams cad mi rtag cing //
T09TD4156E:94b-17: skye ba'i chos can dang ni 'dzad pa'i chos can la //
T09TD4156E:94b-18: skye ba rnams ni sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:94b-19: de dag rnams ni lhag med zhi bas zhi ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:94b-20: skye ba'i bud shing tshad ma min pa bsregs mdzad nas //
T09TD4156E:94b-21: ye shes me lce grags pas rnam khyab du ba can //
T09TD4156E:94b-22: chu yis mi bzhin du ni dus kyi chu yis ni //
T09TD4156E:94b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i me de mya ngan 'da' par bya //
T09TD4156E:94b-24: de nas mchog gi drang srong dang mtshungs drang srong gzhan //
T09TD4156E:94b-25: mtho ris gnas kyang 'bras bu rnams la ma chags pas //
T09TD4156E:94b-26: rab tu zhi ba'i dgra bcom drang srong mthong nas su //
T09TD4156E:94b-27: ri dbang brtan pas tshig ni rnam par smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:94b-28: 'jig rten dag na 'ga' zhig nyams par mi 'gro med //
T09TD4156E:94b-29: de ltar 'gor ba med cing song ba med pa ste //
T09TD4156E:94b-30: mchog dang mchog min mkhyen pa mchog gi don rig pa //
T09TD4156E:94b-31: ston pa mtshungs med gang du rab tu zhi bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:94b-32: shes rab rnam par dag cing mchog gi spyan mnga' ba ;
T09TD4156E:94b-33: / yongs su 'dren pa po nyid 'di yis dman pa ni //
T09TD4156E:94b-34: rmongs pa nges par mig long gson pa'i 'jig rten ni //
T09TD4156E:94b-35: 'du shes nyams shing lam ngan la ni gnas par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:94b-36: de nas 'gro ba'i 'gal ba ma yin ma 'gags pa //
T09TD4156E:95a-0: rjes su chags pa nyams shing skye ba 'gags byas @95a * //
T09TD4156E:95a-2: /'jig rten snang bas dman pa mthong nas su //
T09TD4156E:95a-3: thub ba zhi ba na ni zhi ba'i yid kyis smras //
T09TD4156E:95a-4: shes rab ldan pa 'du byed cho ga la gnas pa //
T09TD4156E:95a-5: dus 'dir nges par blo gtad bya ba ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:95a-6: mi rtag nyid kyi rdo rje nges par btung ba yis //
T09TD4156E:95a-7: gang du thub ba ri bo chen po bcom par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:95a-8: snying po med cing nga med rnam par nyams pa'i chos //
T09TD4156E:95a-9: 'jig rten gson pa'i 'jig rten kye ma smod par shog / gang du thub dka' drang srong chen po seng ge yang //
T09TD4156E:95a-10: nyes pa'i gnyis 'thung rnams ni nyams par mdzad nas nyams //
T09TD4156E:95a-11: 'dod chags bral ba min pa'i 'gro ba 'jug pa la //
T09TD4156E:95a-12: da ni 'jigs pa chen po ma yin su yi lags //
T09TD4156E:95a-13: thun mong las ni gang du de bzhin gshegs pa yang //
T09TD4156E:95a-14: gser gyi ka ba lta bu kun nas chags par gyur //
T09TD4156E:95a-15: sa bon drug dang myu gu gcig dang lo ma gcig / rtsa ba drug dang 'bras bu lnga dang yal ga gnyis //
T09TD4156E:95a-16: phung po gsum dang bdag nyid gcig la nyon mongs kyi //
T09TD4156E:95a-17: sdong po 'di ni bcag nas thub pa gnyis 'thung gzims //
T09TD4156E:95a-18: 'gro rgyal mda' bzhin dgra bo rnams ni bcom nas su //
T09TD4156E:95a-19: chu med pa na rma bya bzhin du chags bral zhing //
T09TD4156E:95a-20: mgyogs 'gro rta bzhin du ni rnam rgyal lam song ba //
T09TD4156E:95a-21: me bzhin thub pa skye ba med cing zhi bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:95a-22: mtho ris dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa mig 'phel na //
T09TD4156E:95a-23: rab tu tshim byed rgyun bzhin gsung rnams btang nas su //
T09TD4156E:95a-24: 'od kyis nyam thag ba lang bzhin sar rnam brgyus nas //
T09TD4156E:95a-25: grags pas phyogs ni mngon par bkang nas bla ma gzims //
T09TD4156E:95a-26: snyan grags ldan pa nyid dang 'od zer ldan pa ste //
T09TD4156E:95a-27: chu bo sin dhu bzhin du gser skyug shugs ldan pa //
T09TD4156E:95a-28: rnam thos bu yi rdzu 'phrul mi skyong sder bcas pa //
T09TD4156E:95a-29: lam la bcug nas mi yi nyi ma nub par gyur //
T09TD4156E:95a-30: rmug pa'i do shal gyi ni phyogs rnams dkris pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:95a-31: rgya chen sprin rnams kyis dkris nyi ma'i 'od rnams bzhin ;
T09TD4156E:95a-32: / mchod sbyin rdzogs tshe mar gyis sman pa'i me bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:95a-33: thub pa zhi tshe de ring 'jig rten gsal ma gyur //
T09TD4156E:95a-34: mdud pa med pa bden pa'i lam ni bsnyen nas su //
T09TD4156E:95a-35: mdud pa med pa zhi ba'i chos 'di brnyes nas ni //
T09TD4156E:95a-36: rdzu 'phrul gyis ni sku lus 'dren par nus na yang //
T09TD4156E:95b-0: sdug bsngal @95b dag gi gter ni lus yin zhes spangs so //
T09TD4156E:95b-1: mun pa mun pa nyi mas bzhin du zil mnan nas //
T09TD4156E:95b-2: rdul ni rdul ni char pa bzhin du mngon bcom nas //
T09TD4156E:95b-3: slar yang slar yang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor mi len te //
T09TD4156E:95b-4: thub pa thub pa skar rgyal bzhin du mngon par gshegs //
T09TD4156E:95b-5: gang zhig skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms phyir skyes pa ste //
T09TD4156E:95b-6: gang la 'jig rten pas ni zhi ba'i ched du bsnyen //
T09TD4156E:95b-7: gang zhig 'od zer mchog gis rnam par gsal ba dang //
T09TD4156E:95b-8: khyad par 'phags pa'i blo yis rnam par gsal bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:95b-9: gang gis skye dgu rnams ni dge legs la bcug ste //
T09TD4156E:95b-10: yon tan rgya chen rnams kyis sa la rgyas pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:95b-11: 'dod pa'i snyan grags gsal ba rnams kyis 'phel ba ste //
T09TD4156E:95b-12: khyim na gnas pa yin kyang grags pas 'phel ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:95b-13: gang gis mkhyen zhing smod pas 'o dod ma bos shing //
T09TD4156E:95b-14: mi ni nyam thag rnams la brtse bas bos pa ste //
T09TD4156E:95b-15: bza' ba ngan pa rab tu 'joms shing ma gsol la //
T09TD4156E:95b-16: bza' ba legs pa rjes su 'gro zhing ma gsol to //
T09TD4156E:95b-17: mi gnas dbang po zhi ba gang zhig yul rnams la //
T09TD4156E:95b-18: stobs rab dbang po nyid las yang dag me gnas shing //
T09TD4156E:95b-19: gzhan rnams kyis ma thob pa'i lam bzangs thob pa ste //
T09TD4156E:95b-20: ro mkhyen pas ni nges par 'byung ba'i ro gsol to //
T09TD4156E:95b-21: gang gis sngar ma byin pa'i sbyin pa byin pa ste //
T09TD4156E:95b-22: 'bras bu 'dod pas cung zad zhig ni mi byin la //
T09TD4156E:95b-23: mnyam nyid rjes mthun phun sum tshogs pa dor ba ste //
T09TD4156E:95b-24: dam pa rnams kyi yid rnams yon tan rnams kyis phrogs //
T09TD4156E:95b-25: brtan pa rnams kyi g-yo ba'i spyan ni bsrungs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:95b-26: brtan par gshegs shing sems ni bsrung du bcug gyur la //
T09TD4156E:95b-27: dge / legs rnams ni bsrungs shing 'phel bar mdzad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:95b-28: chos skyes pa ni cung zhig 'dod par ma mdzad do //
T09TD4156E:95b-29: brtan pas mi dge ba las mi dge rnam spangs nas //
T09TD4156E:95b-30: dge legs kyi ni dgra bo skyon rnams spangs pa ste ;
T09TD4156E:95b-31: / gang zhig blo yis nyes pa rnams ni kun spangs la //
T09TD4156E:95b-32: de ni 'phags min mi rtag nyid kyis nub par gyur //
T09TD4156E:95b-33: gang la chos ni 'dod pa yang dag rjes song zhing //
T09TD4156E:95b-34: dga' bas mchog tu nges pa rnam par bzung ba ste //
T09TD4156E:95b-35: me yis nor ni zos pa ji lta ba bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:96a-1: shes nor can de yang srog song ngo //
T09TD4156E:96a-2: brgyad po rnams la mchog tu sde tshen lnga thul zhing //
T09TD4156E:96a-3: gsum gzigs spyod pa gsum ni zad byed spyan gsum pa //
T09TD4156E:96a-4: gcig ni bsrungs nas gcig ni thob nas gcig rtogs nas //
T09TD4156E:96a-5: lci ba bdun rnams spangs nas bla ma gzims par gyur //
T09TD4156E:96a-6: gang gi zhi ba'i ched du lam ni gsal mdzad de //
T09TD4156E:96a-7: legs pa'i skye bo zhi bas rab tu dang mdzad cing //
T09TD4156E:96a-8: nyon mongs ljon shing rab tu chags pa bcad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:96a-9: srid pa rnams las gus pa ldan pa rnams bsgral to //
T09TD4156E:96a-10: gsung gi bdud rtsis 'jig rten shin tu tshim mdzad cing //
T09TD4156E:96a-11: bzod pa yis ni khro ba yongs su bzung ba ste //
T09TD4156E:96a-12: slob ma'i sde ni dge legs la ni rol mdzad la //
T09TD4156E:96a-13: dge legs don du gnyer rnams phra mo rtogs su bcug / legs pa rnams la chos kyi sa bon skyed mdzad cing //
T09TD4156E:96a-14: rgyu yi bdag nyid 'phags pa'i lam ni thob mdzad la //
T09TD4156E:96a-15: 'jig rten 'das pas 'phags pa min pa ma brten zhing //
T09TD4156E:96a-16: chos las ma gtogs gzhan la sbyar ba ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:96a-17: k'a shi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste //
T09TD4156E:96a-18: blo dang ldan pa nyid kyis 'jig rten tshim mdzad cing //
T09TD4156E:96a-19: gdul bya rnams ni chos kyi cho gar spyad mdzad la //
T09TD4156E:96a-20: bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i ched du dge bar mdzad //
T09TD4156E:96a-21: gzhan rnams kyis ma mthong ba'i de nyid mthong mdzad cing //
T09TD4156E:96a-22: yon tan rnams kyis chos byed rnams la sbyar ba ste //
T09TD4156E:96a-23: gzhan gyi lugs rnams tshar bcad nas ni skul gyur la //
T09TD4156E:96a-24: rtogs par dka' ba'i don ni rnam par shes par mdzad //
T09TD4156E:96a-25: thams cad mi rtag pa dang bdag med par gsungs shing //
T09TD4156E:96a-26: srid pa rnams su bde ba cung zad ma bsrungs la //
T09TD4156E:96a-27: snyan pa'i ba dan gyen du rnam par bsgrengs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:96a-28: nga rgyal ka ba mthon po rnam par bsgyel ba mdzad //
T09TD4156E:96a-29: smad kyang rang gi thugs ni bskyod pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:96a-30: thams cad la ni 'jug pa rnams la sred ma mdzad //
T09TD4156E:96a-31: rang nyid rgal zhing bying ba bsgral bar mdzad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:96a-32: zhi zhing pha rol 'khrul pa zhi bar mdzad gyur la //
T09TD4156E:96a-33: grol zhing pha rol bcings pa grol bar mdzad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:96a-34: rtogs shing pha rol rmongs pas rtogs pas mdzad pa'o //
T09TD4156E:96b-0: thub pa thub pas tshul dang @96b tshul min mkhyen 'di des //
T09TD4156E:96b-1: sems can rnams ni yang dag gtam gyis rjes bzung nas //
T09TD4156E:96b-2: tshul min la dga' tshul min 'byung po rnams la ni //
T09TD4156E:96b-3: bskal pa 'jig pa'i tshe na chos bzhin rab tu gzims //
T09TD4156E:96b-4: chu ldan sprin bzhin sa 'dzin ri bo nags tshal bzhin //
T09TD4156E:96b-5: 'od ldan rgan po bzhin du 'od ldan gzhon nu bzhin //
T09TD4156E:96b-6: 'jig rten dag gi lta byed bcom nas 'jig rten gyi //
T09TD4156E:96b-7: lta byed nye bar phrogs nas 'gros su 'di gshegs so //
T09TD4156E:96b-8: dbang phyug dam pa gang la ltung bas me reg cing //
T09TD4156E:96b-9: gang gis mchog tu zhi ba'i lam ni brnyes pa ste //
T09TD4156E:96b-10: zhi ba brnyes pa de ni gus pas mthong nas su //
T09TD4156E:96b-11: de ring 'jig rten gnyen 'dun med cing rgud pa 'dra //
T09TD4156E:96b-12: 'joms par 'dod cing stobs ni rab zhugs bdud kyang ni //
T09TD4156E:96b-13: sde dang bcas pas gang ni thub par ma nus pa //
T09TD4156E:96b-14: 'joms par 'dod cing stobs zhugs bdud kyis de ring ni //
T09TD4156E:96b-15: de ni dus kyi sbyor las 'joms par nus par gyur //
T09TD4156E:96b-16: 'byung po rnams ni thams cad rnams ni 'dus pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:96b-17: sdug bsngal rnams kyis zil non lha dang bcas pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:96b-18: 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa gang rnams zad pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:96b-19: de ltar mchog tu mya ngan 'das pa thob ma yin //
T09TD4156E:96b-20: skye dgu rnams kyi snang mdzad gang gis 'jig rten ni //
T09TD4156E:96b-21: nye bar skye ba me long bzhin du gzigs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:96b-22: rgyang ring du'am nye bar mtho ris su'am mthar //
T09TD4156E:96b-23: lha yi rna bas sgra ni rnam par thos pa'o //
T09TD4156E:96b-24: bar snang dag la skar ma'i khang par 'dzegs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:96b-25: sa la rab tu zhugs kyang theg pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:96b-26: chu la rab tu gshegs kyang nub pa ma yin la //
T09TD4156E:96b-27: sku yis rnam par 'gyur ba mang po rnams mdzad do //
T09TD4156E:96b-28: de rnams de rnams gnas rnams lam 'gros lam na bzhin //
T09TD4156E:96b-29: gang gis skye ba du ma rnams kyang dran pa ste //
T09TD4156E:96b-30: yid kyis pha rol rnams kyi yid kyi spyod pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:96b-31: dbang po las 'das sna tshogs rnams kyang mkhyen ba'o //
T09TD4156E:96b-32: thams cad mnyam par rab zhugs thams cad mkhyen pa des //
T09TD4156E:96b-33: zag pa thams cad bcad cing bya ba thams cad mdzad //
T09TD4156E:96b-34: ye shes kyis ni nyon mongs thams cad rnam spangs nas //
T09TD4156E:96b-35: ye shes de nyid kun nas brnyes nas gzims par gyur //
T09TD4156E:97a-1: rnams kyi rno ba'i sems rnams btul ba ste //
T09TD4156E:97a-2: rno ba ma yin blo rnams rim gyis drag par mdzad //
T09TD4156E:97a-3: rigs las chos kyi nyes pa spang bar mdzad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:97a-4: 'chi med ched du chos ni su yis ston par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:97a-5: rten dang bral ba'i 'jig rten nyam thag pa la ni ;
T09TD4156E:97a-6: / zhi ba'i ched du chos kyi 'thor ma su yis ster //
T09TD4156E:97a-7: thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan la rang gi don mdzad nas //
T09TD4156E:97a-8: gzhan gyi nyon mongs dra ba su yis 'byed par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:97a-9: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gzhol ba'i 'jig rten dag gi ni //
T09TD4156E:97a-10: zhi ba'i ched du ye shes dam pa su yis smra //
T09TD4156E:97a-11: shes pa med par gzhol ba'i 'jig rten dag gi ni //
T09TD4156E:97a-12: dge ba'i ched du ye shes dam pa su yis smra //
T09TD4156E:97a-13: ji ltar nyin mor byed pa 'od zer med pa dang //
T09TD4156E:97a-14: ji ltar chu bo sin dhu 'bab pa med pa dang //
T09TD4156E:97a-15: sa bdag rgyal srid dang ni rnam par bral ba'am //
T09TD4156E:97a-16: de phyir 'jig rten 'jig rten mkhyen pas rnam par dman //
T09TD4156E:97a-17: blo yis rig pa bzhin du bde bas dbyangs bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:97a-18: dpal gyis mi skyong bzhin du bzod pas chos bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:97a-19: de bzhin skyes bu mchog gis rnam par dman pa ni //
T09TD4156E:97a-20: 'gro ba de ni yod pa dang ni med pa nyid //
T09TD4156E:97a-21: ji ltar kha lo sgyur bas shing rta dor ba dang ;
T09TD4156E:97a-22: / skya ba 'dzin pas gru dang tshul gyis sde dang ni //
T09TD4156E:97a-23: tshong dpon gyis ni tshong pa sman pas nad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:97a-24: de bzhin 'jig rten bde bar gshegs pas rnam par sman //
T09TD4156E:97a-25: dbyar tha dang ni ston rar mkha' la sprin med na //
T09TD4156E:97a-26: rlung gis kyang ni mkha' la bsnyen pa med pa na //
T09TD4156E:97a-27: 'tsho bar 'dod pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal ji lta ba //
T09TD4156E:97a-28: de ltar thar 'dod rnams kyi nga ni nyam thag 'di //
T09TD4156E:97a-29: de ltar dam pa'i don mdzad dgra bcom yin na yang //
T09TD4156E:97a-30: byed pa shes pa nyid kyis bla ma la zhugs pa //
T09TD4156E:97a-31: de ni chags bral yin kyang srid pa'i skyon rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:97a-32: ston pa'i yon tan rnams ni mang po rnams smras so //
T09TD4156E:97a-33: de nas chags bral min rnams mchi ma 'thon pa ste //
T09TD4156E:97a-34: brtan pa btang nas dge slong tshogs ni mya ngan dang //
T09TD4156E:97a-35: 'jig rten 'god pa'i bdag nyid can zhes byar bzung nas //
T09TD4156E:97a-36: bya ba'i 'khor lo rnams ni brtan las ma g-yos so //
T09TD4156E:97b-0: de nas dus kyi dbang gis @97b gyad rnams kyis thos nas //
T09TD4156E:97b-1: gus pa'i dbang gis skyen par 'thon zhing song ba ste //
T09TD4156E:97b-2: khra yi stobs kyis zil mnan khrung khrung rnams bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:97b-3: kyi hud 'o brgyal zhes ni nyam thag 'thon pa'o //
T09TD4156E:97b-4: mun pa rab tu rgyas phyir thub pa rab gzims pa //
T09TD4156E:97b-5: nyi ma 'od med bzhin du de rnams kyis mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:97b-6: seng ges khyu mchog rmugs tsha ba lang rnams bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:97b-7: gus pas drag tu cho nges btab cing dus pa'o //
T09TD4156E:97b-8: chos dga' chos kyi bla ma rab tu zhi ba na //
T09TD4156E:97b-9: gus pas ji lta ba dang bsam pa ji lta bar //
T09TD4156E:97b-10: 'o dod 'bod cing mchi mas mig bcom de rnams kyi //
T09TD4156E:97b-11: dpal ldan dam pa 'ga' zhig 'di ni smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:97b-12: gang zhig gson pa'i 'jig rten gnyid tshe rab sad pa //
T09TD4156E:97b-13: 'di de mthar thug gzims mal la ni gzims pa ste //
T09TD4156E:97b-14: chos ni rnam par 'dzin pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di de ni //
T09TD4156E:97b-15: mchod sbyin mtha' na dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bzhin du btul //
T09TD4156E:97b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma nges par blo gsal zhing //
T09TD4156E:97b-17: brtson 'grus tshad gdung ye shes 'od zer stong ldan pa //
T09TD4156E:97b-18: nub par gyur tshe mi shes mun pa rnams bcom nas //
T09TD4156E:97b-19: 'jig rten dag na slar yang mun pa 'di mdzad do //
T09TD4156E:97b-20: 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gzigs nas su //
T09TD4156E:97b-21: da ni nges par 'jig rten mig ni sgrib pa ste //
T09TD4156E:97b-22: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho chen po rgod pa'i dba' rlabs las //
T09TD4156E:97b-23: 'dren mdzad zam pa 'di ni nges par de ni rgud //
T09TD4156E:97b-24: de ltar 'di na kha cig snying rje bar zlos shing //
T09TD4156E:97b-25: gzhan rnams shing rta'i rta rnams dud pa bzhin du sems //
T09TD4156E:97b-26: gzhan rnams skad bton gzhan rnams sa la 'gyel ba ste //
T09TD4156E:97b-27: bya ba de rnams sems can dbang gis byas //
T09TD4156E:97b-28: de nas dus su gser gyis spras shing sna tshogs pa //
T09TD4156E:97b-29: mche ba rin thang chen po longs ma spyad pa'i khyogs //
T09TD4156E:97b-30: gyad rnams ngu bzhin drang srong la ni glang chen gyi //
T09TD4156E:97b-31: lag pa dang mtshungs lag pa rnams ni btsugs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:97b-32: de nas dus dang mthun pa'i cho ga byas nas su //
T09TD4156E:97b-33: de la phreng ba yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T09TD4156E:97b-34: dri mchog dam pa rnams kyis de rnams kyis mchod cing //
T09TD4156E:98a-0: de nas dga' dang gus pas @98a * //
T09TD4156E:98a-2: de nas shing gzhon lus can gzhon nu ma rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:98a-3: gdu bu rab 'khrol zangs mdog lag pa rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:98a-4: glog gi 'phan rnams dag gis sprin ni dkar po bzhin //
T09TD4156E:98a-5: 'di la rin thang mchog gi bla re bzung ba'o //
T09TD4156E:98a-6: de bzhin mi rnams kha cig dag gis gdugs rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:98a-7: phreng ba dkar po ldan rnams kun nas bzung ba ste //
T09TD4156E:98a-8: kha cig dag gis gser gyi yo byad dang ldan pa'i //
T09TD4156E:98a-9: rnga yab dkar po rnams ni rnam par g-yabs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:98a-10: de nas khyu mchog rnams kyis bzhin du ngal ba yis //
T09TD4156E:98a-11: mig dmar gyad rnams dag gis khyogs ni bzung ba ste //
T09TD4156E:98a-12: sil snyan rnams ni rna ba'i yid du 'ong ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:98a-13: dbyar dus chu gter bzhin du mkha' la rab tu grags //
T09TD4156E:98a-14: phyogs kyi glang po'i dbang po rnams kyi bskul ba yis //
T09TD4156E:98a-15: mdzes pa dang ni rtsub 'gyur shing rnams las bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:98a-16: me tog padma la sogs de rnams de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:98a-17: lha yi me tog rnams ni lha nas lhung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:98a-18: dbang po'i glang po las skyes glang po che rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:98a-19: nor gnas snying po'i chu skyes padma rnams dang ni //
T09TD4156E:98a-20: man d'a ra yi me tog 'dab bcas chags pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:98a-21: chu thigs zer mas 'thor ba rnams kyis mngon bar 'thor //
T09TD4156E:98a-22: de nas dga' ba'i tshal skyes lus mchog ldan pa yi //
T09TD4156E:98a-23: tsandan dmar bo'i ro ni rnam par dul ba dang //
T09TD4156E:98a-24: 'bad pas ma bsgrubs bgo ba rnams ni dkar po rnams //
T09TD4156E:98a-25: dri za'i bu mo rnams kyis yang dag 'thor ba'o //
T09TD4156E:98a-26: rab tu g-yo ba'i ba dan rnams ni bzung ba ste //
T09TD4156E:98a-27: phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bkram pa ste //
T09TD4156E:98a-28: sil snyan rgya chen rnams kyis rjes su 'gro ba ste //
T09TD4156E:98a-29: zhi ba'i ched du zhi ba'i lam las khyogs te drangs //
T09TD4156E:98a-30: gus pa dang ldan gyad rnams kyis de yongs bzung nas //
T09TD4156E:98a-31: thub pa'i mthu las lan brgyar mngon par phyag 'tshal zhing //
T09TD4156E:98a-32: de yi rnam par nyams las kun nas du ba ste //
T09TD4156E:98a-33: grong khyer gyi ni dbus nas yongs su drangs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:98a-34: klu yi sgo nas zhugs te phyi rol byung nas ni //
T09TD4156E:98a-35: chu bo gser ldan zhes pa yang dag rgal nas su //
T09TD4156E:98a-36: cod pan zhes bya'i mchod rten gyi ni rtsa ba ru //
T09TD4156E:98b-0: grags @98b pas bsags phyir bsags pa de rnams kyis byas so //
T09TD4156E:98b-1: de nas shun pa 'dab ma dri bzangs aa ka ru //
T09TD4156E:98b-2: tsandan ae la klu rnams kyis bsags bsags pa ru //
T09TD4156E:98b-3: mya ngan las ni sbrul bzhin dbugs rgyu de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:98b-4: brtan min mig can rnams kyis thub pa'i sku bzhus so //
T09TD4156E:98b-5: de nas lan gsum bkod kyang me yi sgron ma yis //
T09TD4156E:98b-6: de tshe drang srong chen po'i bsags pa ma 'bar te //
T09TD4156E:98b-7: bag med ldan pa gzhu ni rnam par 'khrugs pa yis //
T09TD4156E:98b-8: mda' ni rang bzhin sa yi bdag po'i dpal bzhin no //
T09TD4156E:98b-9: lam dag tu ni rnam par 'ong ba'i 'od srungs ni //
T09TD4156E:98b-10: rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis sems ni gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:98b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung tshang ba lta 'dod de //
T09TD4156E:98b-12: gang gi mthu las me yi 'bar ba ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:98b-13: de nas de tshe bla ma blta ba'i don du ni //
T09TD4156E:98b-14: der ni dge slong skyen par nye bar song ba na //
T09TD4156E:98b-15: thub pa mchog la rab tu btud pa byas pa na//
T09TD4156E:98b-16: de ma thag tu me ni rang nyid 'bar bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:98b-17: nyon mongs rnams kyis ma tshig thub pa'i sku gdung la //
T09TD4156E:98b-18: pags pa sha dang spu dang cha shas rnams tshig nas //
T09TD4156E:98b-19: mar dang rlung dang bud shing yong su rgyas na yang /
T09TD4156E:98b-20: me yis rus pa tshig par nus pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:98b-21: de nas bdag nyid chen po 'das pa'i de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:98b-22: chu mchog gis ni dang bar byas nas dus su ni //
T09TD4156E:98b-23: mngon par bstod cing gyad rnams dag gis grong khyer du //
T09TD4156E:98b-24: gser gyi bum pa rnams kyis rab tu spyan drangs so //
T09TD4156E:98b-25: 'di ni ri bo chen po'i rin chen khams bzhin no //
T09TD4156E:98b-26: dge legs gang ba chen po rnams ni 'dzin pa ste //
T09TD4156E:98b-27: mtho ris dag na lha yi gtso bo'i khams bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:98b-28: khams ni me yis log par sbyor ba ma yin nyid //
T09TD4156E:98b-29: byams pas yong su rnam par bsgoms pa 'di rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:98b-30: 'dod chags me yis tshig pas rnam par spangs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:98b-31: de yi gus pa'i dbang gis gzung ba'i gdung rus rnams //
T09TD4156E:98b-32: bsil ba yin kyang bdag cag rnams kyi yid rnams bsregs //
T09TD4156E:98b-33: sred pa 'joms mdzad gang gi mthu las khyab ba 'jug gi / mkha' lding gis kyang khur bar nus pa ma yin pa //
T09TD4156E:98b-34: 'jig rten dag na mtshungs med de yi rus pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:99a-1: pa kho bo cag gis khur bar gyis //
T09TD4156E:99a-2: ae ma 'jig rten chos ni nges par stobs ldan te //
T09TD4156E:99a-3: chos la nus kyang nus pas gang gis ma bzlog cing //
T09TD4156E:99a-4: gang zhig snyan pas 'gro ba mtha' dag khyab pa ste //
T09TD4156E:99a-5: de yi sku yi cha shas 'di ni bum par gnas //
T09TD4156E:99a-6: gang zhig bdag gi snang bas nyi ma gzhan snang zhing //
T09TD4156E:99a-7: de yi sa ni snang bas rnam par mdzad pa ste //
T09TD4156E:99a-8: gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa de yi sku lus ni //
T09TD4156E:99a-9: me rnams kyis ni rus pa lhag mar byas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:99a-10: gang gis nyon mongs ri bo rgyas pa rnams phye sta //
T09TD4156E:99a-11: sdug bsngal thob pa na yang bstan pa ma phye zhing //
T09TD4156E:99a-12: sdug bsngal mtha' dag rnams ni bkag par gyur pa ste //
T09TD4156E:99a-13: drang srong de yi sku lus me yis bsregs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:99a-14: g-yul du dgra bo rnams kyis mchi ma phyung nas su //
T09TD4156E:99a-15: skyabs 'ongs rnams kyi mchi ma rnam par btul nas su //
T09TD4156E:99a-16: sdug pa na yang mchi ma bstan pas ma bton pa //
T09TD4156E:99a-17: lam du mchi ma 'thon zhing de rnams rnam par zlos //
T09TD4156E:99a-18: de rnams nga rgyal ldan zhing lag pa stobs dang ldan na yang //
T09TD4156E:99a-19: de ltar mya ngan byed cing nags bzhin grong khyer der zhugs shing //
T09TD4156E:99a-20: lam rnams su ni gdung de rnams ni skye bos mchod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:99a-21: mchod pa'i don du gzhal yas khang par mdzes par byas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:99a-22: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las //
T09TD4156E:99a-23: mya ngan las 'da' ba bsngags pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o /
T09TD4156E:99a-26: // / ji lta ba bzhin nyin zhag 'ga' zhig de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:99a-27: de rnams mchod pa dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa ste //
T09TD4156E:99a-28: chab 'og rgyal phran pho nya bdun rnams rim gyis ni //
T09TD4156E:99a-29: de yi ched du grong khyer der ni nye bar 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:99a-30: de nas de'i tshe gang rnams thos nas dus su ni //
T09TD4156E:99a-31: nga rgyal las dang de yi gus pa'i dbang las ni //
T09TD4156E:99a-32: gyad rnams 'thab mo la yang nges par song ba ste //
T09TD4156E:99a-33: sbyin pa la ni yid rnams byas pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:99a-34: de nas de dag rnams kyis rnam gzhag 'di rtogs nas //
T09TD4156E:99a-35: rlung bdun bzhin du mi dbang bdun po de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:99a-36: gyen du zhugs pa'i gang g'a'i shugs 'dra stobs tshogs ni //
T09TD4156E:99a-37: shin tu drag po rnams kyis ku sha zhes byar 'ongs //
T09TD4156E:99a-38: de nas grong ba'i skye bo nags mtha' nas skyen par //
T09TD4156E:99a-39: mi skyong de dag rnams kyi mgyogs 'gro'i sgra yis ni //
T09TD4156E:99a-40: khros pa las ni mgo bo rnams la bzung ba bzhin //
T09TD4156E:99a-41: 'jigs pas rgyas pa'i gdong rnams grong khyer la zhugs so //
T09TD4156E:99a-42: de nas mi skyong de rnams grong khyer de bkag nas //
T09TD4156E:99b-0: glang @99b po'i dbang po rnams bcings rtsed mo'i nags rnams su //
T09TD4156E:99b-1: gyad mchog rnams kyis mi mthun spyad du gyur pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:99b-2: rigs kyi rjes mthun cha lugs ldan rnams la gsos so //
T09TD4156E:99b-3: de nas mda' yab mdzes shing ring pa'i smin ma de //
T09TD4156E:99b-4: sgo yi mig ni rnam par btsums shing grong khyer de //
T09TD4156E:99b-5: mi dga' ba dang 'dus pa'i yan la ma bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:99b-6: dpung pa'i khyogs ni bteg pa nyam thag par gyur to //
T09TD4156E:99b-7: rgyal po bdun po rnams ni bya ba gcig pa ste //
T09TD4156E:99b-8: dpal gyis 'bar zhing shugs kyis 'phro ba rnams kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:99b-9: mnyam du dus gcig la ni gza' bdun rnams kyi ni //
T09TD4156E:99b-10: 'jigs pa dang bcas nam mkha' bzhin dus gyur to //
T09TD4156E:99b-11: sna rnams gnyis 'thung myos pa'i chang dri rnams kyis dang //
T09TD4156E:99b-12: mig rnams dpung gis bsnun pa'i rdul rnams dag gis dang //
T09TD4156E:99b-13: rna ba rnams ni rta glang rnga yi dbyangs rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:99b-14: mi mo'i skye bo yi yang der ni bcom par gyur //
T09TD4156E:99b-15: de nas skyogs rnams nang du khu ba 'bab pa ni //
T09TD4156E:99b-16: mdun du bdar rnams bsdogs byas rta pa'i tshogs rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:99b-17: glang po rnams kyis yongs bskor sgo ni phyed bkag ste //
T09TD4156E:99b-18: 'gegs shing g-yul la phyogs rnams kyis byas so //
T09TD4156E:99b-19: de nas shag ti ral gri mda' lag grong khyer pa //
T09TD4156E:99b-20: skrag pas da ni dpa' bas ngo tsha btang ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:99b-21: khra rnams bzhin du dgra bo rnams la lta bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:99b-22: nye ba'i 'thab ra rnams su kun nas gnas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:99b-23: brtan min ldan pa kha cig 'o dod 'bong pa ste //
T09TD4156E:99b-24: de bzhin gzhan rnams tshogs nas dung ni rab tu sgrogs //
T09TD4156E:99b-25: drag tu dregs rnams kha cig rab tu 'phen pa ste //
T09TD4156E:99b-26: de bzhin gzhan rnams ral gri sngon po rnams 'debs so //
T09TD4156E:99b-27: de nas rgyal ba'i ched du gyad rnams 'thab 'dod cing //
T09TD4156E:99b-28: gyad rnams bzhin du mtshan rnams sgrogs pa mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:99b-29: g-yul 'gyed yan lag ma rnams dag gi sems rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:99b-30: sman rnams dang mnyam mchod yon rnams ni g-yos par gyur //
T09TD4156E:99b-31: g-yul der thog mar 'gro bar 'dod pa'i bul ni //
T09TD4156E:99b-32: yul 'gyed yan lag ma rnams der ni yongs 'dar zhing //
T09TD4156E:99b-33: go cha bcings nas zhi ba'i shes pa byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:99b-34: sems khral gdong rnams mchi ma bton pa ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:99b-35: sems khral gdong las gzhan rnams ri dags mo bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:99b-36: khyim thab 'gro bar 'dod pa'i gzhu la 'phyangs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:99b-37: gang gi gdong ni 'thab la dpa' ba de mthong nas //
T09TD4156E:99b-38: bcings pa'i 'phro spong song ba ma yin gnas ma yin //
T09TD4156E:99b-39: bum pa'i nang du yang dag bkag pa'i sbrul rnams bzhin //
T09TD4156E:100a-1: kyis de ltar rab tu 'phro ba de rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:100a-2: de ltar rnam par gzhag pa'i gyad rnams mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:100a-3: mi dbang rnams kyis g-yul gyi ched du blo bsams so //
T09TD4156E:100a-4: shing rta glang po rta dang rkang thang dregs pa ni //
T09TD4156E:100a-5: g-yul la kun nas nye bar gzhol ba mthong nas ni //
T09TD4156E:100a-6: mkhas pa nyid kyis dang ni mdza' bo nyid kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:100a-7: gnyis skyes bre bos tshig ni 'di skad ces smras so //
T09TD4156E:100a-8: g-yul du dgra bo rnams kyi srog dang dregs pa ni //
T09TD4156E:100a-9: khyed cag rnams kyi mda' yis 'joms par nus pa ste //
T09TD4156E:100a-10: rdzod pa tha dad gnas rnams bde bar mi nus na //
T09TD4156E:100a-11: pha rol bya ba gcig pa rnams ni smos ci dgos //
T09TD4156E:100a-12: ci ste kun nas bkag pas pha rol 'joms pa la //
T09TD4156E:100a-13: blo ni byas rnams de ni rnam par zlog mdzod dang //
T09TD4156E:100a-14: nyes pa med pa'i grong pa'i skye bo 'gegs pa yi //
T09TD4156E:100a-15: gtse bar byed pa de ni chos ni ci zhig yin //
T09TD4156E:100a-16: dong du zhugs pa'i nag po'i sbrul rnams bgrod pa ni //
T09TD4156E:100a-17: gcig la gnas pa rnams kyis dus su rmugs pa bzhin //
T09TD4156E:100a-18: bkag nas rgyal ba mtha' gcig yod pa ma yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:100a-19: brgya la bkag pa rnams kyis rgyal ba 'thob par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:100a-20: grong gi nang du bkag pa'i gtad rnams zhugs pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:100a-21: yid dang ldan pa nyid las mi rnams kyis thos nas //
T09TD4156E:100a-22: bsreg bya rnams kyis 'thor ba'i chung du'i me bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:100a-23: gzi brjid dman kyang legs pa chen por 'gro bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:100a-24: chos kyi bdag nyid can rnams grong du bkag na yang //
T09TD4156E:100a-25: 'joms 'dod thob pa rnams ni dka' thub gyis gtor te //
T09TD4156E:100a-26: dpung ni zad par gyur kyang k'a sha'i grong khyer du //
T09TD4156E:100a-27: lag pa sgra byed chos kyi stobs las rnam par rgyal //
T09TD4156E:100a-28: snyan grags ched dam yul ni 'thob pa'i ched du sa //
T09TD4156E:100a-29: mtha' dag gang rnams kyis kyang mngon par thob pa ste //
T09TD4156E:100a-30: ba lang rnams kyis chu gnas nas chu 'thungs nas bzhin //
T09TD4156E:100a-31: bor nas nor 'dzin bdag po de rnams sa la song //
T09TD4156E:100a-32: de phyir chos dang don ni yang dag mthong nas su //
T09TD4156E:100a-33: khyed cag rnams kyis zhi bas 'bad pa mdzod cig dang //
T09TD4156E:100a-34: mda' yis 'pham pa rnams ni slar yang 'bar ba ste /
T09TD4156E:100b-0: zhi bas @100b 'pham pa rnams kyi rnam 'gyur yod ma yin //
T09TD4156E:100b-1: 'di kun khyed cag rnams kyi tshad ma ma yin te //
T09TD4156E:100b-2: khyed kyi stobs kyi dgra yi stobs las 'gro bar nus //
T09TD4156E:100b-3: sh'akya thub pa gang la mchod par blo yod na //
T09TD4156E:100b-4: de nyid kyi ni gsung la bzod pas bsnyen mdzod cig / de skad ces sogs 'dod pa rnam par nges pa ni //
T09TD4156E:100b-5: bram ze'i drang pos dang ni rab tu dga' ba yis //
T09TD4156E:100b-6: rgyal po yin yang rjes su bstan nas legs pa des //
T09TD4156E:100b-7: dge legs smras shing de nas de rnams kyis smras so //
T09TD4156E:100b-8: dus dang sbyar te mkhas shing phan la bshes kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:100b-9: tshig gang 'di de kyed kyis rnam par smras pa ste //
T09TD4156E:100b-10: chos la dga' ba nyid dang stobs la brten pa las //
T09TD4156E:100b-11: rgyal po rnams kyis bsam pa nges par shes par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:100b-12: 'dod pa'i phyir dang khro phyir stobs phyir 'chi ba'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:100b-13: phal che bar ni bya bar song zhing 'gro ba ste //
T09TD4156E:100b-14: mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas kho bo cag rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:100b-15: sangs rgyas nyid la mchod pa la ni gzhu rnams bzung //
T09TD4156E:100b-16: nga rgyal don du mchod yon blangs la rtsod pa ni //
T09TD4156E:100b-17: byis pa skyong dang drag po dag gis khyab 'jug byung //
T09TD4156E:100b-18: nga rgyal spang phyir mchod pa'i don du nged rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:100b-19: tshe rnams dag kyang 'dor bar mi bgyi gang las yin //
T09TD4156E:100b-20: bu mo la ni sa skyong dag gi rgyal po rnams //
T09TD4156E:100b-21: gtum po long byed rnams ni rtsod par song ba ste //
T09TD4156E:100b-22: 'dod pa 'joms phyir mchod pa'i don du nged rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:100b-23: tshe rnams dag kyang 'dor bar mi bgyid gang las yin //
T09TD4156E:100b-24: rgyal rigs zad phyir drang srong drag tu khros pa ni //
T09TD4156E:100b-25: ngan spong bu yis g-yul du mtshon rnams bzung ba ste ;
T09TD4156E:100b-26: / khro ba 'joms phyir mchod pa'i don du nged rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:100b-27: tshe rnams dag kyang 'dor bar mi bgyid gang las yin //
T09TD4156E:100b-28: lha mo s'i tar mngon brjod 'chi ba yongs bzung nas //
T09TD4156E:100b-29: srid po shin tu dregs pa yang ni nyams pa ste //
T09TD4156E:100b-30: yongs 'dzin spong phyir mchod pa don du nged rnams kyis ;
T09TD4156E:100b-31: / tshe rnams dag kyang 'dor bar mi bgyid gang las yin //
T09TD4156E:100b-32: ae di lam ni pa ka zhes ni dgra 'phel zhing //
T09TD4156E:100b-33: rgyal rigs bye ba rnams ni de ltar nyams pa ste //
T09TD4156E:100b-34: rmongs mun gtor phyir mchod pa'i don du nged rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:100b-35: tshe rnams dag kyang 'dor bar mi bgyid gang las yin //
T09TD4156E:101a-0: @101a * // de skad ces sogs 'jig rten dag na 'thab mo ni //
T09TD4156E:101a-1: skyon las skyes pa mang po rnams ni byung gyur te //
T09TD4156E:101a-2: ston pa bla na med pa'i gus pas mchi ba dang //
T09TD4156E:101a-3: bcas pa yin kyang 'thab mo mi bgyid gang las yin //
T09TD4156E:101a-4: de lta na yang bdag cag rnams kyi nges pa 'di //
T09TD4156E:101a-5: khyed kyi pho nyar gyur cig skyen par gshegs mdzod la //
T09TD4156E:101a-6: ji ltar don ni 'thab mo min pas 'grub pa cig / de ltar bdag nyid kun gyis 'bad pa gyis mdzod cig / khyed kyis chos ldan tshig rnams kyis ni nged cag rnams //
T09TD4156E:101a-7: 'thab par 'dod cing mda' yi mche ba rnon po can//
T09TD4156E:101a-8: nang du rab tu 'phel ba'i dug ni 'thungs pa rnams //
T09TD4156E:101a-9: sngags rnams kyis ni sbrul rnams bzhin du bkag pa'o //
T09TD4156E:101a-10: de ltar bgyi zhes rgyal po rnams kyi tshig bzung nas //
T09TD4156E:101a-11: bram ze de ni grong khyer de la rab zhugs shing //
T09TD4156E:101a-12: ji ltar rim gyis gyad rnams dag ni mthong ba ste //
T09TD4156E:101a-13: mthong nas dus su tshig ni 'di skad ces smras so //
T09TD4156E:101a-14: gzhu rnams lag na gnas pa'i mi dbang 'di rnams ni //
T09TD4156E:101a-15: nyi ltar byi dor go cha 'bar rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:101a-16: khyed cag rnams kyis grong 'dir nges par ro myang zhing //
T09TD4156E:101a-17: seng ge bzhin du rnam par 'gying zhing gnas pa'o //
T09TD4156E:101a-18: de rnams kyi ni shubs su bkod pa'i ral gri dang //
T09TD4156E:101a-19: gser gyi rgyab ldan gzhu rnams nges par rtogs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:101a-20: grub ba'i chos dran nas ni chos min gyis 'jigs shing //
T09TD4156E:101a-21: zhu ba gsol bar byed de g-yul la 'jigs rnams min //
T09TD4156E:101a-22: de rnams mngon par 'ongs rnams sa yi phyir min zhing //
T09TD4156E:101a-23: nor phyir ma yin rgyags phyir ma yin dgra phyir min //
T09TD4156E:101a-24: thub pa'i gus pas nged cag rnams kyi zhe sa 'di //
T09TD4156E:101a-25: de phyir khyed cag rnams kyi bya bas bkur sti mdzad //
T09TD4156E:101a-26: thub pa de la khyed cag gi dang nged cag gi / bla ma nyid du mnyam ste 'di las ngal ba 'di //
T09TD4156E:101a-27: de phyir spun gyi tshogs ni 'dus nas 'ongs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:101a-28: bla ma'i gdung rnams mchod pa la ni bya ba gcig / ji ltar chos kyi cho ga la ni ser sna nyid //
T09TD4156E:101a-29: nor rnams la ni ser sna de ltar skyon ma yin //
T09TD4156E:101a-30: ser sna smra ba nges pa nyid du skyon yin zhing //
T09TD4156E:101a-31: skyon ni chos kyi dgra bor gyur pa nyid yin no //
T09TD4156E:101b-0: gal te mi sbyin par ni khyed @101b rnams kyis ngas na //
T09TD4156E:101b-1: rdzong nas 'thon nas 'gron po rnams la bsnyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:101b-2: gang rnams kyis stobs mnga' rnams ma yin sgo glegs rnams //
T09TD4156E:101b-3: de rnams rigs su skyes pa'i rgyal rigs ma yin no //
T09TD4156E:101b-4: byams pa dang ni gzi brjid ston par byed bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:101b-5: mi dbang rnams kyis khyed cag rnams la de skad smras //
T09TD4156E:101b-6: bdag gi smra 'dod gang yang rang gis rtogs nas su //
T09TD4156E:101b-7: dga' las bdag gi de ni khyed cag rnams kyis nyon //
T09TD4156E:101b-8: 'ga' zhig rtsod pa dge ba ma yin chos min te //
T09TD4156E:101b-9: rnam par 'gras par ma 'gro zhi ba bsnyen par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:101b-10: thub pa des ni bzod pa rab tu bsngags pa ste //
T09TD4156E:101b-11: gang gis gus pas me ni kun nas 'phel bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:101b-12: nor dang 'dod pa dag gi gcig gi ched du ni //
T09TD4156E:101b-13: rnam par rtsod pa tshul ni nye bar 'gyur ba ste //
T09TD4156E:101b-14: chos kyi ched du slar yang 'phags par gyur pa ni //
T09TD4156E:101b-15: zhi ba dang ni dgra bo rnam par rtsod par smra //
T09TD4156E:101b-16: gang zhig nye ngar zhi zhing byams pa'i thugs kyis ni //
T09TD4156E:101b-17: sems can thams cad rnams la brtse ba gsungs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:101b-18: thugs rje chen po mnga' ba de la mchod pa ni //
T09TD4156E:101b-19: 'tshe ba byas nas bdag gi lugs dang mtshungs ma yin //
T09TD4156E:101b-20: de phyir gdung ni rab tu sbyin las 'di rnams la //
T09TD4156E:101b-21: grags pa dang ni chos kyis yang dag bgo ba mdzod //
T09TD4156E:101b-22: de ltar gyur na khyed kyis rtsod min de dag dang //
T09TD4156E:101b-23: de dag gis kyang chos dang grags pa 'thob par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:101b-24: chos ldan skyes bu rnams kyis chos las g-yos pa ni //
T09TD4156E:101b-25: chos la 'bad pa las kyang nged rnams kyis sbyor na //
T09TD4156E:101b-26: gang bdag rnams kyis gzhan dag chos la sbyor byed pa ;
T09TD4156E:101b-27: / de dag rnams kyis chos ni gnas pa'i ched du 'jug / drang srong dam pa mchog gis chos kyi sbyin pa ni //
T09TD4156E:101b-28: sbyin pa thams cad kyi ni khyad par 'phags par gsungs //
T09TD4156E:101b-29: gang zhig la las nor la sbyor bar byed pa ste //
T09TD4156E:101b-30: chos kyi sbyin pa po ni rnam par bsags pa yin //
T09TD4156E:101b-31: de nas snyan grags dang ni bde ba 'dren pa dang //
T09TD4156E:101b-32: chos kyi tshig ni de las nye bar thob nas ni //
T09TD4156E:101b-33: ngo tsha dang bcas phan tshun lta ba de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:101b-34: bre bo'i rigs mnyam bram ze la ni smras pa'o //
T09TD4156E:101b-35: ae ma mdza' bo'i dge la khyod kyis nges pa ste //
T09TD4156E:102a-0: yon tan rnams la bram ze'i rjes su mthun pas @102a * //
T09TD4156E:102a-2: / lam gzhan gyis ni 'khrul ba'i rta ngan rnams bzhin du //
T09TD4156E:102a-3: gang gis legs par bsnyen pa'i lam la bkod par 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:102a-4: ji ltar smras pa de ltar de ni ldan 'gyur zhing //
T09TD4156E:102a-5: brtse zhing mnyen pa'i tshig 'di 'dzin par rigs pa ste //
T09TD4156E:102a-6: mdza' bo'i skye bo'i tshig la shin tu 'das nas su //
T09TD4156E:102a-7: phyi nas sdug bsngal nyid du lhung rnams mya ngan 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:102a-8: de nas 'gro ba'i khams rig gdung ni gyad rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:102a-9: de rnams brgyad du gus pas yon tan las bgos so //
T09TD4156E:102a-10: de nas rang nyid kyis ni cha shas bzung nas ni //
T09TD4156E:102a-11: bdun po so so so sor gzhan rnams la byin to //
T09TD4156E:102a-12: gyad rnams dag gis mngon mchod sa skyong de rnams kyang //
T09TD4156E:102a-13: dga' zhing don byas rnams ni rang yul rnams su gshegs //
T09TD4156E:102a-14: de nas drang srong gis gdung de rnams cho ga bzhin //
T09TD4156E:102a-15: rang grong rnams su mchod rten rab gnas rnams de byas //
T09TD4156E:102a-16: de nas rang gi yul du thub pa'i mchod rten ni //
T09TD4156E:102a-17: byed 'dod bre bos so sor bgos pa'i bum pa blangs //
T09TD4156E:102a-18: sol ba lhag ma rnams kyang pi sa la zhes pa'i //
T09TD4156E:102a-19: gus pas rjes su rab ldan rnams kyis bslangs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:102a-20: de nas gdung gi snying po can gyi sngon du brgyad //
T09TD4156E:102a-21: brag ri dkar po dang mtshungs mchod rten rnams gyur zhing //
T09TD4156E:102a-22: de yi bum pas bsnyen pa bram ze'i dgu pa ste //
T09TD4156E:102a-23: sol ba'i snying po dang ldan bcu pa byung bar gyur //
T09TD4156E:102a-24: thub pa'i mchod rten sna tshogs ba dan g-yo ba rnams //
T09TD4156E:102a-25: ti se'i gangs ri'i rtse mo dang mtshungs de rnams la //
T09TD4156E:102a-26: rang gi skye bo dang bcas mi skyong de rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:102a-27: skye dgu dang bcas bram ze rnams kyis sa na mchod //
T09TD4156E:102a-28: phreng ba mngon sbyar rnams dang dri bzangs mchog rnams dang //
T09TD4156E:102a-29: phreng ba dge ba rnams dang sil snyan dbyangs rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:102a-30: mchod pa dam pa mi skyong de rnams de rnams kyis //
T09TD4156E:102a-31: rgyal ba'i gdung ni 'dzin pa de rnams la byas so //
T09TD4156E:102a-32: de nas dus su dgra bcom rnams kyi lnga brgya rnams //
T09TD4156E:102a-33: ri bo lngas mtshan grong khyer du ni yongs 'dus nas //
T09TD4156E:102a-34: slar yang ji lta ba bzhin chos ni gnas pa'i phyir //
T09TD4156E:102a-35: thub pa'i gsung ni ri yi logs su yang dag bsdus //
T09TD4156E:102a-36: gnas skabs kun du drang srong che las thos pa ni //
T09TD4156E:102a-37: kun dga' bo nyid yin zhes nges par gyur pa yi //
T09TD4156E:102b-0: dge @102b slong de rnams kyis ni 'dus pa mthun pa ru //
T09TD4156E:102b-1: gsung bar zhu zhes lus 'phags thub pa la zhus so //
T09TD4156E:102b-2: de nas de dag rnams kyi dbus su de bzhugs nas //
T09TD4156E:102b-3: smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshig / gang du gang la gang gi tshe na gang zhig dang //
T09TD4156E:102b-4: 'di skad bdag gis 'di ni thos zhes gsungs par gyur //
T09TD4156E:102b-5: de phyir dgra bcom rnams kyis rjes su bcings pa des //
T09TD4156E:102b-6: thub pa chen po'i chos kyi bstan bcos gnas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:102b-7: gang zhig 'bad pas yang dag rab tu thob pa ni //
T09TD4156E:102b-8: mya ngan 'das shing 'da' la mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur //
T09TD4156E:102b-9: dgra bo khengs pa rnams kyi mya ngan ster ba po //
T09TD4156E:102b-10: skye dgu sdug bsngal rnams kyi mya ngan gcod pa po //
T09TD4156E:102b-11: me tog 'bras ldan mya ngan med ltar blta na sdug / dus su de gus sa bdag mya ngan med pa byung //
T09TD4156E:102b-12: 'phags pa moo rgya'i dpal des skye dgur phan don du //
T09TD4156E:102b-13: 'jig rten kun la mchod rten mtshan ma byed du bcug / gtum po mya ngan med nyid thob nas sa la ni //
T09TD4156E:102b-14: chos rgyal mya ngan med nyid las de thob par gyur //
T09TD4156E:102b-15: mngon du byas pa'i mchod rten bdun po de rnams las //
T09TD4156E:102b-16: drang srong de yi gdung rnams moo rgya des blangs nas //
T09TD4156E:102b-17: dpal ldan mchod rten ston ka'i sprin gyi 'od rnams kyi //
T09TD4156E:102b-18: stong phrag brgyad cur babs pa dus su zhag gis byas //
T09TD4156E:102b-19: dga' byed grong gnas mchod rten brgyad pa dang po ni //
T09TD4156E:102b-20: de yi dus su gus ldan klu rnams kyis bsrungs te //
T09TD4156E:102b-21: de phyir gdung rnams thob pa ma yin rgyal bo des //
T09TD4156E:102b-22: der byas pa la ma dad rgya chen gyur pa'o //
T09TD4156E:102b-23: de'i phyir yid kyis dgra bo 'bras bu rnams la ni //
T09TD4156E:102b-24: kun nas gnas shing g-yo ba'i dpal ni bsrungs na yang //
T09TD4156E:102b-25: mi skyong des ni ngur smrig gon pa las gzhan du //
T09TD4156E:102b-26: lta ba rnam par dag cing 'bras bu dang po thob //
T09TD4156E:102b-27: de las gzhan du gzhan gyis thub pa'i mchod pa ni //
T09TD4156E:102b-28: gang gis byas shing byed la byed par 'gyur ba ste //
T09TD4156E:102b-29: dam pa'i skye bos bsnyen pa'i 'bras bu bla na med //
T09TD4156E:102b-30: de yis thob cing 'thob la 'thob par 'gyur ba nyid //
T09TD4156E:102b-31: drang srong bzhugs pa la ni mchod pa sbyar nas sam //
T09TD4156E:102b-32: yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i gdung la phyag byas nas //
T09TD4156E:103a-0: yid kyi dang ba mnyam na 'bras bu mnyam pa @103a * //
T09TD4156E:103a-2: / sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni mkhas rnams shes par mdzod //
T09TD4156E:103a-3: de phyir rtag tu mchog gi chos ni mkhyen pa'o //
T09TD4156E:103a-4: mchog tu mi 'gyur 'pho ba med pa brnyes ldan pa //
T09TD4156E:103a-5: brtse ba dang bcas thub pa blo gros chen po ni //
T09TD4156E:103a-6: mchod 'os mchog la mchod la dam pa 'ongs pa'o //
T09TD4156E:103a-7: mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan mchog gi thugs mkhyen pa //
T09TD4156E:103a-8: gzhan la phan phyir mchog tu ngal bar byon pa de //
T09TD4156E:103a-9: mdzad pa mkhyen pa nyid kyis dam pa mkhas rnams kyi //
T09TD4156E:103a-10: 'di na gtang rag mchod pa gang phyir 'os ma yin //
T09TD4156E:103a-11: sa na 'chi dang rga ba dang mnyam 'jigs pa dang //
T09TD4156E:103a-12: mtho ris dag na 'pho ba dang mnyam yod min te //
T09TD4156E:103a-13: 'gro ba'i de gnyis mkhyen nas gang zhig gnas pa ste //
T09TD4156E:103a-14: de phyir mchod par bya ba dam pa su 'dra yod //
T09TD4156E:103a-15: skye ba yod na bde ba min pa 'byung ba ste //
T09TD4156E:103a-16: yang srid med las shin tu bde bas bde ba med //
T09TD4156E:103a-17: de ni brnyes shing gang gis 'gro la byin pa ste //
T09TD4156E:103a-18: de'i phyir mchod par bya ba dam pa su 'dra yod //
T09TD4156E:103a-19: de ltar thub pa'i skyes mchog de yi gus pa yis //
T09TD4156E:103a-20: mkhas nyid yon tan las min snyan dngags nus pas min //
T09TD4156E:103a-21: thub pa'i lung gi rjes su 'brangs nas 'di brtsams te //
T09TD4156E:103a-22: skye dgu rnams kyi phan dang bde ba'i phyir gyur cig / yul sh'a se ta ka'i gser mig ma'i bu dge slong slob dpon snyan dngags mkhan chen po //
T09TD4156E:103a-23: smra ba dang ldan pa phyogs su rnam par grags pa /
T09TD4156E:103a-24: btsun pa rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i /
T09TD4156E:103a-25: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las sku gdung rnam par bgo ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs so /
T09TD4156E:103a-27: // / sa stengs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug bstan pa'i bdag po mchog / yon tan mtshungs med phul byung du ma'i gter chen po //
T09TD4156E:103a-28: mkhas pa rnams kyi bla ma skye dgu rnams kyi dpal //
T09TD4156E:103a-29: bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung gis //
T09TD4156E:103a-30: 'jig rten kun na zla bral skyes mchog de nyid kyi //
T09TD4156E:103a-31: phrin las sgrub pa snye ba'i thugs dgongs rnam dag dang //
T09TD4156E:103a-32: mi rje lha sras gung thang rgyal mo yum sras dang //
T09TD4156E:103a-33: chos la gcig tu dkar ba'i lha gcig kun dga' 'bum //
T09TD4156E:103b-0: mang yul @103b skyi rong bzang mo yon tan skyid la sogs //
T09TD4156E:103b-1: chos ldan dam pa rnams kyis sbyin bdag bgyis pa'i ngor //
T09TD4156E:103b-2: 'phags pa rta dbyangs kyis mdzad thub pa'i mdzad pa 'di //
T09TD4156E:103b-3: sa dbang bzang po dang ni blo gros rgyal pos bsgyur //
T09TD4156E:103b-4: 'di bsgyur bsod nams rgyal po gang des pha ma dang //
T09TD4156E:103b-5: 'gro rnams lam gyi rgyal po dam pa 'dir zhugs te //
T09TD4156E:103b-6: nyes tshogs tshang tshing kun dang bdud bzhi'i rgyal po rnams //
T09TD4156E:103b-7: bcom nas chos kyi rgyal po dam pa thob par shog //
